T04TD3903E:108b-7: de bzhin du 'phags pa byams pa'i rnam par thar par rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste sgron me gcig khyim mam gnas khang ci 'dra ba cig tu rab tu bcug na /
T04TD3903E:108b-8: de rab tu bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags pa'i mun pa mun nag kyang sel zhing snang bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:108b-9: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i sgron me gcig sems can gyi bsam pa'i thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ci 'dra cig tu rab tu zhugs na de rab tu zhugs ma thag tu brjod du med pa'i bskal pa brgya stong phrag tu bsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i mun pa mun nag kyang sel zhing ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par bskyed do //
T04TD3903E:108b-11: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsebs par yang /
T04TD3903E:108b-12: 'od srungs 'di lta ste phug la sogs par lo brgya stong phrag 'das pa dang skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis til mar sgron me byas na de ci mun pa mun nag de ni lo brgya stong du bsags pa ste 'di nas mi 'gro zhes par 'gyur ram /
T04TD3903E:108b-13: bcom ldan 'das ma lags te gang gi phyir til mar sgron me bgyis na de la mi 'gro ba'i nus pa ma mchis te des gdon mi 'tshal ba nyid du 'gro bar bgyi'o //
T04TD3903E:108b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T04TD3903E:109a-0: 'od srungs de bzhin kho nar las dang nyon mongs pa brgya stong phrag du @109a * //
T04TD3903E:109a-1: mar bsags pa yang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gis 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:109a-3: byang chub kyi sems la zhugs na ni kha na ma tho ba thams cad 'dag pa la the tshom med do //
T04TD3903E:109a-4: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i mdor gsungs pa 'od srungs de gal te sems can gcig kha na ma tho ba chen po mi dge ba bcu po 'di rnams yang dag par ldan par gyur la de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa rgyu dang rkyen ldan pa la zhugs te 'dir bdag gam sems can nam srog gam gang byed pa po'am gang tshor ba po ci yang med do zhes ma byas mngon par 'du ma byas pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid la 'jug nas sems can de ngan 'gror 'gro bar nga mi smra'o zhes pa'i bar dang /
T04TD3903E:109a-5: ji srid du gang 'di ltar lhag par mos par 'gyur ba de la ni ltung ba dang ltung ba'i gnas ci yang med do //
T04TD3903E:109a-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T04TD3903E:109a-7: gnas med cing go skabs med pa ste gang sgrib pa med pa la ltung ba gnas pa 'di ni gnas yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:109a-8: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdor yang /
T04TD3903E:109a-9: mdor bsdus nas don med pa spang bar gsungs te /
T04TD3903E:109a-10: byams pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'jug bzhin pa na bde blag tu yongs su grol bar 'dod pas 'dod pa dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed 'dod pas tshogs la mngon par dga' ba med par 'byung bar bya zhing dgon pa dang nags dang bas mthar gnas pas brtson pa'i sems can yongs su spangs pa bdag nyid kyi 'khrul ba rtog pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba cang mi smra bar sgom pa la dga' bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa la mngon par dga' bas bsgom par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:109a-12: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mdor yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:109a-13: 'jam dpal chos thams cad sgyu ma dang sbrul pa lta bur yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa la sgyu ma lta bu'i sems ni chos rnams la gang du yang sgrib pa med do //
T04TD3903E:109a-14: 'jam dpal de lta na yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams rang gi kun du rtog pas dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ngo //
T04TD3903E:109b-0: med pa'i chos yongs su brtags nas @109b sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po rnams nyams su myong ngo ngo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:109b-1: gang yang mdo dang rgyud dang gsang sngags la sogs pa zab mo de rnams don 'di mngon par rjod par byed de //
T04TD3903E:109b-2: de rnams len pa dang 'dzin pa la sogs pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad par byed do //
T04TD3903E:109b-3: de ltar 'di'i nyes par spyod pa de 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur na skyes bu dam pa la brten nas chos zab mo nyan pa dang chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid du so sor rtog pa las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i yan lag bsgoms pa 'byung ba ni shin tu'o //
T04TD3903E:109b-4: 'dir dper brjod pa ni dge slong dpa' byin tshul khrims dang ldan pa bsod snyoms spyod pa bud med mchog gis mthong ste de yang chags pa drag pos brgyab des dbugs phyung bas rang bzhin du gnas pa gzugs mdzes pa dang lhan cig kun nas sbyar zhing mang du gnas la /
T04TD3903E:109b-5: de'i bdag po la yang dug dang bcas pa'i kha zas byin no //
T04TD3903E:109b-6: de yang shi zhes thos nas 'di ltar gyur te /
T04TD3903E:109b-7: kye ma bdag gis mi bzad pa'i las byas te gang gi phyir bdag gis 'dod pa yang spyad mi yang bsad do zhes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:109b-8: kye ma kyi hud bdag dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes de lus dang sems gdung ba drag por yongs su gyur te /
T04TD3903E:109b-9: su yis bdag phongs pa 'di las grol bar byed ces rnam par rmongs bzhin du 'khor zhing gtsug lag khang gi sgor sa la 'gyel lo //
T04TD3903E:109b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar bla mas dge slong de nags su khyer te bar snang la gnas nas lus las de bzhin gshegs pa mang po spros pa rnams kyis chos bstan pas ;
T04TD3903E:109b-11: lha'i bu stong phrag bzhi bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i de ma thag tu dge slong gi lus la ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dmyal ba'i me byung ba byin rlabs kyis zhi'o //
T04TD3903E:109b-12: dge slong de yang yongs su gdung ba dang bral te sems byang chub kyi rnam pa dang ldan pas skye ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu dpyad nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po zhes so //
T04TD3903E:110a-0: yangs pa can du dge slong dri ma med pa'i 'od zer bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na smad 'tshong ma yang dag par chags pas sngags kyis btab pa'i bsod snyoms lhung bzed du blugs pa'i de ma thag tu yang dag par chags te de @110a * //
T04TD3903E:110a-1: dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' nyams su myong ste gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas 'gyod pa chen po skyes pas yongs su gdungs pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid la lhag par mos pa bstan pa las dga' ba mchog dang ldan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes so //
T04TD3903E:110a-2: gang yang de lta bur gyur kyang zhing brngas pas na sog rtsa ltar 'ga' zhig tu lus kyi lhag ma cung zad lus pa dang /
T04TD3903E:110a-3: gang yang nyams su myong bar nges pa med pa'i las de'i rnam par smin par mi nus pa nyid ni /
T04TD3903E:110a-4: de la dbang ba'i stobs kyis rnam par smin pa phyis bsal nas tshogs kyi yan lag nyid du bskyed pas rnam par sbyong ngo //
T04TD3903E:110a-5: dge ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung ba dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T04TD3903E:110a-6: yang dag pa'i don so sor rtog pas zag pa med pa nyid du bskyed nas tshogs la mngon du phyogs par byed pas rnam par sbyong ngo //
T04TD3903E:110a-7: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i shes rab zag pa med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:110a-8: des ni las dmigs pa med pa dang bya ba med pa dang byed pa po med de gang zhig gang gis rnam par sbyang ba'o /
T04TD3903E:110a-9: don dam pa la gnas pas ni gang du yang 'jug pa'am ldog pa med do zhes chos thams cad ni mi dmigs pa kho nas las rnam par sbyong ngo //
T04TD3903E:110a-10: rmi lam du yang sdig pa zad pa'i mtshan ma rnams mthong ste 'di lta ste zas ngan pa la sogs pa skyugs pa dang zho dang 'o ma la sogs pa za ba'am skyugs pa dang nyi ma dang /
T04TD3903E:110a-13: me 'bar ba dang skyes bu gdug pa dang bcas pa nag po pham par byas pa dang dge slong dang dge slong ma mthong ba dang 'o ma can gyi shing dang glang po dang /
T04TD3903E:110a-14: khyu mchog dang ri dang seng ge'i khri dang khang bzangs dang gru la 'dzegs pa dang chos nyan pa las sdig pa zad par yang dag par mtshon par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:110a-15: de ltar re zhig pa'i las rnam par sbyong ba brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:110a-16: gal te de ltar rnam par dag pa yod na /
T04TD3903E:110a-17: bskal ba bye ba brgya yis kyang //
T04TD3903E:110a-18: lus can las rnams chud mi za //
T04TD3903E:110b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa'i gsung rab ci ltar zhe na de ni gnyen po bsgoms pa la sogs pa med na zhes shes par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:110b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i las ni rkyen rnams ma tshang ba bskyed pas mi skye ba nyid sbyong ba ste /
T04TD3903E:110b-5: ma skyes pa ni ci'i yang gegs su 'gyur ba med do //
T04TD3903E:110b-6: de la kun nas slong ba'i rkyen ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams te gang kun nas gnas pa las mi 'dod cing mi shes kyang blo ma sbyangs pa rnams bya ba ma yin pa byed pa'o blo sbyangs pa rnams ni dpa' bo ste de rnams zil gyis mi gnon zhing slar la de rnams kyis zil gyis gnon no //
T04TD3903E:110b-7: zil gyis gnon pa yang dag pa'i so sor rtog pas brdzun pa nyid du rtogs pa ste 'di rnams kyi skye gnas ni kun du rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:110b-8: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni yul rnams te gang gis 'di rnams 'bros pa rnams bzlog pa pos skra nas 'dzin pa bzhin du stobs kyis bkug cing bkug nas btson khang bzhin du bdud kyi yul la 'jog la /
T04TD3903E:110b-9: don dam pa pa'i rtsa ba nyid thob pa'i brtan pa rnams ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sa'i mthar thug pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang mi khugs shing zil gyis mi non te snga ma bzhin zhes pas las rnams skye pa med do zhes pa sdom pa'i tshul khrims khyad par bcas pa rgyas pa dang bcas pa brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:110b-10: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems gnas pa'i ched du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:110b-11: 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni gnyis te dge ba'i chos sdud kyi tshul khrims ni bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa'i ched du'o sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyang sems can yongs su smin pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:110b-12: 'di tsam yang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:110b-13: 'di lta ste mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i ched du sems gnas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:110b-14: lus dang sems ngal ba med pa'i yongs su smin pa gnyis so zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:110b-15: 'jug pa'i tshul khrims 'di'i rten du ldog pa'i tshul khrims te yid dang rjes su mthun pa phul du byung ba'i lha dang mir skye ba rnams dang de rnams nyid bdag gi dngos po dang /
T04TD3903E:111a-0: longs spyod dang phyi rol gyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can @111a * //
T04TD3903E:111a-1: gyi 'bras bu skyed par byed pa rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid rnams kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:111a-2: dge ba'i las kyi lam 'di rnams thos pa la sogs pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ji lta ji ltar nye bar byed pa de lta de ltar mchog tu bla na med pa dang mchog tu yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te gang gis rnam pa de lta bu'i 'bras bu thob par byed do //
T04TD3903E:111a-3: gzhan gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims rnam pa dgu gsungs pa de ni tshul khrims rnam pa gsum po 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te de skyon med pa ni ji ltar blangs pa'i bslab pa gcig las kyang ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-4: ma nyams shing ma ral ba ni bslab pa mang po las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-5: 'dres pa ma yin pa ni mi dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-6: nog nog por ma gyur pa ni srid pa'i longs spyod kyi don du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-7: 'di nyid thun tshags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims zhes brjod de ltung ba med pa'i rnam pa gzhan gyis nog nog por ma gyur pa'i rnam pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-8: gang skyon med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims de rang dbang can de srid pa'i 'bangs las grol ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-9: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa rnams kyis tshul khrims 'di bsngags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:111a-10: ting nge 'dzin yang 'grub par byed pa ste tshul khrims dang ldan pa las sems mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:111a-11: de'i phyir 'di 'dra ba'i tshul khrims ni bsten par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:111a-12: de 'phags pa dpa' bos gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:111a-13: gang zhig lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa //
T04TD3903E:111a-14: 'di ni mdor bsdus tshul khrims yin gsungs te //
T04TD3903E:111a-15: 'di la gnas rnams 'gro la phan pa'i don //
T04TD3903E:111a-16: sems pa khyad par 'bras bu dang bcas 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:111a-18: bzod pa ni bzod par byed pa ste /
T04TD3903E:111a-19: don dam par ni rnam par rtog zhi ba //
T04TD3903E:111a-20: bzod pa'i de nyid rig pas bzod par gsungs //
T04TD3903E:111a-21: de phyir 'jig rten rmi lam ltar rtog pa //
T04TD3903E:111a-22: rnam rtog nye bar zhi la 'bad par bya //
T04TD3903E:111a-23: brtson 'grus ni dge ba'i las la spro ba ste /
T04TD3903E:111a-24: sa gzhi mtha' dag me mdag tu bya ba'am //
T04TD3903E:111b-0: mtshon gyis bkang ba rkang @111b pas mnan byas nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-1: gang zhig thub dbang lta ba'am zhi ba'i chos //
T04TD3903E:111b-2: bcud len btung phyir mchog tu spro ba'o //
T04TD3903E:111b-3: bsam gtan ni gzung bar bya ba la sems rtse gcig pa nyid yin la /
T04TD3903E:111b-4: de yang lus dang sems dben pa dag kho na las 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:111b-5: ji skad du 'phags pa zla ba sgron mar gsungs pa //
T04TD3903E:111b-6: gang rnams 'dod pa spangs shing me lta bu'i //
T04TD3903E:111b-7: bu dang chung ma rnams la sred spangs nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-8: shin tu skrag pas khyim nas nges thon pa //
T04TD3903E:111b-9: de rnams byang chub mchog 'di rnyed mi dka' //
T04TD3903E:111b-10: gang rnams khyim gyi nang na gnas bzhin du //
T04TD3903E:111b-11: byang chub dam pa mchog 'di thob pa yi //
T04TD3903E:111b-12: sangs rgyas gang yang sngon chad byung ba dang //
T04TD3903E:111b-13: ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur gang zhig bzhugs pa med //
T04TD3903E:111b-14: rgyal srid mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-15: dben pa 'dod pas nags kyi nang gnas na //
T04TD3903E:111b-16: nyon mongs rab tu spangs shing bdud bcom nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-17: rdul bral 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub rtogs //
T04TD3903E:111b-20: grong dang grong khyer la dga' rnams spangs nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-21: bse ru rtag tu gnyis pa med 'byung ltar //
T04TD3903E:111b-22: nags khrod dben pa rtag tu bsten byas nas //
T04TD3903E:111b-23: ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:111b-26: 'jig rten dga' ba rtag tu bde min pas //
T04TD3903E:111b-27: gang la 'dir mdza' mi mdza' dga' med par //
T04TD3903E:111b-28: gang zhig nags dang ri sul mngon dga' des //
T04TD3903E:111b-29: shin tu bde ba dri med rjes myong 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:111b-30: gang 'dir bdag gi 'dzin pa ci yang med //
T04TD3903E:111b-31: gang la yongs 'dzin kun du yod min par //
T04TD3903E:111b-32: 'jig rten 'dir ni bse ru bzhin spyod pa //
T04TD3903E:111b-33: de ni mkha' la rlung bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:111b-34: gang rnams slar yang log par rab zhugs te //
T04TD3903E:111b-35: byis ba rtag tu 'dod yon la dga' rnams //
T04TD3903E:111b-36: ji ltar bya rgod ro la lhag mos ltar //
T04TD3903E:111b-37: rtag tu dbang 'gyur grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:111b-39: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdor yang /
T04TD3903E:111b-40: mtha' yas skyon gyis thibs po khyim ni spangs nas sems ltos med pa de rnams ni //
T04TD3903E:111b-41: nges pa rtag tu gnas su dga' ba thob cing yon tan ldan rnams dbang po zhi //
T04TD3903E:111b-42: de rnams bud med skyes pa rnams dang 'dris pa gang du'ang yod min zhing //
T04TD3903E:112a-0: @112a * // bsam pa dag pa dri ma med rnams bse ru lta bur gcig pur gnas //
T04TD3903E:112a-1: de rnams rnyed pas dga' bar mi 'gyur ma rnyed pas kyang yid mi zhum //
T04TD3903E:112a-2: 'dod pa chung zhing ngan don rnams kyis mngon dga' rgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs //
T04TD3903E:112a-4: slar yang rigs pa ma yin pa'i spyod pas de rnams dbul po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:112a-5: de rnams rab tu byung zhing bstan pa 'di la rnyed pa tsam gyis tshim pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:112a-6: de rnams sdig pa 'chags par yang mi 'gyur na ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa lta ci smos /
T04TD3903E:112a-7: de rnams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan spangs nas bdag ni dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid dam 'cha' bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:112a-8: ji srid du lus dang srog la ltos pa dang bcas pa ni chos yongs su tshol bar nga mi smra'o //
T04TD3903E:112a-9: skyes bu rmongs pa de rnams la ji lta ba de ltar ston pa drug la mi smod do //
T04TD3903E:112a-10: de rnams ni gzhan du smra ba gzhan du byed pa slu bar byed pa ste /
T04TD3903E:112a-11: de rnams la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta ci smos zhes so //
T04TD3903E:112a-12: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs par 'od srungs 'di lta ste nor bu rin po che mi gtsang bar ltung na don med par 'gyur ba dang smad par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:112a-13: 'od srungs de bzhin du mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i mi gtsang bar ltung ba blta bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:112a-14: cung zhig kyang med pa la ni lha dang mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:112a-16: rang don tsam la 'gro ba yi //
T04TD3903E:112a-17: phyugs kyang 'di ltar nyon mongs te //
T04TD3903E:112a-18: 'gro ba'i don sgrub bsod nams can /
T04TD3903E:112a-19: de rnams skye bo chen po'o //
T04TD3903E:112a-20: grang dang rlung sogs sdug bsngal rnams //
T04TD3903E:112a-21: rang don sems pas kyang bzod na //
T04TD3903E:112a-22: 'gro ba'i don du zhugs pa rnams //
T04TD3903E:112a-23: de rnams ci ltar bzod mi byed //
T04TD3903E:112a-24: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyang ni //
T04TD3903E:112a-25: snying rje can gyis bzod bya na //
T04TD3903E:112a-26: grang dang rlung sogs sdug bsngal rnams //
T04TD3903E:112a-27: de rnams da lta ci phyir sems //
T04TD3903E:112a-28: zhes pas 'jig rten phan lta dang //
T04TD3903E:112a-30: rtag tu sbyor bas bsam gtan ni //
T04TD3903E:112a-31: rtsom la yang dag 'bad pa byed //
T04TD3903E:112a-32: ngal bsos ngal bsos bsrubs pa yis //
T04TD3903E:112b-1: de nyid sbyor dang sbyor ba la'ang //
T04TD3903E:112b-2: khyad par rtogs pa med na'o //
T04TD3903E:112b-4: shes rab mi brtson blo can gang phyir lta ba ni //
T04TD3903E:112b-5: dag par mi 'gyur de med na yang tshul khrims med //
T04TD3903E:112b-6: de med na ni yang dag ting 'dzin thob med cing //
T04TD3903E:112b-7: de dang bral bas sdug bsngal zad pa de bzhin nyid //
T04TD3903E:112b-8: ji skad du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin rgyal por gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:112b-9: gzhan yang ting 'dzin 'di na sgom mod kyang //
T04TD3903E:112b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes mi 'jig na //
T04TD3903E:112b-11: de yi nyon mongs slar yang 'khrug 'gyur te //
T04TD3903E:112b-12: lhag spyod 'dir ni ting 'dzin sgom pa bzhin //
T04TD3903E:112b-14: mi 'jig pa ni rnam par mi dpyod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:112b-15: de ltar ni skyil krung dam po bcas nas dus ring por zhi gnas de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i drang srong lhag spyod kyi ral pa'i bug par gnas mi g-yo ba'o zhes te byi ba bu skyes pa'i bu dang tsha bo rnams kyis dus ring por ral pa dam dum du byas te sa la ltung la /
T04TD3903E:112b-16: drang srong de yang dus ring po na ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas ral pa de lta bu mthong ste /
T04TD3903E:112b-17: mnyam par gzhag pas yongs su shes nas zhe sdang zhing gtum par gyur nas der smras pa bdag gang na byi ba gsod cing za ba der skye bar gyur cig ces log pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byi la'i mngal du skyes nas de ltar byed pa 'phags pa rnams kyis gzigs te gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:112b-18: kye ma ting nge 'dzin shin tu de'i bdag nyid du gyur kyang lhag mthong med na mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin bzhin du nyon mongs pa rtsa ba nas 'don mi nus te /
T04TD3903E:112b-19: de ltar ni yun ring por yang ting nge 'dzin gyis bsal ba'i nyon mongs pa slar 'khrugs pa rnams kyis lhag spyod byi lar byas so //
T04TD3903E:112b-21: de yang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i sems nyid byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:112b-22: phul du byung thob pa ni shes rab ste /
T04TD3903E:112b-23: de ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod pas de'i phyir chos kyi de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa las shes bya dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin zhing song bas na pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:112b-24: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa ste rtogs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-0: shes rab kyang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ni shes bya'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes pa med pa la sogs pas de las @113a * //
T04TD3903E:113a-1: bzlog pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin par brjod do //
T04TD3903E:113a-2: de kho na nyid de yang gang zag dang chos kyi stong pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:113a-3: yang thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i ye shes skye ba'i rim gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa ni pha rol tu phul du byung ba'i mthar phyin pas na pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo ni pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la shes rab kho na pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:113a-5: lung du yang ngo bo'i rkyen gyi mtha' yis chos kyang brjod kyi chos nyid kho na ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:113a-6: dper na gsher ba chu'i khams so gsher ba nyid chu'i khams zhes pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:113a-7: yang na pa ra ma ni don dam pa ste /
T04TD3903E:113a-8: pa ra ma las byung ba ni p'a ra mi yin pas don dam pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la dmigs nas skyes pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-9: yang na pha rol gyi sgras de bzhin nyid brjod de thams cad kyi pha rol du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:113a-10: pha rol de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-11: rnam par bshad pa'i rnam pa 'di thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ma bar mar btsal bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-12: ci ltar na chos kyi sku'i mdzad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:113a-13: de'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:113a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na khams gsum du 'khor ba pa sel bar 'byung ba'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-15: gang gi phyir 'di ni rig pa ste ma rig pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin la ma rig pa'i rtsa ba can ni 'khor ba'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-16: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:113a-17: las dang nyon mongs pas 'phangs pa'i skye ba'i rgyu ni 'khor ba'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-19: de ltar ni bden pa gnyis mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-20: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis mi dge ba 'dod pa na spyod pa kho na dang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa khams gsum pa'i las ni 'du byed do //
T04TD3903E:113a-21: las de'i sa bon gang yin pa des yongs su bsgos pa'i sems ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes zla ba grags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113a-22: mdzod du ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ma'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig gi phung po lnga rnam par shes pa zhes bshad do //
T04TD3903E:113b-0: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen @113b gyis ming dang gzugs te /
T04TD3903E:113b-1: de yang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas skabs su ma'i mngal du tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:113b-2: 'byung ba dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ji ltar srid pa ste de nyid nur nur po zhes brjod cing rim gyis mer mer po dang gor gor po dang nar nar po dang yan lag 'gyus pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams so //
T04TD3903E:113b-3: de la phung po bzhi po rnams ni yang srid par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir ram yul la gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir nyid ming nyid do //
T04TD3903E:113b-4: 'byung ba dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni grang ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par 'gyur ba skye ba'i phyir gzugs nyid do //
T04TD3903E:113b-5: ming dang gzugs de nyid rim gyis 'phel bar son pa ni mig la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su skye mched drug gi rkyen du 'gyur zhing gnas skabs der skye mched drug rdzogs par 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:113b-6: skye mched nyid ni sems dang sems las byung ba skye bo'i sgo'i don gyis na'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-7: skye mched drug po de rnams yongs su smin pa las dang yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa las dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pa'i bdag nyid reg pa skye'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-8: 'di ni rten gyi bye brag gis rnam pa drug go //
T04TD3903E:113b-9: reg pa bde ba nyams su myong bya la sogs pa'i ngo bo gang 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i tshor ba skye'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-10: de bzhin du 'du byed kyis 'phangs pa'i yan lag sred pa dang len pas gsos pas 'chi ba'i dus su srid par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:113b-11: de las ji ltar 'phangs pa'i rim gyis skye'o rgas so 'chi'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-12: de la sred pa gang zhe na /
T04TD3903E:113b-13: gang bde ba'i tshor ba la mi 'bral bar mngon par 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:113b-14: sdug bsngal la 'bral bar mngon par 'dod pa dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnyis kar mngon par 'dod pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-15: len pa ni gang 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams la 'dun zhing chags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-16: de dmigs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang lta ba'i len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang bdag gi dngos po'i nye bar len pa'o //
T04TD3903E:113b-17: 'dod chags des 'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len par 'gyur bas so //
T04TD3903E:113b-18: sred pa dang len pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T04TD3903E:113b-19: khyad par med par yang srid la /
T04TD3903E:114a-0: @114a * // mngon par dga' ba ni sred pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-1: khyad par gyis ni len pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-2: yang na ring ba'i rgyu sred pa dang nye ba'i rgyu len pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-3: de'i phyir de ltar 'du byed kyi sa bon sred pa dang len pas gsos pas 'bras bu bskyed la mngon du phyogs pa ni srid pa zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:114a-4: mdo las ni 'dod pa'i srid pa dang gzugs kyi srid pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa zhes gsungs te /
T04TD3903E:114a-5: 'on kyang las kyi srid pa kho na la dgongs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-6: srid pa'i de ma thag tu'ang 'dir rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de skye bar 'gyur te ming dang gzugs la sogs pa rim gyis tshor ba ji srid pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:114a-7: / skyes pa'i dga' ba dang 'chi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:114a-8: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas bdag med pa can gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshogs 'di kun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:114a-9: de ltar 'dir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ni mdor bsdus nas yan lag bzhi rnams su rnam par gzhag par byas so zhes rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-10: 'di lta ste 'phen byed kyi yan lag dang 'phangs pa'i yan lag dang mngon par 'grub byed kyi yan lag dang mngon par grub pa'i yan lag go zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:114a-11: gsum dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis so zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin te ;
T04TD3903E:114a-12: yan lag bcu gnyis po bsdus pa las yan lag bzhi rnams su bsgrags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-13: gang 'di rnams gnas skabs kyi bar la reg pa la ste gang bar skabs kho nar shi ba la ma yin la gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa la'ang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:114a-14: de ltar re zhig skye ba gnyis kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i dbang du byas nas de bzhin du brjod la skye ba gsum du yang rnam par gzhag ste /
T04TD3903E:114a-15: de la ma rig pa dang 'du byed 'das pa'i skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-16: rnam par shes pa nas srid pa'i bar ni da ltar gyi skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-17: skye ba dang rga shi ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:114a-18: de la ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyi 'du byed 'das pa'i skye bar byas pa rnams kyis skye ba 'dir nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang por byas nas tshor ba ji srid par rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:114b-0: da ltar ba'i srid pa dang len pa dang srid pa rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba la @114b sogs pa bskyed do //
T04TD3903E:114b-1: skye ba gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa 'di'i dgos pa dang sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar ma rnams la kun du rmongs pa bzlog pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114b-2: de ltar gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyis 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba bskyed pa'i dus na /
T04TD3903E:114b-3: sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa rnams kyang yod la de rnams kyis gang ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba skyed par byed pa de bzhin du ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyi 'du byed rnams kyis kyang bya ba ste /
T04TD3903E:114b-4: ming dang gzugs las gzhan pa'i skye ba la sogs pa rnams med pa'i phyir de rnams nyid rnam pa gzhan gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:114b-5: de'i phyir skye ba'i rnam par gzhag pa gnyis 'gal ba med do rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bdag nyid dang lam gsum du rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:114b-6: de la nyon mongs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis las dang skye ba 'phen par byed la bden pa mthong ba la las yod kyang yang srid 'phen pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:114b-7: nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pas yang srid pa'i sa bon srid par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:114b-8: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyar bas 'ching bar byed pa'i phyir skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yang rgyu mtshan no //
T04TD3903E:114b-9: de nyid kyi phyir dgra bcom pa la nying mtshams sbyor ba med do nyon mongs pa can gyi sems med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:114b-10: las dge ba dang mi dge ba yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:114b-11: de'i tshe nyid na lus dang sems dag ngal ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang phyis kyang rnam par smin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:114b-12: skye ba yang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad kyi gzhi rten yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114b-14: dang po gnyis ni rgyu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114b-15: phyi ma 'bras bu'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:114b-16: / ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i lam mo //
T04TD3903E:114b-17: 'du byed dang srid pa las kyi lam mo //
T04TD3903E:114b-18: yan lag lhag ma rnams rnam par smin pa'i lam mo zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:114b-19: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:115a-0: @115a * // thog ma mtha' dang dbus med 'di //
T04TD3903E:115a-1: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du ni //
T04TD3903E:115a-2: phan tshun rgyu mtshan 'khor bar byed //
T04TD3903E:115a-4: de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba la thog ma med de sngar med pa'i sems can skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:115a-5: thog ma dang ldan pa nyid na rgyu med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:115a-6: skye ba rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir rgyu zad pa las tha ma ni rigs te sa bon zad pa las myu gu bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:115a-7: sangs rgyas byung ba so sor sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:115a-8: gang gnyen po dang phrad pa na 'bri ba'i chos can de rnams gnyen po'i phyogs shin tu 'phel ba na shin tu 'dzad pa'i chos srid pa yin te gser gyi dri ma la sogs pa bzhin /
T04TD3903E:115a-9: 'khor ba pa yang bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnyen po'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa yod na 'bri ba'i chos can yin no zhes pa'i tshad ma las 'khor ba'i rgyun chad pa yod do //
T04TD3903E:115a-10: 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:115a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa'i lung las kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:115a-12: ji skad du rigs pa drug cu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:115a-13: ma rig rkyen gyis 'jig rten zhes //
T04TD3903E:115a-14: gang phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs //
T04TD3903E:115a-16: rnam par rtog par cis mi 'thad //
T04TD3903E:115a-17: ma rig 'gags par gyur pa na //
T04TD3903E:115a-19: de phyir mi shes kun brtags par //
T04TD3903E:115a-20: ci yi phyir ni gsal mi 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:115a-21: gnas med dmigs pa yod ma yin //
T04TD3903E:115a-22: rtsa ba med cing gnas pa med //
T04TD3903E:115a-23: ma rig sa bon las byung ba //
T04TD3903E:115a-24: thog ma dbus mtha' rnam par spangs //
T04TD3903E:115a-25: chu shing dbus bzhin snying po med //
T04TD3903E:115a-26: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste //
T04TD3903E:115a-27: kun rmongs grong khyer 'jigs rung ba //
T04TD3903E:115a-28: 'gro ba sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
T04TD3903E:115a-30: gang zhig bden par rab brjod pa //
T04TD3903E:115a-31: de yang 'phags rnams brdzun zhes gsungs //
T04TD3903E:115a-32: de las lhag ma gzhan ci zhig / ces so //
T04TD3903E:115a-34: dngos por khas len yod na ni //
T04TD3903E:115a-36: lta ba ma rungs yongs su 'dzin //
T04TD3903E:115a-37: de yis bslangs pa'i rtsod pa byed //
T04TD3903E:115b-0: @115b de ni lta ba kun gyi rgyu //
T04TD3903E:115b-2: de phyir de ni yongs shes na //
T04TD3903E:115b-3: lta dang nyon mongs yongs su zad //
T04TD3903E:115b-4: cis de yongs shes 'gyur zhe na //
T04TD3903E:115b-5: rten cing 'brel par mthong ba las //
T04TD3903E:115b-6: brten nas skyes pa ma skyes par //
T04TD3903E:115b-7: de nyid rig pa'i mchog gis gsungs //
T04TD3903E:115b-8: log pa'i shes pas zil mnan pa //
T04TD3903E:115b-9: bden min bden par 'du shes rnams //
T04TD3903E:115b-10: yongs su 'dzin dang rtsod sogs kyi //
T04TD3903E:115b-11: rim pa chags las rab tu 'jug / nyon mongs lag 'gro g-yo can gyis //
T04TD3903E:115b-12: 'ga' zhig kho na'i gnas rnyed pas //
T04TD3903E:115b-15: sems ni gnas dang bcas rnams la //
T04TD3903E:115b-16: dug can skyon du cis mi 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:115b-17: gang tshe tha mal gnas pa yang //
T04TD3903E:115b-19: ji ltar byis pas gzugs brnyan la //
T04TD3903E:115b-20: bden pa'i 'du shes kyis zhen pa //
T04TD3903E:115b-21: de bzhin yul gyi dra ba ru //
T04TD3903E:115b-23: dngos po gzugs brnyan lta bur ni //
T04TD3903E:115b-24: bzung nas ye shes spyan rnams kyis //
T04TD3903E:115b-25: yul gyi ming can 'dam la ni //
T04TD3903E:115b-26: bdag nyid chen po thogs pa med //
T04TD3903E:115b-27: byis pa rnams ni gzugs la zhen ;
T04TD3903E:115b-28: / bar ma rnams ni chags bral 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:115b-29: blo mchog rnams kyis gzugs kyi ni //
T04TD3903E:115b-30: rang bzhin shes pas rnam par grol //
T04TD3903E:115b-31: gnas med bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T04TD3903E:115b-32: chags pa med cing chags bral min //
T04TD3903E:115b-33: gnas yod na ni chags pa dang //
T04TD3903E:115b-34: chags dang bral ba skye bar 'gyur ;
T04TD3903E:115b-35: / sdug ces pa las chags 'gyur la //
T04TD3903E:115b-36: de las bzlog las chags bral te //
T04TD3903E:115b-37: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin dben par //
T04TD3903E:115b-40: 'khor ba de yang skyon lnga dang ldan par rig par bya ste sdug bsngal nyid dang longs spyod zad pa dang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang 'ching ba dang sgrib pas so //
T04TD3903E:115b-41: de ni phongs pa 'di rnams te /
T04TD3903E:115b-42: nad med pas phongs pa ni rnam pa mang po'i nad dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang ngal bas so //
T04TD3903E:116a-0: longs spyod kyis phongs pa ni dga' ba phun som tshogs pa la mi dga' ba'i rgud pa nges par 'brel @116a * //
T04TD3903E:116a-2: nye du nyams pa ni de rgud pa dang bral ba las rjes su mya ngan byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:116a-3: tshul khrims nyams pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spangs kyang sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang 'gal ba 'dod pa'i sred pa'i bag la nyal gyi rjes su 'ching ba'o //
T04TD3903E:116a-4: lta ba nyams pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams de dang 'gal ba ma rig pa'i bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa las so //
T04TD3903E:116a-5: skye ba'i rgyu na 'di yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi srid par brjod do //
T04TD3903E:116a-6: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:116a-8: skye ba'i srid pa 'gro ba rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma dang /
T04TD3903E:116a-9: de'i pha rol sngon dus kyi srid pa dang /
T04TD3903E:116a-10: skad cig ma tha ma la 'chi ba'i srid pa'o //
T04TD3903E:116a-11: gang la pha rol 'chi ba dang skye ba'i srid pa'i 'gro ba dag gi bar du 'byung ba'i phyir bar ma do'i srid pa ste khams gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:116a-12: gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas gzhan yongs su bcad pa med de /
T04TD3903E:116a-13: gang thob pa'i don du bar ma do'i srid pa 'grub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:116a-14: bar ma do'i srid pa de yang 'gro ba 'phen par byed pa'i las nyid kyis 'gro ba thob pa'i ched du 'phen pa'i phyir 'gro ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba der gang 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon dus kyi srid pa de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa ste /
T04TD3903E:116a-15: dbang po kun tshang ba lo lnga drug lon pa'i byis pa'i tshad tsam pa dbang po gsal ba /
T04TD3903E:116a-16: thogs pa med pa yid kyi rang bzhin lus shin tu dang ba 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid na dri za bas dri za rigs mthun pa dang lha'i mig dag pas mthong ba las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang ldan pa mi ldog pa ste /
T04TD3903E:116a-17: nyi ma bdun nam nyi ma bdun pa bdun nam ji srid skye ba'i tshogs pa ma thob pa'i dus kyi bar du sdod pa ni bzhed pa tha dad las bsdad nas pha ma dag sbyor ba mthong ste /
T04TD3903E:116a-18: ji ltar rigs par 'dod chags sam zhe sdang skyes pas phyin ci log tu gyur nas rtse bar 'dod pas yul der phyin nas /
T04TD3903E:116a-19: gnas skabs de la bdag nyid yang dag par mos shing mngal gyi gnas yang dag par thob pa la dga' ba skyes nas gnas so //
T04TD3903E:116b-0: de nas 'di pha ma'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po gyur pas phung @116b po gor gor por 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:116b-1: pho ni ma'i lto ba g-yas pa la brten nas rgyab tu kha phyogs shing tsog tsog por 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:116b-2: 'on te mor gyur na ni g-yon pa la brten te lto ba la kha bltas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-3: mo yir gyur pa'am pho yir gyur pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhugs te /
T04TD3903E:116b-4: gnas ji lta bas phyis ma ning du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:116b-5: de ltar sgo nga las skyes pa dang mngal skyes dag skye gnas su 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-6: drod gsher las skye ba ni las ji lta bar gtsang dang mi gtsang ba'i dri ma mngon par 'dod pa las te /
T04TD3903E:116b-7: rdzus skyes ni gnas mngon par 'dod pas so //
T04TD3903E:116b-8: dmyal ba pa rnams su mngon par 'dod pa ni blo phyin ci log nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:116b-9: dmyal ba'i bar do'i srid pa ni spyi'u tshugs so //
T04TD3903E:116b-10: mngal du 'jug pa bzhi rnams te rmongs pa rnams ni mngal du 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba shes bzhin ma yin pa nyid de gcig go //
T04TD3903E:116b-11: 'khor los sgyur ba bsod nams rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams 'jug pa kho na shes bzhin du'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-12: rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jug pa dang gnas pa dag go //
T04TD3903E:116b-13: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba yang ste bzhi pa'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-14: de la sgo nga las skyes pa'i gnas pa ni sems can gang sgo nga las skye ba rnams te /
T04TD3903E:116b-15: ngang pa dang rma bya la sogs pa rnams lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-16: mi 'ga' zhig rnams kyang ste dper na khrung khrung mo las skyes pa'i brag dang nye brag dang ri dags 'dzin gyi ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rgyal po lnga len gyi bu lnga brgya rnams lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-17: mngal skyes ni sems can gang mngal nas skyes pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:116b-18: mi dang glang po che dang rta la sogs pa lta bu dang yi dags kha cig kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:116b-19: drod gsher las skye ba ni gang 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skyes pa rnams te sbrang bu la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:116b-20: mi 'ga' zhig kyang ste nga las nu dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang thi ba'i phreng ba can ma dang aa mra skyong ma la sogs pa lta bu'o ;
T04TD3903E:116b-21: / rdzus skyes ni sems can rkang lag dang nyid lag thams cad ldan pa la lan cig la skye ba rnams te /
T04TD3903E:116b-22: lha rnams dang dmyal ba rnams dang srid pa bar ma rnams dang yi dags 'ga' zhig dang /
T04TD3903E:117a-0: klu dang nam mkha' lding la sogs pa'i dud 'gro 'ga' zhig dang bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams @117a * //
T04TD3903E:117a-2: / skye gnas thams cad las rdzus skyes mchog go //
T04TD3903E:117a-3: byang chub sems dpa' mngal skyes kyi skye gnas la brten pa ni /
T04TD3903E:117a-4: nye du'i 'brel pas sh'a kya'i rigs chen po chos la gzhug pa'i don dang 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs so zhes gzhan rnams rim gro cher bskyed pa'i don dang mir gyur pa rnams kyis kyang grub pa 'di thob po zhes gdul bya rnams spro ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-5: gzhan du na rigs dang gdung yongs su mi shes pa ci 'di sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am lha 'am sha za zhes pa 'di ltar yongs su rtog par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:117a-6: kha cig na re rdzus skyes kyi sems can shi ba rnams kyi lus mi gnas te mar me bzhin mi snang bar 'gyur bas sku gdung rnams gzhag pa'i don du'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:117a-7: de ma yin te rdzu 'phrul gyi byin rlabs las sku gdung rnams gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:117a-8: dngos po las ni sku gdung rnams mi 'dod pa kho na ste sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo can bzhi can gyi 'gro ba 'di yang zas bzhis gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-9: de la kham bzhi can gyi 'gro ba 'di yang zas bzhis gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-10: de la kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa'i khams na'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-11: gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang /
T04TD3903E:117a-12: rnam par shes pa zhes pa zas gsum ni khams gsum rnams na'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-13: de la reg pa ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram du srog chags rnams kyis bye mar bzhag pa'i sgo nga rnams ma'i reg pa dran pa rnams 'drul bar mi 'gyur la gang dran pa de rnams 'drul ba lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:117a-14: yid la sems pa ni dper na mu ge yod na thal ba'i thum bu la phyir brtags pa'i bu dag yun ring por gnas pa bshig pa ni yi chad nas shi ba dang /
T04TD3903E:117a-15: rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa'i skyes bu rnams sgrub pa'i phung po chen po la thad do zhes te drung du song ste kun du ma nams [?] nas re ba chad nas shi ba lta bu'o//
T04TD3903E:117a-16: gal te gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad srid pa rnams gso bar byed pas zas yin no //
T04TD3903E:117b-0: de lta na yang gtso bo yin te lus rgyas pa'i don du kham du byas pa'i zas dang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rgyas pa'i ched du reg pa dang yid la sems pas yang srid 'phen pa dang @117b 'phangs zin pa ni las kyis bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las mngon par 'grub po //
T04TD3903E:117b-1: 'gro ba gang na zas su yod ce na thams cad na thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:117b-2: de bzhin du skye gnas rnams na'o //
T04TD3903E:117b-3: dmyal ba na kham du byas pa'i zas ci ltar zhe na /
T04TD3903E:117b-4: lcags kyi tho lum 'bar ba dang zangs bskol ba'o //
T04TD3903E:117b-5: nyams par byed pa'i zas ni dmyal ba pa rnams na ste des kyang bkres pa dang sgom pa 'joms par nus pa'o //
T04TD3903E:117b-6: nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams na kham du byas pa'i zas mi bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:117b-7: de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba rnams bshad zin to //
T04TD3903E:117b-8: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa dang mtshams sbyor ba dang khams dang sa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba zhes pa chos drug ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na la 'dod kyi gzhan la ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:117b-9: 'dir bar ma do'i srid pa nying mtshams sbyor ba yang skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:117b-10: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dag ni tshor ba btang snyoms la'o //
T04TD3903E:117b-11: 'on kyang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang sems med pa la de dag med do //
T04TD3903E:117b-12: gang gi tshe 'di'i rten rnam par 'gyur bar rtsom pa de'i tshe nges par 'di'i rten de dang 'brel pa ste /
T04TD3903E:117b-13: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir dang de ma thag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par don med pa'i phyir 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag bzhin du sngar gyi sems yun ring po 'gags pa las kyang skyes par gyur pa'i sems mngon du gyur nas phyis 'chi 'pho'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:117b-14: skye ba las ni sems chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:117b-15: 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi sems med par rigs pa nyid ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:117b-16: gzhan yang gang snang ba med pa'i 'gro ba pa'i sems can rnams phyi rol pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga can dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig lam du mi 'ong ba de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam gyi phyogs la snang bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyang shin tu mang ste /
T04TD3903E:117b-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang mi de tsam med do //
T04TD3903E:118a-1: ltar sems can tshad med pa snang ba de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par 'dul bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:118a-2: de rnams sems can gzhan rnams kyis shes pa yang med do zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118a-3: 'dul ba yang skye ba med pa la sogs pa bstan pas so //
T04TD3903E:118a-4: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:118a-7: 'di las gzhan pa'i sems can gang //
T04TD3903E:118a-9: me long la brten gang 'dra bar //
T04TD3903E:118a-10: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba na //
T04TD3903E:118a-11: de ni der 'phos ma yin la //
T04TD3903E:118a-12: de med na ni de mi 'byung //
T04TD3903E:118a-13: de bzhin phung po skye 'gyur zhing //
T04TD3903E:118a-14: srid pa bar dor mtshams sbyor ba //
T04TD3903E:118a-15: mkhas pas de 'phos ma yin par //
T04TD3903E:118a-16: thams cad tshe na nges par bya //
T04TD3903E:118a-17: mdor na stong pa'i chos rnams kyis //
T04TD3903E:118a-18: stong pa'i chos rnams skyed par byed //
T04TD3903E:118a-19: las 'bras byed po za ba po //
T04TD3903E:118a-20: kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas bstan //
T04TD3903E:118a-21: chos rnams rgyu las skye ba la //
T04TD3903E:118a-22: 'gal ba nam yang yod ma yin //
T04TD3903E:118a-23: gang phyir rgyu ni rgyus stong bas //
T04TD3903E:118a-24: skye ba med par rtogs par bya //
T04TD3903E:118a-25: zhes te sems can gyi 'jig rten brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:118a-26: snod kyi 'jig rten brjod par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:118a-27: 'dir sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis grub pa nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu drug pa rgyar grangs med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118a-28: der sprin gyi char pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dpangs su 'bum phrag brgyad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118a-29: chu lhag ma yongs su gyur pa gser gyi sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dpangs su stong phrag nyi shu lhag pa'i sum 'bum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118a-30: 'di dag gi rgya'i tshad ni stong phrag gsum dang phyed dang lnga brgya lhag pa'i 'bum phrag bcu gnyis so //
T04TD3903E:118a-32: der ri rab la bskor te gnya' shing 'dzin dang gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can dang blta na sdug dang rta rna dang rnam 'dud dang mu khyud 'dzin te gser gyi ri bdun rnams so //
T04TD3903E:118a-33: de las phyi rol na gling bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:118a-34: de rnams kyi phyi rol na 'khor [?] yug gi lcags ri ste brgyad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-0: lhun po ni gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya dang shel gyi @118b rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:118b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i logs bee d'urya'i rang bzhin du snang ste /
T04TD3903E:118b-2: de'i 'od 'dir phog pas nam mkha' bee d'urya'i kha dog tu snang ngo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:118b-3: ri 'di rnams kyang chu la stong phrag brgyad nur nub la /
T04TD3903E:118b-4: lhun po ni chu las steng du yang stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-5: brgyad po ni phyed phyed phri ba ste de rnams dpangs dang zhing mnyam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-6: 'di rnams kyi bar rnams ni rol mtsho bdun te /
T04TD3903E:118b-7: dri bzang ba dang ro zhim pa dang yang ba dang /
T04TD3903E:118b-11: mgrin pa dang lto ba la mi gnod pa nyid kyi phyir yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'o ;
T04TD3903E:118b-12: / de la ri rab dang gnya' shing 'dzin gyi bar ni nang gi rgya mtsho dang po ste dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-13: logs kyi rgyar ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'gram nas bgrod par bya ba las sum 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:118b-14: rol mtsho gzhan rnams phyed phyed do mu khyud 'dzin dang 'khor [?] yug dag gi bar ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po ste ba tsha can gyi chus gang ba zheng du stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i 'bum phrag gsum pa'i tshad can no //
T04TD3903E:118b-15: de la gling bzhi ste ri rab kyi ngos bzhi rnams na'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-16: de la 'dzam bu'i gling ngos gsum la stong phrag gnyis dang gcig la ni dpag tshad phyed dang bcas pa'i dpag tshad gsum ste shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-17: de'i dbus su gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la rdo rje'i gdan mngon par 'grub ste gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad bzhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-18: 'di'i shar na shar gyi lus 'phags zla phyed lta bu ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra ba gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi brgya pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-19: 'di nas nub na nub kyi ba lang spyod stong phrag phyed dang brgyad pa zlum pa zla ba gang ba lta bu ste 'di'i dbus la phyed dang gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:118b-20: 'di'i byang na byang sgra mi snyan gru bzhi pa ngos so sor stong phrag gnyis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-21: gang gling rnams kyi dbyibs 'dra ba de'i dbyibs lta bu kho nar der mi rnams kyi gdong pa'o //
T04TD3903E:118b-22: kha cig na re mo'i dbang po'i yang ngo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:118b-23: lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan //
T04TD3903E:118b-24: sgra mi snyan zla rnga yab gzhan //
T04TD3903E:118b-25: g-yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro //
T04TD3903E:119a-0: brgyad rnams de yi bar gyi gling @119a * //
T04TD3903E:119a-1: thams cad na mi rnams gnas so //
T04TD3903E:119a-2: gzhan rnams na re gcig na srin po rnams so //
T04TD3903E:119a-5: byang du ri nag po dgu'i pha rol na gangs dang ldan pa'i ri'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-6: de las pha rol spos ngad [?] ldang ba las tshu rol na mtsho ma dros pa zhes pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba chu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu pa gang las chu bo chen po gang g'a dang sin dhu dang si t'a dang pakshu rnams 'bab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-7: de'i drung na 'dzam bu mngon par grub ste gang gi dbang gis 'di 'dzam bu'i gling zhes brjod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-8: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu'o 'og na mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po ste dpangs dang rgya'i tshad stong phrag nyi shu pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-9: mnar med pa'i steng du steng nas steng du rab tu tsha dang tsha ba dang ngu 'bod chen po dang ngu 'bod dang bsdus 'joms dang thig nag dang yang sos ta dmyal ba bdun rnams so //
T04TD3903E:119a-10: gzhan rnams na re mnar med pa'i logs rnams na'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:119a-11: brgyad po de rnams ni so sor bcu drug nye 'khor te dmyal bar ltung ba rnams 'di rnams su slar ltung ba'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-12: ci dmyal ba'i srung ma de rnams sems can nam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:119a-13: ma yin no bya ba byed pa ci ltar zhe na sems can rnams kyi las kyis de ltar snang ba'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-14: gang gshin rje'i srin por skye bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:119a-15: der gang gshin rjes bka' bsgos pa rnams kyis sems can rnams dmyal bar khrid par byed pa de rnams gshin rje'i srin po zhes brjod kyi gang las byed pa rnams ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:119a-17: gzhan rnams na re sems can no zhe'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-18: de'i las rnams gang du rnam par smin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:119a-19: dmyal ba de rnams nyid du'o //
T04TD3903E:119a-20: ci ltar mer gnas pa rnams mi 'tshig ce na /
T04TD3903E:119a-21: las rnams kyi me las mtshams byas pa'i phyir ram yang na 'byung ba'i khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:119a-22: tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad po 'di rnams las gzhan rnams ni grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams te chu bur can dang chu bur rdol ba dang so thams thams pa dang aa chu zer ba dang kyi hud zer ba dang autpala ltar gas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:119b-0: padma ltar cher @119b gas pa zhes pa brgyad po rnams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og na dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi logs la'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og na mnar med pa la sogs pa rnams kyi go skabs yang yod de gling rnams 'bru'i phung po bzhin 'og rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:119b-2: de nyid kyi phyir rgya mtsho chen po rim gyis gzhol ba'o zhes pa dmyal ba bcu drug po 'di rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis grub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-3: nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams ni rang rang gi las kyang mang po'am gnyis sam gcig kyang rung ste /
T04TD3903E:119b-4: de rnams kyis rnam pa'i bye brag du ma'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-5: gnas kyang nges pa med de chu bo dang ri dang mya ngam gyi phyogs rnams dang 'og na'ang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:119b-6: dud 'gro rnams kyang thang dang chu dang nam mkha'i spyod yul pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-7: yi dags rnams kyi rgyal po ni gshin rje zhes bya ste /
T04TD3903E:119b-8: de'i rgyal po'i pho brang ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'og dpag tshad lnga brgyas bar yongs su bcad nas te /
T04TD3903E:119b-9: de rnams kyi rtsa ba'i gnas yin la de las gzhan du 'phos pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:119b-10: 'di'i steng gi bar snang la 'phrul byed kyi rlung rnams 'khor ba dang 'dra bar zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma rnams ri rab la yongs su bskor bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:119b-11: de la zla ba dang nyi ma dag ri rab kyi phyed gnya' shing 'dzin gyi ri'i steng nas mnyam par rgyu'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-12: tshad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad lnga bcu pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-13: nyi ma'i lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-14: skar ma'i gzhal yas khang rnams kyi gang chung ba de'i tshad rgyang grags so //
T04TD3903E:119b-15: nyi ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'og phyi rol ni me shel gyi dkyil 'khor tsha zhing snang bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-16: zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi 'og ni chu shel bsil ba dang snang bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-17: gling bzhir nyi ma gcig dang zla ba gcig gis bya ba byed do //
T04TD3903E:119b-18: gang gi tshe byang gi sgra mi snyan du nam phyed pa de'i tshe shar lus 'phags su nyi ma nub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:119b-19: 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma phyed do //
T04TD3903E:119b-21: de bzhin du gzhan rnams su yong ngo //
T04TD3903E:119b-22: 'di nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag gis mtshan mo dang nyin mo rnams 'phel ba dang thung ba dag go //
T04TD3903E:119b-23: dkar po'i phyogs kyi dang por zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams par mthong ba'i rgyu ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:120a-1: te zla ba'i gzhal yas khang gi logs gzhan la grib ma lhung ste zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma rangs par mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:120a-2: sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re /
T04TD3903E:120a-3: gang re 'ga' gzhal med khang gi phyed snang ba de 'dra ba de rgyu ba'i tshul lo //
T04TD3903E:120a-5: nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang 'di rnams la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa gzhal med khang la gnas pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:120a-6: sa la gnas pa ni ri rab kyi bang rim la sogs pa rnams la gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-7: ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi rnams te /
T04TD3903E:120a-8: de la gcig ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu gyen du son pa nas te bzhi pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-9: stong phrag bcu drug dang brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis thon pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-10: de rnams la lag na gzhong thogs rnams dang phreng thogs rnams dang rtag myos rnams dang rgyal chen ris bzhi pa'i lha rnams te /
T04TD3903E:120a-11: gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa ri bdun po rnams la yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:120a-12: bang rim bzhi pa la rnam thos sras dang yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang ste rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams byang la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la gnas so //
T04TD3903E:120a-13: lag na gzhong thogs la sogs pa 'di rnams thams cad rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-14: lhun po'i steng na legs par spyad pa lhan cig byas pa sum cu rtsa gsum der skyes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-15: lhun po'i steng gi ngos so sor stong phrag brgyad cu ste thur du ji lta ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:120a-16: gzhan rnams na re ngos so sor stong phrag nyi shu'o zhes zer ro //
T04TD3903E:120a-17: grva bzhin dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad kyis brtsegs pa bzhi rnams te /
T04TD3903E:120a-18: gang rnams su lag na rdo rje zhes pa'i gnod sbyin rnams so sor gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120a-19: ri rab kyi steng de'i dbus na grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa ngos re re la dpag tshad phyed dang sum stong du ring ba dpangs su dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa /
T04TD3903E:120a-20: sa'i mthil gser gyi rang bzhin la rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba shing bal ltar reg na 'jam pa brgya byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang ngo //
T04TD3903E:120a-21: de'i dbus na rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i khang bo zangs [?] ngos so sor dpag tshad brgya phrag phyed dang gsum du ring ba dpangs su ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-0: grong khyer gyi logs bzhi rnams @120b na shing rta sna tshogs dang rtsub 'gyur dang 'dres tshal dang dga' ba'i tshal zhes pa skyed mos tshal rnams so //
T04TD3903E:120b-1: grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi logs gnyis kyi byang shar na shing yongs 'dus brtol te /
T04TD3903E:120b-2: de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad lnga zug go //
T04TD3903E:120b-3: dpangs su dpag tshad brgya pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-4: yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma dpag tshad lnga bcu khyab ste gnas so //
T04TD3903E:120b-5: de thams cad me tog rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar 'gro la rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcu'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-6: ci rang gi 'byung ba la brten pa kho nas me tog gi dri'i rgyun de 'jug gam /
T04TD3903E:120b-7: 'on te rlung la bsgos nas skye zhe na /
T04TD3903E:120b-8: 'di la nges pa med la slob dpon gyi 'dod pa gnyis ka ltar yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:120b-9: lho nub na chos bzangs te lha'i bdun sa gang du lha rnams 'khod nas bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa bgro bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-11: de lta bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi snod gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-12: skabs gsum pa rnams las steng du lha rnams gzhal med khang la gnas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-13: de rnams kyang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed de 'dod khams pa rnams dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa bas so //
T04TD3903E:120b-14: de la tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad dang gling bzhi dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris la sogs pa lha drug dang ;
T04TD3903E:120b-16: yi dags kyi dbye bas 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-17: de la 'dod pa skye ba gsum rnams te /
T04TD3903E:120b-18: 'dod pa ji ltar bskyed pa longs spyod pa las mi rnams dang lha'i ris bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:120b-19: 'phrul dga' ba rnams rang gis sprul zhing sprul nas 'dod pa rnams longs spyod pa dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams gzhan gyi sprul pa'i 'dod pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:120b-20: 'dir sa dang 'brel par gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams mi bzhin du gnyis kyis gnyis 'khrig la /
T04TD3903E:120b-21: 'thab bral la sogs pa rnams grangs ji lta bar 'khyud pa dang lag pa bcangs pa dang dgod pa dang lta bas so //
T04TD3903E:120b-22: 'on kyang lha rnams la khu ba med pa'i phyir rlung btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo //
T04TD3903E:121a-0: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyis kyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste dus yongs su bcad @121a * //
T04TD3903E:121a-1: pas 'khyud pa la sogs par gdags par gsungs so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:121a-2: ji tsam ji tsam du yul shas che ba de tsam du 'dod chags kyang shas che ba'o //
T04TD3903E:121a-3: lha'am lha mo gang gis phang par gzhon nu ma byung ba de ni de dag gi bu brgyud de lta'i ris rnams su lo lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang dgu pa dang bcu pa lta bur ro //
T04TD3903E:121a-4: gzugs khams su ni lha rnams lus yongs su rdzogs pa skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang po dang bral ba gos dang bcas par skye'o //
T04TD3903E:121a-5: lha de rnams thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o //
T04TD3903E:121a-6: de la bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs ris dang /
T04TD3903E:121a-7: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang tshangs chen po //
T04TD3903E:121a-8: gnyis pa ni 'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal lo //
T04TD3903E:121a-9: gsum pa ni dge chung dang tshad med dge dang dge rgyas te 'di rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:121a-10: bzhi pa ni rab kyi mtha' pa ni btang snyoms nyams su myong ba ste /
T04TD3903E:121a-11: sprin med dang bsod nams skyes dang 'bras bu che dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong ba 'og min no //
T04TD3903E:121a-12: bsam gtan bzhi ni chung du dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas so sor gsum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:121a-13: bzhi pa ni chen po nyid la chung ngu'i chung du dang /
T04TD3903E:121a-14: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin tu chen po dang mchog tu chen po'i bye brag gis gnas drug ste 'di rnams gnas bcu bdun no //
T04TD3903E:121a-15: de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang bcas pa ni gzugs kyi khams so //
T04TD3903E:121a-16: 'bras bu che ba'i phyogs gcig na 'du shes med pa pa'i sems can rnams so //
T04TD3903E:121a-17: kha cig 'di rnams kyi gnas la sogs pa kho nar 'bras bu che ba'i steng na'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:121a-18: mi che ba zhes pa 'dir aa b'i ha zhes pa dang mi 'dod pa zhes pa'ang ming du sems so //
T04TD3903E:121a-19: mi che ba la sogs pa 'og min gyi bar lnga rnams gtsang ma'i gnas te /
T04TD3903E:121a-20: gtsang ba ni 'phags pa rnams kho na 'di rnams su skyes nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:121a-21: gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas med cing btang snyoms nyams su myong ba tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po bzhi pa /
T04TD3903E:121a-22: skye ba'i bye brag gi rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:121a-23: nam mkha' mtha' ya sa skye mched dang /
T04TD3903E:121a-24: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T04TD3903E:121a-25: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
T04TD3903E:121b-0: 'du shes med 'du @121b shes med min skye mched ces pa'o //
T04TD3903E:121b-1: 'di rnams yul gyis byas pa'i steng dang 'og ni med /
T04TD3903E:121b-2: yul gang du snyoms par 'jug de thob pa rnams shi 'phos pa de nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:121b-3: slar yang de nas shi 'phos pa rnams de nyid du srid pa bar ma 'grub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:121b-4: 'dir 'di la gzugs yod pa ma yin pas gzugs med de de'i dngos po ni gzugs med pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:121b-5: gzugs med pa kho na dang gzugs med pa nyid ces pa ni dman pa la dgag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:121b-6: de'i phyir de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi gzugs ni gzugs kho na las skye'o //
T04TD3903E:121b-7: gzhan rnams na re sems na re sems kho na las skye ste lus de'i rnam par smin pa rgyus yongs su bsgos pa thob pa 'jug pa las so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:121b-8: chos mngon pa pa kha cig na re dman pa'i don la dgag sgrar brjod de /
T04TD3903E:121b-9: gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs kyang yod /
T04TD3903E:121b-11: de nas steng nas steng du gnas pa'i gzhal med khang rnams kyang yod ces zer ba nas sa la sogs pa rnams kyi yang tshad dang dbyibs kyi dbye ba'i bar du rgyas par ston no //
T04TD3903E:121b-12: de'i 'dod pa 'dir ma spros te mang po'i 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:121b-13: bsam gtan la sogs pa dang phyogs gcig pa'i phyir des yang dag par bsdus pa'i nyer bsdogs brgyad rnams te /
T04TD3903E:121b-14: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad rnams kyi re re re re'i ste gang gis de la 'jug pa'o //
T04TD3903E:121b-15: bsam gtan dang po'i nyer bsdogs mi lcogs pa med pa yan lag bzhi pa'o //
T04TD3903E:121b-16: bsam gtan dang po nyid rtog pa dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod pa rnams la btang snyoms kyi tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rtog pa med la dpyod pa dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi phyir de'i 'bras bu tshangs pa chen po'o zhes pa 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:121b-17: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams rnams so //
T04TD3903E:121b-18: de la gtso bor tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams so //
T04TD3903E:121b-19: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa ni tshangs ris la sogs pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:121b-20: shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa rnams ni gtsang ma'i gnas rnams te 'phags pa rnams kho na der skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:122a-1: kyang bag med pa'i sa la gnas pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'i gdams ngag gi snod do //
T04TD3903E:122a-2: bag med pa'i sa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:122a-3: 'dod pa'i bde ba'i ro myang ba ste de phal cher 'dod khams kyi lha rnams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-4: bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang ba bsam gtan du skyes pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi ro myang ba ni gtsang ma'i gnas pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-6: gzugs med pa rnams ni bgrod pa la sogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:122a-7: gdul byar ni byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa yid la byed pa las te rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:122a-8: ci khams gsum pa gcig kho na 'am zhe na khams gsum pa rnams kyi mtha' yod pa ma yin te nam mkha' ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rnams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ji lta gnas she na /
T04TD3903E:122a-14: steng dang 'og na yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'chags pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med de /
T04TD3903E:122a-15: 'og min gyi gong na yang 'dod pa'i khams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-16: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og na yang 'og min no ;
T04TD3903E:122a-17: / gang khams gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba de thams cad las so //
T04TD3903E:122a-18: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa las kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:122a-19: gang bsam gtan dang po la brten nas rdzu 'phrul skyed par byed pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skye ba der skyed par byed la /
T04TD3903E:122a-20: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du nges 'gro'i gzhan du ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:122a-21: gang lha rnams kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa gsum pa brjod pa de rnams kyi 'og nas steng du ci tsam ring zhe na /
T04TD3903E:122a-22: gnas dang gnas nas 'og tu ji srid pa de srid de dang de las steng du ste thams cad 'dzam bu'i gling mtshams so //
T04TD3903E:122a-23: 'o na 'thab bral la sogs pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi tshad ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:122a-24: kha cig na re bzhi po rnams ri rab kyi steng ci tsam pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:122a-25: gzhan rnams na re gong ma nyis 'gyur ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:122a-26: kha cig na re bsam gtan dang po ni gling bzhi pa ji srid pa'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-0: gnyis pa ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams @122b ji tsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-1: gsum pa ni stong gnyis pa ji tsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-2: bzhi pa ni stong gsum pa ji tsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-3: gzhan rnams na re dang po la sogs pa rnams ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad yin la bzhi pa tshad med pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:122b-4: de la gling bzhi dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang 'dod pa na spyod pa drug dang bsam gtan dang po rnams so sor stong ni /
T04TD3903E:122b-5: stong rnams kyi tshogs pa ste stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04TD3903E:122b-6: spyi phud de rnams stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04TD3903E:122b-7: stong gnyis pa de rnams stong ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams te gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya rnams so //
T04TD3903E:122b-8: 'di thams cad mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'chags so //
T04TD3903E:122b-10: 'dir dpag tshad dang ming dang lo rnams nye bar mkho ba'i phyir dang po'i rim gyis brtsam par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-11: gzugs kyi nges par dbye ba'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab po //
T04TD3903E:122b-12: ming gi mtha' ni yi ge ste dper na 'og zhes pa lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-13: dus kyi mtha' skad cig ma ste skad cig gi tshad ni chos 'gro ba ste ji srid du rdul phra rab nas rdul phra rab gzhan du 'gro ba'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-14: chos mngon pa pa rnams na re skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi skad cig ma drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:122b-15: de la rngul phra rab dang rdul phran dang lcags dang chu dang ri bong dang lug dang glang dang nyi zer gyi rdul dang /
T04TD3903E:122b-16: sro ma dang shig dang nas dang sor mo'i tshigs zhes pa bcu gnyis ni phyi ma bdun 'gyur te tshigs gsum sor mo'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-17: log la byas pa'i sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi khru'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-19: / gzhu lnga brgya rnams rgyang grags so //
T04TD3903E:122b-20: rgyang grags brgyad rnams dpag tshad do //
T04TD3903E:122b-21: skad cig brgya nyi shu rnams de'i skad cig go //
T04TD3903E:122b-22: de'i skad cig de drug cu thang cig go //
T04TD3903E:122b-23: thang cig sum cu yud tsam mo //
T04TD3903E:122b-24: yud tsam sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go //
T04TD3903E:122b-25: rgyal dang dbo dang sa ga dang chu stod dang khrums dang smin drug rnams kyi nag po'i phyogs la tshes re re chad pa'i phyir nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu dang nyin zhag sum cu ni zla ba'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-26: zla ba bcu gnyis rnams lo'o //
T04TD3903E:122b-27: de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-1: ba lang spyod dang byang zhes pa rnams ni khru brgyad dang bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rim pa ji lta bar lus kyi tshad do //
T04TD3903E:123a-2: rgyang grags kyi rkang pa gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug rnams rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs la sogs lha drug rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-3: tshangs ris la sogs pa bcu bdun pa rnams kyi lus ni dpag tshad phyed dang gcig dang phyed dang gnyis dang gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang drug cu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya dang phyed dang sum brgya dang lnga brgya dang stong dang /
T04TD3903E:123a-4: stong phrag gnyis dang bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug rnams so //
T04TD3903E:123a-5: byang sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod dang shar lus 'phags po rnams su tshe ni lo stong dang de'i phyed do //
T04TD3903E:123a-6: 'dzam bu'i gling du bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi tshad med pa dang bar du ma nges pa dang tha mar lo bcu'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-7: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag go //
T04TD3903E:123a-8: de'i lo lnga brgya rnams tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-9: steng ma rnams kyi nyin zhag dang tshe phyi ma nyis 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:123a-10: gzugs can rnams kyi yang dpag tshad phyed la sogs pa bzhin bskal pa phyed la sogs pa tshe'i tshad do //
T04TD3903E:123a-11: gzugs med na bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu dang bzhi bcu dang drug cu brgyad cu rnams tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-12: 'dir bskal pa chen po'i phyed de bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu bskal par byas nas /
T04TD3903E:123a-13: bskal pa de'i phyed la sogs pa gzugs can gsum po rnams kyi tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-14: 'od chud nas brtsams nas ni bskal pa chen pos tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-15: ngan 'gro ni gang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi tshe tshad de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos su nyin zhag gcig ste de'i lo lnga brgya rnams tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-16: sum cu rtsa gsum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi tshe ni thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang /
T04TD3903E:123a-17: ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha par nyin zhag gcig ste de yis lo stong la sogs pa rnams tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-18: rab tu tsha ba ni bar gyi bskal pa phyed tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-19: mnar med pa'i bar gyi bskal pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123a-20: dud 'gro rnams kyi ni nges pa med cing mchog tu tshe ring pa'i dud 'gro rnams kyi bar gyi bskal pa ste /
T04TD3903E:123a-21: dga' bo dang nyer dga' la sogs pa klu rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-0: mi'i zla ba @123b yi dags rnams kyi nyin zhag ste des lo lnga brgya rnams so //
T04TD3903E:123b-1: grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi chu bur can gyi tshe ni gang ma ga dh'a'i ti la [?] kh'a ri'i nyi shu pa'i sbyang ste sbyang de las lo brgya nas til re phyung bas zad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-2: gzhan rnams so sor nyi shu 'gyur du 'phel ba'i tshe'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-3: bar du 'chi ba ni sgra mi snyan ma gtogs pa thams cad na yod do //
T04TD3903E:123b-4: mnyam du 'jig go zhes gang brjod pa de la 'jig pa gnyis te 'gro ba 'jig pa dang khams 'jig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-5: yang gnyis te sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-6: gang dmyal ba rnams su sems can 'chi 'pho zhing mi skye ba'i dus der 'gyur te de 'jig pa'i bskal pa rtsom pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-7: rim gyis dmyal ba rnams su sems can gcig kyang ma lus par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:123b-8: gang de'i tshe dmyal ba myong bar nges pa'i las 'dzin pa de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi dmyal bar 'phan par byed do //
T04TD3903E:123b-9: de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang yi dvags rnams dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang shar lus 'phags dang ba lang spyod dang sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams dang 'dod pa na spyod pa drug dang bsam gtan dang po rnams rim gyis 'jig go //
T04TD3903E:123b-10: gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can gcig kyang ma lus par 'gyur ba 'di tsam 'di lta ste sems can 'jig pas 'jig rten 'jig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-11: de nas snod stong pa 'di nyid nas kun nas sems can rnams kyi de 'phen pa'i las yongs su zad nas lhas char ma phab pa dang nyi ma dang po shar bas sa bon gyi grong dang 'byung ba'i grong dang chu mig dang chu phran rnams skam mo //
T04TD3903E:123b-12: nyi ma gnyis shar bas chu bo thams cad skam mo //
T04TD3903E:123b-13: gsum pa chu po chen po bzhi dang ma dros pa la sogs pa'i mtsho phran chen po rnams skam mo //
T04TD3903E:123b-14: bzhi pas rga mtsho chen po dpag tshad brgya'i bar du skam mo //
T04TD3903E:123b-15: lnga pas dpag tshad nyis brgya la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:123b-16: drug pas chu'i thigs pa shin tu che chung ba yang mi lus te sa chen po dang ri rab kyang du bar 'thul lo //
T04TD3903E:123b-17: nyi ma bdun pa shar bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs te ji ltar thal bar yang mi shes par bsregs nas rang nyid kyang zhi'o zhes pa nyi ma bdun gyi mes 'jig pas bsam gtan dang bo'i bar bsreg go //
T04TD3903E:124a-1: bzhin du char pa'i chu ba tshva can gyis bsam gtan gnyis pa myags par byed do //
T04TD3903E:124a-2: rnam par bskyod pa'i rlung chen po'i rlung gis 'jig pas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par 'thor ro //
T04TD3903E:124a-3: bsam gtan bzhi pa na 'jig pa med do //
T04TD3903E:124a-4: 'o na de rtag gam zhe na ma yin te gang gi phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa ni sa gzhi gcig tu 'brel pa med kyi 'o na ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:124a-5: gnas gzhan rnam par chad pa ste skar ma bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:124a-6: de na sems can gang dang gang skye ba'am 'chi 'pho ba ni gzhal med khang dang bcas par yin pa'i phyir 'di rtag pa nyid med do //
T04TD3903E:124a-7: 'dir bar ma chad par me yis 'jig pa lan bdun no //
T04TD3903E:124a-9: de ltar chu yis bdun song ba na yang mes bdun no //
T04TD3903E:124a-10: phyis rlung gis 'jig pa gcig tu 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:124a-11: de rnams ni mes 'jig pa lnga bcu rtsa drug dang chus bdun dang rlung gis gcig ste 'di rnams su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:124a-12: de ltar dmyal bar sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba nas bzung ste ji srid snod kyi 'jig rten rnams zad pa'i bar gyi dus 'di 'jig pa'i bskal pa ste bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu rnams so //
T04TD3903E:124a-13: de'i rjes su 'jig rten gyi khams zhig pa 'di stong pa nam mkha' tsam du bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu gnas so //
T04TD3903E:124a-14: de nas slar yang sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' las rlung dal bu rnams g-yo'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-15: de nas ji skad brjod pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad skye'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-16: 'di tsam 'di ni snod 'chags pas 'jig rten du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:124a-17: de nas sems can gzhan zhig 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams las shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skye'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-18: sems can gzhan rnams kyang de nas shi 'phos te tshangs pa mdun na 'don du'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-19: de nas tshangs ris dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams su ste rim gyis byang sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod dang shar lus 'phags dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang yi dags dang dud 'gro dang dmyal ba rnams kyi bar du skye'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-20: 'di ni chos nyid yin te gang phyis zhig pa de la mngon la 'chags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:124a-21: gang gi tshe dmyal ba rnams sems can gcig skyes par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T04TD3903E:124b-0: gang 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa @124b yin no ;
T04TD3903E:124b-1: / chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ba de ni nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:124b-2: 'dir yang bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams ni gzugs na spyod pa bzhin du yid kyi rang bzhin dang par nga 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba dga' ba'i zas can rnams te /
T04TD3903E:124b-3: de rnams sa'i dri bsnams nas ro myong shing zos pas /
T04TD3903E:124b-4: de rnams kyi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid zhugs shing 'od ni nub par gyur te /
T04TD3903E:124b-5: de nas mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba dag byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:124b-6: sa'i ro dang sa'i zhag dang myu gu'i tshal rim gyis skyes pa rnams chags pa las nub par gyur to //
T04TD3903E:124b-7: ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa de zos pa na gci ba dang bshang ba'i lam pho dang mo'i dbang po dang bcas pa byung shing dbyibs kyang tha dad pa byung ste /
T04TD3903E:124b-8: sngon goms pa'i dbang las tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgya chen po gang las log par zhugs par gyur pa'o //
T04TD3903E:124b-9: le lo las sogs 'jog byas shing bdag tu 'dzin pa skyes pa na 'bras s'a lu brngas pa slar mi skye bar gyur to //
T04TD3903E:124b-10: de na zhing rnams bgos nas rang gi rnams la kun nas 'dzin pa byas te pha rol gyi la brkus so //
T04TD3903E:124b-11: de nas bsrung ba'i don du skyes bu khyad par can cig byung ba la drug cha bstabs te /
T04TD3903E:124b-12: zhing rnams kyi bdag po nyid kyi phyir rgyal rigs zhes don dang mthun pa'i ming ngo //
T04TD3903E:124b-13: mang pos bkur ba nyid kyi phyir dang skye dgu rnams dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mang pos bkur ba dang rgyal po zhes so //
T04TD3903E:124b-14: khyim rnams las yid phyir phyogs pa rnams ni bram ze zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo ;
T04TD3903E:124b-15: / rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gis chad pas bcad pa'i chom rkun pa rnams na re bdag gis 'di lta bu ma bgyis so zhes brdzun du smra bar gyur to //
T04TD3903E:124b-16: de ltar 'jig rten chags bzhin pa rnams mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:124b-17: las kyi lam rnams 'phel bar gyur pa na rim gyis thung ba nyid de /
T04TD3903E:124b-18: mthar tshe lo bcu pa chos ma yin pa /
T04TD3903E:124b-19: chags pa mi bzad pas zil gyis gnon pa log pa'i chos kyis dkris pa rnams la /
T04TD3903E:124b-20: gnod sems mthar thug ste shing la sogs pa rnams mtshon char 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:125a-0: de rnams sems can gzhan gsod par @125a * //
T04TD3903E:125a-1: byed pa'i phyir mtshon gyis te srog gcod pa nyi ma bdun 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:125a-2: slar yang skyon de rnams nyid kyis mi ma yin pa rnams yams nad spro bar byed pa gang las mi de rnams nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa nad zla ba bdun dang nyi ma bdun 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:125a-3: slar yang skyon de rnams nyid kyis char mi 'bab cing mu ge 'byung ste /
T04TD3903E:125a-4: mi rnams bkres pa dang nyam chung bas gab nas 'chi la /
T04TD3903E:125a-5: gzhan rnams kyang rus gong dkar po rnams bskol nas 'thung zhing /
T04TD3903E:125a-6: thur ma'i rtse mos khyim rnams su zang zing 'god par byed de /
T04TD3903E:125a-7: de ring khyim bdag gsol ba'o sang khyim [?] bdag mo'o zhes pa'i 'di lta bu la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:125a-8: 'bru'i gnas kyi bug pa rnams nas thur mas 'bru ba dang 'bras bu rnams chung ba chu mang po la bskol nas 'thung ngo zhes pa mu ge lo dang zla ba dang zhag bdun rnams 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:125a-9: de'i tshe yang gling gnyis dag tu gnod sems lhag pa ma thob par 'gyur zhing kha dog ngan pa dang nyam chung ba dag dang /
T04TD3903E:125a-10: bkres pa dang skom pa dag kyang ngo zhes pa 'di ni chags pa rnams gnas pa'i bar gyi bskal pa dang po'o //
T04TD3903E:125a-11: tshe lo bcu pa de rnams las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pas tshe lo brgyad khrir 'gyur zhing slar yang 'gribs pas tshe lo bcu par gyur pa 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:125a-12: de bzhin du bco brgyad kyi bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:125a-13: nyi shu pa ni yar skye ba kho na ste mar 'bri ba med la tshe lo bcu pa las lo brgyad khri ji srid par ro //
T04TD3903E:125a-14: bar gyi bskal pa gzhan rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i dus ji srid pa de srid par gyi bskal pa dang po'i 'grib pa'i dus dang tha ma'i 'phel ba'i dus kyang ngo zhes pas thams cad dus mnyam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:125a-15: de la bar gyi skal pa gcig gis snod rnams 'chags so //
T04TD3903E:125a-16: bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgus sdod pa po byed do //
T04TD3903E:125a-17: 'jig rten chags pa bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas so //
T04TD3903E:125a-18: gcig gis snod rnams 'jig go bcu dgus stong par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:125a-19: 'jig rten zhig pa ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu gnas so zhes pa brgyad cu ni bskal pa chen po ste /
T04TD3903E:125a-20: bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa phung po lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:125a-21: bskal pa 'ga' zhig ni de lta bu ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:125b-0: smon lam dang dge ba'i @125b rtsa ba'i dbang gis shin tu ring pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:125b-1: dper na bskal pa skar ma lta bu ste de'i 'grib pa'i dus nyid las ji skad brjod pa'i bar gyi bskal pa'i tshad kyi bar gyi bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu yod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:125b-2: de ltar bzang po la sogs pa bskal pa chen po grangs kyi gnas gzhan drug cur son par thob pa ni grangs med pa zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:125b-3: de nas bzlas nas slar yang bgrang bar bya ste de lta bu grangs med pa gsum zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:125b-4: de lta bu'i bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ngo //
