T04TD3903E:158b-0: de gnyis kyis bral bar gyur na mi skye ba'i chos nyid du byas pa'i phyi ma la sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang mthong ba'i @158b chos la yid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-1: mi bde ba rnam par zhi ba ste de kun du mi spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-2: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bur gyur pa sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis spangs pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa 'gog pa dang rnam par zhi ba'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:158b-3: nye bar 'tshe ba lhag ma mthar gyur pa bzung nas nub pa zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:158b-4: de ltar byas nas ma lus par spangs pa rgyas par bshad par rig pa bya'o //
T04TD3903E:158b-5: 'dus ma byas ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:158b-7: blta dka' ba ni sha'i mig dang lha'i mig gi spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-8: g-yo ba med pa ni 'gro bar 'pho ba dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro ;
T04TD3903E:158b-9: / mi 'dud pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum med pa na srid pa rnams su mi 'dud pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-10: 'chi ba med pa ni phung po'i bdud dang bral ba'i phyir te 'chi ba'i don rten phung po med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:158b-11: zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-12: gnas ni rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba de'i gzhi nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-13: gling ni khams gsum las yongs su chad pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:158b-14: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po la thang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:158b-15: skyob pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:158b-16: de thob na skye ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:158b-17: skyabs ni der bsam pa dang sbyor ba 'bras bu yod pa'i gzhi'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:158b-18: der byas pa'i bsam pa dang sbyor ba dag 'bras bu yod pa'i gzhi'i gnas nyid kyis brten par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:158b-19: dpung gnyen ni mchog 'phags pa nyid du 'gro ba'i gzhi'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te dgra bcom pa thob pa'i thabs kyi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:158b-20: 'chi 'pho med pa ni ma skyes pa nyid kyis nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-21: rims nad med pa ni 'dod pas 'joms pa'i gdung ba thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-22: yongs su gdung ba med pa ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad med pas na bsel bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-23: bde ba ni na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:158b-24: zhi ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-1: rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i gzhi nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-2: dge bar gyur pa ni sbyor ba bde bas de thob pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-3: nad med pa ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa'i nad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-4: dper na rgyu gsum gyis nad 'byung ste nyes pa bsags pas dang mi 'phrod pa brten pas dang btang snyoms kyis so //
T04TD3903E:159a-5: de bzhin kho nar nyon mongs pa'i nad de 'di'i nyes pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:159a-6: stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams las gzhan thams cad mi 'phrod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:159a-7: de'i phyir gus pa dang bcas pas phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid goms pa las med par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-8: mi g-yo ba ni yul gyi spros pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes thams cad bral ba zhi la bde bar gnas pa'i dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med pa gnyis ka rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams la yang bskal pa'i me bzhin du sems shing phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la mngon par dga' ba med do //
T04TD3903E:159a-11: don dam par ni sangs rgyas nyid kho na phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de kho nar rnam par mi rtog pa mtha' dag rnam pa thams cad du bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-12: gang yang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de ni gdul bya rnams kyi de lta bu'i bsam pa'i dbang las so //
T04TD3903E:159a-13: 'o na gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa 'di ci slar skye 'am zhe na /
T04TD3903E:159a-14: 'di ni med de gang gi phyir 'bras bu las nyams pa mi mchi bas so //
T04TD3903E:159a-15: 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa ni su yang dus byed pa med pa kho na ste /
T04TD3903E:159a-16: dge slong rnams 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa dang dran pa nyams pa 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:159a-17: 'on kyang yang myur ba kho nar nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes mdor gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-18: gzhan du na tshangs par spyad pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:159a-19: de yang 'bras bu de las yongs su nyams kyang 'bras bu da dang 'gal ba'i bya ba mi byed de dpa' bo bred kyang mi 'gyel ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:159b-0: de la gang la dbang po rtul po rnams ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa bsgom pa @159b la mngon par brtson pa dang po kho nar bdag nyid dul ba dang zhi ba gcig pu mngon par sems pa rnams te de ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du byed cing de rnams mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i 'du shes kyis zag pa med pa'i dbyings kho na la gnas so //
T04TD3903E:159b-1: gang dbang po 'bring po rnams ni bden pa sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba kho na gzhan gyi don la cung zad sred pa rnams te 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du mi byed par dus byed cing /
T04TD3903E:159b-2: de rnams lus kyi chos ston pa mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang gis las dang lam gyi rnam par smin pa las dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba na gzhan gyi gdams ngag la mi ltos par shes bya'i sgrib pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa dag rim pa bzhin spangs pa dang spangs pa dag rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyi byang chub kyi rang byang chub mngon du byas shing rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa bstan pas snod du rung bar byas pa'i gdul bya'i rnam par shes pa la sgra med kyang don de snang ngo zhes pas /
T04TD3903E:159b-3: lus kyi chos bstan pa byas nas zag pa med pa'i dbyings kho na la gnas so //
T04TD3903E:159b-4: dbang po rtul po dang 'bring po 'di dag kyang phyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bskul ba nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug cing rim gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:159b-5: dbang po rnon po rnams ni yang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga' ba gzhan gyi don gcig pu la sred pa /
T04TD3903E:159b-6: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spangs kyang /
T04TD3903E:159b-7: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid kyis sems can mtha' dag gdon pa'i bsam pa can te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang kho nas dus de'i phyis bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byas nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:159b-8: gnyis po de dag kyang bskal pa grangs med bzhi mngon par rdzogs nas yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid 'ba' zhig go //
T04TD3903E:159b-9: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi rnal 'byor dang bral ba las mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu med la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa yang med do //
T04TD3903E:160a-0: gang yang bskal pa'i tshogs mi nyung bar bsgoms pa blo yongs su dag @160a * //
T04TD3903E:160a-1: pa de rnams la kho na nyid la sgro 'dogs pa ma lus pa bzlog pas stong pa nyid dang spros pa med pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis nye bar bstan no //
T04TD3903E:160a-2: de rnams de la mngon du phyogs par byas nas de'i rang bzhin sbyin pa la sogs pa bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi thabs goms pa las sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:160a-3: de yang snying rje chen po skyes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de de nyid gong nas gong du rnam par rtog pa spang ba yongs su dag pa nyid sgrub pa'i don du sgom mo //
T04TD3903E:160a-4: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das ma bdun par gsungs pa 'jam dpal mi gnas pa la de rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ci yod /
T04TD3903E:160a-5: bcom ldan 'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o //
T04TD3903E:160a-6: gang chos gang gi yang gnas pa'am mi gnas pa mi dmigs pa gnas pa ste /
T04TD3903E:160a-7: gang chos gang yang mi sems la rnam par mi rig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:160a-8: bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi sems sam ;
T04TD3903E:160a-10: bcom ldan 'das mi sems lags so //
T04TD3903E:160a-11: gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de kho na ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang chos kyi dbyings dang rgyu ba med pa'i dbyings shes pa ni gnyis su ma mchis gnyis su bgyir ma mchis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:160a-12: gang de lta bu'i ye shes de dmigs sum mchis pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so //
T04TD3903E:160a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni chos gang yang mi dmigs pa na gnas pa ma mchis te /
T04TD3903E:160a-15: chos gang yang 'grib pa'am 'phel ba mi dmigs so //
T04TD3903E:160a-16: bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la ni 'phel ba'am 'grib pa nyid ma mchis so //
T04TD3903E:160a-18: de'i yang mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:160a-19: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T04TD3903E:160a-20: bdag dang phung sogs rnam rig gi //
T04TD3903E:160a-21: rtog pas mngon par ma bsgribs shing //
T04TD3903E:160a-22: stong par sangs rgyas rtag tu bzhed //
T04TD3903E:160a-23: bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog don du //
T04TD3903E:160a-24: phung po khams sogs bstan pa ste //
T04TD3903E:160a-25: de yang sems tsam rnam gzhag pas //
T04TD3903E:160a-26: skal ba chen po rnams kyis bshig /'di dag thams cad sems tsam du //
T04TD3903E:160a-27: rnam rig smra ba rnams la grub //
T04TD3903E:160a-28: rnam rig rang bzhin ci yin la //
T04TD3903E:160a-29: da ni de 'dir brjod par bya //
T04TD3903E:160b-0: 'di rnams thams cad sems @160b tsam zhes //
T04TD3903E:160b-1: thub pa yis ni gang bstan pa //
T04TD3903E:160b-2: byis rnams skrag pa spang don te //
T04TD3903E:160b-3: de ni de bzhin nyid ma yin //
T04TD3903E:160b-4: stong nyid bdag nyid tshul gcig gi //
T04TD3903E:160b-5: sems 'di nyid la kun brtags dang //
T04TD3903E:160b-6: gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub pa //
T04TD3903E:160b-7: nyid du yang ni brtags pa yin //
T04TD3903E:160b-8: theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid rnams //
T04TD3903E:160b-9: chos la bdag med dang mtshungs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:160b-10: stong nyid mkha' mnyam ye shes ni //
T04TD3903E:160b-11: byang chub snying por son gyur pa //
T04TD3903E:160b-12: dus gsum byas pa la brten pa'i //
T04TD3903E:160b-13: sangs rgyas bdag nyid kun gyis mkhyen //
T04TD3903E:160b-14: dmigs med sgyu ma lta bu yi //
T04TD3903E:160b-15: stong nyid srid pa 'jig byed do //
T04TD3903E:160b-16: zhi ba chos rnams kun gyi gnas //
T04TD3903E:160b-17: 'di ni rtag tu bsgom par bgyi //
T04TD3903E:160b-18: skye ba med ces stong pa zhes //
T04TD3903E:160b-19: dmigs pa med ces stong pa nyid //
T04TD3903E:160b-20: dman pa'i bdag nyid gang sgom pa //
T04TD3903E:160b-22: dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog rnams //
T04TD3903E:160b-23: rgyan gcod pa yi mtshan nyid ni //
T04TD3903E:160b-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong par gsungs //
T04TD3903E:160b-25: gzhan ni stong nyid min par bzhed //
T04TD3903E:160b-26: dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T04TD3903E:160b-27: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pas //
T04TD3903E:160b-28: nam mkha' sgom pa 'di kho na //
T04TD3903E:160b-29: stong pa nyid ni stong par dgongs //
T04TD3903E:160b-30: gang phyir chos rnams skye med min //
T04TD3903E:160b-31: stong pa nyid ces rab tu bsgrags //
T04TD3903E:160b-32: mdor na phung po lnga po rnams //
T04TD3903E:160b-33: chos rnams thams cad yin zhes bshad //
T04TD3903E:160b-34: ji lta'i de nyid brjod pa na //
T04TD3903E:160b-35: kun rdzob chad pa nyid ma yin //
T04TD3903E:160b-36: kun rdzob las ni logs par ru //
T04TD3903E:160b-37: de bzhin nyid ni dmigs pa med //
T04TD3903E:160b-38: gang phyir kun rdzob stong nyid brjod //
T04TD3903E:160b-39: stong nyid kho na kun rdzob ste //
T04TD3903E:160b-40: med na ma 'byung nges pa'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:160b-41: byas dang mi rtag pa dag bzhin //
T04TD3903E:160b-42: kun rdzob nyon mongs las las byung //
T04TD3903E:160b-43: las ni sems las yang dag byung //
T04TD3903E:160b-44: sems kyang bag chags kyis yid la //
T04TD3903E:160b-45: bag chags bral las bde ba'o //
T04TD3903E:160b-46: bde ba'i sems ni zhi ba nyid //
T04TD3903E:160b-47: zhi ba'i sems ni rmongs med la //
T04TD3903E:160b-48: rmongs med pas ni de nyid rig //
T04TD3903E:160b-49: de nyid rig pas grol ba thob //
T04TD3903E:160b-50: byang chub sems mchog de nyid dang //
T04TD3903E:160b-51: stong pa nyid ces bshad pa ste //
T04TD3903E:160b-52: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha' //
T04TD3903E:160b-53: sdug bsngal bdag med sogs de bzhin //
T04TD3903E:160b-54: gzhan don ro gcig byang chub ni //
T04TD3903E:160b-55: byang sems myu gu las byung ba //
T04TD3903E:160b-56: snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan pa ni //
T04TD3903E:161a-0: @161a * // rgyal ba'i sras kyis sgom par byed //
T04TD3903E:161a-1: gang sgom pa yis brtan pa rnams //
T04TD3903E:161a-2: bsam gtan gyi yang bde spangs nas //
T04TD3903E:161a-3: pha rol sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te //
T04TD3903E:161a-6: 'di ni khrims mchog dam pa ste //
T04TD3903E:161a-7: de lta mod kyi de rnams kyi //
T04TD3903E:161a-8: rang gi lus dang don gtong mtshar //
T04TD3903E:161a-9: chos 'di rnams ni stong shes nas //
T04TD3903E:161a-10: las dang 'bras bu bsten gang de //
T04TD3903E:161a-11: ngo mtshar las kyang ngo mtshar zhing //
T04TD3903E:161a-12: rmad byung las kyang rmad byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:161a-13: sems can bskyab pa'i bsam pa yis //
T04TD3903E:161a-15: de byung skyon gyis mi gos te //
T04TD3903E:161a-17: 'di rnams stong nyid ye shes mes //
T04TD3903E:161a-18: nyon mongs bud shing rnams bsregs shing //
T04TD3903E:161a-19: 'on kyang snying rjes brlan pa yis //
T04TD3903E:161a-20: bzang po la sogs rgyal sras rnams //
T04TD3903E:161a-21: tshangs dbang nye dbang drag sogs kyis //
T04TD3903E:161a-22: gzugs brnyan du ni rab bzhugs rnams //
T04TD3903E:161a-24: snying rje bsam pas zlos gar mdzad //
T04TD3903E:161a-26: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi sems de sgrub pa dang bral ba yang 'khor bar 'bras bu chen por bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T04TD3903E:161a-27: ji skad du 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdor gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:161a-28: de'i phyir rgyal po khyod kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid la 'dun pa dang dad pa dang don du gnyer ba dang smon lam 'di kho na 'gro yang rung 'greng yang rung bgrod kyang rung /
T04TD3903E:161a-30: gnyid ma log kyang rung za yang rung 'thung yang rung rtag par rgyun du rjes su dran par yid la gyis shig / bsgoms shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T04TD3903E:161a-31: 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang so so skye bo thams cad dang bdag gi yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:161a-32: da ltar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bsdams nas rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig / de nas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du /
T04TD3903E:161a-33: nyi ma nyi mar dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig ces pa la sogs pa gsungs nas de slar yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:161b-0: rgyal po chen po khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems @161b dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas lan du mar lha'i nang du skyes /
T04TD3903E:161b-1: lan du mar mi'i nang du skyes la /
T04TD3903E:161b-2: slar yang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba thams cad du yang rgyal srid la dbang byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:161b-4: gang yang sgrub pa snying por byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems de shin du yang 'bras bu yangs pa kho na'o zhes grub po //
T04TD3903E:161b-5: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa dpas byin gyis zhus par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:161b-6: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang /
T04TD3903E:161b-7: de la gal te gzugs mchis na //
T04TD3903E:161b-8: nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste //
T04TD3903E:161b-9: de ni slar yang lhag par 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:161b-10: gang g'a'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi //
T04TD3903E:161b-11: sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis //
T04TD3903E:161b-12: rin chen dam pas kun bkang ba //
T04TD3903E:161b-13: 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas //
T04TD3903E:161b-14: gang zhig thal mo sbyar gyur te /
T04TD3903E:161b-15: byang chub ched du sems bskyed na //
T04TD3903E:161b-17: gang gis mtha' yang ma mchis so //
T04TD3903E:161b-19: 'phags pa sdong po bkod par yang //
T04TD3903E:161b-20: rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o zhes rgyas par ro //
T04TD3903E:161b-21: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:161b-22: mi gang skad cig gcig tsam yang //
T04TD3903E:161b-23: byang chub sems ni rab sgom pa //
T04TD3903E:161b-24: de yi bsod nams phung po ni //
T04TD3903E:161b-25: 'di tsam zhes pa bgrang mi nus //
T04TD3903E:161b-26: nyon mongs med gyur rin chen sems //
T04TD3903E:161b-27: 'di ni gcig tu grol ba ste //
T04TD3903E:161b-28: nyon mongs bdud sogs chom rkun gyis //
T04TD3903E:161b-29: gzhom bya ma yin dbrog bya min //
T04TD3903E:161b-30: 'di ni theg chen gtso bo ste //
T04TD3903E:161b-31: 'di ni byang chub sems mchog yin //
T04TD3903E:161b-32: mnyam par gzhag rnams byang chub sems //
T04TD3903E:161b-33: 'bad pa yis ni bskyed par gyis //
T04TD3903E:161b-34: 'khor bar bdag gzhan don sgrub la //
T04TD3903E:161b-35: byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa //
T04TD3903E:161b-36: gzhan gang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
T04TD3903E:161b-37: sngon chad nam yang gzigs pa med //
T04TD3903E:161b-39: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di yang dper na long bas mar me gzung ba gzhan la phan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du don mi shes par thos pa 'dzin pa'o zhes thos pa'i don rtogs par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba sngon ma can te /
T04TD3903E:161b-40: de ji ltar gzung ba ni sngar brjod pa de bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:161b-41: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
T04TD3903E:162a-1: rtog pa med pa'i mi [?] la tshe ba sgra 'don gyi na gnyid ma log kyang chom rkun pa rnams kyis rku ba de bzhin du sgra tsam la brtson pa thos pa mang yang so sor rtog pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun pa rnams kyis 'joms pas na sgrub pa la sbyar ro //
T04TD3903E:162a-2: de ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdor gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:162a-3: gzhon nu sgrub pa snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur ba med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:162a-4: sgrub pa yang mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:162a-5: de bzhin du 'di lta bu'i sgrub pa yang rnyed par dka' ba nyid du 'phags pa sdong po bkod par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:162a-6: rigs kyi bu sems can gyi ris na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems smon pa'i sems can de rnams rnyed par dka'o //
T04TD3903E:162a-7: de bas kyang sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de rnams shin tu rnyed par dka'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:162a-8: byang chub kyi sems de yang shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin kho na bskyed par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:162a-9: de la chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid du rtogs pa ni shes rab bo //
T04TD3903E:162a-10: spros pa med pa nyid 'di ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:162a-11: mdor bsdu na ji srid dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad phyin ci log dang spros pa ste spros pa med pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:162a-12: de ltar na stong pa nyid kho na spros pa'o zhe na /
T04TD3903E:162a-13: stong pa nyid kyi sgras cung zad kyang sgrub pa med de gang gi phyir /
T04TD3903E:162a-14: sgrub pa'i sgra'i don ma yin gyi 'on kyang sgro 'dogs pa las ldog pa tsam mo //
T04TD3903E:162a-15: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi tshig gsal ba ni sgro 'dogs pa mtha' dag las ldog pa rtogs par byed pas gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin gsal bar byed kyi gang gis de kho na spros pa yin pa stong pa nyid kho nar sgrub pa ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:162a-16: spros pa med pa nyid spros pa'o zhes kyang brjod par mi bya ste /
T04TD3903E:162a-17: gang gi phyir spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i spros pa yod pa ma yin na de ci ltar spros pa yin ;
T04TD3903E:162a-18: de'i tshe med pa kho na de kho na nyid do zhes mi rigs pas so //
T04TD3903E:162a-19: de ltar na sgro 'dogs pa mtha' dag las ldog pa de kho na nyid do zhe na /
T04TD3903E:162a-20: de ltar ma yin te gang gi phyir ldog pa ni dngos po med pa yin la dngos po med pa yang ci ltar de kho na nyid yin te skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-0: de'i phyir sgro 'dogs @162b pa mtha' dag las ldog pas de kho na nyid stan pa na /
T04TD3903E:162b-1: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i tshul du de kho na nyid ma thob nas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-2: des na stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa de bsal bar byas pa na de kho na nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo gsal bar byed pas de brjed byar btags nas brjod de stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgra rnams las sgro 'dogs pa mtha' dang bral ba'i ngo bo de kho na nyid du lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-3: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin kho na chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid kyi yin la spros pa med pa rtogs pa yang shes rab bo //
T04TD3903E:162b-4: thabs ni bcom ldan 'das ma snying rje chen po'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-5: de yang rnam pa gsum ste de la sems can la dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal nyid kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang yongs su 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dag gis nyin dang nyin du yongs su skyo ba'i sems can rnams la dmigs nas skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-6: chos la dmigs pa ni gang skad cig so sor mi rtag pa nyid kyis phongs par ltung ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs nas skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-7: dmigs pa med pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa la dmigs nas bskyed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-8: de la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje sgom pa'i gnas skabs na /
T04TD3903E:162b-9: thabs dang shes rab dag 'di bdag nyid du sgom la snying rje'i cig shos sgom pa'i gnas skabs na ni ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:162b-10: de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa nyid kyis spros pa med pa nyid med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rang bzhin du skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-11: de'i phyir bdag nyid du sgom pas na lhan cig sgom pa kho na ste shes rab dang thabs kyi tha snyad tha dad pa ni ldog pa byas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-12: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:162b-13: rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med de phyin ci log pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-14: 'on kyang chos kyi 'du shes thams cad sgom pa rnam par mi sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o //
T04TD3903E:162b-15: de bzhin du dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med pa de 'di ni bdag dang 'di la dang 'di sbyin no zhes de ltar 'du shes pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:162b-16: de bzhin du ji srid byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams la ste /
T04TD3903E:162b-17: ji srid du gang kun rdzob de kho na don dam pa ste gang gi phyir de dag de bzhin nyid du gcig pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:163a-0: 'on kyang phung po rnams la dngos por 'du shes @163a * //
T04TD3903E:163a-1: pa rnams la don dam pa de ni dngos po med pa'o zhes kun rdzob tu bstan la /
T04TD3903E:163a-2: dngos po med par 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po'o zhes te /
T04TD3903E:163a-3: don dam par ni dngos po dmigs su med de dngos po med pa yang med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:163a-4: 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:163a-5: so so'i skye bo dngos bdag can //
T04TD3903E:163a-6: rang gi sems kyis bslus gyur te //
T04TD3903E:163a-7: dngos dang dngos med phyin ci log / nyes pa nyon mongs dbang du gyur //
T04TD3903E:163a-8: dngos po la mkhas rnams kyis ni //
T04TD3903E:163a-9: dngos po mi rtag slu ba'i chos //
T04TD3903E:163a-10: gsog dang stod pa bdag med dang //
T04TD3903E:163a-11: rnam par dben pa zhes par mthong //
T04TD3903E:163a-13: de la dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus te zhi gnas kyi tshogs rnams la gnas pas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su lus drang por gzhag nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T04TD3903E:163a-14: sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can ting nge 'dzin bskyed par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163a-15: 'o na sems rtse gcig gzhag pa'i ched du rnam par g-yeng ba spang ba'i don du goms par byed pa yin na /
T04TD3903E:163a-16: dbu ma rnams ni g-yo ba'i chu'i nang gi zla ba ltar 'gro ba g-yo zhing rang bzhin stong pa zhes pa dang kun rdzob pa skad cig mar smra ba rnams kyi sems rnam par g-yeng ba yod pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:163a-17: don so sor nges pa nyid kyis thams cad rtse gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:163a-19: nyams su myong bas grub par sems 'ga' zhig de kho na nyid la yang dag par phyogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:163a-20: 'ga' zhig phyin ci log dang gzhan ni bya ba la sogs pa tsam la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:163a-21: de la chos thams cad bdag med pa'i de kho na nyid las gzhan du phyogs pa'i sems thams cad rnam par g-yeng ba kho nar brjod la de kho na nyid la gcig tu gnas pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa zhes pa 'di tsam cis mi thob gang gi phyir gdon mi za bar gcig sems kho na sna tshogs pa'i spyod yul spyod pa nyid du btsal bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163a-22: ci ste yang de kho na mngon du byed pa'i dus kyi snga rol du bdag go zhes pa gcig gi rnam par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'byung ba srid pa'i phyir de yang tha snyad du yod do //
T04TD3903E:163a-23: gang las bdag gi skyon zad par 'gyur zhe'am goms pa la 'jug pa bgegs med par 'gyur la thob par bya ba'i kun du rtog pa thams cad 'jug par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-0: de gal te yod na dngos po de ltar gyur pa las log par @163b yang 'jug pa cis 'grub par byed gang gis de'i tshe rjes su dpag pas de ltar nges pa de ci ltar 'jug ce na /
T04TD3903E:163b-1: nges pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa med pa'i phyir thog ma med pa nas ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis sems dbang du byas pas nges pa nar ma ma yin pa kho na'i tha snyad 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:163b-2: de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i lam thob kyang bsgom pa'i lam la ltos pa'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-3: de nyid kyi phyir de'i 'bras bu thob pa las tshu rol gyi goms pa ni ma rig pa kho nas yang dag par 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:163b-4: de la dang por re zhig rgyas par khams bco brgyad la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i dbye bas dngos po mtha' dag la rnam par dpyad par bya ste 'di tsam kho na chos thams cad do zhes pa de ltar nges nas slar yang sems de kho na la rgyun du gtad par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-5: de la mdor bsdu na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi skyon ni drug tu 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:163b-6: 'di lta ste le lo dang dmigs pa brjed pa dang bying ba /'di rnams kyi gnyen po spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad bsgom pa'o /'di rnams kyi gnyen po spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad bsgom par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-7: 'di lta ste dad pa dang 'dun pa dang rtsol ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang sems pa dang btang snyoms shes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-8: de la dang po bzhi'i ni le lo'i gnyen po rnams te de ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan rnams la mngon par yid ches pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dad pas rnal 'byor pa de la mngon par 'dod pa skyed par byed do //
T04TD3903E:163b-10: de las lus dang sems las su rung ba nyid ngo //
T04TD3903E:163b-11: de las le lo rnam par ldog go //
T04TD3903E:163b-12: dran pa ni dmigs pa brjed pa'i gnyen po'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-13: shes bzhin ni bying ba dang rgod pa dag gi ste des bying ba dang rgod pa dang nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro ;
T04TD3903E:163b-14: / bying ba dang rgod pa rab tu zhi ba'i dus na ni rtsol ba med pa skyon te de'i gnyen por sems pa bsgom par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-15: bying ba dang rgod pa zhi bar gyur nas gang gi tshe sems rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa de'i tshe rtsol bskyon te /
T04TD3903E:163b-16: de'i gnyen por de'i tshe btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:163b-17: spong ba brgyad po 'di rnams kyi rgyus ting nge 'dzin las su rung bar gyur la des rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams mngon par 'grub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:163b-18: de nyid kyi phyir mdo las gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:163b-19: spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom mo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:163b-20: zhi gnas kyi rim pa 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:164a-1: chub sems dpa' de nang la sems 'jog go //
T04TD3903E:164a-7: rnam par zhi par byed do //
T04TD3903E:164a-10: de la 'jog ste ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa la sems gtod do //
T04TD3903E:164a-11: rgyun du 'jog ste rgyun gyis 'jug pa la de bzhin kho nar 'jog ste gzhan du 'gro ba 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:164a-12: glan te 'jog ste sems rang bzhin gyis g-yo ba nyid kyi phyir ci zhig ltar gzhan du 'gro ba na de rtogs nas myur du sdud pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:164a-13: nye bar 'jog ste sems brtan par gyur kyang rang bzhin gyis rags pa nyid kyis na gzhan du yang rnam par grol ba las gong nas gong du phra bar byed pas de kho na la 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:164a-14: dul bar byed de sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par g-yeng ba la dga' ba ting nge 'dzin la dga' bar byed de ting nge 'dzin gyi phan yon mthong ba las so //
T04TD3903E:164a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi phan yon rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:164a-16: zhi bar byed de de ltar na yang gal te ting nge 'dzin la de mi dga' bar gyur ba de'i tshe rnam par g-yeng ba la dga' la de'i phyir de zhi bar byed pa ste /
T04TD3903E:164a-17: rnam par g-yeng ba'i nyes pa mthong ba las so //
T04TD3903E:164a-18: rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon yang mnar med pa ji srid pa'i yang sdug bsngal thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:164a-19: rnam par zhi bar byed de brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa skyes pa rnams zhi bar byed pa'i phyir mi dga' nga dang ldan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:164a-20: rtse gcig tu byed de dmigs pa gcig la shin tu dang chos mthun pa'i phyir shin tu ba ste shin tu gcig pa de ltar byed cing /
T04TD3903E:164a-21: rnam pa bdun rnams kyis skyon dang bral ba'i sems rtsol ba las de lta bu kho nar rang gi ngang gis 'jug par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:164a-22: mnyam par 'jog ste rang gi ngang gis zhugs nas ro myong ba med pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i dmigs pa la sems 'dzin par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:164a-23: mdo sde rgyan du gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:164a-24: dmigs pa la ni sems gtad nas //
T04TD3903E:164a-25: de rgyun rnam par g-yeng mi bya //
T04TD3903E:164a-26: rnam g-yeng myur du rtogs byas nas //
T04TD3903E:164a-27: de las slar yang glan par bya //
T04TD3903E:164a-28: blo ldan gong nas gong du ni //
T04TD3903E:164a-29: sems ni nang du bsdu bar bya //
T04TD3903E:164a-30: de nas yon tan mthong ba yis //
T04TD3903E:164a-31: ting nge 'dzin la sems dga' bya //
T04TD3903E:164b-0: rnam g-yeng nyes pa @164b mthong ba'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:164b-1: de la mi dga' zhi bar bya //
T04TD3903E:164b-2: brnab sems yid mi bde la sogs //
T04TD3903E:164b-3: langs pa de bzhin zhi bar bya //
T04TD3903E:164b-4: de nas sdom brtson can gyis ni //
T04TD3903E:164b-5: sems la mngon par 'du byed bcas //
T04TD3903E:164b-6: rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba thob //
T04TD3903E:164b-7: de goms pa las 'du mi byed //
T04TD3903E:164b-9: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang sems dag rnam par dben pa kho na las 'byung ngo zhes sngar brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:164b-10: de ltar gang gi tshe dmigs pa de la mngon par 'du byed pa med par rang gis 'byung ba nyid kyis ji srid 'dod par sems 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe zhi gnas rdzogs par rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:164b-11: de ltar ring nge 'dzin rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:164b-12: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bskyed nas sems can la dmigs pa dang ;
T04TD3903E:164b-13: chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mngon du byas shing dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang rang gi dngos po dang gzhan gyi dngos po la sogs par yid la byed pa med par byas pas thams cad las yid glan te ci yang sems pa med par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:164b-14: de de ltar sems pa med pa las bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par byed de tshad ma dang gzhal bya dang 'bras bu'i cha dang yang dag par bral bas na rang gsal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:164b-15: de mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du rtogs nas de'i mthus /
T04TD3903E:164b-16: kye ma ma la gti mug gi nus pa gang gis sems can 'di rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin yang bdag nyid kyis ma rtogs pas 'di rnams ci ltar rtogs par bya zhes rnam par bsams nas de'i bdag nyid kho nar 'gro ba thams cad la dmigs te dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin snying rje chen po bskyed nas de'i bdag nyid kho nar bdag dang dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa ro gcig tu gyur par blta bar bya'o /
T04TD3903E:164b-17: de kho na nyid mthong ba 'di ni gang shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa las chos thams cad mthong ba med pa kho na yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:164b-18: gnyid log pa dang brgyal ba dag gi mig bzhin du gang yid la byed pa med pa las ni ma yin te ;
T04TD3903E:164b-19: de lta na bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa las langs pa bzhin du slar yang gzugs la sogs par mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba can 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams skye ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa grol ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:165a-0: thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi mngon par @165a * //
T04TD3903E:165a-1: zhen pa yid la byed pa yongs su dor ba tsam las spong ba yang ma yin te 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa la sogs pas kyang spang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:165a-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la the tshom spong ba med par ni de yid la byed pa yongs su spang bar yang nus pa ma yin te me ma spangs na sreg pa mi spong ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-3: de'i phyir the tshom gyi sa bon dang bral ba kho na las gzugs la sogs par mngon par zhen pa dang bral bar bya'o zhes nges so //
T04TD3903E:165a-4: the tshom gyi sa bon dang bral ba la yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag phan tshun rjes su mthun pa'o //
T04TD3903E:165a-5: de ltar ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can zhi gnas kyi snang ba yod na shes rab kyi ming gzhan pa lhag mthong gis chos thams cad dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnam par dpyad pa la rnal 'byor pa the tshom dang bral lo //
T04TD3903E:165a-6: de dang bral na gzugs la sogs par mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T04TD3903E:165a-7: de dang bral na chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rtogs so //
T04TD3903E:165a-8: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:165a-9: de'i tshe zhi gnas dang shes rab dag de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:165a-10: rjod pa'i rim pas shes rab dang snying rje chen po dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir zung du 'brel ba'i lam byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin mchog tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnal 'byor bsod nams thams cad kyi rang bzhin kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
T04TD3903E:165a-11: byang chub sems dpa' yang de'i rang bzhin yin la /
T04TD3903E:165a-12: rnal 'byor de yang gnas skabs der shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin zung du 'brel ba'i ye shes kyi ngo nyid de /
T04TD3903E:165a-13: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang rnyog pa mtha' dag dang bral ba nyid dang de las gzhan pa'i ye shes khyad par can gyi rgyu nyid kyis me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-14: tha dad pa mtha' dag mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-15: phyin ci log ma lus pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-16: 'gro ba ma lus pa la phan pa sgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-17: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165a-18: dmigs pa las ldog pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165a-19: mtshan ma mtha' dag las bzlog pas mtshan ma med pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-0: @165b log pa'i smon lam las ldog pas smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-1: phyin ci log gi 'du byed las bzlog pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bdag nyid do zhes rnam par thar pa sgo bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165b-2: de bzhin du de kho na mig la sogs par dmigs pa las ldog pas nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165b-3: gzugs la sogs par dmigs pa las ldog pas phyi stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165b-4: phyi nang gi rten du dmigs pa las ldog pas phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-5: dbang po rnams kyi rten ni sems kyis zin pa'i phyi nang dang phyi rol yang dbang pos bsdus pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:165b-6: stong pa nyid du dmigs pa las ldog pas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-7: snod kyi 'jig rten du lhag par zhen pa las ldog pas chen po stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-8: don dam par dmigs pa las ldog pas don dam pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-9: 'dus byas bsod nams kyi tshogs su dmigs pa las ldog pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-10: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid byang chub kyi tshogs su nye bar dmigs pa las ldog pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-11: sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mthar dmigs pa las ldog pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165b-12: thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' dang 'bral ba'i 'khor bar dmigs pa las ldog pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-13: dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi 'dor bar dmigs pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-14: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du dmigs pa las ldog pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ste /
T04TD3903E:165b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:165b-16: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa las sogs pa'i ngo ba'i chos kyi skur dmigs pa las ldog pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-17: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du dmigs pa las ldog pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-18: dmigs pa med par dmigs pa las ldog pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:165b-19: phan tshun mi dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa ni 'dir dus gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:165b-20: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa las ldog pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-0: @166a * // dngos po med pa yang 'di yin la ngo bo nyid kyang yin pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de sbyor ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-1: de ci ltar dngos po med pa yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:166a-2: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:166a-3: dngos por dmigs pa las ldog pas dngos po stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
T04TD3903E:166a-4: skye bas na dngos po ste phung po lnga rnams so //
T04TD3903E:166a-5: dngos po med par dmigs pa las ldog pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
T04TD3903E:166a-6: skye ba med pas dngos po med pa ste nam mkha'o //
T04TD3903E:166a-7: rang gi ngo bor dmigs pa las ldog pas rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-8: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par ma bcos pa ni rang gi ngo bo ste stong pa nyid kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:166a-9: pha rol gyi ngo bor dmigs pa las ldog pas pha rol gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
T04TD3903E:166a-10: mchog nyid kyi phyir 'di pha rol yang yin la gzhan rnams kyis ma byas pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yang ngo bo yin pas pha rol gyi ngo bo ste de bzhin nyid do zhes pas 'di ni stong pa nyid nyi shu rnams kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-11: de bzhin du ser sna dang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang mi bzod pa dang le lo dang rnam par g-yeng ba dang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang thabs ma yin pa dang log pa'i smon lam dang stobs med pa nyid dang mi shes pa las ldog pas sbyin pa dang tshul khrams [*khrims?] dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-12: dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin no zhes pas bsod nams kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166a-13: 'di'i rang bzhin kho na'i ting nge 'dzin rnams gnas skabs kyi khyad par la bya ba rnams so so so sor byed pa'i phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod ces pa la sogs pa ming sna tshogs pa rnams kyis brjod kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:166a-14: de ltar ni gang gi dbang gis yo byad thams cad nam mkha' las skye ba de ni nam mkhar ram 'di'i mdzod do zhes pas nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa bya ba tha dad pa ste mdo ji lta bar shes par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:166b-0: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa rnams rang bzhin med pa'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ngo bo'i rnam pa rnam par gcod pa las ldog @166b pa'i bdag nyid de /
T04TD3903E:166b-1: de nyid kyi phyir med pa la sogs pa thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:166b-2: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis dang gnyen po'i lam la stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:166b-3: sprul pa'i lam la rnam par thar pa gsum dang /
T04TD3903E:166b-4: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam la thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang zhi bar gnas pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin la 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam la bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi dang 'gog pa dang mthong ba'i lam la bar chad med pa'i lam bzhi dang sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams so zhes pa rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi nyid kyis dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:166b-5: chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i rang 'byung dang rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de rnam pa sum cu rtsa dgu nyid kyis na dmigs pa dang ye shes kyi rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo thams cad shes pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'ang rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:166b-6: de nyid kyi phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dag nang du 'dus pa'i phyir lam thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166b-7: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzungs dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:166b-8: tshangs pa la sogs pa nas ba lang rdzi'i bar gyi sems can gyi rgyud la yod pa'i gang cung zad ye shes sam ting nge 'dzin gzhan la phan pa'i thabs su gyur pa de thams cad 'di nyid du ste /
T04TD3903E:166b-9: de ni thabs thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:167a-0: 'on kyang me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i chos 'di rnams rim gyis sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di sems bskyed pa 'ga' zhig kho na la bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi sgo nas ldog pa @167a * //
T04TD3903E:167a-1: tha dad pas 'ga' zhig kho na rnam par gzhag gi /
T04TD3903E:167a-2: thams cad du thams cad rnams ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:167a-3: de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs na spros pa med pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid ni gnas skabs kyi dbye ba ji lta bar tha dad par ji ltar rigs par bshad pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin du mgon po rnams kyis rnam par gzhag go //
T04TD3903E:167a-5: mi sems bzhin du snang med dang //
T04TD3903E:167a-6: gnyid log bzhin du mi 'phro bar //
T04TD3903E:167a-7: ngal ba ngal bso bzhin du yang //
T04TD3903E:167a-8: sems ni bdag med la dmigs nas //
T04TD3903E:167a-9: mig dag rengs par byed pa dang //
T04TD3903E:167a-10: mgo bo dud pa nyid dang ni //
T04TD3903E:167a-11: sems dang sems byung mi g-yo dang //
T04TD3903E:167a-12: stong nyid mthong ba'i stong pa nyid //
T04TD3903E:167a-13: gang gi tshe rnal 'byor de las langs pa de'i tshe yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na mos pas de bzhin nyid kho nar bsgom par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:167a-15: gang rnams rnam par dben pa zhes //
T04TD3903E:167a-16: yid ni g-yo ba'ang mi g-yo ba //
T04TD3903E:167a-17: de rnams nyon mongs sbrul 'khrugs pa'i //
T04TD3903E:167a-18: srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs rung brgal //
T04TD3903E:167a-20: rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs su yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:167a-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas ni shes bya dang khyad par med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos rnams thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:167a-22: de'i rjes la thob pas ni sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag ca dang gzugs brnyan dang sprul pa dang mtshungs par mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:167a-23: de nas bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i sems dang yangs pa nyid 'thob po //
T04TD3903E:167a-24: phun sum tshogs pa'i sems chen po yangs pa nyid dang shes rab chen po dang ye shes yangs pa nyid kyang ngo zhes rgya cher ro //
T04TD3903E:167a-25: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' thabs bstan pa'i dus su yang phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:167a-26: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las sbyor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:167a-27: 'jug la sgyu ma bzhin du sgom pa ji lta ba bzhin du dngos po'i de kho na nyid la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par 'byung ba kho na'o zhes pa thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel par 'byung ba'i lam 'byung ba kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:167a-28: 'di kho na rig pa chen mo mchog gi spyod pa bslab pa bla na med pa yang ste /
T04TD3903E:167a-29: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das ma yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:167b-0: @167b rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che //
T04TD3903E:167b-1: sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed //
T04TD3903E:167b-2: gang dag 'das dang gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon //
T04TD3903E:167b-3: rig sngags 'di bslabs chos kyi rgyal po bla med 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:167b-4: gang zhig 'dir brjod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste //
T04TD3903E:167b-5: stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa byang chub zhi mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod //
T04TD3903E:167b-6: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
T04TD3903E:167b-7: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can ji snyed ma lus pa //
T04TD3903E:167b-8: de rnams thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
T04TD3903E:167b-9: lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa sbyin byas la //
T04TD3903E:167b-10: kun kyang 'gro ba'i don rgyur byang chub yongs bsngo yang //
T04TD3903E:167b-11: gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin la mngon brtson pa //
T04TD3903E:167b-12: tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na //
T04TD3903E:167b-13: de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi phod //
T04TD3903E:167b-14: de phyir g-yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya //
T04TD3903E:167b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T04TD3903E:167b-16: snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med //
T04TD3903E:167b-17: de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:167b-18: rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongs su spyod //
T04TD3903E:167b-19: byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir yun ring 'brel pa yi //
T04TD3903E:167b-20: lha mi ngan song gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:167b-21: lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la ston 'dod pas //
T04TD3903E:167b-22: nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin la brtson par bya //
T04TD3903E:167b-23: bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa //
T04TD3903E:167b-24: ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin //
T04TD3903E:167b-25: mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas //
T04TD3903E:167b-26: sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slob //
T04TD3903E:167b-27: de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po rnams //
T04TD3903E:167b-28: thal mo sbyar bar byas shing btud nas phyag 'tshal byed //
T04TD3903E:167b-29: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed pa'ang //
T04TD3903E:167b-30: yon tan bsngags pa'i phreng ba yongs su sgrogs par mdzad //
T04TD3903E:167b-31: sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang //
T04TD3903E:167b-32: sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang //
T04TD3903E:167b-33: chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang //
T04TD3903E:167b-34: phan mdzad rnams kyis gnas mchog 'di la brten par gyis //
T04TD3903E:168a-0: de ltar 'di ni dbang po rnon po nyid yin pa'i phyir so so skye bo'i gnas skabs na tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa la rtag tu mngon par sbyor bar @168a * //
T04TD3903E:168a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin kho na'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:168a-3: thabs kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshad med pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po la sogs pa'i bye brag gis te /
T04TD3903E:168a-4: de ltar kho nar yang 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang mdo sde dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa'i mdo sde rnams su gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:168a-5: shes rab ni thabs de kho na phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin du yongs su gcod pa'i rgyu'o //
T04TD3903E:168a-6: gang gi phyir des yang dag pa'i thabs su rnam par phye nas /
T04TD3903E:168a-7: phyin ci ma log pas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i phyir sngags kyis zin pa'i dug za ba bzhin du longs spyad pas kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:168a-8: de bzhin du yang ga y'a mgo'i mdo las gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:168a-9: thabs ni bsdu ba'i ye shes te //
T04TD3903E:168a-10: shes rab yang gcod ye shes so //
T04TD3903E:168a-12: de'i phyir gnyi ga dus thams cad kho nar bstan par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:168a-13: de ltar ni snying rje chen pos sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs kyis gzugs kyi sku 'khor ba la sogs pa'i skal pa chen po nyid kyi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das par mi gnas la shes rab kyis kyang phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i phyir 'khor bar ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:168a-14: 'khor ba ni phyin ci log gi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:168a-15: de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rnon po goms par byed do //
T04TD3903E:168a-16: dbang po 'bring po dang dbang po rtul po dag kyang de ltar goms par byed la /
T04TD3903E:168a-17: 'on kyang dbang po 'bring pos chos thams cad skye mched bcu gnyis kyi rnam pa kho nar dmigs nas zhi gnas skyed par byed cing /
T04TD3903E:168a-18: dbang po rtul pos ni phung po la'i rnam pa kho nar chos thams cad dmigs nas zhi gnas skyed par byed de //
T04TD3903E:168a-19: dngos su ni rgya mtsho'i chu'i thigs pa myangs pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:168a-20: gang gis dngos po gcig lta ba //
T04TD3903E:168a-21: de yis thams cad mthong byed gsungs //
T04TD3903E:168a-22: gcig gis stong nyid gang yin pa //
T04TD3903E:168a-23: de nyid kun gyis stong nyid do //
T04TD3903E:168a-25: gsang sngags kyi tshul las kyang yungs kar gyi tshad kyi dkar po la sogs pa snang ba la yang dmigs nas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag skyed par byed do zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:168b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum po 'di rnams kyang spros pa med par sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba mngon par rdzogs te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs nyid @168b kyis bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis thabs la goms pa mthar phyin pa nyid kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams mngon par rdzogs nas sangs rgyas nyid rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:168b-1: sbyin pa la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i byang chub kyi sems goms pa nyid ni rim gyis sems nyi shu rtsa gnyis rnams su bskyed par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-2: de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa kho na sdig pa thams cad sbyong bar byed pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa yongs su 'byin pa rang gzhan thams cad legs par byed pa'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-3: thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i snang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T04TD3903E:168b-5: // / sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de rnams kho na theg pa chen po'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-6: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-7: de kho na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-8: de kho na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rnams so //
T04TD3903E:168b-9: de ltar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:168b-10: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid rnam pa ma lus pa nyid kyis dngos po mtha' dag yongs su shes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'brel ba ste /
T04TD3903E:168b-11: gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos sangs rgyas nyid yin la /
T04TD3903E:168b-12: de ni skyes bu'i don gyi mchog go //
T04TD3903E:168b-13: de kho na rgyas pa chos kyi sku'i mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:168b-14: gang gi phyir mngon par rtogs pa bdun rnams kyis mngon par rtogs par bya zhing thob par bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-15: de'i don nyid kyi phyir de'i lam ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btags pa pa ste mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:168b-16: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir de bzhin du dngos dang btags pa pa'o //
T04TD3903E:168b-17: ji skad du mdo sde rgyan du gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:168b-18: sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa //
T04TD3903E:168b-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid thob //
T04TD3903E:168b-20: rin chen snod ni phya ba ltar //
T04TD3903E:168b-21: sangs rgyas nyid ni yang dag bstan //
T04TD3903E:168b-23: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos kyang /
T04TD3903E:168b-24: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T04TD3903E:168b-25: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
T04TD3903E:168b-26: bsgrub bya de don du sbyor bas //
T04TD3903E:168b-27: gzhung lam dag la de sgras yin //
T04TD3903E:169a-0: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa byams @169a * //
T04TD3903E:169a-2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T04TD3903E:169a-3: ston pas 'di la bshad pa gang //
T04TD3903E:169a-6: 'dis chol ba zhes pas lam ste /
T04TD3903E:169a-7: mngon par rtogs pa bdun nang du 'dus pa 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar byas so ;
T04TD3903E:169a-8: / de yang 'gro bar 'dod pa dang 'gro ba po'i bye brag bzhin du smon pa dang 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbye ba las rnam pa gnyis so //
T04TD3903E:169a-9: yang dang po rnam pa gsum smon pa'i sems yin la bcu dgu 'jug pa nyid de nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i snying po can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:169a-10: de rnams kyang kun rdzob tu khyad par dang bcas la don dam par khyad par dang bcas pa ma yin khyad par med pa yang ma yin no zhes sgrub byed dang bcas pa sngar brjod zin te /
T04TD3903E:169a-11: kun rdzob tu yang de rnams kyi chos nyid stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni thun mong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-12: chos 'ga' zhig kyang thun mong ma yin pa ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa thams cad kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:169a-13: sngar khong du chud pa'i chos phyi mar rjes su 'jug go zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-14: 'ga' zhig ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:169a-15: yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa sems bskyed pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par ro //
T04TD3903E:169a-16: gang gi tshe gul bya'i ngor ji skad bshad pa'i ldog pa tha dad pa las stong pa nyid rnam pa nyi shu sems bskyed pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par rnams la rnam par gzhag pa de'i tshe de yang thun mong ma yin pa yin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:169a-17: de ltar ni nang dang phyi dang phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sems bskyed pa dang po nas brtsams te mos pas spyod pa'i sa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-18: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sa de'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bar chad med pa sbyor ba'i lam la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-19: chen po stong pa nyid ni kun du 'gro ba'i don gyis sa dang po la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-20: don dam pa stong pa nyid mchog gi don gyis gnyis pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-21: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rgyu mthun pa'i don gyis gsum pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-22: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i don gyis bzhi pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-23: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rgyu tha dad pa med pa'i don gyis lnga pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-24: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i don gyis drug pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169a-25: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sna tshogs pa nyid med pa'i don gyis bdun pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-0: rang @169b bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi rnam par 'gyur ba mi brtan pa'i phyir dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces pa gnyis ni 'grib pa med cing 'phel ba med pa'i don gyis dang rnam par mi rtog pa dang zhing yongs su dag pa la dbang ba nyid gnyis kyi rten nyid kyis ni 'bras bu'i sa nyid kyi phyir so sor rtog pa dang yongs su sbyong ba'i dbye bas brgyad pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-1: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag ni ye shes la dbang ba'i rten nyid kyis de bzhin kho nar dgu pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-2: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po stong pa nyid dag las la dbang ba'i rten nyid kyis de bzhin kho nar bcug pa la ste /
T04TD3903E:169b-3: bcu bzhi pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa bdun gyi rang gi ngo bo la'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-4: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang pha rol gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid ni go rims bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa spong ba'i rten nyid kyis dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa spong ba'i rten nyid kyis dang rang byung nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la ste sems bskyed pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid la'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-5: de la sems bskyed pa dang po ni phyi ma rnams kyi rgyu kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-6: tha ma gnyis ni snga ma rnams kyi 'bras bu kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-7: gnyis pa ni phyi ma rnams kyi rgyu dang snga ma'i 'bras bu ste /
T04TD3903E:169b-8: de bzhin du bsam pa la sogs pa bcu dgu ni phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-9: 'dun pa'i snga rol gyi sems srid pa thog ma med pa nas byung ba na nye bar len pa dang nye bar blang bya nyid kyis rgyun du yang gyur pa rnams ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin no zhes pa mu bzhi'o //
T04TD3903E:169b-10: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs kyi gnas skabs na yang de rnams la thugs brtse bas de'i don du ched du bya ba dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i tshogs thams cad sogs par byed pa la 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:169b-13: ched du bya ba ni ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:169b-14: brjod par bya ste chos kyi dbyings chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can kho na 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs dang gzhi dang ston pa dang rgyu dang rten dang nye bar gnas pa dang sngon du 'gro ba dang gnas dang sa bon dang khams dang rang bzhin zhes pa'i rnam grangs kyis brjod do //
T04TD3903E:170a-0: de ltar ni gang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa glo bur gyi dri ma rnams kyis mi snang bar byas pa'i rigs de nyid phyis dri ma ma lus pa dang @170a * //
T04TD3903E:170a-1: bral ba las gsal bar gyur pa nyid de ni rdo rnams la lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi rigs dang 'dra'o //
T04TD3903E:170a-2: chos nyid bdag nyid kyi rigs 'di kho na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes par gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:170a-3: rang bzhin gyi rigs de yod pa nyid na yang srog chags rnams ma rig pa la sogs pa'i glo bur gyi dri mas g-yogs par gyur pa ji srid par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:170a-4: rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma ma lus pa dang bral ba las ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings gsal bar gyur pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'grub po //
T04TD3903E:170a-5: de nyid kyi phyir khyad par du 'phags pa ni rigs te /
T04TD3903E:170a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po rnams dang de'i khyad par 'dun pa nas brtsams pa'i go cha'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o //
T04TD3903E:170a-8: rtogs pa yi ni chos drug dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-9: gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-10: de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-11: shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-12: slob ma thun mong min nyid dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-13: gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang //
T04TD3903E:170a-14: ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar //
T04TD3903E:170a-15: 'jug pa'i rten la rigs zhes bya //
T04TD3903E:170a-16: zhes pa tshig le'ur byas pa dag gis dang stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzhung rnam par bshad pa 'phags pa rnam grol sde'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:170a-17: gang gi phyir sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnam pa bzhi rnams la dang /
T04TD3903E:170a-18: mthong ba'i lam la dang bsgom pa'i lam la de dang der byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa bcom ldan 'das brjod par bgyi ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170a-19: gnyen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170a-20: spong ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams kyi ste /
T04TD3903E:170a-21: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T04TD3903E:170a-22: gnyen po dang spong ba dag yongs su gtugs pa ni mthar thug par 'gro ba ste gnyen po mchog tu byung ba'i mthar thug pa kho na dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad pa'i mthar thug pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:170a-23: / seng ge bzang pos yongs su gtugs pa ni de dag skye ba dang 'gag pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:170a-24: 'o na 'di ni rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'ongs pa chos nyid kyis thob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170b-0: 'di ni yang dag par blangs pa las byung ba sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba goms pas @170b thob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170b-1: 'di ni dus re zhig nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs so //
T04TD3903E:170b-2: 'di ni rtag tu nges pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
T04TD3903E:170b-3: 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ma nges pa ste rkyen gyis 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro zhes rigs tha dad mi rigs te /
T04TD3903E:170b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:170b-5: 'jam dpal gal te chos kyi dbyings gcig dang de bzhin nyid gcig dang yang dag pa'i mtha' gcig po de ji ltar snod dang snod ma yin par gdags zhes so zhe na /
T04TD3903E:170b-6: de lta bu 'di ni bden te de lta na yang brten pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tha dad pa'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad du tha snyad du bya ste /
T04TD3903E:170b-7: dper na nam mkha' la tha dad pa med kyang /
T04TD3903E:170b-8: lam tha dad pa la chag pa'i lam dang bya'i lam dang nyi ma'i lam zhes pa bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:170b-9: gang gi phyir gang nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub rtogs pa sngon ma can byang chub chen po rtogs pa de rnams re zhig pa'i dus can du bstan pas nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs can du bstan to //
T04TD3903E:170b-10: dang po nas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa rtogs nas rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub bsten pa rnams ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can no zhes tha snyad las rigs tha dad pa mi 'gal la de kho na nyid du ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:170b-12: gang du 'du byed cung zad kyang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs su mtshungs la rigs de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis khyad par med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170b-13: rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyis rtag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:170b-14: rigs de ni thams cad kyi tshe chos nyid yin pas shes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:170b-15: nges pa'i tshig ni 'di las yon tan rnams gong du sgrol bar byed kun nas skye bar byed pas rigs so //
T04TD3903E:170b-16: yang na 'gro bas na sems can rnams ni go'o //
T04TD3903E:170b-17: de rnams skyob pas rigs so //
T04TD3903E:170b-18: yang na 'dir ga mi ni gnas pa la 'jug pa ste /
T04TD3903E:170b-19: dper na nam mkha' thams cad du song ba'o zhes pa bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:170b-20: 'gro'o gnas so zhes pa go ste /
T04TD3903E:170b-22: de skyob par byed mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir rigs zhes pa ste rten no //
T04TD3903E:170b-23: 'o na rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ci ltar sems bskyed rnams kyi rten yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:170b-24: dper na rang bzhin med pa'i nam mkha' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyi dang mun pa sel ba'i bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:171a-0: dmigs pa ni spang bar bya ba nyid dang blang bar @171a * //
T04TD3903E:171a-1: bya ba nyid dag gis dmigs par bya ba'o zhes pas sgrub pa'i yul lo //
T04TD3903E:171a-2: ci zhe na chos rnams thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:171a-3: de la mi dge ba srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:171a-4: lung du ma bstan pa lus kyi las la sogs pa rnams ni spang bar bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:171a-5: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni blang bar bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:171a-6: de ltar byas na rang bzhin gtso bo yin la rnam 'gyur gtso bo dmigs pa ste gnyi gar yang gnyi ga ma bgag go zhes pas rten dang dmigs pa dag gi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba dang dmigs pa dag par 'gro ba yang 'thad par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:171a-7: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:171a-8: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad chags pa nyid dang yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:171a-10: rang bzhin dang 'brel pa'i rnam 'gyur dmigs pa ste rnam 'gyur tsam ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:171a-11: de nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin gtso bo dgos pa dmigs par dgongs nas /
T04TD3903E:171a-12: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:171a-13: 'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de //
T04TD3903E:171a-14: bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed //
T04TD3903E:171a-15: rnam pa bzhi nyid ces kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:171a-16: 'dir dngos po med pa ni chos thams cad kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:171a-17: bdag po'i rkyen ni dran pa ste de 'di'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:171a-18: zhi ba nyid ni rang bzhin gyis zhi ba ste dngos po la 'gag pa'i zhi ba nyid ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:171a-19: ci ltar rang bzhin dgos pa yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:171a-20: gang gi phyir chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid gsal por 'gyur ba bsten pa sgom pa'i don du nye bar sbyor bas so //
T04TD3903E:171a-21: 'o na rang bzhin med pa zhes pa ni dngos po cung zad med pa yin la /
T04TD3903E:171a-22: dngos po med pa nyid na'ang dmigs su med pa'o zhe na /
T04TD3903E:171a-23: bden te dngos po med pa zhes pa ni dngos por dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:171a-24: dngos po med pa ni gnyis med dgag go //
T04TD3903E:171a-26: gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:171a-28: gang rnams rang dngos gzhan dngos dang //
T04TD3903E:171a-29: dngos dang dngos med nyid lta ba //
T04TD3903E:171a-30: de rnams sangs rgyas bstan pa la //
T04TD3903E:171a-31: de kho na nyid mthong ba min //
T04TD3903E:171a-33: dngos dang dngos med mchog 'dzin pa //
T04TD3903E:171a-34: zad pa mya ngan 'das par brjod //
T04TD3903E:171b-0: don dam par ni dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa dang @171b dmigs pa'i spros pa 'ga' yang med de /
T04TD3903E:171b-1: de nyid kyi phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin dmigs pa med pa kho na rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam zab mor sngar brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:171b-2: 'phags pa byams pas kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:171b-3: bsgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste //
T04TD3903E:171b-4: zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs //
T04TD3903E:171b-5: zab pa de ni sgro 'dogs dang ;
T04TD3903E:171b-6: / skur ba'i mtha' las grol ba nyid //
T04TD3903E:171b-8: 'phags pa zhi ba lhas kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:171b-9: stong nyid bag chags goms pa las //
T04TD3903E:171b-10: dngos po'i bag chags spong bar byed //
T04TD3903E:171b-11: ci yang med ces goms pa las //
T04TD3903E:171b-12: de yang phyi nas spong bar 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:171b-13: gang tshe dngos dang dngos med pa //
T04TD3903E:171b-14: blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa ;
T04TD3903E:171b-15: / de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas //
T04TD3903E:171b-16: dmigs pa med pa rab tu zhi //
T04TD3903E:171b-18: 'phags pa rnam grol sdes kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis ci dmigs she na /
T04TD3903E:171b-19: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid du'o //
T04TD3903E:171b-20: 'o na dmigs par bya ba stong pa nyid 'di ni mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du med pa yin pa'i phyir ;
T04TD3903E:171b-21: chos thams cad yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:171b-22: ma yin te gang gi phyir gsod pa po bsad na lhas byin slar 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:171b-23: de ltar na ci ltar dmigs par brjod ce na /
T04TD3903E:171b-25: de ltar na stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po'i tshogs rnams stong pa kho na ste gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i khyad par /
T04TD3903E:171b-26: khyad par gzhan gsal bas brjod par bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:171b-27: de bzhin du yang stong pa nyid sgom pa zhes pa yang dngos po'i tshogs stong par sgom pa zhes pa kho na'i don to //
T04TD3903E:171b-28: 'o na de ltar na bsgom par bya ba'i chos thams cad dmigs par 'gyur la dngos po med pa'i dmigs pa'o zhes pa de nyes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:171b-29: ci ste chos nyid dang tha dad pa med kyang tha dad pa bzhin re zhig snang ba de lta na yang lhag par zhen pa las chos su gyur pa kho na bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni nyes pa de las mi grol te ma 'brel par gnas pa nyid kyis sgom par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:171b-30: de ltar yang dngos po skyes pa 'di rang bzhin med pa'o zhes pa'i rnam pa 'di kho na sgom pa las de ci ltar chos kyi de kho na nyid sgom pa'i phyogs la chos kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su spong /
T04TD3903E:171b-31: yongs su spong na yang chos gzhan sgom pa kho nar 'gyur gyi chos nyid sgom pa ma yin no zhe na /
T04TD3903E:172a-0: bden te gal te yang chos kyi de kho na nyid bsgoms pas kyang chos spyir 'phangs pa de lta de lta na yang de kho na nyid tsam la ched du @172a * //
T04TD3903E:172a-1: gtad nas gnas te de kho na nyid sgom pa kho na gsal bar gyur pas 'khor ba'i ngan 'gro 'byin pas so //
T04TD3903E:172a-2: gang gi phyir 'dod ldan ma lus mchog tu bsgoms pas mngon du byas na 'dod chags zum par 'gyur ba'am dgra bo'i lus kyis zhe sdang 'dzums pa'am gnyis kar sems pa med pas gti mug 'bri ba med de 'on kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid kho nar ro //
T04TD3903E:172a-3: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na la ched du gtad pas de kho na gsal ba nyid sman du 'gyur gyi chos rnams bsgoms pas ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:172a-4: 'o na de la ched du gtad na 'ang chos nyid kho na gsal bar 'gyur gyi chos ma yin zhes pa'i 'thad pa ci ste /
T04TD3903E:172a-5: bsgoms pas gnyis ka yang dbang du byed pa'i phyir te chos la ma reg par chos nyid tsam gsal bar 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:172a-7: chos gsal bar 'gyur ba la ma reg par yang chos nyid tsam gsal bar 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:172a-8: chos nye ba la ma ltos par gsal ba dang gsal byed ces mi 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig go //
T04TD3903E:172a-9: gsal bar gyur kyang de de'i yul 'dus pa na rtsol ba la ma ltos par yud tsam gyis de'i shes pa la de'i rnam pa gsal du zin kyang chos nye ba la ltos pa ni ma nyams te /
T04TD3903E:172a-10: chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo kho na'i phyir dga' ba nyid la sogs pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:172a-11: de ltar nim pa'i ro la sogs pa la dga' ba nyid du goms pa ni gsal bar gyur pa mthong ste /
T04TD3903E:172a-12: nim pa la sogs pa'i chos can gyi de chos so zhes de bsgoms pas /
T04TD3903E:172a-13: nim pa la sogs pa rang skye ba'i yul na gnas pa'am lce'i rtse mor son pa la yang ji srid phyin ci log tu sgom pa la mngon par sbyor ba phul byung med pa'i bar du gsal zhing gsal ba yod pa ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:172a-14: gsal bar gyur pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang nim pa la sogs pa nyams su myong ba la ma ltos par 'brel med du gnas pa na mi dmigs kyi /
T04TD3903E:172a-15: 'on kyang gang dang gang gi tshe nim pa la sogs pa nyams su myong ba de'i tshe yud kyis dga' ba nyid nyams su myong ba'i yul sngar bzhin du yid 'byung ba'am /
T04TD3903E:172a-16: gnyis ka ma yin pa med na'o zhes pa 'di kho na chos nyid gsal bar 'gyur pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:172a-17: ji ltar bzang mo la sogs pa'i chos gsal bar gyur na yang de'i chos nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du gnyis ka phan tshun mi 'khrul na yang de kho na nyid bsgoms pas kyang chos gsal bar 'gyur ba med do zhes pas skyon ci 'dra zhig yod /
T04TD3903E:172b-0: ji ltar yang dga' @172b ba nyid ces pa ni bde bar byed pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:172b-1: de la yul gang la gang dga' ba nyid du sgom pa de'i sems kyi rgyun bsgoms pas 'dus byas pa rgyur byas nas yul de lhan cig byed pa can gyi bde ba goms pa kho na las skyes pa de bzhin du snying rje la sogs pa'i yid las byung ba rnams la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:172b-2: sdug bsngal can gdon no zhes pha rol sdug bsngal can gdon par bsgoms pa las gsal bar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:172b-3: de'i yul dang nye ba na yud tsam gyis de'i shes pa de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgrub pa rab tu bskyed pa'i rgyu ste 'brel pa can kho na dang ngam nye bar cig shos dang lhan cig gsal ba nyid ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:172b-4: ji skad du thams cad mkhyen pa grub par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:172b-5: brtse ba la sogs rtogs pa phul byung thob pa rnams ni de yi spyod yul nyer gnas na //
T04TD3903E:172b-6: 'di ltar rtsol la ltos pa med par de rnams rang gi rang gis so sor bdag nyid gsal //
T04TD3903E:172b-8: de'i phyir rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid goms pa phul du byung bar 'gro na yang ji srid rnal 'byor pas nyams su myong bar bya ba de srid du rang bzhin med pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni so so skye bo la sogs pas mthong ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:172b-9: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par 'khrul pa las byung ba 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas 'di'i sems mtshan ma med pa'o zhes pa 'di tsam de'i gsal bar snang ba nyid do //
T04TD3903E:172b-10: 'di phyin ci log tu sgom pa mi srid de /
T04TD3903E:172b-11: gang gi phyir rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rang gi don nam gzhan gyi don du sgom pa mngon par brtson pa de de tsam kho na nyid du don byas par gyur pas ngal ba gzhan la cis na 'jug ces pa ste /
T04TD3903E:172b-12: don med pa nyid kyi phyir dang don byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:172b-13: dper na bza' ba dang sman la sogs pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa dang smin pa thob pa na bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:172b-14: ji ltar yang 'dir smin pa gzhan mngon par mi 'dod pa srid kyang /
T04TD3903E:172b-15: de tsam kho na smin pa phul du byung ba mthar thug par tha snyad byed pa de bzhin du skabs su yang ngo zhes pas skyon ci yang med do //
T04TD3903E:172b-17: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
T04TD3903E:172b-18: rang bzhin la ni phyin log gis //
T04TD3903E:172b-19: 'bad pa ldan yang mi gnod de //
T04TD3903E:172b-20: blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:172b-21: zhes rnam 'grel du gsungs pa nyid kyis slar yang dpyod par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:173a-0: de ltar mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden @173a * //
T04TD3903E:173a-1: pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i chos rnams dmigs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:173a-2: mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na ni rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa mtha' dag ldog pa na dmigs pa la sogs pa ci yang med do zhes gnas so //
T04TD3903E:173a-3: ched du bya ba ni bsgrub pa rnams kyi ched du bya ba'o zhes las su sgrub pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:173a-4: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis rnams lam chags pa nyid kyis ji srid du rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad rtogs pa'i bar te /
T04TD3903E:173a-5: gang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnam par bshad pa 'phags pas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:173a-6: de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste zhes pa brda las byung ba'o //
T04TD3903E:173a-7: chos gang gi yang skye ba'am 'gag pa med ces pa ni dran gyi dus su snga ma dang phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag la 'gag pa dang skye ba'i tshul gyis shes pa la sogs pa dang 'khor ba pa dang zhugs pa dang 'bras bu la gnas pa la sogs pa sems can gyi phung po ma lus pa'i mchog nyid kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid ces pa gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:173a-8: de bzhin du bstan bcos las kyang /
T04TD3903E:173a-9: sems can kun mchog nyid sems dang //
T04TD3903E:173a-10: spangs dang rtogs pa gsum po la //
T04TD3903E:173a-11: chen po gsum gyi rang 'byung gi //
T04TD3903E:173a-12: ched du bya ba 'di zhes bya //
T04TD3903E:173a-14: rang nyid sangs rgyas su 'byung bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:173a-15: dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba'i khyad par ni /
T04TD3903E:173a-16: mda' ltong sbyor ba dang 'ben la phog pa dang chos mtshungs par shes par bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:173a-17: de'i tshe bdag nyid ni dmigs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:173a-18: sgrub pa dang dus mnyam pa nyid kyis de'i yul gyi dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:173a-19: ched du bya ba ni che ge mo pa thag ring ba ste de ni 'byung ba de'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:173a-20: de ltar rigs dang dmigs pa dang ched du bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed par byed do //
T04TD3903E:173a-21: sems bskyed pa de'i mtshan nyid ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:173a-22: byang chub sems dpa' ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:173a-23: gzhan gyi don bsgrub par bya'o zhes de ltar don du gnyer ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:173a-25: sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T04TD3903E:173a-26: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T04TD3903E:173b-0: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid ni @173b de don du gnyer ba dge ba'i chos 'dun pa sems las byung ba yin mod /
T04TD3903E:173b-1: de yod na byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do zhes bya bas rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa ste /
T04TD3903E:173b-2: de ltar don du gnyer ba'i dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya ba'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:173b-3: yang de don du gnyer ba dang lhan cig spyod pa sems bskyed pa la de'i sgras btags pa ste de ltar don du gnyer ba dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i sems skyed par byed do zhes shes pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:173b-4: yang na sems ni mngon par 'dod pa ste de ltar ni 'gro bar 'dod zer ba ni bdag gi sems 'gro bar zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:173b-5: de bskyed pa ni sems bskyed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:173b-6: mngon par 'dod pa ni bskyed pa las mi 'khrul pa las bskyed pa smos pa ni khyad par yongs su gzung ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:173b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa ste mngon par 'dod pa gang gi yin pa ste de'i ngo bo ni de nyid do //
T04TD3903E:173b-8: de'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi ched du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pa ni sems bskyed pa'o zhes pa 'di'i mtshan nyid do //
T04TD3903E:173b-9: 'o na don du gnyer ba ni rtog pa ste de dang lhan cig gyur pa'i sems ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yin zhe na bden te don du gnyer ba'i don du gnyer ba po nyid de byed pa po'i chos sngon gyi sems so so dang /
T04TD3903E:173b-10: don du gnyer byas zin pa nyid de las kyi chos phyi ma'i sems so so yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:173b-11: de'i phyir don du gnyer bas byas zin pa'i sems rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ste /
