T04TD3903E:223b-2: de'i tshe dngos po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mthong gi /
T04TD3903E:223b-3: 'di las 'di dngos po ma lus par rtogs pa'i sprul pa la mkhas par rigs pa ma yin te de kho na nyid sgrib par byed pa nyid ni dri ma nyid yin la /
T04TD3903E:223b-4: dri ma nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par rtog pas sprul pa la gegs byed pa po ma yin no zhe na /
T04TD3903E:223b-6: ci dngos po rnams mthong ba la rnam par rtog pa gegs nyid du ma mthong ngam /
T04TD3903E:223b-7: 'on te nyon mongs pas byas pa ma yin zhes pas so //
T04TD3903E:223b-8: de gnyis ka yang yod pa ma yin te gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang na yang med pas so //
T04TD3903E:223b-9: rnam par rtog pa de dang bral ba yang nyon mongs pa med par ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:223b-10: gang gi tshe dga' ba'i dngos po mthong ba na skyon dang mthong ba la yang skyon med par rtog pa de'i tshe 'dod chags ni gsal bar rgyu yin no //
T04TD3903E:223b-11: gang gi tshe yang mi dga' ba yon tan dang ldan pa yang yon tan med par rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe zhe sdang ngo //
T04TD3903E:223b-12: goms pa med pa na thams cad yod pa'i ngo bo ma yin par rnam par rtog pa ni gti mug gis byas pa kho na ste /
T04TD3903E:223b-13: la ba la sogs pa bzhin du sgrib par byed pa ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:223b-14: 'on kyang rgyud mi mthun pa skyes pas so //
T04TD3903E:223b-15: de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas ji lta ji ltar gti mug la sogs pa las yongs su rgyal ba de ltar gang nyid kyis mi mthun pa ldog pas gang gi tshe re zhig blo rnams rang gi rnam pa rnams la nges par rten cing mthar thug pa na rnam pa thams cad dang dngos po thams cad la yang 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:223b-16: de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pa rnams bsgom pa rab tu gyur pa na gsal ba nyid du gdon mi za bar 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:223b-17: de yang bsgom pa'i khyad par gyi stobs kho na las te /
T04TD3903E:223b-18: lha'i dbang las bden pa'i rmi lam bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:223b-20: don ji lta ba'i bdag nyid med par ma yin la /
T04TD3903E:223b-21: de las skye ba las gzhan du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:223b-23: gzung ba'i mtshan nyid bsam pa 'di //
T04TD3903E:224a-2: / rnal 'byor rtog pa bsam mi khyab //
T04TD3903E:224a-4: phyi rol du ni so so skye bo'i 'dra ba nyid dang skyed par byed pa dag gis rig byar gnas la rnal 'byor pa'i 'dra ba tsam gyis kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:224a-5: thob par bya ba ni don 'jug yul nye bar ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir mi slu ba'o //
T04TD3903E:224a-6: 'o na 'byung 'gyur dang byung zin dag dus kyis bar du chod pas na des ci ltar ston zhe na /
T04TD3903E:224a-7: yul gyis bar du chod pa la yang 'dir thal lo zhes pas 'jug tu rung ba'i yul la yang ston par byed pa tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:224a-8: de ni de tsam du yod do zhe na /
T04TD3903E:224a-10: gal te de'i dus na med pas so zhe na /
T04TD3903E:224a-11: de'i yul na da lta ba yang med do zhes pa mtshungs so //
T04TD3903E:224a-12: don bya ba yang de ji ltar de'i yul nye pa na yin pa de ltar de'i dus nye ba na'o zhes pa khyad par ci yang med do //
T04TD3903E:224a-13: ci ste thams cad rig par byed na 'dod chags la sogs pa pha rol gyi sems ma lus pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:224a-14: bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:224a-15: ma yin te gang gi phyir 'dod chags ni rang gi bag chags kyi nus pa dang ldan pa las 'dod chags pa nyid du byed kyi gzhan gyi bag chags kyis stobs dang ldan pa las ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:224a-16: nye bar 'jog par grub pa nyid kyis de'i yang dag par rig par bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:224a-17: 'o na gal te kun rdzob tu ye shes skad cig gcig gis cig car shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa la khyab na de'i tshe dngos po rnams 'di tsam zhes yongs su bcad pa'i phyir mtha' med par khas blangs pa la gnod de /
T04TD3903E:224a-18: de ltar ni ye shes gcig gis rtogs pa'i dngos po las gzhan pa'i dngos po med do zhes pa 'di ltar yongs su gcad par bya ba rnams ci ltar mtha' dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T04TD3903E:224a-20: ji ltar sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams na mtha' yas pa de lta kho nar thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs mtha' med pas cig car 'dzin pas te /
T04TD3903E:224a-21: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa du ma bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:224a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su chad par byas na ni mthar thug pa nyid kyi skyon no //
T04TD3903E:224b-0: gang gis shes par bya ba nyid kyis na mtha' dang ldan par 'gyur ba dngos po rnams ye shes kyi yongs su bcad @224b pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis mtha' med par khas blangs pa ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:224b-1: 'on kyang yul bkod pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis snod kyi 'jig rten mtha' yas la /
T04TD3903E:224b-2: sems can gyi 'jig rten ni grangs mtha' med pa nyid kyis kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:224b-3: de'i phyir 'di ni 'dir bsdus pa'i don te /
T04TD3903E:224b-4: dper na rmi lam bden pa mthong ba'i shes pa /
T04TD3903E:224b-5: don dam par yul med kyang so sor nges pa'i yul gyi rnam pa rtags dang lung la ma ltos par rten gyi khyad par gyi dbang las skye bas nye bar bstan pas nye bar bstan pa'i don thob par byed pa nyid kyis mi slu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnam skyi ye shes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor goms pa'i stobs kyis ji ltar de bzhin byung ba'am 'byung bzhin pa'am 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o zhes 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos por gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa de lta kho nar 'gal ba dang mi 'gal ba dang spang bya dang blang bya la sogs pa nye bar ston pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba can gyi spros pa rnams phyi rol bzhin du yongs su gsal ba'i ngo bo gsal bar so sor snang ba /
T04TD3903E:224b-6: rtags dang lung la ltos pa med pa mi slu ba nyid du skyes pa ni mngon sum tshad mar 'dod do zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:224b-8: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi stobs las skyes pa rjes thob /
T04TD3903E:224b-9: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:224b-10: yang gzhan rnams kyis bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kho na de bzhin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:224b-11: de dang 'di'i 'dod pa dang rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs mod /
T04TD3903E:224b-12: shing rta chen po rnams kyis gzhan du dpyad zin no zhes pa 'dir zhar 'byung rgya che bas ci bya /
T04TD3903E:224b-13: de ltar ye shes lnga rnams mdor bsdus nas rnam par gzhag ste /
T04TD3903E:224b-14: rgyas pa las sems dang po bskyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams 'ga' zhig rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:224b-15: de ltar mdor bsdus na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin theg pa chen po //
T04TD3903E:224b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mngon par rtogs pa gcig kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:225a-0: phye bas rnam par gzhag pa ni mngon par rtogs pa gsum rnams te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang @225a * //
T04TD3903E:225a-1: lam shes pa nyid dang thams cad shes pa nyid ni mngon par mtshon par bya ba rnams te /
T04TD3903E:225a-2: 'jug pa'i yul nyid kyis na rgyu'i mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:225a-3: spang bya dang blang bya'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas de bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:225a-4: rnam pa kun mngon par rtogs pa dang rtse mor gyur ba dang mthar gyis pa dang skad cig gcig la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnams ni /
T04TD3903E:225a-5: 'dis rab tu sbyor ro zhes pa de'i sbyor ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:225a-6: phrin las dang bcas pa'i chos sku ni 'bras bu'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:225a-7: slar yang gsum po 'di rnams rgyas par mngon par rtogs pa drug rnams te /
T04TD3903E:225a-8: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs pa rnam grangs ji lta bar sbyor ba'i mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:225a-9: rab tu gyur ba'i mngon par rtogs pa dang go rims kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes dbye ba las so //
T04TD3903E:225a-10: shin tu rgyas pa las ni rgyu'i mngon par rtogs pa sngar bzhin gsum nyid kyis na mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rnams so //
T04TD3903E:225a-11: gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa gsum rnams sbyor ba'i yul yin la /
T04TD3903E:225a-12: de las gzhan bzhi rnams sbyor ba dang rgyu'o zhes 'phags pas rnam par gzhag par mdzad pa ni 'di dang don gyis mthun pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:225a-13: sems bskyed pa rnams la mngon par rtogs pa rnam par gzhag pa 'di thams cad bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi dgongs pa kho na 'dir brjod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:225a-14: thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi snang ba'i le'u ste yongs su bcad pa gsum pa'o /
T04TD3903E:225a-29: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:225a-33: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /
T04TD3903E:225a-39: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang /
T04TD3903E:225a-40: chos kyi sku dang ldan pa ste /
T04TD3903E:225b-0: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po so sor pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams kyis yang dag par @225b bsdus pa 'di rnams la /
T04TD3903E:225b-1: dad pa dang ldan pa yod pa nyid du mos pas yid ches pa yang dag par skyes pa yon tan dang ldan pa nyid mos pas rab tu dang ba skyes pa thob par nus pa nyid du mos pas mngon par 'dod pa thob pa gang rung rung 'dod pa'am gzhan gyis bskul bas ni ma yin pa bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par 'dod cing yongs su bsams pa'i don rnams ring po mi thogs pa nyid du phun sum tshogs par byed do zhes /
T04TD3903E:225b-2: byang chub sems bskyed pa len pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa dge ba'i tshogs nye bar sogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' ni dang po re zhig smon pa'i sems skyed par byed do //
T04TD3903E:225b-3: de'i yon tan yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T04TD3903E:225b-4: de la mthong ba'i chos ni da ltar ba'i skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:225b-5: de la thob par bya ba'i yon tan ni mthong ba'i chos la thob pa dang brgyud pas thob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:225b-6: de la gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu rnams su zhing mtha' yas pa rnams rin po che sna tshogs las brgyan par byas nas lha dang mi'i bde ba'i yo byad de dang de rnams dang ldan pa rnams skad cig so sor ster bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa kho na'i bskal par phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kho na la phul la /
T04TD3903E:225b-7: gzhan gang zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bzhin pa kho nas /
T04TD3903E:225b-8: 'di ni 'di lta kho na'o zhes mos pas sems skyed par byed pa de 'dis ni sngar gyi sbyin pa po de las bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa thob po zhes bsod nams kyi mchog nyid thob pa ni mthong ba'i chos la thob pa'i phan yon te /
T04TD3903E:225b-10: bsod nams dag ni skye ba gcig po de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:225b-11: de ltar mos pa 'phel bas bsags bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi chu bos sdig pa'i dri ma bkrus shing /
T04TD3903E:225b-12: sdig pa las byung ba'i ngan 'gro gsum rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:225b-13: gzhan don la 'bab pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:225b-14: bde 'gro dang zag pa med pa dman pa'i chos kyi ba sngags pa smra ba'i sdig pa'i grogs po rnams ring du byed la mu stegs pa dang bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mnan par bya ba ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:225b-15: 'jig rten gsum gyis bkur bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid thob la tshogs yongs su rdzogs @226a * //
T04TD3903E:226a-2: sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs par byed do zhes pa mdor bsdus pa las brgyud pas thob pa'i yon tan rnams te /
T04TD3903E:226a-3: rgyas pa las ni skabs ji lta bar 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:226a-4: 'dun pa la sogs pa'i sems bskyed pa nyid shu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag tu gsungs la /
T04TD3903E:226a-5: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo dag gis ni /
T04TD3903E:226a-6: de rnams la rim pa ji lta bar mi zad pa brgyad cu rnams gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:226a-8: sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-13: tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-14: mngon par shes pa lnga rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-15: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-16: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-18: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-19: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-24: chos kyi sdom bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-25: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:226a-26: thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:226a-27: 'dir sbyor ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dag rim pa bzlog nas bstan pa ni gnyis ka la 'byung bar gsal bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:226a-28: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa thogs med kyis smon pa brgyud pas ni sbyor bar gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:226a-29: sems bskyed pa bco lnga par yang /
T04TD3903E:226a-30: bcom ldan 'das ma bar ma 'phags pas nye bar bzhag pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtogs par byas pa ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:226a-31: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:226a-32: mdo la lar chos kha cig gnas skabs 'ga' zhig la bstan pa 'gal ba med do zhes pa skyon cung zad kyang med do //
T04TD3903E:226a-33: sems bskyed pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang ba skyed par byed pa'i dper brjod pa rnams kyis rgyas par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:226a-34: de la sems bskyed pa dang po ni ched du bya ba dang bcas pa'i byang chub la 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid can mi zad pas na sa dang mtshungs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:226a-35: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang de'i tshogs rab tu skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:226b-0: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdor don gyis gsungs @226b pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
T04TD3903E:226b-1: thog ma dang bar dang tha ma rnams su sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par sgrub pa'i rten du gyur pa nyid kyis na /
T04TD3903E:226b-2: phan pa dang gnod pa byed pa thams cad la mthar thug pa med pa'i sems dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-3: sa dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur gyi ji ltar yang btang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:226b-4: skyes bu'i byed pa des sems can rnams der nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:226b-5: 'di nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams la nyin dang mtshan du mngon du phyogs par byed do //
T04TD3903E:226b-6: de rnams kyang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad sel nus par nam zhig 'gyur zhes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-7: dbul zhing skyo ba'i sems can rnams 'byor pa chen po la nges par sbyor bar nam zhig 'gyur snyam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-8: rang gi lus sha khrag dang bcas pas sems can gyi don gang gi tshe byed par 'gyur snyam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-9: dus shin tu ring bar dmyal bar gnas pas kyang sems can rnams la phan pa kho na nam zhig byed par 'gyur snyam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi yid la re ba yang dag par rdzogs par nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-11: sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las nam gyi tshe 'don par 'gyur zhes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-12: sems can la phan pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i skye ba dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-13: sems can gyi don la rab tu sbyar ba dang bral ba'i sems dang gzhan gyi don la ro gcig pa ma yin pa'i bya ba dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-14: skye bo thams cad dga' bar mi byed pa'i ngag dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-15: gzhan gyi don dang bral ba'i gson pa dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-16: gzhan la phan pa dang stobs chung ba'i lus dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-17: gzhan la phan par byed pa la mi dga' ba'i blo dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-18: sems can la phan pa'i bya ba mi byed pa'i rdzas nor dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-19: 'gro ba'i don du spyod pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang /
T04TD3903E:226b-20: gzhan 'tshog pas dga' ba rnams skye ba dang /
T04TD3903E:227a-0: skye bar ma gyur cig ces pa dang srog chags thams cad kyi sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bdag la gyur cig / bdag gi legs par spyad @227a * //
T04TD3903E:227a-1: pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu sems cad thams cad la gyur cig ces pa skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams so //
T04TD3903E:227a-2: 'di'i rjes su bsngags pa ji skad du dkon mchog brtsegs par /
T04TD3903E:227a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon par gyur na /
T04TD3903E:227a-5: 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de la der lha rnams shin tu stobs dang ldan par dga' ba bskyed kyi gzhon nu mgyogs pa dang stobs dang shugs dang mthu thob pa cher skyes pa de rnams la ni ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:227a-7: da ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad pa'i ched du gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:227a-8: de bzhin du sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang po yongs su ma smin pa /
T04TD3903E:227a-9: nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po nur nur por gyur pa /
T04TD3903E:227a-10: tha mal pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub pa'i ched du 'khor bar 'khor mod /
T04TD3903E:227a-11: 'on kyang der sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams shin tu stobs dang ldan par dga' ba bskyed kyi /
T04TD3903E:227a-12: dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa de rnams la ni ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:227a-14: de ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i ched du gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:227a-16: bya ka la ping ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i spubs na gnas pa mig ma bye ba yang /
T04TD3903E:227a-18: zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
T04TD3903E:227a-19: 'od srungs de bzhin du sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na gnas pa las las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi dra bas mig khebs pa yang /
T04TD3903E:227a-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:227a-23: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
T04TD3903E:227a-25: ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la sman gang yod pa de rnams nga yir bya ba med /
T04TD3903E:227a-27: rnam par rtog pa med de /
T04TD3903E:227a-28: nad gang la btang ba de zhi bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:227b-0: 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang ye @227b shes kyi sman yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cad rnam par rtog pa med par yang dag par sgrub cing sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas de rnams gso ba la yang rab tu sbyor bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:227b-2: ji ltar zla ba gsar ba la phyag 'tshal ba de ltar zla ba gang ba la ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:227b-3: 'od srungs de bzhin du nga la shin tu stobs dang ldan par dad pa de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs pa la ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:227b-5: byang chub sems dpa' byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin la /
T04TD3903E:227b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:227b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sar yang /
T04TD3903E:227b-8: 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phan yon dag ste /
T04TD3903E:227b-9: sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par 'gyur ba dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-10: bla mar gyur pa dang bsod nams kyi zhing dang skye dgu rnams kyi pha rol 'dra ba dang gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:227b-11: de la ni gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams te /
T04TD3903E:227b-12: gang gis bsrungs ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyid log gam myos par gyur pa la yang sbrul lam gnod sbyin nam mi ma yin pa gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis tho 'tshams par mi byed do //
T04TD3903E:227b-13: tshe brjes na'ang bsod nams des gnod pa nyung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-14: nad med pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba nas /
T04TD3903E:227b-15: dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-16: sems nyams pa med pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:227b-17: de las gzhan pa'i lag tu song ba rnams ma grub pa /
T04TD3903E:227b-18: sems can rnams kyi yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-19: zad 'go ba nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-20: rig sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang de'i lag tu son pa rnams 'grub na /
T04TD3903E:227b-21: grub pa rnams slar smra ci dgos /
T04TD3903E:227b-22: zhing gang na gnas pa der 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:227b-24: mi ma yin pas byas pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba rnams kyang /
T04TD3903E:227b-25: ma byung ba rnams mi 'byung la byung ba rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:228a-0: gal te sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de brgya la sems can dmyal ba rnams su ngan 'gro'i sar skyes kyang de tshad chen pos @228a * //
T04TD3903E:228a-1: shin tu myur bar grol la /
T04TD3903E:228a-2: dmyal ba pa rnams las shin tu chung ba'i sdug bsngal myong zhing /
T04TD3903E:228a-3: ches shin tu skyo ba'ang skye'o //
T04TD3903E:228a-4: sems can de rnams la yang snying rje'i sems nyid do //
T04TD3903E:228a-5: de ltar gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa pos de lta bu'i cha dang mthun pa'i phan yon mang po rnams thob po zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:228a-6: bsam pa dang ldan pa ni gser bzang po lta bu ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdus pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni phyi ma dang de'i dus dag tu rnam par 'gyur ba mi bstan pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:228a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi bsam pa ni bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:228a-8: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:228a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bsam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:228a-10: zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i bsam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:228a-11: sems can bde ba'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:228a-12: de la dang po yang ba dang lci ba dang rnam pa gnyis te /
T04TD3903E:228a-13: phyogs bcu rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdul bya nye ba med pa nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa /
T04TD3903E:228a-14: gzhan rnams kyis mi mthong ba'o zhes 'das pa rnams dang gang yang gdul bya nye ba rnams kyis mthong bzhin ba nyid kyis na bzhugs pa rnams dang gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa don rdzogs par byas pa /
T04TD3903E:228a-15: myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa zhes pa ma byon pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:228a-16: de rnams bdag gis bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni yang ba ste /
T04TD3903E:228a-17: de rnams kyi ched du sku gzugs rnams dang mchod rten rnams dang nam mkha' la yang mchod pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:228a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ni sgrub pa'i mchod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:228a-19: de yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bsam pa ni lci ba'o //
T04TD3903E:228a-20: gnyis pa ni bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtho dma' dang sdong du ma dang tsher ma dang gseg ma dang gyo mo dang bong pa dang gcan gzan dang sbrul dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang chu dang nad kyi dgon pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag cing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa nyid bal ltar 'jam pa yangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:228b-0: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa la sogs @228b pa dang ldan pa /
T04TD3903E:228b-1: ngan 'gro'i sa dang bral ba shal dang aindra n'i la dang /
T04TD3903E:228b-2: beed'urya la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cig ces pa'o //
T04TD3903E:228b-3: gsum pa ni zhing der gang khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang rigs kyis bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad ngan 'gro ba rnams kyang lha dang mi'i bde ba rab tu gyur pa ngan 'gro can ma yin pa'i bde bas rtag tu bde bar gyur cig / lus dang sems gnod pa dang bral ba dang /
T04TD3903E:228b-4: de rnams yo byad gang dang gang gis bde ba 'di dang 'di 'dra ba mngon par 'dod pa'i yo byad de dang de rnams la bdag gi dge ba'i las yongs su smin pa las nye bar 'byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:228b-5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rjes su mthun par yang gyur cig / de ltar de rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yongs su smin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:228b-6: yid la re ba rdzogs pa dang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang ldan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:228b-7: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba gsar pa lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:228b-8: des dge ba rnams skye zhing 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:228b-9: khyad par rtogs pa'i ched du ba'i bsam pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa ste /
T04TD3903E:228b-10: gang bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:228b-11: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin yang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom par bya'o nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:228b-12: de nyid kyi phyir sbyor ba bgoms pa 'di yang dag par skye bar byed 'phel bar byed de /
T04TD3903E:228b-13: dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba gsar pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:228b-15: don gyis na zla ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur gyi yang ji ltar zla ba dkar po'i phyogs kho na snang bar byed cing nag po'i phyogs la ma yin pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:228b-16: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis nag po dang dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa nyid kyis so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:228b-17: de ltar 'di ni las dang po pa'i ngo bo'i sems bskyed pa gsum la tshogs kyi sar /
T04TD3903E:228b-18: bsam gtan mngon shes bsgrubs pa las //
T04TD3903E:228b-19: sangs rgyas dpag tu med rnams la //
T04TD3903E:228b-20: mchod pa'i don dang mnyan ched du'ang //
T04TD3903E:228b-22: 'di yis sangs rgyas dpag med rnams //
T04TD3903E:228b-23: bskal pa drangs med bsnyen bkur nas //
T04TD3903E:229a-0: @229a * // de la bsnyen bkur byas pa las //
T04TD3903E:229a-1: sems ni las rung phyogs tu gyur //
T04TD3903E:229a-2: chos dang gang zag gi bdag med pa nyid kyi gdams pa dang /
T04TD3903E:229a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa brtsams pa nyid las su rung bar gyur pa na chos kyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste /
T04TD3903E:229a-5: gang thob pa las stan gcig la gnas pas /
T04TD3903E:229a-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bstan pa nyan pa dang gzhung dang don dag 'dzin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:229a-7: ting nge 'dzin de thob na ni ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag mngon par 'phel ba'i don du sangs rgyas rnams las gdams //
T04TD3903E:229a-8: de yang phyogs so sor gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lta /
T04TD3903E:229a-9: de rnams chos bstan pa yang nyan /
T04TD3903E:229a-10: dge 'dun la yang bsnyen bkur byed /
T04TD3903E:229a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang lta /
T04TD3903E:229a-12: de thams cad la yang bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa med /
T04TD3903E:229a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la yang spyod do nas /
T04TD3903E:229a-14: ji srid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
T04TD3903E:229a-15: de las kyang thams cad la rlom sems med do zhes pa spyod pa rnams kun nas dang yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:229a-16: lam ji ltar rigs pa tshogs kyi sar dang /
T04TD3903E:229a-17: gong ma gong ma'i sems kyi gnas skabs su yang rim gyis bskyed pa'i mchog dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i bye brag gis spyan lnga rnams so sor 'thob la /
T04TD3903E:229a-18: mngon par shes pa drug rnams kyang ste /
T04TD3903E:229a-19: de rnams la yang rlom sems su mi byed la /
T04TD3903E:229a-20: gang de rnams kyis shes pa de thams cad kyang mi dmigs so //
T04TD3903E:229a-21: de la sha'i mig ni gang gzugs rnams mthong ba ste /
T04TD3903E:229a-22: de bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:229a-23: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do zhes pa nas brtsams nas /
T04TD3903E:229a-24: ji srid du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:229a-25: rnam par smin pa pa nyid kyis na de'i yul so sor nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:229a-26: sha'i mig gi khyad par bag tsam ni srog chags phal che ba tsam la yod do //
T04TD3903E:229b-0: lha'i mig ni gang gzugs rnams dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dag kyang mthong @229b ba'o ;
T04TD3903E:229b-2: sh'a ri'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so //
T04TD3903E:229b-3: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig de ni de rnams kyis rab tu mi shes so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:229b-4: phyogs bcu rnams su sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba thams cad 'di'i yul yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes rab kyi spyan ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa rnam par ma rtog pa ste /
T04TD3903E:229b-5: gang zag gi bdag med pa mthong ba tsam ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa rnams la yang yod do //
T04TD3903E:229b-6: chos kyi spyan ni gang 'phags pa'i rtogs pa'i spyod yul can te /
T04TD3903E:229b-8: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan gyis 'di ltar shes te /
T04TD3903E:229b-9: 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T04TD3903E:229b-10: 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o nas ji srid 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:229b-11: 'di bag tsam ni dgra bcom pa la yang yod do //
T04TD3903E:229b-12: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa spangs pa'i dgu rnams chos kyi spyan no zhes dbyig gnyen no //
T04TD3903E:229b-13: sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni gang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:229b-14: 'di kho na stobs bcu'i ngo bo zhes kha cig go //
T04TD3903E:229b-15: mngon par shes pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba dang lha'i rna ba sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:229b-16: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T04TD3903E:229b-17: lha'i mig dang zag pa zad pa shes pa zhes pa drug rnams so //
T04TD3903E:229b-18: lha'i mig gi rnam par shes pas 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag shes so //
T04TD3903E:229b-19: 'di ni bsgom pa mngon par 'du byed pa las skyes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:229b-20: snga ma lha'i spyan ni rnam par smin pa pa'o //
T04TD3903E:229b-21: ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang mngon par shes pa drug pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyir brjod ce na /
T04TD3903E:229b-22: sa brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gnyis ka so sor 'thob pa ste /
T04TD3903E:230a-0: sangs rgyas kyi sa la ni de dag yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa mthar thug par ched du / de ltar sbyin pa la sogs pa tshogs kyi go cha dang ldan pa 'di sems bskyed pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa mngon par sgrub par byed @230a * //
T04TD3903E:230a-2: / de yang sbyor ba dang ldan pa me lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:230a-3: des khyad par rtogs pa ni rab tu gyur par 'gro ba'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:230a-4: bud shing gi khyad par gyis me bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:230a-5: de nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'di lta ste /
T04TD3903E:230a-6: 'di chos rab tu gyur pa 'dod pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:230a-7: dkon mchog brtsegs par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:230a-8: don gyis na med dang mtshungs par 'gyur gyi /
T04TD3903E:230a-9: yang ji ltar mo na rnam par bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig par byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:230a-10: 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba yang dag par reg pa mngon par sgrub cing rnam par gnas pa'i ched du yang dag pa'i gdams ngag nye bar sdud pa 'di kyis so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:230a-11: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdor yang /
T04TD3903E:230a-12: mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'di kho na la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo yin kyang byis pa'i rgud pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste /
T04TD3903E:230a-13: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par thar pa dang mngon par shes pa'i yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan par gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:230a-14: de ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:230a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T04TD3903E:230a-16: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:230a-18: stong pa nyid nyi shu'i chos thams cad kyang dmigs su med par sbyor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:230a-19: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyin par bya ba dang ster ba po dang len pa po rnams nas ji srid du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi dang /
T04TD3903E:230a-20: byang chub sems dpa' dang yid la byed pa rnams kyang mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la goms par byed do //
T04TD3903E:230a-23: sgom pa rnams dmigs pa med pa'i ched du bya bas dge ba'i chos thams cad sgom par byed do //
T04TD3903E:230a-24: mngon par shes pa lnga rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:230a-25: der yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par byed do //
T04TD3903E:230a-26: de rnams las theg pa chen po nyan to //
T04TD3903E:230a-27: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:230a-28: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:230a-29: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya zhes spro bar byed do//
T04TD3903E:230b-0: @230b phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams blta'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-1: de rnams kyis kyang 'di yongs su sgrogs so //
T04TD3903E:230b-2: de ltar dgu po 'di rnams la shin tu legs par so sor 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:230b-3: de bzhin du yang bstan bcos ni //
T04TD3903E:230b-4: bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang //
T04TD3903E:230b-5: lam dang byams la sogs pa dang ;
T04TD3903E:230b-6: / dmigs med sbyor bar son pa dang //
T04TD3903E:230b-7: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa dang //
T04TD3903E:230b-8: ched du bya dang mngon shes drug / rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni //
T04TD3903E:230b-9: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la //
T04TD3903E:230b-10: nges par 'dzeg par shes par bya //
T04TD3903E:230b-12: 'dir sems can kun gyi mchog nyid kyi sems chen po nyid la sogs pa'i ched du bya ba rnam pa gsum po ched du bya ba'i 'jug par smras pas /
T04TD3903E:230b-13: seng ge bzang pos stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzhung 'phags pas drangs pa ma mthong ngo zhes mtshon no //
T04TD3903E:230b-15: lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang bral ba dang /
T04TD3903E:230b-17: las kyi dbang gis ngan song du mi 'gro ste /
T04TD3903E:230b-18: ngan 'gro'i rgyu 'dod chags la sogs pa skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:230b-19: gang bzod pa 'bring la gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:230b-20: de nam yang mngal du mi skye ste /
T04TD3903E:230b-21: rtag tu rgyun ma chad par rdzus te skye'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-22: snying rje ni gzhan don du ngan 'gror 'gro ba kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-23: de bzhin du 'di mi khom brgyad rnams su mi skye'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-24: bud med kyi dngos po yongs su mi 'dzin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-28: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang /
T04TD3903E:230b-29: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mi thos pa dang /
T04TD3903E:230b-30: yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang /
T04TD3903E:230b-31: dbang po rnams glen zhing lkugs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:230b-32: lha tshe ring por skye ba'o zhes pa mi khom pa brgyad rnams so //
T04TD3903E:230b-33: 'dir tshe ring po ni gzugs med pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:230b-34: bud med nyid bkag pa ni gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang rjes su mthun pa rtogs pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i dbang nyid kyi skabs ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:230b-35: skyes pa'i dngos po kho na rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:230b-36: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rtag par rab tu du ba bzhin du so sor thob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:231a-0: ji skad du chos mchog chung ngur chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes @231a * //
T04TD3903E:231a-2: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod dang rin chen phyag rgya dang /
T04TD3903E:231a-3: seng ge rnam par rtsen pa la sogs pa'i bar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la dmigs so zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:231a-4: chos mchog chen po nas bzung nas tshogs rnams sgrub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:231a-5: de ltar ni snying rjes phyogs bcu rnams su so sor gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa nas /
T04TD3903E:231a-8: yi dags la sogs pa'i sems can rnams rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas te /
T04TD3903E:231a-9: sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i lha dang mi rnams su skyer 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:231a-10: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba thos pas de yid la byed pa las de rnams ngan 'gro rnams las 'thon te /
T04TD3903E:231a-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa rnams rgyun du gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed du 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:231a-12: gzungs rnams kyang so sor 'thob po //
T04TD3903E:231a-13: de yang dran pa dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin bzhi rnams te /
T04TD3903E:231a-18: de la aa ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams la /
T04TD3903E:231a-19: de'i don de bzhin du sgro btags nas sgom par byed pa rnams kyi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni yi ge de'i don dam pa la bzod pa skye ba de bzod pa'i gzungs te /
T04TD3903E:231a-20: shes rab kyi bzod pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:231a-21: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstan pa'i phung po 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni chos kyi gzungs te /
T04TD3903E:231a-22: dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams thos pa tsam gyis /
T04TD3903E:231a-23: mtha' med pa'i dus su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:231a-24: de nas de bzhin du de'i don 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni don gyi gzungs so //
T04TD3903E:231a-25: de nas sems can rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i sngags sgyu ma lta bu rnams 'chad pa la dbang ba ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
T04TD3903E:231a-26: de la bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag tu gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:231a-27: aa yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
T04TD3903E:231a-28: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes te /
T04TD3903E:231b-0: aa yig ni chos thams cad kyi ji lta bu'i yang dag @231b pa so sor rtogs pa'i sgo ste thabs so //
T04TD3903E:231b-2: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:231b-3: gang gi phyir chos thams cad gdod ma dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kho na na skyes pa med pa de'i phyir 'dis skye ba med pa'i don du aa yig la sgro btags nas sgom pa goms pa'i stobs las aa yig tsam legs par bsgoms pa na chos thams cad la skye ba med pa'i bzod pa thob po zhes pas ma skyes pa nyid ni aa yig gi don to //
T04TD3903E:231b-4: de bzhin du ra yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste rdul dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:231b-5: ji ltar nam mkha' rdul gyis mi gos pa de bzhin du de bzhin nyid kyang nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis mi gos so zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:231b-6: de bzhin du pa yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
T04TD3903E:231b-7: don dam pa nges par zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:231b-8: don dam pa ni nges par zhugs pa'am /
T04TD3903E:231b-9: chos thams cad la de yang de bzhin no zhes pa ni pa yig gi don to //
T04TD3903E:231b-10: de bzhin du tsa yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
T04TD3903E:231b-11: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:231b-12: de bzhin nyid la 'chi ba'i srid pa dang skye ba'i srid pa dag med pa tsa yig gi don to //
T04TD3903E:231b-13: de bzhin du na yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /
T04TD3903E:231b-14: ming dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes te /
T04TD3903E:231b-15: de bzhin nyid la ming du gdags pa mi ldan pa ni na yig gi don to //
T04TD3903E:231b-16: de ltar la yig la sogs pa rnams kyi don bcom ldan 'das ma dag tu rgya cher shes par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:231b-17: phyi mo'i yi ge rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
T04TD3903E:231b-18: rnam grangs gzhan ni gang bzod pa skye ba'i ched du gsungs pa'i sngags kyi tshig / tad ya th'a /
T04TD3903E:231b-19: ai ti mi ti ki ti ni kshana ti pa d'a ni sb'a h'a /
T04TD3903E:231b-20: zhes pa la sogs pa de rnams don dam par rang bzhin med par sgom par byed cing de'i rjes su 'brang bas chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su lta ba las don dam pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skye'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:231b-21: de la mos pas spyod pa'i sar bzod pa'i gzungs 'thob la /
T04TD3903E:231b-22: gzhan gsum rnams ni sa rab tu dga' ba nas bzung nas so //
T04TD3903E:231b-23: 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba nyid kyis sngags kyi ye ge rnams byin gyis rlob ste /
T04TD3903E:232a-0: sngags kyi yi ge 'di rnams cho ga 'di lta bu sems can thams cad kyi yams dang @232a * //
T04TD3903E:232a-1: nye bar 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang /
T04TD3903E:232a-2: 'khrug pa thams cad zhi ba'i ched du dang /
T04TD3903E:232a-3: sdig pa thams cad dang ngan 'gro thams cad zad pa'i ched du grub par gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams cho ga'i khyad par des 'grub pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:232a-4: de byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
T04TD3903E:232a-5: gzungs de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po nyid kyis na yi ge de rnams kyang gzungs kyi sgras brjod do //
T04TD3903E:232a-6: gzhan yang ma na shes pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:232a-7: tree nya skyong ba la'o zhes pa ye shes dang snying rje ni sngags kyi sgras brjod par bya la /
T04TD3903E:232a-8: de dag gis rgyu mthun pa nyid kyi phyir yi ge de rnams kyang sngags su brjod do ;
T04TD3903E:232a-9: / ma rig pa spong bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang rig pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir de rnams rig sngags so //
T04TD3903E:232a-10: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi brten pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir tshig rnams te /
T04TD3903E:232a-11: des na gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gnas rnams dang rig sngags kyi tshig rnams so zhes pa yang ming ngo //
T04TD3903E:232a-12: de la sa dang po la khyad par can gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa'i gzungs 'thob ste /
T04TD3903E:232a-13: de'i dbang las mchog tu gyur pa'i chos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:232a-14: gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sa dgu rnams la rim pa ji lta bar gong nas gong du rab mchog tu gyur pas /
T04TD3903E:232a-16: legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:232a-19: ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi sgron ma dang /
T04TD3903E:232a-21: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T04TD3903E:232a-23: mi zad pa'i za ma tog go //
T04TD3903E:232a-24: de bzhin du yang so so la gzungs re re sngon du 'gro ba'i gzungs stong phrag grangs med cing dpag tu med pa du ma rnams so sor 'thob po //
T04TD3903E:232a-25: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa la sogs pas yongs su gzung bas na /
T04TD3903E:232a-26: bar chad bya ba'i ched du rab tu 'bad pa'i bdud kyi nus pa 'joms pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams rgyas pa dang bcas pas mdo rnams su brtson 'grus can rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:232a-27: de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' bshes gnyen dam pas legs par yongs su bzung nas /
T04TD3903E:232a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par bsags pa /
T04TD3903E:232a-30: snying rje chen po la brten pa 'di /
T04TD3903E:232b-0: 'gro ba thams @232b cad yongs su bskyab pa'i ched dang rnam pa thams cad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i ched du dang /
T04TD3903E:232b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba'i ched du /
T04TD3903E:232b-2: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems lnga pa skyed par byed do //
T04TD3903E:232b-3: sems bskyed pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa gter chen po lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:232b-4: zang zing gi longs spyod rnams kyis sems can dpag tu med pa tshim par byed pa'i phyir dang mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:232b-5: gang skyes pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' byis pa so so'i skye bo dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las 'das par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:232b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par 'gyur /
T04TD3903E:232b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur /
T04TD3903E:232b-8: srid pa bar ma las khu ba la bzhin du mthong ba'i lam la nges pa ji srid par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:232b-9: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dpung gnyen can no zhes pa 'di'i mthong ba'i lam sa dang po'o //
T04TD3903E:232b-10: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje la sogs pas yongs su gzung ba'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes kho na char rnam par phye ba ni sa'i ming 'thob ste /
T04TD3903E:232b-11: yon tan gyi rten du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:232b-12: de yang gong nas gong du yon tan gyi grangs dang mthu phul du byung ba thob cing sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:232b-13: rnam par smin pa rab mchog tu gyur pa'i bye brag las /
T04TD3903E:232b-24: kun du 'od ces pa rnam pa bcu gcig tu rnam par gzhag gi /
T04TD3903E:232b-25: 'di'i rang gi ngo bo phul du byung bas byas pa'i tha dad pa brjod par bya ba'am mnyan par bya ba med do //
T04TD3903E:232b-26: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:232b-27: de ni bsam dang sems kyi lam rnams spangs //
T04TD3903E:232b-28: ye shes mngon sgrub thub pa'i dbang pos mkhyen //
T04TD3903E:232b-29: phung po skye mched khams kyis phye ma yin //
T04TD3903E:232b-30: sems kyis rtogs min yid kyis bsam ma yin //
T04TD3903E:232b-31: ji ltar bar snang bya rjes mkhas rnams kyis //
T04TD3903E:232b-32: smra bar mi nus mthong bar nyer 'gro min //
T04TD3903E:232b-33: de ltar rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa kun kyang //
T04TD3903E:232b-34: brjod mi nus na mnyan par ga la nus //
T04TD3903E:233a-1: ba'i bya'i rkang rjes ni brjod par mi nus shing blta bar yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:233a-2: nam mkha'i phyogs ni de'i rkang rjes bzhin du yongs su bcad bya'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:233a-3: de la de rnam par 'god par mi byed pa yang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:233a-4: de bzhin du bya'i rkang rjes lta bu'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus pa rnams kyang sgra ji bzhin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir brjod par mi nus la mnyan par yang ma yin mod //
T04TD3903E:233a-6: de rnams de la rnam par 'god pa dbye ba kun rdzob tu mi bya ba yang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:233a-7: de la mngal gyi gnas skabs dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bcu'i gnas skabs rig par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:233a-8: sa 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:233a-9: btsas pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs te /
T04TD3903E:233a-10: 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa nye bar bzung nas shes bya thams cad kyi spyod yul so sor nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:233a-11: bcas pa ni lus kyi dbang po thams cad kyi spyod yul so sor nyams su myong ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:233a-12: de la mngal gyi gnas skabs bcu ni //
T04TD3903E:233a-13: bu ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-14: nur nur po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-15: ltar ltar po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-17: lus dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-18: rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-19: las dang bcas pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-20: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:233a-21: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-22: mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-23: chu zheng yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:233a-24: de rnams dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa rnams chos mthun par nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:233a-25: gang gi phyir 'dir dang por rang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pa las byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba de'i phyir 'di rab tu dga' ba ste dang po'o //
T04TD3903E:233a-26: gzhan yang rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bya ba ni sems tshim pa dang /
T04TD3903E:233a-28: rangs pa yid la byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:233a-29: de yang rnam pa dgu ste /
T04TD3903E:233b-0: dang bas @233b rab tu dga' ba nyid ni dkon mchog rnams la'o //
T04TD3903E:233b-1: dga' bas rab tu dga' ba ni dmigs pa la dga' zhing tshim pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-2: gong du son pas mchog tu dga' ba ni bdag nyid rtogs pa'i khyad par mthong bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-3: mgu bas mchog tu dga' ba ni rang gi lus dang sems rjes su 'dzin pa rgyas pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-4: rlabs kyis mchog tu dga' ba ni rang gi lus dang sems rjes su 'dzin pas khyab pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-5: spro bas mchog tu dga' ba ni byang chub nye bar mthong ba las so //
T04TD3903E:233b-6: mi 'khrugs pas mchog tu dga' ba ni rang gi rgyud yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du 'brel pa'i gtam gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus su 'khrug pa med pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-7: rnam par 'tshe ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba ni gzhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du sems can sdud pa'i dus su snying rje dang des pa nyid dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:233b-8: khro ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba ni de las log par zhugs pa'i dus su bzod pas so //
T04TD3903E:233b-9: rab tu dga' ba'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/
T04TD3903E:233b-10: 'phags pas bcu par gsungs pa'i smon lam chen po bcu rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:233b-11: 'bad pa chen po rnams mngon par sgrub bo //
T04TD3903E:233b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i ched du rnam pa thams cad mchog tu ldan pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa /
T04TD3903E:233b-14: chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba /
T04TD3903E:233b-15: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /
T04TD3903E:233b-16: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa bgrangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:233b-17: sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa chen po dang rim gro'i ched du /
T04TD3903E:233b-18: smon lam chen po dang po mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:233b-19: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:233b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:233b-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du gnyis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:233b-22: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad du /
T04TD3903E:233b-23: dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad nas /
T04TD3903E:233b-28: nang gi grong du bzhugs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-1: snying por yang dag par gshegs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-3: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa chen por 'pho ba'i ched du gsum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234a-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad de pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa /
T04TD3903E:234a-8: sa yongs su spyod pa yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa'i lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa rab tu sbyin pas bstan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ched du bzhi pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234a-9: de bzhin du khams dang 'gro ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-10: skye gnas dang ris su gtogs pa'i ming dang gzugs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzung pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-12: 'gro ba bgrangs pa thams cad rnam par gcad pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i ched du lnga pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234a-13: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgya che ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-19: steng g-yogs med cing gzhi phyal ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-21: rnam par dbye ba mig 'phrul lta bu dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-22: phyogs bcu tshad med pa ma lus pa 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba ste /
T04TD3903E:234a-23: ye shes kyis khong du chud cing mngon sum du gyur par bya ba'i ched du drug pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234a-24: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad zhing gcig dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-25: zhing gcig zhing thams cad du mnyam par rgyu so sor sbyong ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams 'od dang bkod pa'i rgyan gyis so sor brgyan pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-27: nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-28: sems can ye shes tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi yongs su gang ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-29: sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-30: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta bar yang dag par bstan cing tshim par bya ba'i ched du bdun pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234a-31: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-32: sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234a-33: 'gran zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-0: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams @234b cad dang 'grogs shing mi 'bral ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-1: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji ltar 'dod par bstan pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-2: rang gi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ye shes kyis khong du chud pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-3: ma nyams shing rjes su 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa 'thob pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-5: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du so sor snang ba 'thob pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-6: skye ba thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-7: theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnam par mi spyad pa'i ched du brgyad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234b-9: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-10: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-11: mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos nges pa nyid kyi ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-12: sgra brjod ma thag tu mthu dang ye shes khong du chud pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-13: mthong ma thag tu sems can rab tu dang ba thob cing nyon mongs pa ldog par bya ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-14: sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'i lus thob pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-15: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam pa'i lus thob pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyod pa spyad pa'i ched du dgu pa'o //
T04TD3903E:234b-17: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-18: byis pa'i lam gcig las ma 'das par byis pa'i lam thams cad du skye bar 'byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-20: nang gi grong du bzhugs pa dang ;
T04TD3903E:234b-23: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-25: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-27: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-28: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nye bar bstan pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:234b-29: sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po mthu dang ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ched du /
T04TD3903E:234b-30: chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa /
T04TD3903E:235a-0: bskal pa bgrangs pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i ched du @235a * //
T04TD3903E:235a-1: smon lam chen po bcu pa mngon par sgrub po zhes pa de lta bu'i ngo bo 'di rnams smon lam chen po dang dbang ba chen po bcu rnams te /
T04TD3903E:235a-2: de la sogs pa so so la smon lam grangs med pa khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor can sa yongs su sbyong ba rnams te gang byang chub sems dpas sgrub pa rnams so sor 'thob po zhes pa 'di rnams bsgom pa'i lam las yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235a-3: de la smon lam chen po dang pos ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-4: gnyis pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-5: lnga ni sems can yongs su smin pa'i ched du ste /
T04TD3903E:235a-8: sems can gang rnams dang gang du gnas pas dang /
T04TD3903E:235a-9: ji ltar gyur pas yongs su smin par bya ba rnams de rnams su'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-10: gsum rnams bdag nyid kyi sa'i khyad par rtogs pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:235a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mthar thug par bgrod pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:235a-12: thams cad kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-13: de la don du gnyer ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa ni smon lam ste 'dun pa'i khyad par ro //
T04TD3903E:235a-14: de 'grub par byed pa'i thabs ni 'bad rtsol lo //
T04TD3903E:235a-15: des 'grub par byed pa ni mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-16: 'di gsum sa 'di la rim gyis mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-17: smon lam dang po la mchod pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:235a-18: rnyed pa'i mchod pa ni na bza' la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235a-19: bkur sti'i mchod pa ni gdugs la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235a-20: sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni dad pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pas so //
T04TD3903E:235a-21: rim gro rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:235a-22: bsnyen bkur dang yang dag par 'tshol ba dang sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:235a-23: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa ni /
T04TD3903E:235a-24: dngos po sna tshogs mang ba nyid kyis dang /
T04TD3903E:235a-25: dngos po gya nom pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235a-26: mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa ni rab tu dang ba drag pos dang byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa mos pas so //
T04TD3903E:235a-27: chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad pas mchog nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235a-28: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag pa'i rgyu nyid ni mi zad pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235a-29: phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa ni rtag pa ni rtag pa'i 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i rgyu nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235b-0: bskal pa thams cad dang sangs rgyas @235b 'byung ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-1: gnyis pa la chos kyi tshul ni mod la sogs pa'i lung rnams brgyud pa'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-2: yang dag par 'dzin pa ni rtogs par byed pa'i gdams ngag ster ba'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-4: kha ton bya ba sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:235b-5: byang chub ni thob pa'i chos te byang chub rnam pa gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:235b-6: de yang dag par yongs su gzung ba ni rtogs par bya ba'i gdams ngag sbyin pas so //
T04TD3903E:235b-7: yongs su bsrung ba ni sgrub pa ste /
T04TD3903E:235b-8: nye bar 'tshe ba las skyob pas so //
T04TD3903E:235b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bstan pa phun sum tshogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:235b-10: sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rtogs pa dang thugs su chud pa phun tshogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:235b-12: ji lta ba mngon par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:235b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mtha' dag dang /
T04TD3903E:235b-16: dpag tu med pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis ye shes khong du chud cing mngon sum du gyur par bya ba'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-17: de la yangs pa la sogs pa rnams ni stong pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsum rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235b-18: phra ba ni gang rnams ni yid kyi rang bzhin lus can rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235b-19: rags pa ni gang rnams na yid kyi rang bzhin gyi ma yin pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235b-20: 'chol ba ni go rims su mi gnas pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235b-21: steng g-yogs med cing gzhi phyal pa ni khyim gnas pa ma byas pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:235b-22: 'jug pa'i khyim can ni khyim gnas pa byas pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:235b-23: 'di ni mtha' dag gi mtshan nyid do //
T04TD3903E:235b-24: mig 'phrul gyi rnam par dbye ba nyid don dam pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T04TD3903E:235b-25: las kyi sgyu ma las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:235b-26: phyogs bcu tshad med pa'i rnam par dbye ba ma lus pa la 'jug pa ni dpag tu mad pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T04TD3903E:235b-27: de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes kyis khong du chud pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-28: de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid ni so sor mngon sum du rtogs pa nyid kyi ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:235b-29: bdun pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la /
T04TD3903E:235b-30: de yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te /
T04TD3903E:235b-31: thun mong ba yongs su dag pa ni zhing thams cad zhing gcig nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235b-32: dbang du gyur pa yongs su dag pa ni zhing thams cad du mnyam par rgyu ba yongs su sbyong ba nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:235b-33: rab tu dang ba nyid yongs su dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 'od dang bkod pa'i rgyan gyis so sor brgyan pa nyid kyis te /
T04TD3903E:236a-2: yongs su longs spyad pa yongs su dag pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal bas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:236a-3: gnas pa po sems can yongs su dag pa ni /
T04TD3903E:236a-4: sems can ye shes tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis yongs su gang ba nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:236a-5: rgyu yongs su dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:236a-6: 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta bar yang dag par ston zhing tshim par byed pa nyid kyis te /
T04TD3903E:236a-7: ye shes dang mthu dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:236a-8: brgyad pa la bsam pa dang /
T04TD3903E:236a-9: sbyor ba gcig pa ni theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i ched du ste /
T04TD3903E:236a-10: theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i don gyis so //
T04TD3903E:236a-11: theg pa chen po yang chen po nyid rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:236a-12: dmigs pa che ba nyid ni mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos rgya chen po dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-13: sgrub pa chen po nyid ni rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i phyir ro ;
T04TD3903E:236a-14: / ye shes chen po nyid ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa nyid shes pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-15: brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po nyid ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du rtag tu dang gus par bya ba nyid dag gis sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-16: thabs la mkhas pa chen po nyid ni 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-17: yang dag par 'grub pa chen po nyid ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-18: sangs rgyas kyi phrin las chen po nyid ni yang dang yang du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i phyir ro ;
T04TD3903E:236a-19: / de nyid kyi phyir 'di la rab tu dang ba tsam yang 'bras bu chen por nye bar gsungs te /
T04TD3903E:236a-21: kun du dpa' bo gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la rab tu dang ba bskyed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa stong ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:236a-22: bskal pa stong phrag lngar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye'o //
T04TD3903E:236a-23: de bzhin du yi dags rnams su'o //
T04TD3903E:236a-24: bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngar lha'i 'jig rten dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:236a-25: 'dir dga' ba zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa /
T04TD3903E:236b-0: ming du mos pa med pa rnams 'di lta bu shin tu gya nom pa legs par bshad pa theg @236b pa chen po'i chos la yang mchog tu zab pa dang rgya che ba nyid du 'jug par mi byed /
T04TD3903E:236b-2: lhag par mos par mi byed /
T04TD3903E:236b-4: rnam pa mang por smod par byed /
T04TD3903E:236b-5: ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin no zhes pa'i bar du smra'o //
T04TD3903E:236b-7: chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa 'di ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du'o //
T04TD3903E:236b-9: rab 'byor chos 'di dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyis mnyan par yang mi nus so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:236b-10: theg pa chen po ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin ;
T04TD3903E:236b-11: mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang mngon pa las phyi rol du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:236b-13: gang mdo sde la 'jug /'dul ba la snang /
T04TD3903E:236b-14: chos nyid dang yang mi dgal ba de sangs rgyas kyi gsung ngo zhes pas so //
T04TD3903E:236b-15: theg pa chen po de lta bu ma yin pas so zhe na /
T04TD3903E:236b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa mdo sde dang 'dul ba rnam pa du ma rnams ni der nges par bstan la khyad par du chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
T04TD3903E:236b-18: ci ste pha rol tu phyin par yang yin kyang sde pa'i sde snod gsum du 'di 'di ltar ma bstan to zhe na /
T04TD3903E:236b-19: de ltar gyur na rnam pa bco brgyad du gyes pa'i sde snod gsum po phan tshun gzhung dang don shin tu tha dad pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:236b-20: gzhan yang 'dul ba rnam par bshad pas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:236b-21: thub pa'i dbang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya nas bstan pa'i bye brag gis dang por sde pa gnyis te gnas brtan pa dang dge 'dun phal chen po dag go zhes so //
T04TD3903E:236b-22: bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis kyang lung bstan te /
T04TD3903E:236b-23: rgyal po kri k'i'i mi bco brgyad kyis ras yug drangs pa'i rmi lam ston pa na /
T04TD3903E:236b-24: sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa rnam pa bco brgyad du gyes par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:236b-25: gzhan yang chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ste /
T04TD3903E:236b-26: tshig dang yi ge de rnams kho nas dang /
T04TD3903E:236b-27: go rims de nyid kyis yang dag par gzung zhing bstan pa mi nyung ma lhag pa phyin ci ma log pa de'i tshe gzhung 'di bka' mgur nas gsungs pa dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes brjod de /
T04TD3903E:236b-28: bcom ldan 'das drang srong nyid kyis 'dir zhes byas nas so //
T04TD3903E:237a-0: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs @237a * //
T04TD3903E:237a-1: pa'i don kho na yi ge gzhan rnams dang go rims gzhan gyis nye bar sbyar ba 'am yang dag par bsdus pa'am /
T04TD3903E:237a-2: 'chad pa de'i gzhung 'di rjes su mthun pa'i bka' zhes bkod do //
T04TD3903E:237a-3: gang du don yang gzhan pa de ni bka' yang ma yin la rjes su gnang ba'i bka' yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:237a-4: 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa rnams bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:237a-5: da ni sde pa'i gzhung rnams sgra las kyang tha dad pa mang por don las kyang ste /
T04TD3903E:237a-6: mdo sde yang phyin ci log tu brjod pa yang klog la /
T04TD3903E:237a-7: 'dul ba gcig tu yang kha cig gis ltung bar 'gyur bar smra ba /
T04TD3903E:237a-8: gzhan rnams phyir bcos pa dang bcas pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237a-10: kha cig gis skad cig gcig gi mngon par rtogs pas 'bras bu khong du chud pa'o //
T04TD3903E:237a-11: kha cig gis ni skad cig bcu gsum gyi mngon par rtogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:237a-12: kha cig gis ni skad cig bcu drug gi mngon par rtogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:237a-13: gal te dgongs pa'i dbye bas skad cig ma'i dbye ba 'di rnams kyang sdud pa po rnams kyis brjod pa srid pas so zhe na /
T04TD3903E:237a-14: de lta yin na thams cad du sde pa gcig la skad cig ma'i dbye ba srid pa'i phyir bstan par bya bar 'gyur la de lta yang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:237a-15: kha cig bdag med pa nyid mthong ba btags par yod par rnam par 'jog par byed do //
T04TD3903E:237a-16: kha cig gang zag rdzas su yod par ro //
T04TD3903E:237a-18: mdo sde pa rnam pa gzhan pa'i phyogs yongs su 'dzin la /
T04TD3903E:237a-19: chos mngon pa rnams kyang gzhan du'o //
T04TD3903E:237a-20: kha cig 'dus byas thams cad skad cig par 'dod pas te /
T04TD3903E:237a-21: kha cig gnyis par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:237a-22: kha cig sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na skad cig gnyis dag tu yang mi gnas shing 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams skad cig gsum du yang dag par ro //
T04TD3903E:237a-23: kha cig sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kho na skad cig gnyis par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:237a-24: kha cig sems can ring por yang gnas te /
T04TD3903E:237a-25: sa ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237a-26: kha cig ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba zad pa tsam mya ngan las 'das pa ste tha snyad tsam du'o //
T04TD3903E:237a-27: kha cig ni mya ngan las 'das pa gdags par yod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:237b-0: gang du lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang skye ba zad par 'gyur gyi skye ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad nyid zad pa mya ngan las 'das @237b pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-1: kha cig 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams dus thams cad du rdzas su yod do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-2: kha cig med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-3: kha cig thob pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams rdzas su yod do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-4: kha cig med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-5: kha cig srid pa bar do'i sems can rnams yod do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-6: kha cig med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-7: kha cig gzugs med pa'i khams na gzugs med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-8: kha cig yod do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-9: kha cig gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:237b-10: kha cig gnas dang bcas pa'o zhes te sngar ji skad bshad bzhin du ji srid sa la sogs pa rnams kyi tshad dang dbyibs nges par bstan pa tha dad pa'i bar du'o zhes so de lta bu la sogs pa phan tshun 'gal ba'i don shin tu mang po rnams de dang der smra ba mthong na de rnams ci ltar bka' nyid du rigs khyad par du yang /
T04TD3903E:237b-11: gang rnams kyi rtsa ba'i bsdus pa nyams so zhes khas len pa'o //
T04TD3903E:237b-12: 'on te gzhung 'di rnams phyis dgra bcom pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:237b-13: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ni 'di ltar phan tshun don 'gal ba'i gzhung mdzad pa ma yin pas so //
T04TD3903E:237b-14: de'i phyir yang gzhung 'di rnams dgra bcom pa rnams kyis mdzad par mi rigs so zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:237b-15: 'o na ci zhe na so so skye bo rnams kho nas byas so zhes rigs so //
T04TD3903E:237b-16: de rnams 'dzin stangs tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ma rig pa dang the tshom la sogs pa'i bag la nyal rnams ma spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:237b-17: rnam pa 'di lta bu da ltar byas pa'i gzhung rnams su theg pa chen po legs par gsungs pa bka' ci ltar gzhug par nus 'di rnams su 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gang yang de'i tshe yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gzhung ma nyams pa sdud pa pos bsdus pa bka' de rnams su yang ste /
T04TD3903E:237b-18: bar shin du ring ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:237b-19: gal te dman pa'i theg par theg pa chen po zhugs pa 'am nang du 'dus par gyur na ni de'i theg pa chen po nyid kyang nyams par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:237b-20: ci rgya mtsho chen po khron pa la sogs pa rnams su ma zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ram nang du ma 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir chu'i rten ma yin par 'gyur ram /
T04TD3903E:237b-21: de'i phyir de rnams su mi 'jug pa ni theg pa chen po'i yon tan kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:237b-22: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:237b-23: rang gi nyid la 'jug phyir dang //
T04TD3903E:237b-24: rang gi 'dul la snang phyir yang //
T04TD3903E:238a-2: chos nyid dang ni 'gal med nyid //
T04TD3903E:238a-4: gal te da ni sde pa'i gzhung 'di rnams bkar mi 'dod na bsnyen par rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i las rnams ji ltar 'grub /
T04TD3903E:238a-5: dge slong nyid med na skyon mang po rnams su 'gyur ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:238a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po de yang yod pa'am med pa zhes ci ltar shes par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:238a-7: mngon sum las ma yin zhing rjes su dpag pa las kyang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:238a-9: 'on kyang gzhung 'di rnams bka' nyid dam bka' ma yin pa nyid na yang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub po //
T04TD3903E:238a-10: bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnam pa bcu'o zhes 'dul ba'i 'dzin pa rnams smra ba 'di lta ste /
T04TD3903E:238a-11: rang 'byung nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-12: skyon med pa la zhugs pas cang shes koondi nya dang rta thul dang bzang ldan dang rlangs pa dang ming chen te lnga rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-13: dge slong tshur shog gis grags pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o ;
T04TD3903E:238a-14: / ston par khas blangs pa las 'od srungs chen po'i'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-15: dris shing mnyes pas legs byin gyi'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-16: lci ba'i chos khas blangs pas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-18: 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga pas yul mtha' 'khob rnams su'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-19: bcu'i tshogs kyi dbus rnams su'o ;
T04TD3903E:238a-20: / skyabs su 'gro ba gsum brjod pas bzang ste'i tshogs drug cu rnams kyi'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:238a-21: de ltar rjes su gnang ba'i bka' rnams bklags pas kyang gsol bar byed de /
T04TD3903E:238a-22: don gyis de rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:238a-23: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:238a-24: sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni don la rton pa ste /
T04TD3903E:238a-25: tshig 'bru la rten pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:238a-27: dka' ba 'di ni brgal dka' ba ste /
T04TD3903E:238a-28: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang chos 'dod pa la bsgribs pas phyin ci log pa rnams theg pa chen po spong ba'i tshul ma yin pa chen po la 'jug pa'o //
T04TD3903E:238a-30: theg pa chen po gang zhig tu //
T04TD3903E:238a-31: thams cad snying rje'i rtsa ba can //
T04TD3903E:238a-32: rgyu mthun ye shes dri med bshad //
T04TD3903E:238a-33: de la sems yongs su zhig smod //
T04TD3903E:238a-34: skyon dang yon tan mi shes pa'am //
T04TD3903E:238a-35: yon tan skyon du lta ba'am //
T04TD3903E:238b-0: yon tan ldan la sdang ba zhig / theg pa che la @238b smod byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:238b-2: yang na 'di la mtshar ba ci yod de gang long ba rnams kyis nyams par bya ba yin pas so //
T04TD3903E:238b-3: gang bzlog par byas pa rnams kyang mi nyan zhing /
T04TD3903E:238b-4: bdag dang gzhan rnams g-yang sa chen por ltung bar byed do zhes rjes su brtse bar bya ba'o zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog go //
T04TD3903E:238b-5: dgu pa la de ma thag pa gsum gyis lus la sogs pa'i las bstan to //
T04TD3903E:238b-7: gegs las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du sman chen po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:238b-8: bcu pa la ni byis pa rnams te gdul bya rnams kyi gtso bor gdul ba'i gnas nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:238b-9: byis pa'i lam gsungs pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo //
T04TD3903E:238b-10: 'dzam bu'i gling gcig gi dus su 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:238b-11: mthu ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rnams su gdul bya thams cad la bden pa bstan pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:238b-12: ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gcig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas chos la bdag med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das par mos pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:238b-13: chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba ni ngag gcig brjod pas gdul bya mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi sems la cig car go bar byed pas so ;
T04TD3903E:238b-14: / smon lam 'di rnams sa gong ma rnams su rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:238b-15: mos pas spyod pa'i sa la ni 'di lta 'di ltar gyur zhes mos pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:238b-16: de bzhin du sa 'di nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:238b-17: 'dir dang po gsum ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bslab pa gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:238b-18: rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni mi slob pa'i lam mo //
T04TD3903E:238b-19: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T04TD3903E:238b-21: 'di smon lam las dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la blo rgya che ba spro ba yang dag par skyes pa /
T04TD3903E:238b-22: mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa las rang gi don bzhin du gzhan gyi don rnams la 'jug bzhin pa ni stong pa chen po la rab tu 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:239a-0: gang gang gi don du gnyer ba de de la @239a * //
T04TD3903E:239a-1: ster bar byed cing phyi rol lam nang yang rung ba gang yongs su mi gtong ba'i dngos po de med de /
T04TD3903E:239a-2: de ltar 'di'i gtong ba chen po 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:239a-3: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:239a-4: sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur te ;
T04TD3903E:239a-5: mthong ba rgya chen po nyid dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis nas /
T04TD3903E:239a-6: ji srid sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyi bar dang de de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams mthong nas lhag pa'i bsam pa rgya chen po nyid kyis bkur ster byed /
T04TD3903E:239a-9: mchod par byed do nas ji srid byang chub sems dpa'i bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub pa dang /
T04TD3903E:239a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba de rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:239a-11: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la mchod pa las sems can yongs su smin par byed pa kun du skyes pa yin te bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing de las 'di'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chos shin tu lhag par 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:239a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams la yang dag par mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:239a-13: yum chen mo dag tu yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:239a-14: bcom ldan 'das ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rgya chen po dang /
T04TD3903E:239a-15: bdag nyid chen po'i bsam pa ngo mtshar lags so //
T04TD3903E:239a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T04TD3903E:239a-17: gang 'di rnams brgya byin nyid dang 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang 'khor los sgyur ba nyid la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams don du mi gnyer la /
T04TD3903E:239a-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba yongs su sngo bar byed do nas ji srid du 'di rnams chags pa med pa dang 'dzin pa med pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:239a-19: 'di ni 'di rnams kyi rgya che ba'i bsam pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:239a-20: gang yang de'i chags pa med pa'i bde ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste bde ba de thams cad kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du 'dod cing /
T04TD3903E:239a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed pa /
T04TD3903E:239a-22: 'khor ba yongs su gtong ba nyid kyis te /
T04TD3903E:239a-23: 'di ni 'di rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid kyi bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-0: gsol ga bcom ldan @239b 'das ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams te de rnams thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:239b-1: de la mthong ba rgya che ba nyid ni gnag du mthu'i khyad par gyis gzugs kyi sku mthong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-2: smon lam gyi stobs kyis ni gang nang gi yang dag pa'i smon lam las chos kyi sku mthong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-3: thabs mkhas pa nyid kyis mang po nyid dang rab tu gyur pa bstan pa'i don du grangs rnam pa mang po'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni bsam pa la brten pa yang ste de yang rnam pa drug ste /
T04TD3903E:239b-10: dge ba'i bsam pa rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:239b-11: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig la skad cig gcig la yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis bkang pa rnams ster zhing /
T04TD3903E:239b-12: de dang mnyam pa'i lus rnams kyang de dang mnyam pa'i bskal par skad cig so so la sbyin par byed la /
T04TD3903E:239b-13: sems can gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can gyi khams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya ba ji snyed pa de la yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:239b-15: lam ka'i 'bras mchog ldan pa'i longs spyod shing las ji lta bar //
T04TD3903E:239b-16: dogs pa dang bral lus can bsam pa rang bzhin gnas rnams kyis //
T04TD3903E:239b-17: gang gi nor rdzas rgya che'ang blangs nas rang nyid longs spyod pa //
T04TD3903E:239b-18: gtong dga' longs spyod can de byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan min //
T04TD3903E:239b-20: 'di lta bus mi ngoms pa kho na ni sbyin pa'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa brgyud pa de lta bu'i ngo bo skad cig tsam yang nyams par mi byed cing byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rgyun gcod par mi byed de /
T04TD3903E:239b-22: 'di lta bu ni sbyin pa la rgya che ba'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:239b-23: sems can de rnams de ltar sbyin pas rjes su 'dzin pa po ches dga' bar 'gyur gyi /
T04TD3903E:239b-24: sbyin pa des rjes su gzung bar bya bzhin pa'i sems can rnams ma yin no zhes pa 'di lta bu'i ngo bo ni sbyin pa la dga' ba'i bsam pa'o //
