T04TD3903E:240a-0: gang sbyin pas phan btags pa'i sems can de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' bdag la ches phan 'dogs par @240a * //
T04TD3903E:240a-2: bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:240a-3: de rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye bar ston pa rgyur byas nas so //
T04TD3903E:240a-5: sems can rnams la de ltar sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas kyang lan nam rnam par smin pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:240a-6: 'di ni gos pa med pa'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240a-7: gal te de ltar sbyin pa'i phung po rgya che ba rab tu sbyor ba'i rnam par smin pa sems can rnams kho na'i yin par mngon par dga' bar byed kyi /
T04TD3903E:240a-8: bdag nyid la ma yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:240a-9: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yang byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de /
T04TD3903E:240a-11: gang byang chub sems dpa' lus gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pas /
T04TD3903E:240a-12: tshe'i tshang de dang mnyam pa'i bskal par rgyun du yo byad thams cad kyis phongs bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang bar spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed cing /
T04TD3903E:240a-13: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skad cig ma gcig nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skad cig ma gcig gi bar du sgom par byed pas mi ngoms pa kho na ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar sgom pa la bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240a-14: sgom pa brgyud pa de yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rgyun mi gcod pa de 'di ni rgya che ba'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240a-15: sgom pa des ches dga' bar 'gyur gyi /
T04TD3903E:240a-16: phan gdags par bya bzhin pa'i sems can rnams ni ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa 'di ni dga' ba'i bsam pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:240a-17: / gang rnams la phan btags pa'i sems can de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu phan 'dogs pa por blta'i bdag nyid ni de rnams la ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:240a-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye bar ston pa rgyur byas nas so zhes pa 'di ni phan par byed pa'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240a-19: de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i bar gyi bsod nams rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas kyang /
T04TD3903E:240a-20: lan nam rnam par smin pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di ni gos pa med pa'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240b-0: gang de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po rnam @240b par smin pa sems can rnams kho na'i yin par dga' bar byed kyi bdag nyid lam yin zhing sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar yang byed do zhes pa 'di ni dge ba'i bsam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:240b-1: slar yang gsungs pa skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin brgya so sor thob cing snyoms par 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:240b-3: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:240b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya g-yo bar byed cing snang bar yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-5: zhing brgyar 'gro ba dang sems can brgya yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-7: sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:240b-8: chos kyi bsgo brgya rnam par 'byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-9: lus brgya ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-10: lus dang lus la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan par ston par byed do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:240b-11: 'dir ting nge 'dzin gyi las ni sangs rgyas mthong ba la sogs pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:240b-12: / g-yo bar byed pa ni gdul bya rnams 'dul bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-13: 'gro ba dang snang bar byed pa dag gis song ste mthong nas yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:240b-14: 'jug pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' las sems can rnams kyi sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du byas te las kyi 'gro ba ston par byed do ;
T04TD3903E:240b-15: / rnam par 'byed de rang gi blo yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du /
T04TD3903E:240b-16: chos kyi rnam grangs rnams kyi don sems so //
T04TD3903E:240b-17: thams cad du brgya smos pa ni nges par 'byung ba nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:240b-18: thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis ni grangs nges pa med pa las grangs nges pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:240b-19: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir mos pa spyod pa'i sa la yang ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa rnams thob pa dang /
T04TD3903E:240b-20: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams mthong ba la sogs pa yang gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:240b-21: sangs rgya grangs med pa mthong ba ni tshogs kyi sar yang ste 'phags pa rtag par rab tu du ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:241a-0: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sa la yang ting nge 'dzin rnam grangs med pa nyid na yang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs bzhin dus de srid par snang pa'o zhes pa'i cha ni seng ge bzang po'i cha yin la gang yang rtogs pa'i tshul gyis brtan par so sor snang ba nyid na de rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob par bya ba sangs rgyas @241a * //
T04TD3903E:241a-1: nyid du de'i tshe kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i phyir bsam pa de ni legs pa ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:241a-2: gal te thabs la mkhas pas thams cad kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams so sor snang bar 'gyur mod de lta na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba'i dri ma rnams kyis na cher gsal ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang ;
T04TD3903E:241a-3: shin du ring bar khyab pa mchog tu gyur pa med pa nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe kho na sangs rgyas nyid du thal ba med do //
T04TD3903E:241a-4: de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi gter byang chub sems dpa' de ni phal cher 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing /
T04TD3903E:241a-5: dbang phyug chen po dbang rab tu thob la /
T04TD3903E:241a-6: chos rjes su bsrung zhing gtong ba chen po rtsom pa rnams kyis tshim pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-7: las gang cung zad rtsom pa de sbyin pa'am snyan par smra ba'am /
T04TD3903E:241a-8: don spyod pa'am don mthun pa nyid kyis te skye ba thams cad du'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-9: de la sbyin pa ni phyi dang nang gi zang zing sbyin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:241a-10: des gdul bya rnams chos sgrub par rung bar bskyed pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:241a-11: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni snyan par smra ba'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-12: don spyod pa ni chos la yang dag par 'god pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-13: don mthun pa ni gang la pha rol yang dag par bkod pa de la rang yang rjes su 'jug pa'o zhes pa bzhi sems can bsdu ba'i thabs rnams so //
T04TD3903E:241a-14: bsdu ba de yang mos pa spyod pa'i sar phal cher don med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-15: sa bdun rnams la phal cher don yod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-16: brgyad pa la sogs pa'i sa rnams la rnam pa thams cad du don yod pa ste sems can gyi don lhun gyis grub par gdon mi za bar phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:241a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste las kyi dbang gis ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ste /
T04TD3903E:241a-18: las kyi dbang gis mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su skye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-19: smon lam gyi dbang gis ni sa la bzhugs pa rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba la dbang pa nyid kyis dud 'gro la sogs pa dman pa'i gnas su skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241a-20: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis ni bsam gtan rnams bzlog nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba gang yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:241b-0: dbang 'byor pa'i dbang gis ni sprul pa rnams kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs par skye ba kun du ston pa gang yin pa'o @241b zhes pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:241b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ni //
T04TD3903E:241b-3: srid par gnas pa'i rgyu yin te //
T04TD3903E:241b-4: de ni gnas pa byed kyang blo //
T04TD3903E:241b-5: zhen pa rjes su sems ma yin //
T04TD3903E:241b-7: der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la chags pa med par spyod cing /
T04TD3903E:241b-8: 'dod pa la yongs su longs spyod pa rnam pa mang por ston par byed kyang de la chags pa med do //
T04TD3903E:241b-9: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i yo byad thams cad sogs par byed cing de la yang zhen pa med par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:241b-10: bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa sngon ma can nyid kyis na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ni rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu kho nar 'gyur la chos thams cad sgyu ma ltar bsgom pas ni sems can gdul ba rgyur byas nas nyon mongs pa la dbang ba nyid thob pas bsam pa'i khyad par las sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin du 'dod pa yongs su longs spyod pa /
T04TD3903E:241b-11: rgyal ba'i sras po rnams la skyon byed pa ma yin pas so //
T04TD3903E:241b-13: mdo sde rgyan la sogs pa rnams su gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:241b-14: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams //
T04TD3903E:241b-15: rtag tu 'khor los sgyur bar ni //
T04TD3903E:241b-16: 'gyur zhing skye ba thams cad du //
T04TD3903E:241b-17: sems can don ni rab tu byed //
T04TD3903E:241b-18: thabs chen ldan pa rnams la ni //
T04TD3903E:241b-19: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:241b-20: 'khor ba'ang zhi ba'i bdag nyid du'o //
T04TD3903E:241b-21: de phyir rgyal sras bsam mi khyab //
T04TD3903E:241b-23: yang na 'di 'dod na khyim dang chung ma dang longs spyod thams cad dang /
T04TD3903E:241b-24: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:241b-25: ji ltar yang 'di 'di la 'di ltar rab tu 'byung ba de bzhin du sa gong ma rnams la yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:241b-26: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba yang thog ma kho nar /
T04TD3903E:241b-27: ma dang pha dang bu dang chung ma la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyon de snyed pas yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:241b-28: yongs su gzung ba de'i don du zhing las dang nyo tshong dang rgyal po'i skyes bu byed pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas sa yongs su dkrugs pa'i sdug bsngal las kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:241b-29: mtha' gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa lu gu rgyud du spyod par nus so //
T04TD3903E:241b-30: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:242a-0: dge ba gang dang gang kho na rtsom pa de dang @242a * //
T04TD3903E:242a-1: de mthar phyin pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:242a-2: brtul zhugs nges pa la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad du tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:242a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes pa de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyis khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag gi khyad par ro zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sar gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:242a-4: de lta bu ni sems bskyed pa 'di'i yon tan rnams so //
T04TD3903E:242a-5: sngar gyi sems bskyed pa'i yon tan can dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnams ni 'di la cher 'bar ba dang ring du khyab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-6: de'i gong ni sems bskyed pa'i yon tan rnams ni 'tsham pa med pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:242a-8: 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:242a-9: de yan chad du byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par can gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
T04TD3903E:242a-10: gzhan yang lus sam 'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam spyan nam spyod yul lam dbyangs sam spyod pa'am bkod pa'am byin gyis brlabs pa'am mos pa'am mngon par 'du byed pa rnams kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams ji snyed pa de snyed du yang bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:242a-11: de bzhin du sa so so la chos kyi sprin gyi bar la gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:242a-12: de la spyan ni rnam pa lnga'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-13: dbyangs ni sprul pa'i gsung ngo //
T04TD3903E:242a-15: byin gyis brlabs pa ni gang gis pha rol byin gyis rlob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-16: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la brten nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthu'i bya ba'i don sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-17: shes rab kyi spyan gyis bsdus pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la brten nas chos ston pa mngon par 'du byed pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:242a-18: de lta na yang de'i yon tan rnams bag tsam brjod par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-19: de la sems bskyed pa drug pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni ro han [?] la sogs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:242a-20: yon tan rin po che thams cad de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:242a-21: dri ma med pa'i sa yang ste /
T04TD3903E:242a-22: gang gi phyir 'di la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma dang bral ba de'i phyir dri ma med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:242a-23: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'di'i lhag cing shin du dag par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:242a-24: sems bskyed pa lnga pas rtsen pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:242b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams las tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches shas che bar @242b 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:242b-1: sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal ches gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stobs bcu ru 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:242b-2: sems can rnams kyi tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma bzlog pa'i ched dang /
T04TD3903E:242b-3: dge ba la brten pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la dgod pa'i ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:242b-4: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams kyang 'di la snang bar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:242b-5: rgya chen po mthong bas dang /
T04TD3903E:242b-6: smon lam gyi stobs kyis so //
T04TD3903E:242b-7: thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis na so sor snang ba 'di yang nges pa med pa ste gnas skabs snga ma rnams la bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:242b-8: nges pa las ni skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin stong thob po //
T04TD3903E:242b-10: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:242b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams stong g-yo bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:242b-13: zhing stong du yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:242b-15: sems can stong yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:242b-16: bskal pa stong du gnas shing /
T04TD3903E:242b-17: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:242b-18: chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:242b-19: lus stong ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:242b-20: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:242b-21: snang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi grangs ma nges pa dang nges pa 'di dag kyang sems bskyed pa gong ma gong ma rnams la yang rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:242b-22: de bzhin du spyan dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa snga ma'i yon tan rnams 'di dang phyi mar yang thams cad du rjes su 'jug cing rab tu gyur pa shin du dang ches la sogs pa tha dad pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:242b-23: sems bskyed pa bdun pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:242b-24: mi 'dod pa thog tu bab pa thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:242b-25: sa 'od byed pa yang ste gang gi phyir 'di la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten pa chos kyi snang ba chen po byed pas so //
T04TD3903E:242b-26: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' shin tu so sor rtogs pa'i shes pa can te phyir yang tshad med pa dam pa'i chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas shing /
T04TD3903E:242b-27: nyin dang mtshan du chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba dang /
T04TD3903E:242b-28: chos smra ba la dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:243a-1: gi dngos po gang de la mi sbyin pa de cung zad kyang med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:243a-2: bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba gang nyams su mi len pa de cung zad kyang med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:243a-3: lus kyi gnod pa gang mi len pa de cung zad kyang med do //
T04TD3903E:243a-4: rtag par rab tu sbyor ba'i rgyu ni chos la gus pa mchog tu gyur pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:243a-5: / de ni nor dang rgyal srid dang bde 'gror skye ba dang 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa dang bdag nyid kyi lus pas kyang chos shin du gces par byed de /
T04TD3903E:243a-6: de ni chos kyis shin du dga' bar 'gyur gyi /
T04TD3903E:243a-7: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang /
T04TD3903E:243a-9: tshangs pa nyid ma yin la chos kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba gcig gi don du yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes gang bar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar nas kyang bdag nyid 'dor bar spro na me'i 'obs tha mal par lta ci smos te 'on kyang bdag gis dmyal ba dang ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun du gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal bar bya na mi'i sdug bsngal la kun du gnas pas lta ci smos zhes brtson 'grus drag po rtsom pas ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur te chos de rnams thos na gcig tu dben par song bas 'di ltar dpyod de /
T04TD3903E:243a-10: chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di rnams khong du chud par bya'i /
T04TD3903E:243a-11: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin no zhes 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:243a-12: 'dir chos ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i chos so //
T04TD3903E:243a-13: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos te /
T04TD3903E:243a-14: chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa'i stobs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rig nas bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang tshad men pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams sbyor ba las thob kyi /
T04TD3903E:243a-15: mngon par dga' ba la gnas pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:243a-16: de kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:243a-17: de la bsam gtan rnams la ni bde bar mngon par nga rgyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-0: @243b gzugs med pa rnams ni thar par mngon par nga rgyal ba rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-1: byams pa dang snying rje dag sdug bsngal can rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-2: dga' ba dang btang snyoms dag grol ba rnams kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-3: mngon par shes pa rnams ni skyabs ngan pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas te /
T04TD3903E:243b-4: mthu khyad par can gyis gzhug pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-5: ma nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir sa 'di ni de rnams kyis rab tu phye ba yin no //
T04TD3903E:243b-6: sa snga ma dag na yang de rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:243b-7: 'dir mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te /
T04TD3903E:243b-9: de rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du ma so sor nyams su myong bar byed de sa yang g-yo bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:243b-10: gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:243b-11: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:243b-12: snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur to //
T04TD3903E:243b-13: rtsig pa la yang thad ka dang ra ba la yang thad ka dang /
T04TD3903E:243b-14: ri la yang thad kar mi thogs par 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-15: nam mkha' la yang 'gro ba dang /
T04TD3903E:243b-16: sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed do //
T04TD3903E:243b-17: chu la 'ang sa la bzhin du 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:243b-20: sprin chen po bzhin du lus las chu 'byin te /
T04TD3903E:243b-21: chu gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'bar ba yang zhi bar byed pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:243b-22: / nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang lag pas yongs su nyug par byed do //
T04TD3903E:243b-23: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro //
T04TD3903E:243b-27: de lha'i rna ba'i khams mi'i las 'das pas lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra rnams thos so ;
T04TD3903E:243b-28: / dmyal ba dang byol song dang yi dags rnams kyi dang /
T04TD3903E:243b-29: tha na sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu rings dang /
T04TD3903E:243b-30: srin bu dang bya dang bung ba rnams kyi yang sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams kyis nyen pa'i sgra thos nas sdug bsngal de bsal ba'i ched du 'bad cing /
T04TD3903E:243b-31: 'di nyid du gnas nas zhing sna tshogs pa rnams na sangs rgyas rnams chos ston pa nyan no //
T04TD3903E:243b-32: des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol rnams kyi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta bar rab tu shes te /
T04TD3903E:243b-33: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'o zhes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:243b-34: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-0: @244a * // zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-1: zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-2: gti mug dang bcas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-3: gti mug dang bral ba'i sems nas ji srid bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
T04TD3903E:244a-4: skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran pa dang gnyis dang gsum nas ji srid skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar yang rjes su dran no //
T04TD3903E:244a-5: nyi ma gcig dang gnyis dang gsum rnams nas ji srid du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar rnams kyang rjes su dran no //
T04TD3903E:244a-6: che ge mo zhig tu bdag ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur /
T04TD3903E:244a-11: tshe'i mtha' ni 'di lta bu thub /
T04TD3903E:244a-12: bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes pa na ji srid de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes pa nas /
T04TD3903E:244a-13: ji srid yan lag dang bcas /
T04TD3903E:244a-15: ched du bya ba dang bcas /
T04TD3903E:244a-16: rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no //
T04TD3903E:244a-17: pha rol po rnams kyi yang sngon gyi srid pa de rnams kho nas dran du 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:244a-18: des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams mthong ste /
T04TD3903E:244a-19: 'chi bzhin pa dang skye bzhin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-26: ngan 'gro las ji lta bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te /
T04TD3903E:244a-27: sems can 'di rnams lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-28: ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-29: yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba can rnams te /
T04TD3903E:244a-30: legs par spyod pa'i rgyu des /
T04TD3903E:244a-31: lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams su skye'o //
T04TD3903E:244a-32: sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-33: ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244a-34: yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba can rnams te /
T04TD3903E:244a-35: log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu las /
T04TD3903E:244a-36: lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o zhes /
T04TD3903E:244b-0: lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi khams @244b thams cad du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams kyi so //
T04TD3903E:244b-1: de yang phal cher sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po lha'i /'dir mngon par shes pa gcig gis sems can rnams nye bar gnon no zhes pas khyab bdag nyid thob po //
T04TD3903E:244b-2: gnyis kyis chos ston pa sgra dang don so so yang dag par rig pa las te /
T04TD3903E:244b-3: sems shes nas skad gzhan rnams kyi don shes par byed pas so //
T04TD3903E:244b-4: gnyis dag gis 'ong ba dang 'gro ba shes te /
T04TD3903E:244b-5: sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i yongs su smin pa shes so //
T04TD3903E:244b-6: rnam par dag pa ni gsal bar thos pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:244b-7: mi'i las 'das pa ni thag ring po thos pa ste /
T04TD3903E:244b-8: mi'i sgra las shin tu 'das nas 'og tu ji srid mnar med pa'i bar gyi sgra thos par nus pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:244b-9: rnam pa ni 'di rnams thams cad tha dad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:244b-10: ched du bya ba ni ming ngo //
T04TD3903E:244b-11: rgyu mtshan ni rigs la sogs pa rnams te ;
T04TD3903E:244b-12: gang gis skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan no //
T04TD3903E:244b-13: 'di la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:244b-14: mthong ba rgya chen po nyid dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis so //
T04TD3903E:244b-15: de yang phal cher sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po lha'i rgyal po'i dbang por 'gyur la sems can gyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bzlog pa'i thabs yang dag par sgrub pa la mkhas pa ste /
T04TD3903E:244b-16: sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dam las gdon pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:244b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams las bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las don spyod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:244b-18: skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong thob pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-20: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:244b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya g-yo zhing snang bar byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-22: zhing brgya phrag stong du 'gro ba dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-23: sems can 'bum yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-24: bskal pa stong phrag brgyar gnas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-25: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-26: chos kyi sgo 'bum rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:244b-28: lus so so la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'bum ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:245a-0: de ltar thob pa'i yon tan 'phel ba la spro ba dang ldan pa ni @245a * //
T04TD3903E:245a-1: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa 'phel ba dang rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir yon tan thams cad kyi rgyu brtson 'grus kho na'o zhes sems bskyed pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par byed do //
T04TD3903E:245a-2: de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:245a-3: yid ches pa brtan pa nyid kyis na mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:245a-4: sa 'od 'phro ba yang ste gang gi phyir 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bud shing bsregs la /
T04TD3903E:245a-5: de las ye shes kyi me'i 'od 'byung ba'i phyir 'od 'phro ba'o //
T04TD3903E:245a-6: 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur la skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya so sor thob pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba brgya mthong ba dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-8: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya g-yo bar byed cing snang bar yang byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-10: zhing bye ba brgyar 'gro ba dang sems can bye ba brgya yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-11: bskal pa bye ba brgyar gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug pa dang chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-12: lus bye ba brgya ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245a-13: lus dang lus la yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'i 'khor dang ldan par ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:245a-14: phal cher lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral du 'gyur la /
T04TD3903E:245a-15: sems can rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa dang gtso bo ste /
T04TD3903E:245a-16: sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod pa'i ched du mkhas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:245a-17: de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las don mthun pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams las brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:245a-18: de nas sems bskyed pa dgu pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i ri bo lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:245a-19: dmigs pa'i rnam par g-yeng bas mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:245a-20: sa sbyang dka' ba yang ste /
T04TD3903E:245a-21: gang gi phyir 'di la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag gi rigs pa dang bden pa shes pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba las yongs su sbyong ba bya ba dka' ba de'i phyir shin du sbyang dka' ba'o //
T04TD3903E:245b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i bdud rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'dir thub par mi nus so zhes @245b pas shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:245b-1: de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i sna tshogs pa'i thabs dang bya ba rab tu sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:245b-2: de de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba la phyir mi ldog pa ste khyad par can gyi chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas /
T04TD3903E:245b-3: sems can la phan pa gang 'jig rten na rab tu spyod pa na /
T04TD3903E:245b-4: yi ge dang bstan bcos dang rgya dang grangs dang rtsis dang shod thabs la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-5: khams kyi rgyud dang gso ba'i rgyud dbul ba dang brjed byed dang 'byung po'i gdon sel ba rnams dang dgu dang ro longs kyi sbyor ba 'joms par byed pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-6: snyan dngags dang gar thabs dang gtam rgyud dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-7: rol mo dang sngon byung bas rab tu dga' bar byed pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-8: grong dang grong khyer dang skyed mos tshal dang 'bab chu dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang rdzing bu dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang sman dang nags tshal mngon par sgrub pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-9: gser dang dngul dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bee d'urya dang dung dang men shel dang byi ru dang rin po che'i 'byung khungs bstan pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-10: zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang 'od dang sa g-yo ba dang gcan gzan gyi lang nge dang rmi lam gyi ltas ston pa la 'jug pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-11: sems can gyi yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshan nyid spyod pa dang rjes su spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i ltas rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-16: gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-17: gzhan yang gang rnam par tho 'tshams pa med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-18: rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang ldan pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:245b-19: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyang snying rje dang ldan pas mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'god pa'i ched du mngon par sgrub bo zhes 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:245b-20: 'di la yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:245b-21: skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba stong thob po //
T04TD3903E:245b-22: sangs rgyas bye ba stong mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:245b-23: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:246a-1: khams bye ba stong g-yo bar byed snang bar yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-2: zhing bye ba stong du yang 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:246a-3: sems can bye ba stong yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-4: bskal pa bye ba stong du gnas shing /
T04TD3903E:246a-5: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:246a-6: chos kyi sgo bye ba stong rnam par 'byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-7: lus bye ba stong ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-8: lus dang lus la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba stong ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-9: phal cher lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan du 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:246a-10: sems can thams cad mu stegs pa'i gnas thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa la byang ba dang gtso bo yin zhing sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis bden pa la 'god pa la mkhas pa yin no //
T04TD3903E:246a-11: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:246a-12: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa thob pa de las 'di'i sems bskyed pa bcu pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa sman chen po lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:246a-13: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:246a-14: sa mngon du gyur pa yang ste gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par 'byed pa las chags pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa mngon du 'gyur te de'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'o //
T04TD3903E:246a-15: 'di la yang byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:246a-16: skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba 'bum so sor thob po //
T04TD3903E:246a-17: sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:246a-18: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:246a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong g-yo bar byed snang bar yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-20: zheng bye ba stong phrag brgyar 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:246a-21: sems can bye ba 'bum yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-22: bskal pa bye ba 'bum du gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar yang 'jug go ;
T04TD3903E:246a-23: / chos kyi sgo bye ba 'bum rnam par 'byed par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-24: lus bye ba 'bum ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-25: lus dang lus la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba 'bum ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:246a-26: phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:246b-0: sems can rnams kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal rgyun @246b gcod pa la bya ba dang gtso bo yin zhing sems can rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'dzud mkhas pa yin no //
T04TD3903E:246b-1: 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches shas che bar yang 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:246b-3: blo yi 'od zer gsal por snang ba can //
T04TD3903E:246b-4: rang gi lag mthil son pa'i skyu ru ra ji bzhin //
T04TD3903E:246b-5: srid gsum ma lus 'di ni gdod nas ma skyes par //
T04TD3903E:246b-6: rtogs te tha snyad bden pa'i stobs las 'gog pa rtogs //
T04TD3903E:246b-7: 'gog pa thob pas 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa yongs su gtong ba yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:246b-8: 'khor bar son pa'i sbyor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par son pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ;
T04TD3903E:246b-9: 'di'i 'gro ba mgon med pa la snying rje shin du ches 'phel bar byed pas so //
T04TD3903E:246b-10: de nas sems bskyed pa bcu gcig pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa bshes gnyen lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:246b-11: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can mi zad pa'i tshad med pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:246b-13: bcom ldan 'das ma bar mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:246b-14: dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas mi zad par byed 'dod pa dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro bar 'dong pa dang /
T04TD3903E:246b-15: bskal pa stong phrag brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyang sems can la ltos nas gtong bar 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:246b-16: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:246b-17: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
T04TD3903E:246b-18: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par byed 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:246b-19: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba ni khyad par du 'phags shing lhun gyis grub pa mtshan ma med par gnas pa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:246b-20: sems bskyed pa 'di yangs ring du song ba ste /
T04TD3903E:246b-21: gang gi phyir 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs dang bden pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs pa mtshan ma med pa'i gnas pa 'bad pas 'jug pa ste /
T04TD3903E:246b-22: de'i phyir ring du song ba'o //
T04TD3903E:247a-1: sems dpa' sems can la phan pa'i don du bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:247a-2: mngon par shes pa drug rnams la yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:247a-3: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T04TD3903E:247a-4: yongs su bsgyur ba pa dang /
T04TD3903E:247a-6: dang po ni g-yo bar byed pa la sogs pa sngar ji skad bshad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:247a-7: sprul pa pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:247a-8: sku dang gsung dang yul gyi sprul pa las so //
T04TD3903E:247a-9: de ltar ni phyogs bcur grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su grangs med pa'i sems can gyi don du skad cig gcig la yang 'gro ba drug gi sems can gyi gzugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sprul pa rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par byed do //
T04TD3903E:247a-10: lha la sogs pa dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ji srid phyogs bcu rnams su grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dbyangs kyis sprul pa go bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:247a-11: dbyangs de las kyang rnam pa du mar chos ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:247a-12: yang na gzhan sprul pa rnams kyis byed du 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:247a-13: nam mkha' la yang chos ston pa'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:247a-19: rin po che la sogs pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi don du sprul par byed do //
T04TD3903E:247a-20: zag pa zad pa shes pas bdag gam pha rol po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa zad pa ji ltar gyur pa bzhin shes so //
T04TD3903E:247a-21: bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag tu yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:247a-22: de 'di ltar rtogs par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:247a-23: gang phyogs bcu gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams dang gang yang de rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ming 'ba' zhig pa sngar brtags pa'o nas chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T04TD3903E:247a-24: da de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas mngon par shes pa drug rnams mngon par sgrub po //
T04TD3903E:247a-25: gang rnams la gnas nas phyogs bcu rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing bsnyen bkur byed de /
T04TD3903E:247a-26: de rnams las chos kyang nyan to //
T04TD3903E:247b-0: de rnams la dge ba'i rtsa @247b ba rnams skrun par byed cing mngon par zhen pa med de /
T04TD3903E:247b-1: stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med pas so //
T04TD3903E:247b-2: de lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sems can rnams mthong nas /
T04TD3903E:247b-3: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pas der song ste de rnams la chos ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:247b-4: lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las chos mnyan te bzung nas de rnams la ston to //
T04TD3903E:247b-5: sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas sems can rnams kyi sems rnams rig nas bsam pa ji lta bar de rnams la chos ston to //
T04TD3903E:247b-6: des bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran zhing /
T04TD3903E:247b-7: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos rjes su dran nas chos des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston to //
T04TD3903E:247b-8: de zag pa zad pa shes pas sems can rnams dang rjes su mthun par chos ston to //
T04TD3903E:247b-9: de mngon par shes pa de rnams kyis sems can rnams ni don gyi ched du lus gang dang gang 'dzin par 'dod pa de dang de kho na so sor 'dzin gyi de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba rnams kyis gos pa med do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:247b-10: de nyid kyi phyir rtsod pa 'di 'jug pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:247b-11: sems dang po bskyed pa kho nas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:247b-12: nges pa yang ci ltar ngan 'gro rnams su skye ba yin zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:247b-13: gang gi phyir gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang tshad med pa bzhi la spyod cing mi dge ba'i chos bcu spangs nas gnas pa de'i mi khom pa brgyad rnams mi srid na ngan 'gror skye ba lta ci smos /
T04TD3903E:247b-14: 'o na byol song gi skye gnas kyi skyes rabs rnams ci ltar yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:247b-15: de rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi don gyi ched du dbang thob pa nyid kyis bsam pa bzhin du skye ba rnams te /
T04TD3903E:247b-16: byol song gi sdug bsngal rnams myong ba yang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:247b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchog thob pa la /
T04TD3903E:247b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du cig car mtha' yas pa'i sku gzhan gyi don gyi ched du sprul pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:248a-0: mngon par shes pa drug po 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa' @248a * //
T04TD3903E:248a-1: la skye ba nas skye bar 'byung ste /
T04TD3903E:248a-2: byol song gi skye gnas la sogs par yang mi nyams so //
T04TD3903E:248a-3: de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rjes su gzung ba'i sems can rnams kyang lhan cig skyes pa'i byams pas de'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa la khro bar mi byed do //
T04TD3903E:248a-4: gdug pa can dang nga rgyal can dang mu stegs gang de'i tshig la gnas par mi 'dod pa de rnams mgo dags pa la sogs pas bskul zhing gsal bar byas nas bsdigs pas bdag nyid kyi tshig 'dzin du 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:248a-5: gang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i tshig la khro ba'i sems can de ni 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:248a-6: gzhan du byang chub sems dpa' kho nas dus dang dus ma yin pa gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248a-7: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'di chos ston par byed de /
T04TD3903E:248a-8: snying rjes yang dag par bskul ba shes rab kyis sbyangs pa'i yid can rnams sems can rjes su 'dzin pa'i ched kho nar chos ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248a-9: sa gong ma gsol ba rnams ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su slob dpon du 'os par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:248a-10: 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa'i rim pas sa sbyong bar byed ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'bum phrag bcu rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so sor thob pa las dang /
T04TD3903E:248a-11: snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas sa brgyad pa la mngon du phyogs par yang 'gyur ba dang /
T04TD3903E:248a-12: 'di'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mtshan ma dang bral ba tshad med par yang 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:248a-13: 'o na sa dang po kho nar nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa las 'das pa ma yin nam /
T04TD3903E:248a-15: der ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i bdag nyid che ba nyid kyis te /
T04TD3903E:248a-16: rang gi blo'i rnam par dpyad pas ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:248a-18: 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:248a-19: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste /
T04TD3903E:248a-20: dper na rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i bu rgyal po'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa ni rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon gyi /
T04TD3903E:248b-0: @248b rang gi blo'i stobs kyis rnam par dpyod pas ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:248b-1: de nar son pa na rang gi blo'i stobs bskyed pas kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:248b-2: kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid che ba nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi ;
T04TD3903E:248b-3: rang gi blo'i rnam par dpyod pas ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:248b-4: sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa ni rang gi yul shes pa'i khyad par gyi bdag nyid chen po la gnas pa nyid las nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bya ba las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
T04TD3903E:248b-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las zab cing dben la rgyu ba med pa thob pa yin te gong du khyad par 'tshol ba'i brtson pa yang mi gtong ngo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:248b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i las ni khyad par du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin la brten pa nyid kyis na mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248b-7: gal te yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi las ni mtshan ma dang bral bar 'jug kyang tshad med pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:248b-8: sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248b-9: 'di'i las ni sbyor ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir legs par sbyangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:248b-10: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa snang ba rtogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:248b-11: ring du song ba nyid kyi phyir zab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:248b-12: de'i mi mthun phyogs kyi sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir dben pa'o //
T04TD3903E:248b-13: de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i sa la mi rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rgyu ba med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:248b-14: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi las de ni mtshan ma dang bral ba yin yang 'di 'dra ba ma yin la /
T04TD3903E:248b-15: de tsam la gnas pa ste /
T04TD3903E:248b-16: gong ma yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248b-17: gnas pa khyad par can yang ste 'di yang dag pa'i mtha'i gnas pas gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:248b-18: 'gog pa mngon du mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:248b-19: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:248b-20: kye rgyal ba'i sras sa drug pa nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la snyoms par 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:248b-21: sa bdun pa la ni sems kyi skad cig nas sems kyi skad cig la 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ste /
T04TD3903E:248b-22: 'gog pa mngon du byas par brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:249a-0: des na 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan pa zhes brjod nas ji srid du rtag par rgyun du dben pa'i @249a * //
T04TD3903E:249a-2: sems can yongs su smin pa'i don du smon lam gyi dbang gis khams gsum par skye ba yang mngon par sgrub pa la 'jig rten gyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:249a-3: 'dir yang dag pa'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
T04TD3903E:249a-4: de bzhin nyid la 'gog pa zhes brjod pa las te /
T04TD3903E:249a-5: 'dir spros pa thams cad 'gog go zhes byas nas so //
T04TD3903E:249a-6: 'di la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur la skad cig gcig gis kyang ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum so sor 'thob pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum mthong ba dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-8: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum g-yo zhing snang bar yang byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-10: zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum du 'gro ba dang ;
T04TD3903E:249a-11: sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-12: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar rab tu 'jug pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-13: chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-14: lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ston par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:249a-15: lus dang lus la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:249a-16: phal cher ni lha'i bdag po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:249a-17: sems can rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'i ye shes sgrub pa la byang ba dang gtso bo yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:249a-18: sems can rnams skyon med pa la 'dzud mkhas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:249a-19: 'di'i thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:249a-20: de ltar yongs su sbyong ba'i sa bdun rnams dang 'bad pa dang bcas pas mtshan ma med par spyod pa'i yon tan rnams rtogs pa las sems bskyed pa bcu gnyis pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba ste /
T04TD3903E:249a-21: smon lam ji lta bar 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:249a-22: mngon par shes pa mi zad par yang ste /
T04TD3903E:249b-0: mngon par shes pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i phyir @249b ro ;
T04TD3903E:249b-1: / sa mi g-yo ba yang ste gang gi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang bden pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i mtshen [?] ma med par gnas pa rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir g-yo ba med de de'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes brjod de /
T04TD3903E:249b-3: ye shes mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:249b-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir sgrub par dka' ba'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-5: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-6: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir skye ba'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-7: yang bya ba med pa'i phyir yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-8: ye shes kyi rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su mthar thug pa'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-9: sngon gyi mtha' rnams su smon lam mngon par sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir sprul pa'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-10: gzhan gyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir byin rlabs kyi sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-11: sngon gyi mtha' rnams su mngon par sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir lhun gyis grub pa'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-12: dge ba'i chos rnams lhun gyis grub pa kho nas rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid du 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-13: sangs rgyas rnams las sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob pa'i phyir lung bstan pa'i sa'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-14: lung bstan pa yang gang zag gi bye brag gis rigs la gnas pa sems bskyed pa mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin par gnas pa'i gang zag lung ston pa las so //
T04TD3903E:249b-15: lung bstan pa chen po ni sa brgyad pa la ste mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:249b-16: sa 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba la 'jug cing /
T04TD3903E:249b-17: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes thams cad dang bral zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:249b-18: de thob pa las 'di'i gang bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror rnam par smin par bya ba'i las kyi sgrib pa de rnams yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:249b-19: gzhan du ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo la rjes su brtse bas ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:249b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa zab mo shes par dka' ba dbyer med par mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba rjes su thob pa nas /
T04TD3903E:250a-1: pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:250a-2: de la rnam pa thams cad du gnyis la kun du spyod pa'am mtshan ma la kun du spyod pa snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:250a-3: de 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams kho nas 'gog pa de las slong bar mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:250a-4: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:250a-5: de sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa dang chos kyi sgo'i rgyun de la gnas pa /
T04TD3903E:250a-6: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:250a-7: de la 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
T04TD3903E:250a-8: rigs kyi bu legs so legs so //
T04TD3903E:250a-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:250a-10: 'on kyang rigs kyi bu gang nged rnams kyi stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de yongs su tshol ba la mngon par sbyor bar gyis shig / brtson 'grus rtsoms shig / bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma 'dor cig / gzhan yang khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pas gnas pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo ma zhi ba 'di rnams la soms shig / yang rigs kyi bu sngon gyi smon lam dang sems can gyi don thob par bya ba dang ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par gyis shig ste gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'o nas /
T04TD3903E:250a-11: ji srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo rnams su gzhug pa mdzad pa ma yin te de kho nar 'di'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:250a-12: sems can thams cad kyi bya ba rgyun 'chad pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:250a-13: 'di yang gang yud tsam cig gis lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gnon pa da ni sngar gyi rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i las can gyis bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang de snyed du dpag tu med pa rjes su thob par mi nus so //
T04TD3903E:250a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang sems can rnams kyi so sor rab tu dbye ba rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so //
T04TD3903E:250b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig las kyang mi g-yo @250b la ;
T04TD3903E:250b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams su dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang so sor snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T04TD3903E:250b-3: sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par dbye ba kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs dang chu zheng rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-4: mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang de dang de lta de ltar rang gi lus kun du ston te /
T04TD3903E:250b-6: dge sbyong dang bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang khyim bdag dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang tshangs pa rnams kyi gzugs rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston pa nas ji srid du 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'og min gyi gzugs ston pa'i bar dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-7: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su ston te de dang de'i gzugs kyis gdul ba rnams kyi don gyi ched du'o //
T04TD3903E:250b-8: de ltar gdul bya'i lus dang sems dang skal ba mthun par bdag nyid kyi lus dang sems dag ston te /
T04TD3903E:250b-9: 'di yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T04TD3903E:250b-10: ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:250b-11: de sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa kun du shes nas ji ltar gdul bya yongs su smin pa'i sems mi 'da' bar 'dod na sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:250b-12: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi lus dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-13: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i lus dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-14: nyan thos kyi lus dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-16: shes pa'i lus dang chos kyi lus dang nam mkha'i lus byin gyis rlob bo //
T04TD3903E:250b-17: rang gi lus sems can gyi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
T04TD3903E:250b-18: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi lus la sogs pa nam mkha'i lus kyi bar du rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:250b-19: 'dir don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye shes ngag gis ye shes rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor bar rig par bya ste de la don dam pa'i ye shes ni lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral ba nyid kyis dang /
T04TD3903E:250b-20: lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas bstan to //
T04TD3903E:250b-21: rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su mi gcod pas so //
T04TD3903E:251a-0: 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thun mong ma @251a * //
T04TD3903E:251a-1: yin pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes yongs su gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:251a-2: kun rdzob kyi ye shes ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa rab tu shes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:251a-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang /
T04TD3903E:251a-4: gnyis ka ma yin pa'i phyogs rab tu shes pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:251a-5: de la sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten dag dang de'i skye ba'i rgyu las kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:251a-6: theg pa gsum gyis rnam par byang ba'i phyogs te de yang ye shes gang gis dang chos gang gis rab tu phye ba'o //
T04TD3903E:251a-7: nam mkha'i lus kyis gnyis pa ma yin pa'i phyogs so //
T04TD3903E:251a-8: rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob pas ni dbang de dang de la bya ba mtshungs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba nyid yongs su gsal bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:251a-9: dbang bcu rnams kyang sa 'di la so sor thob ste /
T04TD3903E:251a-10: gang rnams thob pa las 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la ni gnas pa nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang ldan pa yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:251a-11: rtag par rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-12: brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bsu ba yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-13: lag na rdo rje rnams rtag par phyir 'brang ba yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ma btang ba yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-15: lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par sgrub pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-16: lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-17: mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su grub pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-18: ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas ba la dbang byed pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-19: lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par tshol ba yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-20: 'gro ba ji ltar smin pa ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-21: theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa yin /
T04TD3903E:251a-22: bskal pa re re dang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams re rer sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma rnams la bsti stang byed btsun par byed do //
T04TD3903E:251a-23: chos kyi snang ba nye bar sgrub pa yang tshol lo //
T04TD3903E:251a-24: 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba de rnams kyang rgya chen por 'gyur /
T04TD3903E:251a-25: tshim par byed yongs su dag par 'gyur ;
T04TD3903E:251a-27: theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa yang rnam pa dgu ste /
T04TD3903E:251a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi don ni mi phyed pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:251a-30: ye shes mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251a-31: bshad pa mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251a-32: bshad pha mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251a-33: rnam par grol ba mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251a-34: zhing yongs su dag pa dbyer med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251b-0: theg pa chen po la 'jug @251b pa dbyer med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251b-1: mngon par shes pa mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251b-2: dris pa lung ston par nus pa dbyer med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251b-3: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa mi phyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:251b-4: mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa dbyer med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:251b-5: 'dis dang po sems bskyed par gyur pas kyang smon lam chen po bcu la sogs pa gang smon lam grangs med pa brgya mngon par bsgrubs pas de rnams 'di'i yongs su dag par 'gyur bas na smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:251b-6: de ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams byams pa chen po'i snang ba spros nas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rim gyis zhi bar byed cing rten rnams kyang tshim par byed cing rten rnams kyang rten par byed do //
T04TD3903E:251b-7: sa 'di la yang nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pa shin tu phra ba yang med do zhes pas 'dod pa lnga la yongs su longs spyod pa mi srid pa kho na ste /
T04TD3903E:251b-8: de lta na yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i rgyur byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams nye bar len te /
T04TD3903E:251b-9: de ltar ni bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa bdag cag gi byang chub sems dpa' don mthun pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i don du grags 'dzin ma dang sa skyong ma la sogs pa bud med stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams la so sor sku mngon par sprul nas de rnams thams cad dang rol to //
T04TD3903E:251b-10: gal te 'dod pa la sbyang pa bden pa ma yin na de'i tshe sgra gcan 'dzin sras yin pa yang bden pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:251b-11: mi bden pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:251b-12: sras rnams ni 'dod pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i rgyu las mngal du gnas shing skye ba kho na ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:251b-13: rdzus te skyes pa rnams kyang 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:251b-14: sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste /
T04TD3903E:251b-15: dgos pa'i dbang kho nar mang la du gnas pa'i rnam par bstan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:251b-16: 'phags pa chos 'phags sa bcu'i dbang phyug bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtsen pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ni bla na med pa'i yul can gyi dga' ba la dbang ba'i rten nyid kyis na 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin pa'i don du sems can mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyas par byed pa las te /
T04TD3903E:252a-0: bud med kyi dngos po dang ldan pa'i sems can @252a * //
T04TD3903E:252a-1: rnams kyis kyang rang dang gzhan gyi don rnam par dag pa'i ched du de'i 'khor gyi dngos po don du gnyer bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:252a-2: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs par yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:252a-4: sngags dang sman gyis yongs su gzung ba'i dug gis ltung bar byed mi nus so ;
T04TD3903E:252a-5: /'od srungs de bzhin du shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis ltung bar byed mi nus so zhes dang /
T04TD3903E:252a-7: grong khyer chen po'i ljan ljin gang de /
T04TD3903E:252a-8: bu ram shing gi zhing rnams dang rgun 'brum gyi zhing rnams la nye bar mkho bar gyur par 'gyur ro ;
T04TD3903E:252a-9: /'od srung de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i ljan ljin de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar mkho bar gyur par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:252a-10: sa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:252a-11: zil gyis gnon pa zil gyis mi gnon pa dang ;
T04TD3903E:252a-12: dbang nyid thob pa gtso bo ste /
T04TD3903E:252a-13: sems can rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa'i ched du las thams cad kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis rtsom mo //
T04TD3903E:252a-14: skad cig gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so sor thob po //
T04TD3903E:252a-15: de snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:252a-16: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:252a-17: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams g-yo bar byed snang bar yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:252a-18: de snyed kyi zhing rnams su yang 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:252a-19: de snyed kyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:252a-20: de snyed kyi bskal par gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:252a-21: de snyed kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par 'byed do //
T04TD3903E:252a-22: de snyed kyi lus ston to //
T04TD3903E:252a-23: lus so so la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de snyed do ;
T04TD3903E:252a-24: / de ltar sa brgyad pa la ye shes kyi las mngon par sgrub pa rnams kyis zhing yongs su dag pa rdzogs par byas nas dgu pa la sems can yongs su smin pa rdzogs par byed do //
T04TD3903E:252a-25: de yang 'di'i sems bskyed pa bcu gsum pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa nyi ma lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:252a-26: mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:252b-0: sa legs pa'i @252b blo gros kyang ste /
T04TD3903E:252b-1: gang gi phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis chos 'chad pa po nyid kyi phyir legs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:252b-2: de'i phyir legs pa'i blo gros so //
T04TD3903E:252b-3: de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams kyis chos smra ba po chen po'o //
T04TD3903E:252b-4: de ltar spobs pa mi chod pa can de'i sngon bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid yongs su rnam par smin pa 'khor ba ji srid par lhun gyis grub par sems can gyi don dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par byed do //
T04TD3903E:252b-5: de nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa'i spyod pa 'di nges pa'i spyod pa zhes brjod de /
T04TD3903E:252b-6: smon lam gyi stobs kyis mngon par grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:252b-7: spyod pa 'dis kyang yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:252b-8: rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir don yod pa'i spyod pa 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:252b-9: de nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma gcig la sems can gyi don gyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byas pa la snga ma'i spyod pa can rnams kyis bye ba stong phrag brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:252b-10: 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa grangs med pa 'bum thob pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa grangs med pa rnams kyi mdun du chos nyan cing thos nas kyang mi brjed do //
T04TD3903E:252b-11: ji skad du thos pa yang grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams thams cad du rgyas par bkang nas bsam pa dang mos ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can rnams la chos ston te /
T04TD3903E:252b-12: 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi stan la 'dug pas /
T04TD3903E:252b-13: 'dod na sgra skad brjod pas 'khor thams cad la sgra skad sna tshogs pa tshad med pas chos kyi sgo rnams go bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:252b-14: sgra sna tshogs dang dbyangs kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye ba rnams kyis yang na'o //
T04TD3903E:252b-15: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra la chos thams cad rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:252b-16: ba spu'i khung bu las dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par son pa'i gzugs la sogs @253a * //
T04TD3903E:253a-1: pa'i snang ba rnams las kyang ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-2: 'di ni mdor bsdus pa las 'di'i ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-3: de yang rnam pa gsum du yongs su rtogs par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-4: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-5: gsung phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-6: smra ba po phun sum tshogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:253a-7: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni gang theg pa gsum gyi dbye bas rnam par grol ba'i snod nyid la sogs pa ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-8: gang yang rigs dang dbang po'i rab tu dbye ba la sogs pa'i dbang du bya ba ni de'i yul lo //
T04TD3903E:253a-9: gsung phun sum tshogs pa ni so so yang dag par rig pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-10: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-11: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-12: de'i bshad pa ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-13: gang gi bsam pa ji lta ba de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-14: gang rnam grangs ji snyed pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba de ston pa'i phyir rjes su mthun pa ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-15: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnams ni mdo dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-22: de lta bu byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-25: chos rmad du byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-26: gtan la phab pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:253a-27: de la mdo sde ni gang rkyang pa rnams kyis don gsal bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-28: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa ni gang mdo kho na dbus dang mtha' mar tshigs su bcad pas dbyangs su bsnyad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-29: gang drang ba'i don gyi mdo de yang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-30: rtogs par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:253a-31: lung bstan pa ni gang du nyan thos 'das te dus byas pa dang 'byung ba lung ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-32: gang nges pa'i don gyi mdor yang ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-33: des rnam par phye nas dgongs pa 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:253a-34: tshigs su bcad pa ni gang tshigs bcad du gsungs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:253a-35: de ni rkang pa gnyis pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253a-40: ched du brjod pa ni gang yid rangs pas brjod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-41: gleng gzhi ni gang ched du byas nas gsungs pa'am byung ba dang ldan pa'i bslab pa bcas pa gsungs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-42: rtogs pa brjod pa ni dpe dang bcas par gsungs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253a-43: de lta bu byung ba ni gang sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-0: skyes pa'i rabs ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i @253b spyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-1: shin tu rgyas pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa ste /
T04TD3903E:253b-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:253b-3: rmad du byung ba'i chos ni gang du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-4: gtan la phab pa ni gang du chos kyi mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-5: smra ba po phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:253b-6: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-7: rab tu gsal bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-8: dris pa lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-10: de la gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni gzungs rnam pa bcu ste /
T04TD3903E:253b-13: mngon par shes pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-14: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-15: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang sems can bkren pa rjes su 'dzin pa nye bar sgrub pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-17: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sems can yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-18: chags pa med pa'i smon lam gyi gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-19: spobs pa mi zad pa'i gzungs dang /
T04TD3903E:253b-20: don sna tshogs la spobs pa'i gzungs so //
T04TD3903E:253b-21: 'di ni bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pa las nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yang ste /
T04TD3903E:253b-22: de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par smin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa las bya dka' ba thams cad la bya dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-23: de'i brtson 'grus shin tu chen po rtsom pas sgrub pa'i bskal pa mang po rnams bsnyil bar 'gyur te ;
T04TD3903E:253b-24: dper na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das sha'kya thub pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i /
T04TD3903E:253b-25: sangs rgyas nyer rgyal mnyes par byas pas bskal pa dgu bsnyil ba lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:253b-26: de bzhin du shin tu che ba'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub bzhin pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro ;
T04TD3903E:253b-27: / gang yang de ltar thams cad khas blangs nas su zhig gi yang bskal pa grangs med pa bsnyil bar mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa'i 'dod pa de 'phags pas khyad du bsad pa ni /
T04TD3903E:253b-28: 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T04TD3903E:254a-0: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do @254a * //
T04TD3903E:254a-1: nas ji srid du bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes pa'i bshad pas /
T04TD3903E:254a-2: gang gi phyir 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa ni sa drug pa la gnas pa ste sngar brjod pa'i rim pas bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa dang 'brel pa'i bskal pa bzang po nyid la gnas pa /
T04TD3903E:254a-3: de la yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ni /
T04TD3903E:254a-4: ci ltar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pa bsnyil ba ma yin /
T04TD3903E:254a-5: ci ste bskal pa bzang po la 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pas bcu gsol ba bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa'o zhen 'di las ci ste /
T04TD3903E:254a-6: gang gi phyir mthong bas thos pas drug pa gsol ba rnams bskal pa bzang po la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas na bskal ba grangs med pa bsnyil ba kho na'o zhes gnas so //
T04TD3903E:254a-7: de nyid kyi phyir phul du dbyung du med pa'i shin tu che ba'i brtson 'grus dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis sgrub bzhin pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ba nas ji srid bskal pa gcig la dang /
T04TD3903E:254a-8: skye ba nyung ngu'i sa dang /
T04TD3903E:254a-9: ji srid du skye ba 'di kho na la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes sngags kyi tshul las gsungs so ;
T04TD3903E:254a-10: / shas cher ye shes kyi snang ba 'di lta bu 'dzin par rtsom ste /
T04TD3903E:254a-11: de gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go re re la 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la chos ston zhing /
T04TD3903E:254a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang de snyed kyi sems can rnams la don tha dad pa can gyi chos ston te /
T04TD3903E:254a-13: sems can so so la'ang de snyed kyi chos rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:254a-14: skra'i rtse mo gcig la ji lta ba de ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad na ste /
T04TD3903E:254a-15: der bdag gis ji ltar skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba so sor nod pa de lta bu'i dran pa rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub par bya zhing /
T04TD3903E:254a-16: shes rab kyi snang ba rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa yongs su sbyangs nas skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rnams su sems can thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:254a-17: bskal pa gcig la yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma rnams mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:254b-2: phal cher stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:254b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ston pa la gtso bo yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:254b-4: 'dod na tshul de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
T04TD3903E:254b-5: gang skad cig gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab ji snyed pa'i grangs de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so sor thob po //
T04TD3903E:254b-6: de snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:254b-7: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:254b-8: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g-yo zhing snang bar yang 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-9: de snyed kyi zhing rnams su 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:254b-10: de snyed kyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do ;
T04TD3903E:254b-11: / de snyed kyi bskal par gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar yang 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:254b-12: de snyed kyi chos kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'byed do //
T04TD3903E:254b-13: de snyed kyi lus rnams ston te /
T04TD3903E:254b-14: lus so so la yang de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo 'di'i stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-15: de la bsam pa'i stobs ni nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-16: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs ni sa'i ye shes yongs su sbyangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-17: gzungs kyi stobs ni chos mi brjed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni rtag tu rnam par g-yeng ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-19: yang dag pa'i 'byor pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas shing mur thug pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spyod pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-20: dbang gi stobs ni yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-21: spobs pa'i stobs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-22: smon lam gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa la sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs ni bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:254b-24: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:254b-25: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i spyod pa mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-26: byams pa chen po'i stobs ni sems can thams cad bskyab pa la mchog tu sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-27: snying rje chen po'i stobs ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:254b-28: chos nyid kyi stobs ni sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i chos nyid mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:255a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs @255a * //
T04TD3903E:255a-1: pa'i stobs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa mdo sder bstan pa ni stobs rnams so //
T04TD3903E:255a-2: de ltar sa dgu pa la zhing yongs su dag pa dang sems can yongs su smin pa dag byas nas /
T04TD3903E:255a-3: sa bcu pa la shes bya mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes pas sems bskyed pa bcu bzhi pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni dri za'i glu snyan pa lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:255a-4: mi zad pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams kyis gdul bya 'dun par byed pa'i chos bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:255a-5: sa chos kyi sprin yang ste /
T04TD3903E:255a-6: gang gi phyir sa 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chos la rgyal tshab nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ba de'i phyir chos kyi sprin no //
T04TD3903E:255a-7: mi ha bran pa la ste gha nya'o //
T04TD3903E:255a-9: sprin chen po ltar 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i lo tog mngon par 'phel ba'i don du lhun gyis grub par chos thams cad kyi char pa 'bebs so zhes pas kyang chos kyi sprin no //
T04TD3903E:255a-10: sprin dang chos mthun pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:255a-11: khyab par byed pa las ni sa 'dir thob pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' bzhin du rten la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:255a-12: rdul rab tu zhi bar byed pa las ni chos des sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:255a-13: 'phel bar byed pa las ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis sems can gong du sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:255a-14: sprin gyi char pas lo tog 'phel bar byed pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:255a-15: de ltar ni 'phags pa sa bcu pa la sogs pa'i mdo sder bstan pa'i rim pas de ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu ji snyed pa'i mthar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:255a-16: gang mngon du gyur ma thag la stong gsum gyi mthar thug pa 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i tshad kyi rin po che chen po'i padma rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che las bskrun pa stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa dang ldan pa'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i 'khor can 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:255a-17: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang 'tsham par gnas so //
T04TD3903E:255a-18: de ting nge 'dzin de thob pa las padma de la 'dug par kun du snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:255b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig @255b rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la bskor nas blta zhing pad+ma'i 'khor de rnams la gnas so //
T04TD3903E:255b-1: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g-yo bar gyur to //
T04TD3903E:255b-2: ngan song thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /
T04TD3903E:255b-3: spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'du ba dang /
T04TD3903E:255b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang /
T04TD3903E:255b-5: sems can thams cad bde ba skye ba dang /
T04TD3903E:255b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jug pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang rnam par rig par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:255b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de'i zhabs kyi mthil dag las 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu byung nas phyogs bcu rnams su mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa rnams snang ba sngon ma can sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:255b-8: de bzhin du pus mo gnyis nas dud 'gro rnams so //
T04TD3903E:255b-9: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas yi dags rnams so //
T04TD3903E:255b-10: rtsi ba logs dag nas mi rnams so //
T04TD3903E:255b-11: phyag dag nas lha dang lha ma yin rnams so //
T04TD3903E:255b-12: phrag pa dag nas nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:255b-13: chos snang ba'i sgo nye bar sgrub pa'o //
T04TD3903E:255b-14: rgyab dang mgrin pa las rang sangs rgyas rnams te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i tshul lo //
T04TD3903E:255b-15: zhal gyi sgo nas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste ji srid sa dgu pa rjes su thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T04TD3903E:255b-16: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:255b-17: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la nub par 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:255b-18: steng du yan lag dam pa las stong gsum grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs bcu rnams su nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams snang bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:255b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams la lan bcur bskor ba byas nas /
T04TD3903E:255b-20: steng gi bar snang la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams byas te /
T04TD3903E:255b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gror bya ba 'jug par byed do //
T04TD3903E:256a-0: @256a * // phyogs bcu rnams na ma lus pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du gtogs pa'i me tog la sogs ba dang /
T04TD3903E:256a-1: gdugs dang na bza' dang rin po che'i rgyan la sogs par gdags pa ji snyed pa de las shin tu 'das pa bkod pa sna tshogs pa rin po che la sogs pa'i char rnams de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sprin chen po rnams bzhin du char 'bab po //
T04TD3903E:256a-2: mchod pa de rnams sems can gang rnams kyis shes pa de rnams thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:256a-3: de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil rnams su nub par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:256a-4: phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams de rnams nas kyang sa dgu pa ji srid pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa rnams lhags nas /
