T04TD3903E:256a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de la yang dag par mchod pa de blta zhing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la snyoms par 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:256a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de'i yang thugs ka na gnas pa'i mtshan dpal gyi be 'u dang rdo rje dang bkra shis las /
T04TD3903E:256a-7: bdud kyi dgra thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu'i 'khor can spros nas phyogs bcu rnams snang bar byas shing cho 'phrul mu med pa rnams yang dag par bstan te /
T04TD3903E:256a-8: slar log nas dpal gyi be'u dang rdo rje dang bkra shis kho na la nub par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:256a-9: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthu stong 'gyur las lhag par mngon par 'phel lo //
T04TD3903E:256a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu rnams nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer grangs med pa'i 'khor can rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' med pa rnams snang bar byas nas /
T04TD3903E:256a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams yang dag par bstan zhing /
T04TD3903E:256a-12: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa rnams bskul te /
T04TD3903E:256a-13: phyir log nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag mchog la nub par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:256a-14: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams ni 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:256a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la /
T04TD3903E:256b-0: ye @256b shes chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur bzhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:256b-1: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yang 'thob po //
T04TD3903E:256b-2: rang gi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas kyang lus sna tshogs pa rnams kyis skad cig gcig la phyogs bcu rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams na rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bkang nas /
T04TD3903E:256b-3: dge ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char gyis bsam pa ji lta bar sems can rnams kyi thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi mi shes pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:256b-4: de'i phyir sa 'di chos kyi sprin zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:256b-5: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su yang dga' ldan gyi pho brang du bzhugs pa nas bzung nas ji srid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang gdul bya ji lta ba rnams la byin gyis rlob po //
T04TD3903E:256b-6: ye shes kyi dbang de lta bu dang ldan zhing shin tu rnam par brtags pa'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po can de 'dod na kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongs su dag pa nyid du byin gyis rlob po //
T04TD3903E:256b-7: yongs su dag pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyid du'o //
T04TD3903E:256b-8: dog pa ni yangs pa nyid du'o //
T04TD3903E:256b-9: yangs pa ni dog pa nyid du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:256b-10: rdul phra rab gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams byin gyis rlob ste /
T04TD3903E:256b-11: rdul phra rab de yang 'phel ba med la bya ba de rnams kyang kun du ston to //
T04TD3903E:256b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i bkod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:256b-13: de na gang sems can yod pa rnams kyang kun du ston to //
T04TD3903E:256b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bkod pa dang der sems can gang yod pa rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams su'o //
T04TD3903E:256b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gnas pa'i sems can rnams skra'i khyon gcig tu ste /
T04TD3903E:256b-16: de rnams la gnod pa yang med do //
T04TD3903E:256b-17: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi bkod pa grangs med pa yang skra'i khyon gcig tu'o //
T04TD3903E:256b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams na rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi lus rnams skad cig gcig la sprul par byed do //
T04TD3903E:257a-0: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa rnams dang de snyed kyi mgo bo so so la de snyed kyi lce rnams kyang ston par @257a * //
T04TD3903E:257a-2: lag pa de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu rnams su bde ba can dang padma can dang 'od zer can la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas mchod pa la rab tu sbyor ro //
T04TD3903E:257a-3: lag pa re res kyang gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa nyid me tog gi phur ma rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la 'thor ro //
T04TD3903E:257a-4: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa nas ji srid na bza' dang gdugs dang rin po che la sogs pa'i bkod pa'i bar du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:257a-5: lce de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang gsol ba 'debs pa yang byed de bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar 'os par chos bstan du gsol zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:257a-6: gang yang sems can gyi bya ba rdzogs pa lta bu /
T04TD3903E:257a-7: thabs kyis gdul bya rnams brtson par bya ba'i ched du mya ngan las 'das pa ston par bzhed pa mya ngan las 'das par bab pa med pa de rnams la /
T04TD3903E:257a-8: 'gro ba ma lus pa la dge ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phan pa'i ched dang mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu grub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba'i ched du /
T04TD3903E:257a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bskal par bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs su gsol zhes bsnyen bkur byas shing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba 'debs par byed do //
T04TD3903E:257a-10: sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu khyab par 'gro ste mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bkod pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bkod pa ji srid pa rnams byin gyis rlob po //
T04TD3903E:257a-11: dus gsum gyi lus tshad med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:257a-12: rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa grangs med pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:257a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang chags pa thams cad kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:257a-14: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'byin te sems can rnams la gnod pa yang med do //
T04TD3903E:257a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa'i chu'i phung po gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T04TD3903E:257a-16: der yang padma chen po dang padma de'i 'od kyi bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par khyab par byed do //
T04TD3903E:257a-17: der yang byang chub kyi shing chen po ston par byed pa nas rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:257b-0: rang gi lus @257b la yang phyogs bcu rnams kyi nor bu dang gleg dang zla ba'i 'od nas ji srid 'od dang snang ba'i bkod pa thams cad kyi bar du byin gyis rlob po //
T04TD3903E:257b-1: kha'i dbugs kyis phyogs re re 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa g-yo par byed de /
T04TD3903E:257b-2: sems can rnams skrag par yang mi byed do //
T04TD3903E:257b-3: phyogs bcu'i rlung gis 'jig pa dang chus 'jig pa dang mes 'jig par yang byin gyis rlob po //
T04TD3903E:257b-4: rang gi lus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur dang /
T04TD3903E:257b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
T04TD3903E:257b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa mtha' yas pa tshad med pa grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa'i rnam par rol pa rnams ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:257b-7: 'di'i yang ye shes kyi snang ba ni sems can rnams ji srid du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar la gzhug pa'i ched du gnas pa ni /
T04TD3903E:257b-8: sa dgu pa ji srid pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de las gzhan pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so //
T04TD3903E:257b-9: gang gi phyir 'di'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che bas so //
T04TD3903E:257b-10: de yang phal cher gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rgyal por 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:257b-11: sems can rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la byad ba dang gtso bo yin zhing 'dod na rnam pa de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
T04TD3903E:257b-12: gang las skad cig gcig gis phyogs bcu'i grangs med pa las 'das pa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob po //
T04TD3903E:257b-13: de snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:257b-14: de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so //
T04TD3903E:257b-15: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams g-yo zhing snang bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:257b-16: de snyed kyi lus ston zhing /
T04TD3903E:257b-18: de snyed kyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:257b-19: de snyed kyi bskal par gnas shing sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go //
T04TD3903E:257b-20: de snyed kyi chos sgo rnams rnam par 'byed do ;
T04TD3903E:257b-21: / de snyed kyi lus ston zhing /
T04TD3903E:257b-22: lus dang lus la yang de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ro //
T04TD3903E:258a-0: lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga re rer yang grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la 'khor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa can rnams skad cig skad cig la rnam pa gzhan @258a * //
T04TD3903E:258a-1: dang gzhan yang ston par byed de /
T04TD3903E:258a-2: rnam par rtog pa la dpyod pa med pa kho nar ro //
T04TD3903E:258a-3: de las gzhan lha dang mi la sogs pa 'gro ba lnga'i dbye ba tha dad pa yang 'khor bar tha dad pa med par te /
T04TD3903E:258a-4: brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyod ba la sogs pa dang nyan thos ngang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'bad pa med pa kho nar /
T04TD3903E:258a-5: brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs su byas nas chos ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:258a-6: sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bu'i chos la mos pa ni ji skad du bcom ldan 'das ma bar mar mthar thug par 'gro ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan nges par bstan par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:258a-7: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang sgra brnyan dang gzugs brnyan dang sbrul pa lta bu'i chos la lhag par mos pa rnams kyis shes so //
T04TD3903E:258a-8: 'dir dpe brgyad kyis mtshan nyid brgyad rnams gsal bar byas te ;
T04TD3903E:258a-9: 'di lta ste stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin med pa dang snang brnyan dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang kun brtags dang /
T04TD3903E:258a-10: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rnams so //
T04TD3903E:258a-11: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dar gyi yol bas bar du chod pa tsam du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'di'i yongs su dag pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:258a-12: cig car gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lus yang dag par ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:258a-13: skyil krung gcig gis zhing thams cad khyab pa dang /
T04TD3903E:258a-14: rang gi lus kyi rdul phra rab re re la yang zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang sems can gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'chags pa la sogs pa yang dag par ston zhing /
T04TD3903E:258a-15: rdul phra rab de rnams cher song ba yang ma yin la /
T04TD3903E:258a-16: sangs rgyas la sogs pa de rnams chung ba nyid dam 'dres pa yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:258a-17: de rnams dang der de ltar phan tshun dog pa med pa kho nar bzhugs pa ni gzhan du zhing yangs pa rnams su ji lta ba bzhin no zhes pa la sogs pa sku'i las rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:258a-18: gsung gcig gis gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bar chos bstan pa thos par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:258a-19: dbyangs gcig gis zhing khams thams cad khyab pa dang /
T04TD3903E:258b-0: @258b dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor re rer dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa ngag gi las rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:258b-1: ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa yid kyi phrin las rnams dang mdor bsdu na /
T04TD3903E:258b-2: gom pa 'degs pa dang 'jog pa'i las rnams kyang ji srid byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dam pa thob pa sa legs pa'i blo gros la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shes par sla ba ma yin na gzhan rnams kyis lta ci smos /
T04TD3903E:258b-3: de nyid kyi phyir bar mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:258b-4: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa kho na zhes par brjod par bya'o shes so //
T04TD3903E:258b-5: 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdor yang /
T04TD3903E:258b-6: sa bcu pa las pha rol gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar brjod par bya'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:258b-7: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas sems can rnams la so sor nye bar gnas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pas ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:258b-8: 'phags pa byams pas kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:258b-9: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang las dang //
T04TD3903E:258b-10: rnam rtog thams cad bral pa'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:258b-11: de ni lus can smin ched du //
T04TD3903E:258b-12: slar yang 'bad pa byed ma yin //
T04TD3903E:258b-13: ston dang gzugs sku dag dang ni //
T04TD3903E:258b-14: spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung //
T04TD3903E:258b-15: gang zhig gang gis ji ltar 'dul //
T04TD3903E:258b-16: de 'dis de ltar kho nar shes //
T04TD3903E:258b-17: de ltar nam mkha'i mtha' klas kyi //
T04TD3903E:258b-18: 'gro la rtag tu lhun grub par //
T04TD3903E:258b-19: thogs med blo ldan de yis ni //
T04TD3903E:258b-20: sems can don ni yang dag 'jug ;
T04TD3903E:258b-21: / byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa 'di //
T04TD3903E:258b-22: thob pa de bzhin gshegs rnams dang //
T04TD3903E:258b-23: sems can yang dag sgrol ba la //
T04TD3903E:258b-24: 'jig rten rnams na mnyam pa nyid //
T04TD3903E:258b-25: 'on kyang sa gzhi rdul phran dang //
T04TD3903E:258b-26: rgya mtsho ba lang rmig rjes kyi //
T04TD3903E:258b-27: khyad par gang yin sangs rgyas dang//
T04TD3903E:258b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i khyad de yin //
T04TD3903E:258b-30: de ltar 'di'i yon tan rnams mdor bsdus pa bstan pa ste /
T04TD3903E:258b-31: rgyas par ni bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag du mas kyang mthar thug pa med pa'i rnam pas blta bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:259a-0: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar re zhig sa chos @259a * //
T04TD3903E:259a-1: kyi sprin 'di kho na bskal pa tshad med par bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan par zad na /
T04TD3903E:259a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa lta ci smos /
T04TD3903E:259a-3: kye rgyal ba'i sras de gal te phyogs bcu rnams su phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang bar gyur kyang /
T04TD3903E:259a-4: de rnams kyis bskal pa mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas ni /
T04TD3903E:259a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig gcig las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi yang ji skad bye ba khrag khri 'bum gyi cha dang grangs dang /
T04TD3903E:259a-6: rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:259a-7: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di sa bcu pa 'di kho na'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bco lnga pa la sogs pa sems bskyed pa drug rnams mngon par sgrub po //
T04TD3903E:259a-8: de la sems bskyed pa bco lnga pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ni rgyal po chen po lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:259a-9: mthu thogs pa med pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:259a-10: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:259a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu rnams su mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su 'gro'o //
T04TD3903E:259a-12: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pa'i chu'i phung po gang de thams cad skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' brgyar gshags pa'i chas 'phen par byed la de la brten pa'i srog chags rnams la gnod pa med do //
T04TD3903E:259a-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskal par bsregs pa'i me 'bar ba kha'i dbugs kyis rab tu zhi bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:259a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bskyod pa chen po sor mo'i tshigs kyi rtse mo gcig gis gnon par byed do //
T04TD3903E:259a-15: nam mkha'i khams skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byed do //
T04TD3903E:259a-16: ri rab chen po la sogs pa'i ri bo rnams skra nyag ma gcig gis bcings te 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par 'phen par byed do //
T04TD3903E:259b-0: phyogs bcu rnams su so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du @259b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lha'i mig gis blta'o //
T04TD3903E:259b-1: de rnams kyi chos bstan pa yang lha'i rna bas nyan no //
T04TD3903E:259b-2: sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa rnams shes so //
T04TD3903E:259b-3: de rnams kyi yang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no //
T04TD3903E:259b-4: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub la /
T04TD3903E:259b-5: yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed pa yang ma yin no zhes so //
T04TD3903E:259b-6: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la sogs pa'i mthu 'di 'dra ba yang dad par dka' ba ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:259b-7: bsam gtan pa rnams kyi yang dag par ston pa khyab bdag nyid 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:259b-8: sems bskyed pa 'di ni ston pa mi zad pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:259b-9: de la don la rton gyi legs par sbyar ba la sogs pa'i tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:259b-11: de la rton gyi gnas brtan la sogs pa'i gang zag la ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:259b-12: bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni ye shes te /
T04TD3903E:259b-13: de la rton gyi rnam par shes pa thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag la ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:259b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad ma mchog ste /
T04TD3903E:259b-15: des na nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang yin pa de la rton gyi drang ba'i don la ma yin pa'o zhes pa rton pa bzhi rnams so //
T04TD3903E:259b-16: sems bskyed pa bcu drug la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa ni bang mdzod lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:259b-17: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mang po'i mdzod de gnas nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:259b-18: sems bskyed pa bcu bdun pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa ni lam po che lta bu ste 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:259b-19: sems bskyed pa bco brgyad pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan pa ni bzhon pa lta bu ste de zung du 'brel par 'gro ba nyid kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang rung bar mi ltung bar bde blag tu 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:259b-20: sems bskyed pa bcu dgu pa gzungs dang spobs pa dang ldan pa ni bkod ma'i chu lta bu ste chu 'dzin zhing mi zad par 'byin pa dang chos mthun par thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos dang don 'dzin zhing mi zad par ston par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:260a-0: sems bskyed pa nyi shu pa chos kyi sdom dang ldan pa ni kun dga'i @260a * //
T04TD3903E:260a-1: sgra lta bu ste thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya rnams la snyan par sgrogs pa'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:260a-2: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:260a-3: byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu so sor dus ring por mun pas 'thoms pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar rnams lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas der skyes pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs par byed cing /
T04TD3903E:260a-4: de rnams kyang yang dag par lta ba la so sor bgrod par byed do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:260a-5: de la chos kyi sdom rnams ni 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:260a-6: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal ba dang /
T04TD3903E:260a-7: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o zhes pa so sor rtogs pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:260a-8: de la mi rtag pa ni rtag tu med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:260a-9: med pa'i don ni mi rtag pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:260a-10: kun rdzob tu skad cig gis 'jig pa'i don yang mi rtag pa'i don no //
T04TD3903E:260a-11: rnam par rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni zhi ba'o zhes pa mdor bsdus te sa'i yon tan rnam par gzhag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:260a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:260a-13: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams te /
T04TD3903E:260a-14: mdor bsdus nas bstan pas bstan gyi rgyas par ni bskal pa mtha' yas par ston par byin gyis brlabs pa las rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:260a-15: gang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsungs pa de rnams kyang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po rnams te ;
T04TD3903E:260a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba rnams su blta bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:260a-17: rim gyis mngon du phyogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:260a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang skad cig gcig kho na la bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:260a-19: ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa tha dad na yang /
T04TD3903E:260a-20: mi sgrib pa nyid du mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:260a-21: der son pa'i nam mkha' tha mi dad pa de bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'i dngos po tha dang na yang der son pa'i de kho na nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can tha mi dad pa'i phyir de kho na nyid gcig kho nar shes par bya zhing /
T04TD3903E:260b-0: de yang shes pa'i @260b skad cig gcig kho nas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:260b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang sems bskyed pa gnyis te ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:260b-2: de la sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang ldan pa ste /
T04TD3903E:260b-3: bla na med pa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas na sa de pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi rang gi ngo bo'i sems de'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba las byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu dang bya ba dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam mo //
T04TD3903E:260b-4: de dang ldan pa ni chu'i rgyun lta bu ste rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:260b-5: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ni 'dres pa dang nye bar 'dres pa nyid kyis mi g-yo ba nas bzung nas te 'on kyang 'di ni bla na med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:260b-6: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ldan pa'i sprin lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:260b-7: sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba rnams de las 'jug pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:260b-8: sprin las snod kyi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs pa rnams bzhin du'o //
T04TD3903E:260b-9: thabs la mkhas pa mi zad pa yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa la sogs pa kun du ston pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:260b-10: de ltar yang bstan bcos kyang //
T04TD3903E:260b-11: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste //
T04TD3903E:260b-12: 'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin //
T04TD3903E:260b-14: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:260b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni rnam par thar pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin las can te /
T04TD3903E:260b-16: 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgyar cig car chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:260b-17: thabs la mkhas pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dag gam /
T04TD3903E:260b-18: de las skyes pa'i las la mkhas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:260b-19: ci'i phyir dga' ldan du bzhugs pa kun du ston gyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams su ma yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:260b-20: mi khom pa nas 'dir 'ongs pa bdag cag gi rgyu mtshan du ni ma yin pa kho na'o zhes rim gro mang du mi byed pa yongs su spong ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:260b-21: ci'i phyir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du ma yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:260b-22: nus pa yod kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i skye ba spangs nas sems can la thugs brtse bas dga' ldan du skyes so zhes rim gro mang du lhag par bskyed pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-1: mi rnams su ma yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:261a-2: lha'i bde ba spangs nas bdag cag la thugs brtse bas mir byon no zhes rim gro mang du lhag par bskyed pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-3: ci'i phyir mngal du gnas pa ston zhe na /
T04TD3903E:261a-4: rigs mthun pa spro ba bskyed pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-5: ci'i phyir rang nyid mngon par byang chub pa bstan gyi /
T04TD3903E:261a-6: sangs rgyas gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa ma yin zhe na //
T04TD3903E:261a-7: skyes bu'i byed pa la sbyor ba'i don du ste /
T04TD3903E:261a-8: gzhan la rag las pas mi 'grub ces pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-9: ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gnas pas gnas she na /
T04TD3903E:261a-10: de mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa thun mong ma yin par gsal bar bya ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-11: ci'i don du gzhan gyi don du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyi ma bdun du 'das par mdzad ce na /
T04TD3903E:261a-12: bdag nyid chos kyi kun dga' dgyes pa chen po nyid gsal bar bya ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-13: de yang ci'i don du zhe na /
T04TD3903E:261a-14: sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang gus pa yang dag par 'phel ba'i don du ste /
T04TD3903E:261a-15: da ltar gyur kyang de 'dra ba'i dgyes pa spangs nas sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas chos ston par byed do zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-16: ci'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur ce na /
T04TD3903E:261a-17: yongs su skom pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas chos la gus par bya ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-18: de las tshangs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-19: ci'i phyir 'ga' zhig tu gsol ba ma btab pa kho nar ston par rtsom zhe na /
T04TD3903E:261a-20: gzhan du na ci ston par bzhed pa'am zhes 'di'i ston par bzhed pa nyid mi shes pas so //
T04TD3903E:261a-21: cis yang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la bstan pa'i ched du byin gyis rlob par byed ce na /
T04TD3903E:261a-22: de'i rigs rnams spro ba yang dag par 'phel ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-23: byin gyis rlob pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:261a-24: sku'i phyag gis reg pa las sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261a-25: kha cig tu ni gsung gis so //
T04TD3903E:261a-26: kha cig tu ni thugs kyis so //
T04TD3903E:261a-27: kha cig tu ni gsum kas kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:261a-28: ci'i don du 'od zer dang bcas pa'i cho 'phrul dang gsol ba 'debs pa ston par byed ce na /
T04TD3903E:261a-29: las kyi khyad par gyi don du ste /
T04TD3903E:261b-0: 'od zer de ni las brgyad dang lus @261b gnyis can no //
T04TD3903E:261b-1: de la yang dag par sad par byed pa'i las can ni /
T04TD3903E:261b-2: gang des reg pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pas skyes pa'i stobs snang bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-3: sdud pa dang 'gyed pa'i las ni grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bkye nas 'od 'dom gang tsam du bsdus pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-4: rgyu nyid kyi las ni grangs med pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi rgyu nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:261b-5: ston par byed pa'i las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang der gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-6: rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i las ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:261b-7: zil gyis gnon pa'i las can ni bdud thams cad kyi mthu dman par byed pa ste skrag cing brtabs pas gdul bya rnams la bgegs byed pa la mi 'jug pa'o ;
T04TD3903E:261b-8: /'dun par byed pa'i las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phrin las dang mthu gsal bar byed pa las so //
T04TD3903E:261b-9: gsol ba 'debs pa'i las ni tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra 'byin pa las so //
T04TD3903E:261b-10: lus gnyis ji ltar zhe na /
T04TD3903E:261b-11: skar mda' lta bu'i lus ni gang gi tshe khams gzhan du 'gyed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-12: nyi ma lta bu'i lus ni gang gi tshe sprin gyi dra ba mthug po'i khang pa brtsegs pa byas nas thams cad gnas te gcig gi mthus so sor snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:261b-13: de ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams su gcig tu gyur pa bzhin du phan tshun mthong bas bstan pa yang sla bar 'gyur la nyan pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:261b-14: gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das pa'i lung ston par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe 'od zer rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu nub par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:261b-15: 'on te ma 'ongs pa ma yin na mdun du'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-16: dmyal bar skye ba ni zhabs kyi mthil du'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-17: byol song du skye ba ni zhabs kyi rting par ro //
T04TD3903E:261b-18: yi dags su skye ba ni zhabs kyi mthe bong la'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-19: mir skye ba ni pus mo dag la'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-20: stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-21: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du'o //
T04TD3903E:261b-22: lhar skye ba ni lte bar ro//
T04TD3903E:262a-0: @262a * // nyan thos kyi byang chub ni zhal du'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni smin mtshams su'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni gtsug tor du'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:262a-3: ci'i don du spyod lam bzhi dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-6: nang du yang dag par 'jog pas gnas pa ste /
T04TD3903E:262a-9: bya ba dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bzhi rnams kyis gnas she na /
T04TD3903E:262a-10: gnas pa thams cad kyis 'phags pa thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phan 'dogs pa chen po rab tu 'jug pa las so //
T04TD3903E:262a-11: gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'i dbang las bcom ldan 'das kyi nang du yang dag par 'jog pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo las ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:262a-12: ci'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te /
T04TD3903E:262a-13: rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhe na /
T04TD3903E:262a-14: 'di tsam gyis 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:262a-15: de la chos ni bstan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-16: de nyid 'khor lo ste gdul bya'i rgyud rnams la 'khor bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
T04TD3903E:262a-18: de gsum du bzlas pa ni /
T04TD3903E:262a-22: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes bden pa bzhi'i rang bzhin yongs su gcad pa ni lam dang po'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-23: de kho na rim pa ji lta bar yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-24: rab tu spang bar bya ba dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-26: bsgom par bya ba 'di tsam nyid du yongs su gcad pa ni lan gnyis pa'o//
T04TD3903E:262a-27: de kho na'i bdag nyid kyis yongs su shes pa spangs pa dang mngon du byas pa dang bsgoms zin pa nyid du yongs su gcad pa ni gsum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-28: de'i phyir de ni lan gsum du bskor ba'o //
T04TD3903E:262a-29: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-30: yongs su shes par bya ba nyid dang yongs su shes pa nyid ces pa rnam pa gsum dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-31: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i de'i rang bzhin dang spong bar bya ba nyid dang spangs pa nyid ces pa gsum dang /
T04TD3903E:262a-32: 'gog pa'i bden pa'i de'i rang bzhin dang mngon du bya ba nyid dang mngon du byas pa nyid ces pa gsum dang /
T04TD3903E:262b-0: lam gyi bden pa'i @262b de'i rang bzhin dang bsgom par bya ba dang bsgom pa nyid ces pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:262b-1: de'i phyir de ni rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
T04TD3903E:262b-2: yang na 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
T04TD3903E:262b-4: yongs su shes so zhes pa lan gsum du bskor ba'o //
T04TD3903E:262b-5: so so la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang yang dag pa'i don can nyid kyi phyir rig pa dang mi slob pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi blo 'byung ba'i phyir zhes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rnams so //
T04TD3903E:262b-6: de ltar bden pa so so la ste gsum dang bcu gnyis su chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:262b-7: lam gsum dang rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
T04TD3903E:262b-8: chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bstan pa las so //
T04TD3903E:262b-9: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi spyod pa re re'i gnyen po gzhung ji snyed kyis yongs su rdzogs pa de snyed kyi gzhung gi phung po ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes pa chos kyi phung po stong phrag rnams so //
T04TD3903E:262b-10: ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs she na /
T04TD3903E:262b-11: le lo can rnams myur ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:262b-12: bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
T04TD3903E:262b-13: lnga brgya pa tha ma ji srid par ro //
T04TD3903E:262b-14: brgya phrag lnga rnams 'dus pa ni lnga brgya pa'o //
T04TD3903E:262b-15: tha ma ni lnga brgya pa lnga pa ste /
T04TD3903E:262b-16: lnga brgya pa lngar dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gsung las te dam pa'i chos sgrub pa nyams pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T04TD3903E:262b-17: gzhan rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i dus ni lo stong phrag lnga rnams te /
T04TD3903E:262b-18: de rnams brgya phrag lnga lnga rnams kyis phyed mar byas pa ni lnga brgya pa bcu rnams su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:262b-20: sngon la re zhig rtogs pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus dang lung gi dus zhes pa gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:262b-21: slar yang so sor rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:262b-22: dgra bcom pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:262b-23: lhag mthong dang ting nge 'dzin dang tshul khrims dang chos mngon pa dang /
T04TD3903E:262b-24: mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i sde snod kyi dus te /
T04TD3903E:262b-25: dgu po rnam grangs ji lta bar lnga brgya pa dgu rnams la'o //
T04TD3903E:262b-26: bcu pa'i dus ni rtags tsam ste /
T04TD3903E:263a-3: ye shes lnga po rnams kyang sngar ni mdor bsdus pas rnam par gzhag la /
T04TD3903E:263a-5: de la dang po ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang bdag nyid gcig pa'i ye shes so //
T04TD3903E:263a-6: de yang chos kyi rnam grangs mtha' dag thos pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pa las /
T04TD3903E:263a-7: sa ma lus pa sgom pa'i rgyu can rtag tu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i ched du nye bar gnas pa ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rjes su song ba dang /
T04TD3903E:263a-8: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol ba ni /
T04TD3903E:263a-9: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:263a-10: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:263a-11: phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T04TD3903E:263a-12: 'phags pa'i chos thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu dang /
T04TD3903E:263a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:263a-14: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin la /
T04TD3903E:263a-15: chos kyi dbyings kyang de bzhin nyid yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:263a-16: de yang chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin na /
T04TD3903E:263a-17: chos kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams te so so rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:263a-18: de'i rjes su son pa'i chos kyi dbyings ci ltar tha dad pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:263a-19: tha dad pa de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:263a-20: tha dad par gyur na yang ji ltar spyi'i mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:263a-21: dper na nam mkha' dngos po med pa bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi rjes su son kyang tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:263a-22: bum pa'i nam mkha' dang snam bu'i nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ni tha snyad tsam mo //
T04TD3903E:263a-23: de bzhin du chos nyid de'i bdag nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi rjes su son yang tha dad pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:263a-24: spros pa ma lus pa las ldog pa ni chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:263a-25: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid nas ji srid du rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa ni khyad par gzhan spangs pas tha snyad tsam mo //
T04TD3903E:263a-26: khyad par gzhan mi spong ba ni rab 'byor gzugs stong pa'o nas rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes pa'i bar kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:263b-1: de ni stong pa nyid du brjod //
T04TD3903E:263b-2: de ni brten nas brtags pa'o //
T04TD3903E:263b-3: dbu ma yi ni lam nyid do //
T04TD3903E:263b-5: gang phyir dben pa dben gyur las //
T04TD3903E:263b-6: tha mi dad pa nyid du 'dod //
T04TD3903E:263b-7: ces pa'i rigs pa las so //
T04TD3903E:263b-8: don dam par ni chos kyi dbyings 'dir rang gi ngo bo spong ba'am ngo bo gzhan nye bar len pa ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:263b-10: ldog pa rang bzhin med nyid phyir //
T04TD3903E:263b-11: tha dad tha dad med rtag min //
T04TD3903E:263b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:263b-14: nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes brjod de /
T04TD3903E:263b-15: nam mkha' ni brjod du med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:263b-16: de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces brjod de stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:263b-17: chos bstan pa don med par thal ba yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:263b-18: de rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:263b-19: brgyud par phrin gyi yi ge mthong bas don rtogs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa gang brjod du med pa'i don brjod pas gsal bar byed pa de 'di nam mkha' la tshon gyi ri mo 'god pa bzhin du shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T04TD3903E:263b-21: blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste skyes bu 'ga' zhig kho na nam mkha' gzugs med pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'di tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:263b-22: ji srid du blo gros rgya mtsho de bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa ste /
T04TD3903E:263b-23: gang brjod du med pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas brjod pas sems can pha rol rnams la rnam par rig par byed pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i bar du'o //
T04TD3903E:263b-24: chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa 'di yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad du dbyer med par 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:263b-25: ji ltar rang gi sems rnam par dag par yongs su grub cing rtag tu rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rang bzhin yongs su dag pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su 'jug pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:263b-26: 'on kyang glo bur ba'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par gzhag par mi bya'o //
T04TD3903E:264a-0: de'i tshe yang skyon rnams kyis @264a * //
T04TD3903E:264a-1: gos pa yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:264a-2: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264a-3: gang gi phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa ni skyon rnams te sun dbyung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir dang sems dri ma can du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264a-4: de rnams kyang glo bur ba ste brtags pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264a-5: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams spang bar bya ba ste rang bzhin ni spang bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264a-7: sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:264a-8: ji ltar nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag kyang mig ma dag pa rnams la rab rib la sogs pas nye bar bcom pa las rnam par ma dag par snang ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag kyang rang gi rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan las shes rab kyi mig ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis nye bar bcom pa rnams la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yang phyin ci log tu snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:264a-9: rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i shes rab kyi spyan can rnams ni de ltar mi dgongs so //
T04TD3903E:264a-10: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa de yang rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa ni /
T04TD3903E:264a-11: khyad par med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku bstan par bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:264a-12: de kho na don dam par de bzhin gshegs par brjod do //
T04TD3903E:264a-13: dus thams cad du de bzhin kho nar yod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264a-14: de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud rnams la yang yod pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:264a-15: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:264a-16: thams cad la gnas kyang de sems can rnams kyi rang gi sgrib pa'i stobs bskyed pa las dmus long gis nyi ma bzhin du mi mthong ngo //
T04TD3903E:264a-17: ji skad du theg pa chen po bsdus par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:264a-18: snod chag pa yi zla ba bzhin //
T04TD3903E:264a-19: sems can skyon can la snang min //
T04TD3903E:264a-21: / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin na de ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul can yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'bad rtsol med pas ci ltar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu can gyi ye shes rnams skyed par byed ce na /
T04TD3903E:264b-2: nam mkha' ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams skye ba la gegs mi byed pa'i ngo bos skabs ster bar byed cing rnam par rtog par yang mi byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:264b-3: dper na zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgron ma la sogs pa rnams kyi 'od zer rnams de la 'bad rtsol med par skyes nas gzugs la sogs pa rnams rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:264b-4: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnams kyang 'bad rtsol dang bral bar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa ni 'bad pa med par don thams cad mdzad par rnam par gzhag ste /
T04TD3903E:264b-5: de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lnga la sogs pa thams cad bskyed pa la rgyu mtshan gyi dngos por 'gyur ba'am /
T04TD3903E:264b-6: ye shes kyi sprul pa longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams thams cad la nam mkha' bzhin du go skabs 'byin par byed do //
T04TD3903E:264b-7: mi zad pa nyid kyis rgya che ba nyid kyi phyir dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa las kyang sngon gyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i dbang las de'i bdag nyid rkyen gyis skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:264b-8: 'di kho na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo ste /
T04TD3903E:264b-9: gang mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan pa rnams 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas chos kyi sku'i gnas skabs las rnam par rtog pa med pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:264b-10: sprul pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:264b-11: gal te yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'di ni bya ba'o //
T04TD3903E:264b-12: 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med mod /
T04TD3903E:264b-13: de lta na yang sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang las rab tu nges par bzung nas /
T04TD3903E:264b-14: gnyid sad pa bzhin dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba bzhin du /
T04TD3903E:264b-15: ji skad brjod pa'i bya ba rnams rab tu mkhyen te /
T04TD3903E:264b-16: ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos nges par bstan par gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:265a-2: 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
T04TD3903E:265a-3: gand'i'i sgra de'i rna bar nye bar ltung ba yang ma yin la rnam par rtog par byed pa yang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:265a-4: 'on kyang ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265a-5: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa de yang ye shes dang sprul pa thams cad kyis sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa la dbyer med par 'jug gi / skye ba dang 'gag pa dag ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:265a-6: de kho na mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:265a-7: 'jam dpal skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa zhes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:265a-8: lha'i bu chos thams cad skye ba med pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste /
T04TD3903E:265a-9: de lta na thob pa med do //
T04TD3903E:265a-10: mngon par rtogs pa med do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265a-11: gzugs la sogs pa don dam par de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo can rnams la yang skye ba la sogs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa la kun rdzob tu ni rnam par gzhag go //
T04TD3903E:265a-12: de bzhin du ye shes dang sprul pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:265a-13: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na /
T04TD3903E:265a-14: de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar sgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa dang bzhud pa dang 'byon par byed pas ;
T04TD3903E:265a-15: de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyang smra ba dang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar thal bas cig shos dang 'dra bar rnam par dag pa med pa dang skye ba la sogs par thal lo zhe na /
T04TD3903E:265a-17: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par de bzhin gshegs pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyang sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su son pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265a-18: de rnams kyang rang gi sa bon yongs su smin pa'i dbang las dang de'i bdag po nyid las de'i ngo bo'i bya ba so sor snang ba'i rnam par rig pa nye bar skyes pas na de ltar rab tu 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:265a-19: gang de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:265a-20: chos bstan pa dang bzhud pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don gyi bya ba mdzad do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag po nyid tsam ma gtogs pa'i bya ba gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:265a-22: gang las de'i ngo bo'i bya bar 'gyur ba'o //
T04TD3903E:265a-23: ji skad du 'phags pas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:265b-0: khyod kyis yi ge gcig kyang @265b ni ;
T04TD3903E:265b-1: / cung zad bshad pa med par ni //
T04TD3903E:265b-2: gtso bos gdul bya'i skye bo kun //
T04TD3903E:265b-3: chos kyi char pas tshim par mdzad //
T04TD3903E:265b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma bar mar yang /
T04TD3903E:265b-6: rigs kyi bu nges par de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du yang bzhud pa 'am byon pa med de /
T04TD3903E:265b-7: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid ni g-yo ba med pa'o nas /
T04TD3903E:265b-8: ji srid du de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265b-9: gzugs kyi sku la mngon par dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs so zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te 'gal ba med do //
T04TD3903E:265b-10: gal te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin na ci ltar khyed dang bdag gi don nyid du 'bad rtsol med par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad ce na /
T04TD3903E:265b-11: chos kyi sku tha dad pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas spros pa med pa'i ngo bo can sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku tha dad pa can rnams kyi yang rang gi 'dus byas pa'i stobs kyis byung ba rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar dmigs la /
T04TD3903E:265b-12: sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bkod pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:265b-13: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:265b-14: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis dben pa dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa /
T04TD3903E:265b-15: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag spangs pa /
T04TD3903E:265b-17: ye shes ma lus pa'i rten gyi rang bzhin dmigs pa ma lus pa la brjed ngas med pa /
T04TD3903E:265b-18: yul dang dbang po dang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'char ba'i rgyu mtshan shes pa thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa /
T04TD3903E:265b-19: de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:265b-20: de yang shes bya thams cad la khyab par byas nas 'byung ba ste /
T04TD3903E:265b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:265b-22: des rang rig pa'i rnam pas rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su son pa'i skye mched la sogs pa gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar so sor snang ba rnams de'i rnam pa nye bar 'dzin pa'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to //
T04TD3903E:265b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos nyid can du yang de nyid kyi phyir rig ste /
T04TD3903E:266a-0: @266a * // shes bya mtha' dag la brjed ngas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:266a-1: gzhan du na me long lta bu'i ye shes med na ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin te /
T04TD3903E:266a-2: shes bya'i phung po mtha' dag rang gi ngo bo bzhin du de la rab tu gsal bas so //
T04TD3903E:266a-3: dus gsum pa'i srog chags su gyur pa thams cad kyi shes pa yang des yang dag par mi rig pa 'byung ba med de /
T04TD3903E:266a-4: thams cad yang dag par rig pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:266a-5: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i me long gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:266a-6: rgyud gzhan rnams la yang skye mched dang de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'jig rten gyis shes par 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:266a-7: de med na de rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir la /
T04TD3903E:266a-8: 'byung ba'i dus nyid na yang yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:266a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:266a-11: skye mched dang de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams rnam par rig par byed do zhes so //
T04TD3903E:266a-12: de'i dbang gis de rnams 'byung ba'o zhes dgongs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:266a-13: sa bon yod na'ang sa gzhi la sogs pa med pa las myu gu mi skye ba bzhin dang /
T04TD3903E:266a-14: gzugs yod kyang me long med pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan mi 'char ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:266a-15: 'di yang mi g-yo ba bskyod bya ma yin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:266a-16: rnam par rtog pa'i yongs su g-yo ba thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:266a-17: rgyun gyis rtag tu rjes su son pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:266a-18: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa gsum rnams ni g-yo ba yang ste res 'ga' ba nyid du tha snyad bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:266a-19: gal te 'di shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu mtshan yin na de'i phyir de'i dbang gis 'byung ba srog chags thams cad kyi shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams cig car ram thams cad kyi tshe 'char bar thal bar ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T04TD3903E:266a-20: ji ltar me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'char ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur zhing rtag tu gzugs brnyan 'char bar byed pa'ang ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:266a-21: gzugs brnyan gyi rkyen la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:266a-22: de bzhin du me long gi ye shes ni sems can dang /
T04TD3903E:266a-23: dus kyi rkyen gyi khyad par la ltos pa ste /
T04TD3903E:266b-0: mu stegs pa la @266b sogs pa kha cig ni mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa las dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan pas bsgribs /
T04TD3903E:266b-1: kha cig ni dam pa'i chos spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i las byed /
T04TD3903E:266b-2: kha cig ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs /
T04TD3903E:266b-3: kha cig ni las kyi sgrib pa drag pos bsgribs /
T04TD3903E:266b-4: kha cig ni ngan song gsum dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi ngo bo rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs /
T04TD3903E:266b-5: kha cig ni mi khom par ltung /
T04TD3903E:266b-6: kha cig ni theg pa dman pa'i rigs can rnams te /
T04TD3903E:266b-7: 'di rnams thams cad dus re zhig pa'i snod ma yin pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:266b-8: ji skad du mdo sde rgyan du gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:266b-9: ji ltar chu yi snod chag na //
T04TD3903E:266b-10: zla ba'i gzugs ni mi snang ba //
T04TD3903E:266b-11: de bzhin sems can ngan [?] pa la //
T04TD3903E:266b-12: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mi snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:266b-13: ji ltar me ni gzhan du 'bar //
T04TD3903E:266b-14: slar yang gzhan du zhi ba ltar //
T04TD3903E:266b-15: de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams la yang //
T04TD3903E:266b-16: snang dang mi snang shes par bya //
T04TD3903E:266b-18: sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams yod pa na /
T04TD3903E:266b-19: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir de snang gi rnam par brtul zin pa na /
T04TD3903E:266b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir de mi snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:266b-22: skye bo'i bsod nams kyis dang smon lam khyad par las //
T04TD3903E:266b-23: 'phangs phyir 'di yi 'jug pa shin tu bsam mi khyab //
T04TD3903E:266b-25: snying rje chan po'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku ni rtag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:266b-26: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur na //
T04TD3903E:266b-27: gang dang gang la gang tshe dang //
T04TD3903E:266b-28: gang tshe bya ba phan 'gyur ba //
T04TD3903E:266b-29: de dang de la de snang ngo //
T04TD3903E:266b-30: thams cad kyi tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar gnas kyang sems can rnams kyi rang gi las kyi nyes pas bskyed pas rgyu ma tshang ba las 'bras bu ster bar snang ba ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:266b-31: dper na lha'i rgyal pos char pha ba tu zin kyang rul bar gyur pa la sogs pas sa bon du mi rung bar gyur pa'i sh'a li la sogs pa'i sa bon ni myu gu skyed par mi byed pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:266b-32: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni gang byang chub sems dpa' sa mthong ba'i lam mngon par rtogs pa'i dus su bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob la /
T04TD3903E:267a-0: de nyid la dmigs pa de kho nas gong nas gong du sgom pa rab tu gyur @267a * //
T04TD3903E:267a-1: pa'i rnal 'byor gyis byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs pa /
T04TD3903E:267a-2: dbyibs dang kha dog gi bdag gi dngos po sku rnam pa sna tshogs pa ston pa'i thabs su rnam par gzhag go //
T04TD3903E:267a-3: de nyid kyi phyir me long lta bu'i ye shes las khyad par ro //
T04TD3903E:267a-4: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dngos po tsam dang de'i chos nyid kyi yul can gyi me long lta bu'i ye shes la dmigs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:267a-6: tshangs pa chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams so //
T04TD3903E:267a-7: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud pa yang byang chub ste /
T04TD3903E:267a-8: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad gzigs pa ste 'dra ba kho na ni tshangs pa chos de rnams so /
T04TD3903E:267a-11: gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma gtogs pa'i chos de rdul tsam yang ma mthong ngo zhes so //
T04TD3903E:267a-12: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid la rten 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra yang yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:267a-13: gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba de ni chos mthong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:267a-14: gang chos mthong ba de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:267a-15: don dam pa'i chos yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang don dam pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:267a-16: de ni thams cad du tha dad pa med do //
T04TD3903E:267a-17: tshad med pa rnams kyang mi g-yo ba nas bzung nas rnam par smin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:267a-18: mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:267a-19: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
T04TD3903E:267a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi yul can dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:267a-21: de rnams nyid sangs rgyas kyi sa la rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing rtag tu rjes su son pa ste /
T04TD3903E:267a-22: bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267a-23: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:267a-24: thams cad du khyad par med par 'jug pa'i phyir ram yang na de rnams kho na mnyam pa nyid de mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267a-25: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag dang lam dang 'bras bu dag kyang mnyam pa nyid de rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267b-0: rnyed @267b pa dang ma rnyed pa la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams thams cad du ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:267b-1: gcig tu mnyam pa nyid dang byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa yon tan rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs pas na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T04TD3903E:267b-2: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gzungs dang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams thams cad kyi yang dag par 'dzin pa nyid kyis skye ba'i sgo /
T04TD3903E:267b-3: shes bya'i rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug pa bee d'urya la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i thabs /
T04TD3903E:267b-4: the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i rgyu'i chos rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:267b-5: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can /
T04TD3903E:267b-6: rnam pa shin tu rnam par phyed pa ste /
T04TD3903E:267b-7: ji ltar chos de rnams mngon par tha dad pa'i rnam pas phyed pa yin pa de lta kho nar so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267b-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis 'byor pa sna tshogs pa bstan pa las byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang dam pa'i chos rdzogs par longs spyod pa so sor nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267b-9: khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas gzhan gyi rgyu dang 'bras bus bsdus pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba so sor snang ba ste /
T04TD3903E:267b-10: gang gi phyir de'i bdag rkyen las rtogs pa po rnams de ltar rnam par gzhag pa nye bar 'dogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:267b-11: dga' ba'i rgyu yang ste pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chos sna tshogs pa rnams kyis dga' bar bya ba nyid kyis dga' ba nges par 'brel par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:267b-12: de la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bas so //
T04TD3903E:267b-13: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gdul bya ji lta bar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs sna tshogs pa rnams kyis pha rol la phan pa byed pa'i rgyud gcig pa can te rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can no //
T04TD3903E:267b-14: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir sprul pa'i sku'o //
T04TD3903E:267b-15: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:268a-4: de la sku'i sprul pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T04TD3903E:268a-5: rdzu 'phrul kun du ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:268a-6: skye ba kun du ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:268a-7: las kyi rnam par smin pa kun du ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:268a-8: de rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis 'dun par mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:268a-9: dang por mngon du phyogs pa bskyed pa las rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:268a-11: lteng rgyas 'ong srungs la sogs pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:268a-12: kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis yongs su smin par mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:268a-13: las su rung ba nyid du bskyed pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par mdzad pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:268a-14: rjes su bstan pa'i chos 'phrul gyis khams gsum pa ngang ngan 'gro las rnam par grol bar mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:268a-15: de'i nye bar bstan pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:268a-16: 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byas shing sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par byas nas bde 'gro la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:268a-17: cho 'phrul gsum rnams kyang gnas pa bzhin rnams kyis byed de /
T04TD3903E:268a-18: de la spyod lam gyis gnas pa ni sku'i las thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:268a-19: ston pas gnas pa ni gsung gi las thams cad do //
T04TD3903E:268a-20: ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas pa ni gang rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:268a-21: gang yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par phyogs par byed pas te de gnyis yid kyi las so //
T04TD3903E:268a-22: snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa ni gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can rnams la gzigs pa dang lha la sogs pa nas 'pho ba na yang ste /
T04TD3903E:268a-23: de gnyis ka yid kyi las so //
T04TD3903E:268a-24: skye ba kun du ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cig car 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du skye ba nye bar ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:268a-25: las kyi rnam par smin pa kun du ston pa ni las kyi 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa ste /
T04TD3903E:268a-26: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa yang dag par ston pa'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:268a-27: gang gi phyir bde ba dang sdug bsngal lus kyis myong ba sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu las kyi lus kyi rten can skye la /
T04TD3903E:268a-28: sngon gyi las kyis sprul pa'i lus ni las kyi lus so //
T04TD3903E:268b-0: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kho na sku sprul pa po las kyi sku ste so @268b sor snang ba'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:268b-1: de lta bu byung ba dang spyod tshul gyi mtha' ston pa dang skyes pa'i rabs thams cad sgrol la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:268b-2: de thams cad kyang sprul pa'i skur ston pa ste /
T04TD3903E:268b-3: dper na mthe bo'i rtse mo snad pa la sogs bstan pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:268b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i sku can nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i chos can te /
T04TD3903E:268b-5: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'byung po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor can gyis 'bad pa drag pos /
T04TD3903E:268b-6: mtshon cha'i khyad par de dang de rnams kyis nye bar bsnun pa'i khyad par rnams kyis kyang /
T04TD3903E:268b-7: ba spu gcig langs pa'i nyams pa'ang skyes pa med na rnam pa gzhan du lta ci gzhig / de yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la yang lhas byin ming tsam nyid kyis nyes par spyod pa byas so zhes pa 'di ji ltar zhe na /
T04TD3903E:268b-8: de'i phyir 'di thams cad ni srog chags rnams dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i don du de dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid bstan pas gdul ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:268b-9: dka' ba spyod pa ston pa ni de ltar bstan pas gdul bar bya ba rnams gdul bya'i don dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis dag par mi 'gyur gyi ye shes kyis dag pa'o zhes rab tu bstan pa'i don du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:268b-10: byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces pa 'di'i 'bras bu'o zhes gsungs pa ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa las bzlog pa'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:268b-11: sku'i sprul pa dang gsung gi sprul pa de yang rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel pa dang ma 'brel pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:268b-12: thugs kyi sprul pa ni rang dang gzhan dang 'brel pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:268b-13: de la sku'i sprul pa rang gi lus dang 'brel pa ni bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su ston pa ste /
T04TD3903E:268b-14: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyis sku dang gsung gi 'jug pa ni 'jig rten rjes su gzhug pa las kyang rig par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:269a-0: ji ltar mnyan yod du rgyal po ka pi na @269a * //
T04TD3903E:269a-1: gdul ba'i don du bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pas rgyan rnams kyang bzung zhing gzhu yang bzung la /
T04TD3903E:269a-2: 'khor de nyid du nyan thos chen po rnams thams cad kyis kyang rgyal phran la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rab tu byung ba la bkag pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bzung ba nas /
T04TD3903E:269a-3: ji srid ka pi na dang blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor stong phrag bco brgyad bsnyen par rdzogs te /
T04TD3903E:269a-4: dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269a-5: mnyan yod de nyid du bram ze'i khye'u 'dul ba'i dus na bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs gdong bzhi pa ral pa'i cod pan 'chang bar gsungs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269a-6: rgyal po'i khab drug cu mtho ris kyi 'bras bu dang byang chub la rab tu bkod mtho ris kyi 'bras bu dang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269a-7: drang srong gnas 'jog gi rigs can gyi bram ze mo 'dul ba na /
T04TD3903E:269a-8: mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi ro bzung zhing 'di ni bdag gi chung ma'o zhes kyang gsungs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269a-9: ko sa la'i gar mkhan 'dul ba'i don du du yul ma kar kotta balli ru bcom ldan 'das gar mkhan gyi lugs 'dzin par gsungs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269a-10: dri za zur phud lnga pa gdul ba'i ched du dri za tha mal pa'i gzugs can bcom ldan 'das kyi pi wang bsnams shing glu blangs la pi wang gi rgyud stong po bcad pa na sgra stong phrag yongs su rdzogs pa nam mkha' las byung ba lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:269a-11: de bzhin du rab tu byung ba dang 'gal ba 'dul ba la bkag pa gzhan rnams kyang khyim pa tha mal pa'i gzugs kyis spyod par gsungs te /
T04TD3903E:269a-12: ji skad du bstod pa mdzad pas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:269a-13: mchog tu zhi ba la gnas kyang //
T04TD3903E:269a-14: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur nyid kyis //
T04TD3903E:269a-15: rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal la'ang //
T04TD3903E:269a-16: khyod kyi zhabs ni bkod pa mdzad //
T04TD3903E:269a-18: rol mo mkhan ni rol rtsed mkhan rnams so //
T04TD3903E:269a-19: de rnams kyi sgyu rtsal ni bzo ste bi wang sgrogs pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:269a-20: de yang mdzad pa'i ched du gshegs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:269a-21: sde pa'i lung rnams su yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:269a-22: mar me mdzad pa nas bzung nas //
T04TD3903E:269a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa chags bral te //
T04TD3903E:269b-0: 'di ni 'jig rten rjes rjes gzhug @269b pa'o //
T04TD3903E:269b-2: cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa rnams ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:269b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyag la sogs pa'i las mthun pa ma yin pa rnams kyang ston pa nas dman pa bran nyid kyi bar du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:269b-4: de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'di 'dra ba'o zhes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T04TD3903E:269b-5: de la thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis dad pa kho na bya'o //
T04TD3903E:269b-6: gzhan yang kha cig tu gdul bya dang 'tsham pa'i yul du gshegs pas dang /
T04TD3903E:269b-7: kha cig tu gdul bya rnams rang gi yul du bkug pas dang /
T04TD3903E:269b-8: kha cig tu gnas pa'i sku las /
T04TD3903E:269b-9: phyogs thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa rnams su sku la sogs pa yang dag par bstan pas so //
T04TD3903E:269b-10: bcom ldan 'das ni dbang thams cad so sor rtogs pa'i dbang nyid thob pa'i phyir sku la sogs pa rnams kyi rdul phra rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar la 'jug pa dang /
T04TD3903E:269b-11: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas dben par mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:269b-12: dper na ser skya'i gzhi'i nags su seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po dang brgya byin dang dpal mo dang ri skyes dang gzhon nu la sogs pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci brgya phrag stong du ma rnams mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bstan pa sa btul lo zhes pa la sogs pa lta bu rim pa ji lta bar dper brjod par rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:269b-13: bag med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang bag yod pa'i gnas la bkod pas /
T04TD3903E:269b-14: de dang de'i sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:269b-15: dper na bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang sor phreng dang mthong ldan dang bde byed la sogs pa rnams bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:269b-16: de ltar ni dga' bo zhes bya ba sh'akya'i gzhon nu chags pa drag po can thams cad du rang gi chung ma la shin tu lhag par chags pa de med par yud tsam yang mi sdod pa de 'dra ba de /
T04TD3903E:270a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas khyim nas bkug nas rab tu byung du bcug cing rab tu byung nas kyang bud med de nyid nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed kyi chos ma @270a * //
T04TD3903E:270a-2: de lta na yang de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:270a-3: de bzhin du bram ze rmongs pa sor phreng can zhes bya ba des bla ma'i bka'i bya ba ched du 'gyur ro zhes mi stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba 'tsho ba dang bral bar byas pa de yang phyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phyung zhing khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar mdzad do /
T04TD3903E:270a-5: mthong ldan ni ma skyes dgra yin la /
T04TD3903E:270a-7: de ltar ni des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:270a-8: sngon gyi 'khon rjes su 'brel pa las pa chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po srog dang phral la /
T04TD3903E:270a-9: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa kho na'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas dmyal ba'i me'i bud shing las thar ro zhes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:270a-10: rigs kyi bu la de byed kyang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i dbang las /
T04TD3903E:270a-11: pha rol gyi bud med dang 'grogs pa la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:270a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa kho na la brten nas pho long brdabs pa dang 'dra bas dmyal ba las 'das te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi bde ba nyams su myong ngo zhes thos so //
T04TD3903E:270a-14: sku'i sprul pa gzhan gyi lus dang lus 'brel pa ni bdud la sogs pa rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270a-15: ma 'brel pa ni sa la sogs pa rnams rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa'i gzugs su ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270a-16: gang yang tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:270a-17: gang yang 'od zer bkye nas 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:270a-18: gang yang skye ba la sogs pa ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270a-19: de bzhin du gsung gi sprul pa bdag gi lus dang 'brel pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar mdzad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270a-20: gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel pa ni gang gis nyan thos la sogs pa chos ma gtogs pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis theg pa chen po'i chos ston pa ste /
T04TD3903E:270a-21: dper na 'phags pa rab 'byor la sogs pa rnams bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:270a-22: ma 'brel pa ni rol mo'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-0: gzugs @270b snang ba thams cad dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-1: nam mkha' las kyang chos ston pa'i sgra 'byung bar mdzad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-2: thugs kyi sprul pa ni bdag nyid kyi chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-3: gzhan gyi'ang de ltar sems nges par 'dzin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:270b-4: gang gis shes rab dman pas kyang chos phra mo yang so sor rtogs par mdzad pa dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-5: dran pa nyams pa rnams kyang dran pa theb po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-6: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de yang rnam pa thams cad du rtag par rjes su son pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:270b-7: mdzad pa bya ba dang grangs dang zhing gi bye brag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-8: sems can gyi don gyi bya ba la mi ldog par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:270b-9: chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes lnga po 'di rnams kyi go rims rnam par gzhag pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dang de'i rab tu dbye ba las so //
T04TD3903E:270b-10: de la rgyu ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-11: 'bras bu ni 'phags pa'i ye shes te /
T04TD3903E:270b-12: de la dmigs par skyes pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-13: de la brten pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-14: de'i ldog pa'i dbye ba rnam pa lnga'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-15: ji ltar skye ba las so zhes pa gzhan rnams so //
T04TD3903E:270b-16: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa ste /
T04TD3903E:270b-17: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-18: de la dmigs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis rab tu gyur pa'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-19: rgyu ni tshad med pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes phul du byung ba'o //
T04TD3903E:270b-20: 'bras bu ni gzhan gyi don byad pa ste /
T04TD3903E:270b-21: de yang skal ba dang ldan pa dang skal pa med pa'i sems can so sor rtog pa las dang nge dang rjes su mthun pa'i bya bsgrub pa las so //
T04TD3903E:270b-22: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa ste /
T04TD3903E:270b-23: ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang bya ba sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gnyis dag dang /
T04TD3903E:270b-24: gnyis dag dang gcig gis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:270b-25: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:271a-0: gal te yang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid kyi @271a * //
T04TD3903E:271a-1: phyir me long lta bu'i ye shes la dmigs pa de lta na yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku kho nas bsdus te /
T04TD3903E:271a-2: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi g-yo ba nyid kyis na chos kyi skus bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:271a-3: de slob dpon tsandra go mis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:271a-4: 'ga' zhig de bzhin nyid dmigs pa ;
T04TD3903E:271a-5: / me long ye shes su ni 'dod //
T04TD3903E:271a-6: gzhan rnams don kun rnam pa can //
T04TD3903E:271a-7: don kun spyod yul can du 'dod //
T04TD3903E:271a-8: mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa //
T04TD3903E:271a-9: de ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs //
T04TD3903E:271a-10: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni //
T04TD3903E:271a-11: dgos don rnam pa can du 'dod //
T04TD3903E:271a-12: rnam pa kun du thams cad nyid//
T04TD3903E:271a-13: 'di yi rnam shes nus kun ldan //
T04TD3903E:271a-15: de'i phyir mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dag longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T04TD3903E:271a-16: ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos la nye bar longs spyod pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:271a-17: de la 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du bzang po zhes bya'o //
T04TD3903E:271a-18: 'bras bu de yang ye shes dang spangs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:271a-19: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:271a-20: ye shes de yang rnam pa lnga'o //
T04TD3903E:271a-21: 'di tsam kho na sangs rgyas kyi sa ste /
T04TD3903E:271a-22: mtha' dag par der sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa bsdus par rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro//
T04TD3903E:271a-23: de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa las bya ba gcig tu bya ba rnams ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bsdus so //
T04TD3903E:271a-24: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus pa ste lus la sogs pa las so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:271a-25: yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:271a-26: brtson 'grus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab kyis yongs su bzung ba 'dor ba med cing gzhag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T04TD3903E:271a-27: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T04TD3903E:271a-28: tshad med pa bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T04TD3903E:271a-29: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo can rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gsung las so //
T04TD3903E:271a-30: gang yang gzhan bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /
T04TD3903E:271a-31: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa dang /
T04TD3903E:271b-0: rdzu @271b 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dag kho na las gzhan pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:271b-1: nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T04TD3903E:271b-2: lam shes pa rnams dang kun du 'gro ba'i lam dang zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dag las gzhan pa'i stobs rnams ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T04TD3903E:271b-3: kha cig ni mi 'jigs pa rnams dang dad pa la sogs pa rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do zhes zer ro //
T04TD3903E:271b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-5: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni zag pa zad pa'i rgyud la brjod par 'dod pa na /
T04TD3903E:271b-6: rgyu gang gis zag pa rnams zad pa'o zhes ye shes lnga rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-7: yang na mya ngan las 'das pa ni zag pa rnams zad pa'o zhes pa ste chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnams kyis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-8: kun du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi rnams so //
T04TD3903E:271b-9: shes rab kyi dbang po dang shes rab kyi stobs ni me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-10: byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam gyi yan lag rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-11: sdug bsngal shes pa la sogs pa shes pa bcu gnyis rnams me long lta bu dang /
T04TD3903E:271b-12: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-13: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni me long ye shes kyis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-14: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar ba thams cad spangs pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang me long ye shes dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:271b-16: pha rol tu phyin pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni lam gyi gnas skabs su so sor rtog pa dang bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dag gis so //
T04TD3903E:271b-17: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus so //
T04TD3903E:271b-18: ye shes kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs smos pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:271b-19: de las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:272a-0: de bzhin du me long ye shes @272a * //
T04TD3903E:272a-1: dang de'i rten can gyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes pa gnyis po tshul gcig pa ste /
T04TD3903E:272a-2: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-3: de las gzhan pa'i ye shes gnyis kyang ro gcig pa ste /
T04TD3903E:272a-4: gzhan la phan par byed pa rgyun gcig pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:272a-5: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-6: gnyis can gnyis dang chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:272a-7: de'i bdag nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-8: ji skad du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdor gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:272a-9: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa na 'dres pa dang nye bar 'dres pa bya ba ro gcig pa can gyi ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:272a-10: gsung de nyid las sems bskyed pa snga ma rnams su ro gcig pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:272a-11: 'dres pa ni gcig tu gyur pa'o //
T04TD3903E:272a-12: gcig tu gyur pa yang res 'ga' tha dad par byed la /
T04TD3903E:272a-13: de ni nam yang tha dad par bya ba med pa'o zhes pa nye bar 'dres pa shin tu dbyer med pas mnyam par dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa nyid du nye bar ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-14: bya ba ro gcig pa ste ro ni snying po ste rang bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:272a-15: ye shes kyis rdzogs par longs spyod pa ni yul te /
T04TD3903E:272a-16: chos kyi dbyings yang dag par longs spyad par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-17: ye shes kyis rdzogs par longs spyod pa gang gis dgongs pa ye shes kyi chos kyi dbyings la dmigs nas skye ba'i phyir ro gcig pa yin pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-18: yang na yang dag par longs spyod pa ni rdzogs par longs spyod pa myong byed de /
T04TD3903E:272a-19: ye shes kyis yang dag par longs spyod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir na /
T04TD3903E:272a-20: 'di ye shes kyis rdzogs par longs spyod pa yin la /
T04TD3903E:272a-21: de yang bde ba ste rten gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro gcig pa ste /
T04TD3903E:272a-22: de la sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272a-23: 'bras bu yang ste chos kyi dbyings kyi'o //
T04TD3903E:272a-24: yang na ye shes kho na rdzogs par longs spyod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:272a-25: kun rdzob tu rang rig pa nyid kyi rnam pas yang dag par longs spyad par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272b-0: de yang ro gcig pa ste bdag dang gzhan la sogs pa @272b gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272b-2: rgyu las gnyis kyi 'du shes kyis dben par dus thams cad du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272b-4: 'dir thams cad rig pa kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:272b-5: ye shes lnga po 'di rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams kyang bsdus te /
T04TD3903E:272b-6: 'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i lam la gnas pa rnams la 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyod pa ni mi 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:272b-7: sa brgyad pa nas bzung nas ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'o //
T04TD3903E:272b-8: gnyis ni bdag dang bdag gi ba dang yod pa dang med pa dang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:272b-9: byung ba dang ma byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:272b-10: skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dang /
T04TD3903E:272b-11: bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:272b-12: de'i gnyen por thams cad du sems mnyam pa nyid thob po //
T04TD3903E:272b-13: de nas bzung nas gnyis kyi 'du shes dang bral ba las /
T04TD3903E:272b-14: 'bad pa thams cad dang bral ba zag pa med pa mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:272b-15: 'on kyang sgrib pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa nyid kyis na yongs su ma dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:272b-16: lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi spyi la mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
T04TD3903E:272b-17: mi g-yo ba la ni chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o zhes mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa chen po thob pas so //
T04TD3903E:272b-18: gal te yang rab tu dga' ba la bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa yod pa de lta na yang 'bad pa dang bcas par 'byung ba nyid kyis na yongs su dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par ma bzhag go //
T04TD3903E:272b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyang rgya mtshor chu bo chen po rnams bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sar zhugs pa rten tha dad med pa rnams su 'gyur te /
