T04TD3903E:272b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa rten tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:272b-21: de ltar yang 'bras bu ro gcig pa can ye shes kyis rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:273a-0: de nyid kyi phyir yang zag pa med pa'i dbyings la sangs rgyas rnams du mar rnam par ma bzhag @273a * //
T04TD3903E:273a-2: / gang kho na chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bo de kho na nyid stong pa nyid de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi lam thob pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi sa bon shin tu bral bar gyur pa na yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid gnas gyur pa zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:273a-3: zag pa med pa'i dbyings kyang ngo //
T04TD3903E:273a-4: de ni ye shes chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te /
T04TD3903E:273a-5: so sor rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyis de la dmigs pas na mtha' med pa'i dus su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:273a-6: chos kyi dbyings de dang chos thams cad kyang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis dmigs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:273a-7: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:273a-8: gang kho na rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid gnas ngan len mtha' dag gi rten kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa /
T04TD3903E:273a-9: gnyen po'i stobs kyis gnas ngan len gyi dri ma ma lus pa dang bral ba las gnas gyur pa de kho na me long ye shes zhes bya'o //
T04TD3903E:273a-10: gang slob dpon tsandra go mis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:273a-11: gang yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes //
T04TD3903E:273a-12: me long ye shes nyid gyur pa //
T04TD3903E:273a-13: de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi ni //
T04TD3903E:273a-16: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa 'di ci zhe na /
T04TD3903E:273a-17: yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na ste /
T04TD3903E:273a-18: ji ltar de kho na bdag dang bdag gi bar sgro 'dogs pas rab tu 'jug pa na nyon mongs pa can gyi yid du tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du de kho na gnas ngan len la sogs pa mtha' dag gi rten nyid kyis dang /
T04TD3903E:273a-19: chad pa dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /
T04TD3903E:273a-20: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang nyams pa dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba la sogs pa'i rten nyid kyis na gnas ngan len la sogs pa rnams 'dir gzhi 'cha'o zhes pas kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:273a-21: de nyid kyang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i chos gzhan dge ba dang mi dge ba de dang de rnams kyis bsgo bya ste /
T04TD3903E:273a-22: ji ltar rigs par sa bon rgyas pas rgyu byas pa gang las rgyud yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par rgyur blangs pa las stobs ji lta bar dgod par byed pa'i 'jug pa thob par gyur pa na /
T04TD3903E:273b-0: phyis de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa @273b mngon par 'grub ste /
T04TD3903E:273b-1: dper na rgya skyegs kyi khu bas yongs su bsgos pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon la me tog dang 'bras bu yang dmar po nye bar skye ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:273b-3: gang phyir rgyud gang kho na la //
T04TD3903E:273b-4: las kyi bag chags bsgos gyur pa //
T04TD3903E:273b-6: ras bal la ni dmar nyid bzhin //
T04TD3903E:273b-8: de kho na yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdor gdul bya'i khyad par gyi ngor gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:273b-9: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing phra //
T04TD3903E:273b-10: sa bon thams cad chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
T04TD3903E:273b-11: bdag tu rtog par gyur na mi rung zhes //
T04TD3903E:273b-12: 'di ni byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan //
T04TD3903E:273b-14: de ni yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba rnams su lus len pa'i phyir len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes brjod do //
T04TD3903E:273b-15: chos thams cad kyi sa bon rnams kyi gzhi nyid kyi phyir kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:273b-16: skye ba snga ma'i rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:273b-17: gang 'di kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa 'di dang rnam par rtog pa can nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang dbang po lnga'i rnam par shes pa rnams las gzhan pa kho na kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'o zhes sems pa de'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa ci yin /
T04TD3903E:273b-18: dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'o zhe na /
T04TD3903E:273b-19: ci ltar rnam pa shes pa zhes bya ba yang yin la 'di 'dra ba yang yin /
T04TD3903E:273b-20: de ltar ni rang gsal la thun mong ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'o zhes pa mtshan nyid do //
T04TD3903E:273b-21: brjod pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam pa brgyad ma gtogs pa gzhan ni 'dir cung zad kyang so sor rang gi rnam pa dang bcas par nyams su myong ba med do //
T04TD3903E:273b-22: mi gsal bar yod do zhes 'dod pa yang rnam par shes par sma ba rnams kyi ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:273b-23: bdag la sogs pa phyi rol du gyur pa yang yod pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:273b-24: rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam du yang nyams su myong ba med do zhes gzhan du legs par dpyad zin to //
T04TD3903E:273b-25: de'i phyir rta'i rva bzhin du de la mngon sum med la rjes su dpag pa yang med do //
T04TD3903E:274a-0: de ltar na yang gal te kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yongs su rtog na bdag kyang yongs su rtog cing de kho na yang bdag @274a * //
T04TD3903E:274a-2: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la yang mngon par dgongs nas bdag tu yongs su rtog par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:274a-3: gang bye brag tu smra ba'i khyad par rnams ni legs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:274a-4: sems dul gyur las bde ba 'byung //
T04TD3903E:274a-6: gang phyir bdag nyid bdag gi mgon //
T04TD3903E:274a-7: pha rol mgon du su zhig 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:274a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan pa na dgongs pa mi shes pa rnams sems kho na bdag go zhes mngon par rlom ste /
T04TD3903E:274a-9: de rnams kyis gal te kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ston pa'i gsung rab nyan thos kyi theg pa thos par gyur na /
T04TD3903E:274a-10: de'i tshe rnam par shes pa de bdag go zhes shin tu brtan par rlom par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:274a-11: de'i phyir 'di ltar yang mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:274a-12: byis pa rnams la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:274a-13: gang rig pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa de ni chen po rnams kyang bag med pa las /
T04TD3903E:274a-14: rigs med pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs nges par khas len pa bzhin dang /
T04TD3903E:274a-15: don dam par grub pa'i shes pa tsam khas len pa bzhin du 'khrul pa'o zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:274a-16: 'dir skyes bu tshad mas ci zhig /'dir brjod pa'i rigs pas sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang 'du shes med pa la yang sems yod do zhes 'dod pa ni yang dag par rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pa rgyas pas ci bya ste /
T04TD3903E:274a-17: skabs su bab pa gzhag par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:274a-18: ye shes gzhan gsum yang gnas gyur pa ste /
T04TD3903E:274a-19: gang slob dpon tsandra go mis gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:274a-20: nyon mongs can yid gnas gyur pa //
T04TD3903E:274a-21: mnyam nyid ye shes brjod par bya //
T04TD3903E:274a-22: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni //
T04TD3903E:274a-23: yid kyi rnam shes nyid de'o //
T04TD3903E:274a-24: de dag longs spyod rdzogs sku nyid //
T04TD3903E:274a-25: chos la rdzogs longs spyod ston phyir //
T04TD3903E:274a-26: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams //
T04TD3903E:274a-27: chos la rdzogs longs spyod phyir yang //
T04TD3903E:274a-28: kha cig me long ye shes kyang //
T04TD3903E:274a-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru rtogs //
T04TD3903E:274a-30: de yang de la rgyu nyid phyir //
T04TD3903E:274a-31: nye bar btags las de bzhin gzhan //
T04TD3903E:274a-32: dbang po lnga yi rnam shes gang //
T04TD3903E:274a-33: de ni don kun yongs su 'dzin //
T04TD3903E:274a-34: sems can kun gyi don du ni //
T04TD3903E:274b-0: bya @274b bsgrub pa tsam nyid thob //
T04TD3903E:274b-1: de yang rtag par thams cad du //
T04TD3903E:274b-2: dus ji bzhin dang bsam ji bzhin //
T04TD3903E:274b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul sku ste //
T04TD3903E:274b-4: sprul pa kun gyi rgyu nyid phyir //
T04TD3903E:274b-5: kha cig yid kyi kho na la //
T04TD3903E:274b-6: sprul pa'i sku nyid du ni rtog / dbang po lnga yi rnam shes gang //
T04TD3903E:274b-7: de yi longs spyod rdzogs skur ro //
T04TD3903E:274b-9: de ltar ye shes lnga po 'di rnams ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob tu mchog tu zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las nye bar skyes pa ste de'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T04TD3903E:274b-10: zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings de yang chos kyi sku ste /
T04TD3903E:274b-11: zag pa med pa'i chos gang rnams kyi chos nyid yin pa'i chos de thams cad bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag tu gsungs la /
T04TD3903E:274b-13: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-14: rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni //
T04TD3903E:274b-15: snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-16: zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang ;
T04TD3903E:274b-17: / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni //
T04TD3903E:274b-18: rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-19: nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-20: mngon shes so so yang dag rig / rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-21: dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-22: mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi rnams dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-23: bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-24: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-25: bsnyel pa mi mnga'i chos nyid dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-26: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-27: skye la thugs rje chen po dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-28: thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos //
T04TD3903E:274b-29: bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang //
T04TD3903E:274b-30: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen zhes pa'ang //
T04TD3903E:274b-31: chos kyi sku ru mngon par brjod //
T04TD3903E:274b-33: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang zhes zlas dbye'o //
T04TD3903E:274b-34: mthar gyis ni snga ma'i rjes su phyi mas 'brel pa'o //
T04TD3903E:274b-35: bsrung ba med pa ni bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa ste mi bsrung ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:274b-36: de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T04TD3903E:274b-37: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni zag pa med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:274b-38: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs so //
T04TD3903E:274b-39: de la skabs ji lta bar bdag gis mang po rnams gsal bar byas la /
T04TD3903E:274b-40: lhag ma rnams 'dir gsal bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:274b-41: nyon mongs pa ni ku co dang 'thab rtsod la sogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:275a-1: pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa ni 'thab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-2: bdag la dmigs nas 'di rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
T04TD3903E:275a-3: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs las gang las longs nas grong khyer la sogs par zhugs pa de la dmigs nas der de rnams kyi 'thab pa mi skye ba de ni 'thab pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-4: de ni nyan thos la yang 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas la yang ste /
T04TD3903E:275a-5: de dag gi byed pa la khyad par ro //
T04TD3903E:275a-6: nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa med pa ni grod la sogs par sems can gang rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa na de la nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ste ;
T04TD3903E:275a-7: de rnams kyi mthong ba nyid rnam par spong ba'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni mthong bar gyur pa na yang de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rgyun gcod pa nyid yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:275a-9: mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes pa nyon mongs pa 'thab pa dang 'gog pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-10: nyan thos kyi nyon mongs med pa ni mthong bas mi rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skye ba rnam par spong la /
T04TD3903E:275a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni gzhan rnams kyi yang nyon mongs pa'i rgyun no zhes pa gzhan no //
T04TD3903E:275a-12: rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa thams cad kyang 'thab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-13: de rnams med pa las rnam par mi rtog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'thab pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-14: 'di shes par gyur cig ces smon nas /
T04TD3903E:275a-15: bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi byung ba'i mtha' la sogs pa la gang shes pa skye ba de ni nyan thos rnams kyi smon nas shes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon nas mkhyen pa ni lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T04TD3903E:275a-17: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275a-18: kun nas chags pa med pa ste ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275a-20: thams cad du gegs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275a-22: rtag tu thugs mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:275a-23: dri ba thams cad la yang lan 'debs par byed do /
T04TD3903E:275a-24: yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi rnams ni rten yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang thugs yongs su dag pa dang ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-0: de la nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi bag chags gnas ngan len rnams rten nas shin tu bral bar byas te rang gi bdag nyid kyi @275b dngos po la yang len pa dang gnas dang 'pho ba rnams la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bsgyur ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad du rten yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-1: dmigs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang /
T04TD3903E:275b-2: grangs rnams la dbang bsgyur ba nyid ni rnam pa thams cad du dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-3: snga ma bzhin du sems gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba dang sems la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa thams cad bsags pa yang rnam pa thams cad du thugs yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-4: sngar bzhin du ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba dang shes bya thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba ni rnam pa thams cad du ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-5: dbang bcu ni 'chi ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bkren pa dang /
T04TD3903E:275b-6: nyes pa spyod pa dang ngan 'gro dang yongs su tshol bas ngal ba dang /
T04TD3903E:275b-7: chos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /
T04TD3903E:275b-8: 'dod pas bar du gcod pa dang 'jigs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:275b-9: ci ltar smra bar bya zhes pa nye bar 'tshe pa bcu'i gnyen po rnams so //
T04TD3903E:275b-10: de la tshe la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du tshe gnas pa'i phyir dang gtod ba'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:275b-11: 'di lta ste brjod du med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-12: brjod du med pa'i bskal par tshe'i tshad byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa na'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-13: sems la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir dang ldang ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275b-14: yo byad la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par phan par byed pa so sor nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir te /
T04TD3903E:275b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa du ma'i rgyan gyis so sor brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa yang dag par ston pa nyid kyis so //
T04TD3903E:275b-16: las la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par sku dang gsung gi phrin las grub pa'i phyir dang dus ji lta bar las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275b-17: skye ba la dbang ba nyid ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du ji ltar 'dod par skye ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:275b-18: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par mngon par shes pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa kun du ston pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:275b-19: smon lam la dbang ba nyid ni smon lam thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:276a-1: pa la dbang ba nyid ni gang ji ltar mos pa de de bzhin kho nar 'gyur ba ste /
T04TD3903E:276a-2: dper na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang ba yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-3: ye shes la dbang ba ni gang kho na shes par 'dod pa de kho na shes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:276a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
T04TD3903E:276a-8: mngon par byang chub pa yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-9: chos la dbang ba nyid ni mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnam par gzhag pa rnams la mkhas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-10: bsrung ba med pa gsum rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:276a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de la sku'i kun du spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'chab par bya bar dgongs pa cung zad mi mnga' ba 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-12: de bzhin du gsung gi las ni gnyis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-13: de bzhin du yid kyi las ni gsum pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-14: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni /
T04TD3903E:276a-15: ji skad du gsungs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:276a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa ni kha cig gus par nyan 'dod rna gtod par byed kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur yid bde bar mi 'gyur thugs mthon po yang ngo bo nyid du mi 'gyur ba dang gzhan rnams gus par mi nyan rna mi gtong ces pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa khong khro ba ma yin mi bzod pa ma yin thugs mi ches pa ma yin thugs mi mnyes pa ma yin pa dang ;
T04TD3903E:276a-17: kha cig gus par nyan 'dod pa ngad gus par nyan mi 'dod pa des de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dgyes pa dang khong khro bar te /
T04TD3903E:276a-18: thams cad du btang snyoms par gnas pa dran pa dang ldan pa'i shes bzhin can no zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276a-19: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:276a-20: bag chags yang dag bcom pa ni /
T04TD3903E:276b-0: nyon mongs pa sangs kyang gang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags te til gyi mi tog la sogs pa bsal yang bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa rnams la des yang dag @276b par bsgos pa'i dri phra mo lhag par gnas pa bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:276b-1: de la ma rig pa'i bag chags ni shes bya yongs su gcod pa'i gegs su gyur pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-2: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags ni lus dang ngag gi spyod tshul gyi khyad par gyi rgyu yang ste /
T04TD3903E:276b-3: ji ltar dgra bcom pa'i sngon du spre 'ur gyur pas mchongs nas gshegs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-4: sngon bram zer gyur pa'i rmongs mo zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-5: de thams cad nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la nub par gyur pa'o zhes pa nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa de bcom ldan 'das su brjod do //
T04TD3903E:276b-6: thugs rje chen po ni phan pa'i bsam pa nyid de gang gis bcom ldan 'das dus thams cad du lan drug tu su ni 'grib su ni 'phel zhes pa la sogs par 'jig rten la gzigs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang khyad par dang mtshan nyid dang dbye ba mthar thug pa shes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-8: stobs bcu rnams ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-9: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-10: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-11: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-12: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-13: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-14: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-15: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T04TD3903E:276b-16: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T04TD3903E:276b-17: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mdo las ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:276b-18: de la srid pa dang mi srid pa ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dag sta /
T04TD3903E:276b-22: gnas ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par rab tu mkhyen to zhes so ;
T04TD3903E:276b-23: / nyes par spyod pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa ni gnas so //
T04TD3903E:276b-24: 'dod pa ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-25: legs par spyad pa rnams kyi 'dod pa ni gnas so //
T04TD3903E:276b-26: mi 'dod pa ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:276b-27: ser snas dbul ba nyid ni gnas so //
T04TD3903E:276b-28: longs spyod chen po nyid ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-0: @277a * // sbyin pas longs spyod chen po nyid ni gnas so //
T04TD3903E:277a-1: dbul ba nyid ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-2: ma dang pha dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i ngang can dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-3: ma dang dgra bcom ma la mi tshangs par spyod pas sun 'byin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-4: byang chub sems dpa' nges pa la gnas pa bkrongs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-6: dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo phrogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-7: mchod rten 'jig pa zhes pa mtshams med pa dang nye ba lnga byed pa'i sems gnas pa ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-8: 'gyod pas gnas pa'i sems rab tu sbyangs pa ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-9: bud med kyi lus de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang tshangs pa nyid la sogs pa ni gnas ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-10: bzlog pa thams cad gnas so //
T04TD3903E:277a-11: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen te /
T04TD3903E:277a-12: dag pa chags pa med pa thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis so //
T04TD3903E:277a-13: ngag pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba ste phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-14: gang dang gang gyur pa'o zhes 'dod pas chags pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-15: rnam pa gang dang gang gis gyur pa zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-16: mkhyen pa de nyid stobs te shin tu yang gzhan rnams kyis brdzi bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-17: gzhan rnams shin tu yang zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:277a-18: las ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-19: mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-20: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsod nams ni mi g-yo ba'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-21: kha cig tu khams gsum ka dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dge ba yang bsod nams su rnam par gzhag go //
T04TD3903E:277a-22: rnam par smin pa ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277a-23: khams sna tshogs pa ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi g-yo ba la sogs pa bskyed pa'i bsam gtan no //
T04TD3903E:277a-24: mos pa sna tshogs pa la 'dir mos pa ni 'dod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:277a-25: 'di ltar 'dod chags la gnas pa'i yang zhe sdang la 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-26: zhe sdang la gnas pa'i 'dod chags la 'dod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-27: sbyor ba dman pa'i sbyor ba rgya chen po la dang /
T04TD3903E:277a-28: sbyor ba rgya chen po'i sbyor ba dman pa la'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-0: dbang po rnams ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang @277b dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab bo //
T04TD3903E:277b-1: de rnams kyi mchog dang mchog ma yin pa tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog ste /
T04TD3903E:277b-3: 'di ni dbang po 'bring ngo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-4: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam ste 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang ma nges pa yang shes shing de dag gi rjes su mthun pa'i lam yang shes la ston par yang byed do //
T04TD3903E:277b-5: log pa nyid du nges pa rnam mkhyen nas /
T04TD3903E:277b-6: de rnams la btang snyoms kho na rjes su mthun no zhes re zhig gi dus su btang snyoms su byed pa dang 'di ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i lam mo /
T04TD3903E:277b-7: 'di ni zhe sdang gi'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-9: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-10: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gsum rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-11: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-12: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:277b-13: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ro myong ba la sogs pas so //
T04TD3903E:277b-14: rnam par byang ba ni dmigs pa med pa la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-15: ldang ba ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas sam thod rgal gyis so //
T04TD3903E:277b-16: sngon gyi gnas ni skye ba snga ma'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-17: de'i rjes su dran pa ni dran pa'o //
T04TD3903E:277b-19: skye ba dag ni sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba dang skye ba dag go //
T04TD3903E:277b-20: de 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos mdor gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:277b-21: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan te /
T04TD3903E:277b-22: gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par zhing du snang ba gang 'ga' zhig bsreg bzhin pa de rnams gzigs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-25: gang du sems can du snang ba de rnams 'chi bzhin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-26: skye ba rnams thams cad dang /
T04TD3903E:277b-27: gang yang snang ba med pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan la snang bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:277b-28: gal te yang dbang po rnams gnas dan len gyi rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:278a-0: mi shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas nyid kyi gnas skabs na spangs pa na yid kyi blo bzhin du dbang po'i blo la sogs @278a * //
T04TD3903E:278a-1: pa rnams kyis yul thams cad yongs su gcod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa thams cad ni yul thams cad par 'dod de /
T04TD3903E:278a-2: ji skad du dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:278a-3: thams cad du ni phyag zhabs mtha' //
T04TD3903E:278a-4: kun du can dang dbu dang zhal //
T04TD3903E:278a-5: kun nas thos ldan 'jig rten du //
T04TD3903E:278a-6: thams cad khyab par byas te gnas //
T04TD3903E:278a-8: 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdor yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:278a-9: 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so //
T04TD3903E:278a-10: de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so //
T04TD3903E:278a-11: de bzhin du dus cig car phyogs bcu rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du gzigs so zhes so //
T04TD3903E:278a-12: de ltar na yang dbang po'i blor sngon gyi rjes su 'brangs pas rnam par gzhag go zhes pas lha'i mig ces pa la sogs par brjod par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:278a-13: zag pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:278a-14: de rnams kyi zad pa gang yin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278a-15: lam gang gis zad pa de gnyis ka yang zag pa zang pa ste /
T04TD3903E:278a-17: seng ge bzhin du bsnyems pa shin tu mi mnga' bar rigs par gsungs ba ni mi 'jigs pa ste de'i dngos po'am las ni mi 'jigs pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:278a-18: mi 'jigs pa nyid bzhi rnams te /
T04TD3903E:278a-19: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:278a-20: zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:278a-21: bar du gcod pa'i chos la mi 'jigs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:278a-22: nges par 'byung ba'i chos la mi 'jigs pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:278a-23: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278a-24: zag pa zad pa ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278a-25: de gnyis ni rang don no //
T04TD3903E:278a-26: bar du gcod pa'i chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i gegs so //
T04TD3903E:278a-27: nges par 'byung ba'i chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278a-28: 'di gnyis ni gzhan gyi don te pha rol po rnams la de 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:278a-29: de rnams la mi 'jigs pa nyid de //
T04TD3903E:278a-30: de dam bca' ba so sor 'god pa rnams la'o //
T04TD3903E:278a-31: de byed pa po mgon med pa sems can rnams te /
T04TD3903E:278a-32: de rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
T04TD3903E:278a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni chos so //
T04TD3903E:278b-0: de'i brjod par bya ba mtha' dag ni don @278b no ;
T04TD3903E:278b-1: / de rnams kho na'i ming gi phyogs gcig la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam pa mang por nges par bshad pa ni nges pa'i tshig go //
T04TD3903E:278b-2: yang na rgyu'i chos thams cad ni chos so //
T04TD3903E:278b-3: 'bras bu'i chos thams cad ni don no //
T04TD3903E:278b-4: 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad thams cad kho na ni nges pa'i tshig go ;
T04TD3903E:278b-5: / de rnams so so yang dag par rig pa ni rim pa ji lta bar chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-6: don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-7: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-8: chos la sogs pa rnams pha rol po rnams la bstan pa'i ched du chos la sogs pa so so yang dag par mngon du gyur pa ni spobs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278b-9: de yang 'di yin la so so yang dag par rig pa yang ngo zhes pa spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278b-10: ma 'dres par spyod pa zhes pa ni ma 'dres pa'i chos te /
T04TD3903E:278b-11: gzhan rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes pa'i don no //
T04TD3903E:278b-12: de rnams kyang ji skad du 'khrul pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-13: ca co dang dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-14: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-15: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-16: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang [?] snyoms med pa nyid dang 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba rnams nyams pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-17: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las thams cad kyi ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang dus gsum rnams la thams cad du ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa bco brgyad do //
T04TD3903E:278b-18: de la dang po ni sku'i 'phrin la yongs su dag pa'o //
T04TD3903E:278b-19: gnyis pa ni gsung gi phrin las so //
T04TD3903E:278b-20: de nas bzhi pa ni thugs kyi phrin las so //
T04TD3903E:278b-21: de nas drug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rten dang bcas pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams ma thob pa'i yongs su nyams pa med pa las te /
T04TD3903E:278b-23: 'bras bu ni rnam par grol ba'o //
T04TD3903E:278b-24: dbang po ni brtson 'grus la sogs pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:278b-25: de nas gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i phrin las rnams ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:278b-26: ye shes rgyu nyid kyis dang /
T04TD3903E:278b-27: ye shes dang lhan cig spyod pa nyid kyis na'o //
T04TD3903E:279a-0: de nas gsum ni dus gsum rnams la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes rnams @279a * //
T04TD3903E:279a-2: /'dir mdo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med do zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:279a-3: ji ltar dgra bcom pa grong la sogs par bsod snyoms kyi ched du rgyu ba rnams glang po che dang rta gtum po dang ba lang dang khyi dang tsher ma dang sbrul la sogs pa rnams kyis gnod pa skyel ba dang /
T04TD3903E:279a-4: 'brog dgon par chom rkun dang stag la sogs pas 'jigs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:279a-5: 'di 'dra ba'i 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la thams cad kyis thams cad du mi mnga'o //
T04TD3903E:279a-6: 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdor yang gsungs pa /
T04TD3903E:279a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i phrin las 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba ;
T04TD3903E:279a-8: rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i spyod lam can /
T04TD3903E:279a-9: spyod lam bzhis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil gnyis sa la mi reg cing /
T04TD3903E:279a-10: sa chen po la 'khor lo rtsibs stong phrag can rnams 'byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:279a-11: dri yid du 'ong ba can gyi padma rnams 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:279a-12: gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs dag bzhag pa der gang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi 'od kyis reg pa de rnams zhag bdun du mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
T04TD3903E:279a-13: shi 'phos nas kyang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:279a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la na bza' sor bzhi'i bar gyis mi reg par gnas la rtsom chen gyi rlung gis kyang g-yo bar byed ma nus so //
T04TD3903E:279a-15: sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sems can rnams bde bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:279a-16: des na de bzhin gshegs pa la sku 'khrul pa med par brjod par bya'o zhes te /
T04TD3903E:279a-17: rtag pa kho nar yang dag par gzigs nas mdzad pa'i ngang can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279a-18: ca co mi mnga'o zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:279a-19: ji ltar dgra bcom pa rnams 'brog dgon par lam nor bas sgra mthon po 'don par 'gyur ba'am /
T04TD3903E:279a-20: bag chags kyi dbang las gad mo cher god pa de lta bu sangs rgyas la mi mnga' ste rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279a-21: dran pa nyams pa mi mnga'o zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:279a-22: ji ltar dgra bcom pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa las dran pa nyams pas bya ba mi byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:279a-23: dus las kyang 'da' ba de lta bu sangs rgyas la mi mnga' ste /
T04TD3903E:279a-24: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279b-0: thugs mnyam par ma @279b bzhag pa mi mnga'o zhes pa ste ji ltar dgra bcom pa snyoms par zhugs pa kho na mnyam par bzhag pa yin gyi gzhan mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279b-1: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279b-2: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes mi mnga'o zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:279b-3: ji ltar dgra bcom pa mtha' gcig tu phung po rnams la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can dang /
T04TD3903E:279b-4: mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes can yin pa de ltar sangs rgyas ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:279b-5: rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa nyid kyis na gnyis ka la rnam gnyis ka la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyar ro //
T04TD3903E:279b-6: so sor ma snyoms mi mnga'o zhes pa ste ;
T04TD3903E:279b-7: ji ltar dgra bcom pa so sor ma brtags par sems can gyi don bya ba btang snyoms su byed pa de lta bu sangs rgyas la mnga' ba ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:279b-8: de ni dus la sogs pa rnams so sor brtags pa rnams kho nas bar mar gnas par 'gyur gyi rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yon no //
T04TD3903E:279b-9: 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:279b-10: dgra bcom pa rnams mdzad pa la 'dun pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:279b-11: de'i phyir de la 'dun pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T04TD3903E:279b-12: de'i phyir nge rnams de rnams las ma thob pa'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:279b-13: de lta bu sangs rgyas rnams la ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:279b-14: de rnams kyis ma thob pa'i khyad par gyi chos med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:279b-15: de la 'dun pa la sogs pa rnams gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mdor so sor rtog par mdzad pa ni byams pa dang snying rje dang chos ston pa dang sems can gdul ba dang yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:279b-16: rab tu dben pa dang byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa ni 'dun pa'o //
T04TD3903E:279b-18: gdul bya 'gugs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T04TD3903E:279b-19: chos nyan pa rnams la mi sgrub pa med pa'i brtson 'grus te /
T04TD3903E:279b-20: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de gang bskal par mi skyo bar nyan pa de lta bu'i ngo bo'i chos nyan pa po rnyed na bskal par yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston bzhin pa mi bzhengs te /
T04TD3903E:280a-0: bza' ba dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis dang sems can la ltos pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das @280a * //
T04TD3903E:280a-1: par mdzad nas gang du tha na sems can gcig sangs rgyas kyi gdul byar 'gyur bar yang gshegs so //
T04TD3903E:280a-2: dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ste /
T04TD3903E:280a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dran nas sam bsam par mdzad nas sam /
T04TD3903E:280a-4: rtogs par mdzad nas sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:280a-5: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:280a-6: chos thams cad kyi mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang ji lta ba bzhin nyid do //
T04TD3903E:280a-7: gang mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid de dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:280a-8: gang dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyam pa nas /
T04TD3903E:280a-9: ji srid du khams gsum la yang brten pa med pa nyid kyi phyir nyams pa med cing yongs su nyams pa med pa ste /
T04TD3903E:280a-10: des na ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:280a-11: shes rab mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad la gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa'i ye shes dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-12: sems can pha rol rnams la chos rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i ye shes dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-13: so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pas rab tu dbye ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-14: tshig gcig rab tu 'jug pas bskal pa stong phrag brgyar lhag par gnas pa ston pa'i ye shes dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-15: ji ltar bris pa'i don gsungs pas the tshom gcod pa dang theg pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ston pa'i ye shes dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-16: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams mkhyen pa dang /
T04TD3903E:280a-17: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams ji ltar so sor 'os pa'i chos ston pa'i ye shes so zhes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' yas pa /
T04TD3903E:280a-18: mur thug pa med pa mi zad pa tshad med pa ston pa'i shes rab bo //
T04TD3903E:280a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T04TD3903E:280a-20: sngon gyi mtha' dang ma bcings pa /
T04TD3903E:280a-22: da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin kho nar shes pa ste de'i phyir skad cig gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes brjod par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:280a-23: sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-0: sku'i phrin las gang dang yang dag @280b par ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas kyang sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:280b-2: cang mi gsung bar gyur pa'ang rung gsol bas kyang rung spyod lam gyis kyang rung /
T04TD3903E:280b-3: mtshan rnams kyis kyang zhes rgya cher ro //
T04TD3903E:280b-4: gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:280b-6: gsung de yang dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:280b-7: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su son pa /
T04TD3903E:280b-9: chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi rkyen gyi ma yin pa /
T04TD3903E:280b-10: dmigs pa las yang dag par 'das pa /
T04TD3903E:280b-11: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pa /
T04TD3903E:280b-12: srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba dpag tu med pa'i bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-13: ji srid du chos kyi dbyings dang /
T04TD3903E:280b-14: dbyer med pa'i bar du yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:280b-15: 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:280b-17: de rnams na rtsva dang 'khri shing la sogs pa ji snyed pa rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:280b-18: chos ston pa ji snyed pa rnams dang /
T04TD3903E:280b-19: rang dang gzhan rnams kyi sems gang gis de ma thag tu sems gang skyes pa de thams cad bgrang ba'i sbyor bas mkhyen to //
T04TD3903E:280b-20: de yang mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis te /
T04TD3903E:280b-21: rjes su rtogs pa'i ye shes pas ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:280b-22: ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-23: zhing ngam sems can gang ci yang rung ba skye bar 'gyur ba rnams dang sems gang skye bar 'gyur ba de thams cad bgrang bas mkhyen to zhes rgyas par ro //
T04TD3903E:280b-24: da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste /
T04TD3903E:280b-25: gang da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang chos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nas ji srid du rigs thams cad dang sa la sogs pa'i khams thams cad dang /
T04TD3903E:280b-26: rdul phra rab kyi char bcas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:281a-1: mo'i mthas blangs pa'i bar dang /
T04TD3903E:281a-2: ji srid du dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro bar skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bar yang mkhyen to zhes rgyas par ro //
T04TD3903E:281a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba shes pa med de /
T04TD3903E:281a-4: gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'i ched du sems can rnams la chos ston par yang mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:281a-5: 'o na gla te don dam par mtha' dag stong pa nyid kho na yin zhing /
T04TD3903E:281a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na nyid gzigs pa yin na /
T04TD3903E:281a-7: de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyi rol gyi don dang rnam par shes pa dag ston par mdzad de /
T04TD3903E:281a-8: de kho na nyid gzigs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa ston par byed pa med la /
T04TD3903E:281a-9: ston na yang ci ltar de kho na nyid mthong ba'o zhes rtogs par bya zhe na /
T04TD3903E:281a-11: phyi rol gyi don dang rnam par rig pa dag sgrub pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das de ston pa ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:281a-12: 'on kyang rjes su brjod pa'i don du ste /
T04TD3903E:281a-13: phung po lnga po kho na dang rnam par shes pa tsam kho na yod kyi bdag ni med do zhes bdag bkag pa de rjes su brjod pas 'chad par bzhed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281a-14: rjes su brjod pa yang ci ltar na stong pa nyid gzigs pa la yin te /
T04TD3903E:281a-15: de so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T04TD3903E:281a-16: ma yin te 'jig rten pa'i blo kho nas rjes su brjod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281a-17: 'jig rten pa'i blo ni de lta bu ste /
T04TD3903E:281a-18: thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa goms pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281a-19: 'o na gal te bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten pa'i blo yin na ji ltar de kho na nyid gzigs pa yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:281a-20: ma yin te sngon gyi 'phen pas ston pa srid pa'i phyir te 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:281a-21: de'i phyir rnam pa du mar ston pa ni 'jig rten gzhug pa'i ched du 'gal ba med de /
T04TD3903E:281a-23: ldem por dgongs pa rnam pa bzhis ston pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281a-24: de la gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pa ni nyan thos rnams la blta bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:281a-25: bstan pa la gzhug pa'i don du mi skrag pa'i ched du gzugs la sogs pa yod pa nyid du ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281a-26: mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa ni don gzhan la dgongs pas na kun brtags la sogs pa ngo bo nyid gsum rnams la blta bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:281a-27: ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T04TD3903E:281a-28: ma skyes pa la sogs par chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281b-0: gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa ni nyes pa rnams 'dul ba la blta @281b bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:281b-1: ji skad du sangs rgyas la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:281b-2: nga nyid de'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa der gyur to zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-3: mnyam pa nyid la 'dir ldem por dgongs pa ste chos kyi sku khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:281b-4: chos la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:281b-5: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas 'di snyed la bsnyen bkur byas nas theg pa chen po khong du chud par gyur to zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-6: le lo'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:281b-7: gang rnams bde ba can du smon lam byed par 'gyur ba de rnams der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang sangs rgyas dri med zla 'od kyi mtshan gzung ba 'di tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
T04TD3903E:281b-8: dus gzhan du zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-9: cung zad tsam gyis chog pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba gang yin pa de nyid bsngags par mdzad la 'ga' zhig la smod pa ste /
T04TD3903E:281b-10: cung zad tsam gyis chog pa'i gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pas so //
T04TD3903E:281b-11: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'byor pa bsngags par mdzad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-12: nga rgyal la spyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:281b-13: gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig gi phun sum tshogs pa lhag par bsngags par mdzad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-14: 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni /
T04TD3903E:281b-15: gang rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa byed pa de rnams thams cad mtho ris su nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:281b-16: re zhig tsam ma nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po las 'byed pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas nyid du ston pa dang /
T04TD3903E:281b-17: theg pa gcig tu ston pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:281b-18: bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ni rjod byed zab pa nyid la blta bar bya ste /
T04TD3903E:281b-20: snying po med la snying por shes //
T04TD3903E:281b-21: phyin ci log la shin tu gnas //
T04TD3903E:281b-22: nyon mongs kyis kyang rab nyon mongs //
T04TD3903E:281b-23: byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:282a-2: 'di ni 'dir ldem por dgongs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:282a-3: snying po med pa rnam par g-yeng ba med pa la gang rnams kyi snying po'i blo can dang /
T04TD3903E:282a-4: rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog pas mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci log la shin tu gnas pa yongs su ma nyams pa dang /
T04TD3903E:282a-5: nyon mongs pa ste dka' ba spyod pa'i rtsol ba'i ngal bas shin tu yongs su nyon mongs pa'o zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:282a-6: dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdor ji skad du gsungs pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:282a-7: de la gsung gi gnyen po ni sems can gyi khams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-8: 'jam pa ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la bde ba la reg par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-9: yid du 'ong ba ni don bzang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-10: yid du 'thad pa ni yi ge bzang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-11: dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i rjes la thob pa'i phyir ro ;
T04TD3903E:282a-12: / dri ma med pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal dang bag chags thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-13: gsal ba ni tshig dang yi ge so sor grags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-14: snyan cing 'jebs pa ni mu stegs can blo gros ngan pa can thams cad kyi lta ba 'joms pa'i stobs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-15: mnyan par 'os pa ni sgrub pas nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-16: mi tshugs pa ni pha rol gyi smra ba po thams cad kyis gcad par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-17: snyan pa ni dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-18: dul ba ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-19: mi rtsub pa ni bslab pa bca' ba'i bde ba'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-20: mi brlang ba ni de las 'das pa na yang dag par nges par 'byung ba nye bar ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-21: rab tu dul ba ni theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba nye bar ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-22: rna bar snyan pa ni rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-23: lus tshim par byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-24: sems tshim par byed pa ni lhag mthong gi rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282a-25: snying dga' bar byed pa ni the tshom gcod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-0: dga' ba dang bde ba bskyed pa ni @282b log par nges pa sel ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-1: yongs su gdung ba med pa ni sgrub pa po 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-2: kun du shes par bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-3: rnam par rig par bya ba ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-4: rnam par gsal ba ni slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud med par chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-5: dga' bar bya ba ni rang gi don rjes su thob pa rnams dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-6: mngon par dga' bar 'os pa ni rang gi don rjes su thob pa rnams kyis spro bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-7: kun shes par bya bar gzhug tu 'os pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-8: rnam par rig par byar gzhug tu 'os pa ni bsam par bya ba'i chos yang dag par ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-9: rigs pa ni tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-10: 'brel pa ni ji ltar 'os par gdul bya la ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-11: zlos pa'i skyon med pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-12: seng ge'i sgra'i shugs ni mu stegs can gyi tshogs thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-13: glang po che'i sgra skad ni rgya che ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-14: 'brug gi sgra dbyangs ni zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-15: klu'i dbang po'i sgra dbyangs ni gzung bar 'os pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-16: dri za'i glu dbyangs ni snyan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-17: ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs ni rno ba dang 'jebs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-18: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa ni thag ring por grags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-19: shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grags pa ni grub pa thams cad la bkra shis pa nyid kyis sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:282b-20: de la sgra bzung ba ni don rtogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgra rtogs par bya ba'i don du'o //
T04TD3903E:282b-21: dbyangs bzung ba ni thag ring por de dang de'i brda rtogs par byed pa'i don no //
T04TD3903E:282b-22: grags pa bzung ba ni de dang de'i dbyangs kyis brda rjes su ston pa rtogs par byed pa'i don to //
T04TD3903E:282b-23: lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rda'i sgra ni bdud dang glags tshol ba thams cad las rgyal ba'i sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-0: ma khengs pa ni bstod pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med @283a * //
T04TD3903E:283a-2: mi dma' ba ni smad pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-3: sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa ni lung ston pa thams cad la mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-4: sgra zur chag pa med pa ni dran pa nyams pas mi gsung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-5: ma tshang ba med pa ni gdul bya'i bya ba rnams la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-6: ma zhum pa ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-7: ma zhen pa ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-8: rab tu dga' ba ni mi skyo ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-9: khyab pa ni rig pa'i gnas thams cad mkhas pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-10: chub pa ni sems can rnams kyi de'i don thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-11: rgyun chags pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-12: 'brel ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs su nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-13: sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ni sgra gcig las sgra'i rnam par rig pa du ma nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-14: dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa ni gcig las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-15: ma smad pa ni dam bca' ba ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-16: mi 'gyur ba ni dus la bab par rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-17: ma brtabs pa ni rtab rtab por mi gsung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-18: 'khor kun du grag pa ni ring ba dang nye ba'i 'khor du mtshungs par thos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-19: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad dpe'i chos su bsgyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so //
T04TD3903E:283a-20: de bzhin du yon tan gzhan rnams kyang mdo sna tshogs rnams su rgyas par bstan pa 'di lta ste /
T04TD3903E:283a-21: spyod pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis 'jug pa'i yon tan ni gdul bya ji lta bar bdag nyid kyi lus yang dag par phye ba kun du ston pas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283a-22: dge ba'i chos skye ba mkhyen pa'i yon tan ni /
T04TD3903E:283a-23: dper na sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs pa rnams la bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:283a-24: nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul las 'das pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon phra mo yang rdo'i gseb tu son pa'i gser gyi sa bon bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283b-0: ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ston pa'i yon tan ni @283b yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du rnam par rtog pa med par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang dang /
T04TD3903E:283b-1: rang gi mos pa'i dbang las de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog la sogs pa'i sku can du mthong ba ste /
T04TD3903E:283b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rtog par mi mdzad pa rnam par rtog par mdzad ces pa la sogs pa mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
T04TD3903E:283b-3: tshad med pa'i rten gyis sems can 'dul ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i yon tan ni tshad med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rten rnams kyis sems can 'dul ba'i ched du rab tu sbyor ba ste /
T04TD3903E:283b-4: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang sems pa dang /
T04TD3903E:283b-5: sgom pa'i rim gyis ye shes kyi khyad par thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjes su 'dzin pa dang yongs su gtang ba dag gis yongs su chad pa med par brgyud pas rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283b-6: chos kyi sku dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par rdzogs pa'i yon tan ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sku can sangs rgyas kyi sa la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mtshungs par rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283b-7: 'dres pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mos pa bzhin yang dag par ston pa'i yon tan ni /
T04TD3903E:283b-8: sems can gyi mos pa la ltos pas 'dres pa med cing ma 'dres par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283b-9: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum po rnams kyi yang yul yongs su chad pa med pa'i yon tan ni thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma spangs pa'i sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi bdag nyid rnams kyi sa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su thams cad du yul yongs su gcad pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:283b-10: 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa 'khor ba'i bar du gnas pa las de'i rgyu mthun pa mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams gdul bya rnams kyi dus ji lta ba bzhin phyi ma'i mthar dang de'i tshe nyid na yang so sor nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284a-0: mi zad pa nyid kyi yon tan ni chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bkod pa rnams nam mkha' bzhin du mthar thug pa @284a * //
T04TD3903E:284a-1: med pa las 'khor ba ji srid par chos kyi dbyings las 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyi phyir yon tan mi zad pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:284a-2: mdzes pa dang slar ma ldog pa dang ma lus pa rtogs pa'i yon tan te /
T04TD3903E:284a-3: 'dis kyang rim pa ji lta bar phyi rol pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams rnam par gcod par rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:284a-4: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis thob pa de nyid kyis na mdzes par rtogs pa yin la de bzhin du phyi rol pa rnams kyi ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:284a-5: mtshams dang bcas pa nyid kyis de'i thar pa ni thar pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284a-6: ldog pa'o zhes brjod pa na skye ba dang skyon kun du 'byung ba ste /
T04TD3903E:284a-7: de dag kyang slob pa rnams kyi yin la bcom ldan 'das ni mi slob pa'o //
T04TD3903E:284a-8: lus pa ni nyon mongs pa med cing nad med la lus dang ngag dang yid las su mi rung ba'am lam 'chad pa la mi gsal ba'o //
T04TD3903E:284a-9: de theg pa dman pa'i mi slob pa dgra bcom pa rnams la yang ji ltar srid pa bzhin yod la /
T04TD3903E:284a-10: bcom ldan 'das la ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:284a-11: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa'i yon tan te /
T04TD3903E:284a-12: de la rig pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o //
T04TD3903E:284a-13: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa ni zhabs so //
T04TD3903E:284a-14: rigs pa sngon ma can de dag zhabs nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:284a-15: gang gi phyir rig pa mig dang 'dra bas bltas pas cig shos zhabs dang 'dra ba dag gis de ltar 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284a-16: dbang phyug dang gzugs dang grags pa dang dpal dang ye shes dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan te /
T04TD3903E:284a-17: de la dbang phyug ni gzhan gyi dbang ma yin pa yin la /
T04TD3903E:284a-18: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:284a-19: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284a-20: rnam pa thams cad du yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:284a-21: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa ni bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsis mngon par bran zhing bla na med la sgrib pa med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs phun sum tshogs pa rtogs par mdzad pas so //
T04TD3903E:284a-23: gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bde ba'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:284a-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kho na bde ba ste /
T04TD3903E:284b-0: @284b sdug bsngal ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-2: rab tu zhi ba mi g-yo mchog / dbang bsgyur mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T04TD3903E:284b-3: rnam par mi rtog bde de'i phyir //
T04TD3903E:284b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rtogs par byed //
T04TD3903E:284b-6: de nyid kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la bcom ldan 'das ni btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no zhes 'dod pa ni mi 'thad par rig par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:284b-7: gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ni bla na med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis rnam par gsal ba'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-8: grags pa phun sum tshogs pa ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su sgra grag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-9: phun sum tshogs pa gang gis na mang po rnams kyis bstan par bya ba de ni dpal te /
T04TD3903E:284b-10: bsod nams kyi tshogs bla na med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T04TD3903E:284b-11: de phun sum tshogs pa ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa rnams kyis bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-12: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni shes bya thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du dag pa dang chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-13: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ni bla na med pa'i gsung phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T04TD3903E:284b-14: lhun gyis grub pas chags pa med cing mi ldog la 'bad pa med par 'byung ba dang 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:284b-15: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
T04TD3903E:284b-16: 'gro ba grol bar byed pa'i gsung ste /
T04TD3903E:284b-17: gzhan gyi don rnam pa thams cad la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dag gis rtag tu mi ldog pa'i bya ba can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:284b-19: rang bzhin legs par rnam par gnas pa me long ye shes kyis thob pa'i phyir dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:284b-20: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus thob pa'i phyir gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:284b-21: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na cho 'phrul thams cad kyis shin tu phra ba'i mtha' yas pa'i gdul bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i phyir grags pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:285a-1: cad du mos pa ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyi mtha' yas pa'i bsod nams dang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs las mi zad pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi rten la sogs pa ston pas tshim par byed pa'i phyir dpal phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:285a-2: thun mong ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa thams cad du ye shes la dbang nyid thob pa'i phyir ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:285a-3: de ltar gyur pa'i shin tu sems can gyi don la mchog tu sbyor ba na mchog tu mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i phyir brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes rnam gzhag mdzad do ;
T04TD3903E:285a-4: / de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye ste /
T04TD3903E:285a-5: nam mkha' gnas pa ji srid par bzhugs so //
T04TD3903E:285a-6: de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin zhe na /
T04TD3903E:285a-7: de nyid der gtso bor 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:285a-8: 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pas na 'jig rten te /
T04TD3903E:285a-9: skye dgu dang de'i snod do //
T04TD3903E:285a-10: des na 'jig rten gyi khams ni rnam pa gnyis te sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T04TD3903E:285a-11: de la snod kyi 'jig rten du sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa khang bzangs skyed mos tshal dang 'bab stegs dang dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pas bskor ba'i sems can gyi gnas mchog tu 'bar ba gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya dang mu sa ra gar bha dang rdo'i snying po dang mu tig dmar po dang kar ke ta na ste /
T04TD3903E:285a-12: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro ba'i 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa /
T04TD3903E:285a-13: steng du yang nam mkha' dang rjes su mthun par snang ba'o //
T04TD3903E:285a-14: der sems can gang su dag skyes pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T04TD3903E:285a-15: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu smin par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:285a-16: sems can de rnams kyang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis ni khams drug pa can te /
T04TD3903E:285a-17: dge slong skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:285a-18: de rnams kyi lus kyang mdzes pa dang ldan pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can te /
T04TD3903E:285a-19: sa gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs can no //
T04TD3903E:285b-0: de na sems @285b can rnams kyi longs spyod la yongs su longs spyod pa yang lha'i 'jig rten thams cad las so sor khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
T04TD3903E:285b-1: gang rnams kyi longs spyod ni mtha' gcig tu dge ba bde ba mtha' gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa mtha' gcig tu dbang bsgyur ba'o //
T04TD3903E:285b-2: 'di 'dra ba ni khams drug yongs su dag pa ste /
T04TD3903E:285b-4: mtshams dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-5: shin tu rol pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:285b-6: der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas der sems can de rnams kyi mi dge ba bsags pa spang bar bya ba dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-7: de'i gnyen po dge ba sogs pa rnams rab tu mkhyen nas dge ba'i chos bskyed pa'i ched du chos ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:285b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang yon tan 'di rnams thams cad yod la mchog tu rnam par dag par son pa ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:285b-9: de ltar mtshams med pa'i yon tan gyi gter gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi nang na /
T04TD3903E:285b-10: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad mchog tu 'bar bas sku rnam par gsal ba ni bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T04TD3903E:285b-11: de la gzugs tshad mar byed pa'i gang zag rnams kyi ngor dad pa mngon par 'phel ba'i ched du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams rnam par gzhag gi 'di rnams kyi grangs 'di tsam du bya bar nus par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:285b-12: de la mtshan rnams ni phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-13: rus sbal bzhin zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-14: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dra bas 'brel ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-15: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-17: sor mo ring ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-18: rting pa yangs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-19: sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-20: zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-21: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-22: byin pa ri dags ae ne ya lta bu dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-23: dpung pa ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:285b-24: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-1: spu re re nas g-yas su 'khyil ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-2: zhal mdzod spus mtshan pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-3: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-4: spung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-5: thal gang rgyas pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-6: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-7: nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-8: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-9: ljags srab cing ring ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyis dam pa'i chos go bar byed pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-11: 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-12: tshems shin tu dkar ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-14: tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-15: tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-17: spyan rdzim [?] ba'i lta bu nyid do //
T04TD3903E:286a-18: zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid ni sa la mnyam par reg pa ste /
T04TD3903E:286a-19: sa chen po thams cad la yang dma' ba dang mtho ba dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-20: gseg ma dang rdo ba dang chu dang 'dam dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-21: tsher ma dang bu ga la sogs pa med par mnyam por gnas la /
T04TD3903E:286a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyi dbang gis ring ba yang nye bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:286a-23: sor mo'i tshigs dang po nas brtsams pa'i sor mo'i bar la seng seng po med na yang sor gdub la sogs pa'i rgyan gzhug tu rung ba'i sor mo can no //
T04TD3903E:286a-24: 'jam pa ni shin tu gzhon pa nyid do //
T04TD3903E:286a-25: gzhon sha chags pa ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:286a-26: bdun ni phyag dang zhabs kyi rgyab gnyis dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-27: phrag gang gnyis dang ltag pa ste shas khengs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:286a-28: zhabs kyi mthil thams cad cha bzhir byas nas cha gsum rnams la zhabs dang /
T04TD3903E:286a-29: cha gcig la rting pa ste tshad dang ldan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:286a-30: zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa zhes 'dir mdo ni shin tu pus mo dang long bu mi mngon pa nyid kyi phyir zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa'o zhes so //
T04TD3903E:286a-31: de'i phyir shin tu yang sbas pa'i don can aud sgra'o //
T04TD3903E:286a-32: pus mo dang long mo'i rus pa rjod par byed pa ni sham kha'i sgra'o //
T04TD3903E:286a-33: brla'i rtsa ba las 'og thams cad la zhabs zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:286a-34: ae ne ya'i yan lag ni ae ne ya ste /
T04TD3903E:286a-35: byin pa dang 'dra ba ni byin pa ste /
T04TD3903E:286b-0: sha shin tu rgyas pa dad rim gyis phra @286b ba dang /
T04TD3903E:286b-2: shin tu 'dril zhing yongs su zlum pa ste sor brgyad kyi phyogs su 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:286b-3: phyag dag mdzes pa nyid ni rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:286b-4: ring ba nyid ni ring ba ste /
T04TD3903E:286b-5: ma btud par pus mor sleb pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:286b-6: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni gang gis mdoms kyi sba ba mi mngon pa'o //
T04TD3903E:286b-7: mdog gser 'dra ba nyid kyis na sku mkhregs shing snum la 'od gsal ba'i kha dog can nyid du bstan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:286b-8: spu g-yas su 'khyil ba nyid ni g-yas phyogs su 'khor bas so //
T04TD3903E:286b-9: mdzod spu ni smin mtshams kyi bar na thig le'i gnas na 'jam pa dkar ba mnyen pa drangs na khru gang dang khru gnyis dang khru gsum la sogs pa'i tshad 'byung la /
T04TD3903E:286b-11: rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam pa dngul 'bur gyi rnam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:286b-12: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid ni rgyas pa yangs pa sha rgyas pa'i brang can nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:286b-13: mdzes pa nyid dang rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:286b-14: shin tu zlum pa rtsa'i dra ba mi mngon pa ni gang gi dpung mgo ste /
T04TD3903E:286b-15: gser gyi bum pa'i mgrin pa yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa legs par 'brel pa can no //
T04TD3903E:286b-16: dpung mgo dag gi bar dang bar ni thal gong ste 'di'i de nye bar rgyas pa'o zhes pa thal gong rgyas pa'o //
T04TD3903E:286b-17: ro drug po rnams kyi bro ba mkhyen zhing tshim par byed pa ste ro bro ba'i mchog nyid kyi zhal zas can ni bcom ldan 'das so zhes kha cig tu brjod do //
T04TD3903E:286b-18: yan lag dang nying lag rnams su ro rnams bro bar byed gsol bar byed ces pa ro bro ba ste rtsa rnams so //
T04TD3903E:286b-19: de rnams kyi mchog nyid ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyis mnyam par gnas pa ste /
T04TD3903E:286b-20: 'di'i rlung la sogs pas ma dkrugs pa rnams ni mtho bar mi 'gyur 'dus khongs su ma yin /
T04TD3903E:286b-22: kha dog ngan pa ma yin te /
T04TD3903E:286b-23: mi mngon par rtsa de rnams kyis rnam 'gyur ma byas pa'i sku ni gser gyi gtan pa bzhin du yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:286b-24: rlung la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par gsol ba'o //
T04TD3903E:286b-26: skyes bu chen po rnams kyi ma gri na pa ro gsol bar byed pa stong phrag bdun po gyen du kha phyogs pa rnams 'jug go zhes so //
T04TD3903E:287a-0: ro thams cad kyang zhal du bcug pas bdud rtsi'i ro dang @287a * //
T04TD3903E:287a-2: yang na ro bro bar bya'o zhes pa ro ste drug rnams so //
T04TD3903E:287a-3: de rnams kyi bro ba ste /
T04TD3903E:287a-5: de dang ldan pa'i zhal zas gang la yod pa ni de skad do zhes bye brag tu bshad do //
T04TD3903E:287a-6: n+yag ni dma' ba ste sku smad do /
T04TD3903E:287a-7: ro dha ni sku stod do //
T04TD3903E:287a-8: yongs su gab ba ni mnyam pa ste lte ba nas bzung nas sku smad dang sku stod tshad mnyam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:287a-9: yang na 'dom ni nya gro dha ste sku bzhengs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis 'dom du byas pa na sku mtha' dag chu dang zhes dag mnyam pa'o //
T04TD3903E:287a-10: nya gro dha ni shing kha kha ta ste de dang 'dra bar chu dang zheng mnyam pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T04TD3903E:287a-11: gtsug tor ni dbu dkris pa'i rnam par zlum zhing legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:287a-12: ljags che ba nyid ni ring ba nyid kyi phyir te /
T04TD3903E:287a-13: snyan gyi bug pa'i bar dang dpral ba'i skra mtshams kyi mthar thug par ljags kyis reg pa'o //
T04TD3903E:287a-14: shin tu yang dag par rdzogs pa ma yin pa chos bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba legs par 'brel pa dang 'gram pa'i mtha' zlum pa nyid kyi phyir /
T04TD3903E:287a-15: 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu nyid do //
T04TD3903E:287a-16: tshems bzhi bcu tshad ba ni gzhan rnams kyi bzhin du sum cu rtsa gnyis sam nyi shu rtsa brgya ma yin pa'o //
T04TD3903E:287a-17: spyan ni zlum pa'i dbus snum zhing gnas pa dang nag po zlum po'i logs gnyis dkar ba dang /
T04TD3903E:287a-18: rdzi ma gnas pa'i go skabs snum la mthing gar 'dug pa dang /
T04TD3903E:287a-19: mtha' gnyis shing pi ppa la'i shun pa ltar dmar ba dang /
T04TD3903E:287a-20: rdzi ma dang spyan gyi bar gser gyi kha dog go zhes pa 'di lta bu dang ba lnga rnams dang ldan kyang spyan gyi dkyil 'khor gtso bo nyid kyi phyir spyan mthon mthing ngo zhes gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:287a-21: be'u gzhon nu'i bzhin du bla 'og shin tu snum zhing 'od dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:287a-22: ma 'dzings pa nyid kyi phyir spyan rdzi ma pa'i lta bu nyid do //
T04TD3903E:287a-23: mtshan 'di rnams rjes su gsal par byed pa'am mtshan dang rjes su mthun par gsal bar byed pa'am /
T04TD3903E:287a-24: skyes bu chen por rab tu gsal bar byed ces pa'am /
T04TD3903E:287a-25: rjes su mthun par mdzes par byed ces pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams te /
T04TD3903E:287a-26: sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287a-27: sen mo snum pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-0: sen mo @287b mtho ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-1: sor mo zlum pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-2: sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-3: sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-4: rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-5: rtsam dud pa med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-6: long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-7: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-8: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-9: glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-10: ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-11: khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-12: g-yas phyogs su bskor bas gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-13: mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-14: mi g-yo bar gshegs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-15: sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-16: sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid do //
T04TD3903E:287b-17: sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang sku gtsang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-19: sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-20: mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-21: sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-22: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-23: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-24: sku shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-25: sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-27: sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-28: yan lag dang nyid lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-29: gzegs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-31: dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-32: dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-33: phyal phyang nge ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-34: lta ba zab pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-35: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-36: kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-37: kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-38: sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-39: phyag mthil shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-40: phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-41: phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-42: phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-43: zhal ha cang mi ring ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-44: shin tu dang zhing 'od 'bar ba nyid las zhal la gzugs brnyan 'char ba'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:287b-45: zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-49: glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-50: gsung snyan zhing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-52: mche ba rno ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:287b-53: mche ba dkar ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-2: mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-6: rdzi ma stugs pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-7: spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-8: smin tshugs ring ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-10: smin ma snum pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-11: smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-12: phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-14: snyan ma nyams pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-15: dpral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-16: dpral ba dbyes che ba nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-18: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang ;
T04TD3903E:288a-19: dbu skra stug pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-21: dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-22: dbu skra mi bshor pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-23: dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-24: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil pas thugs kha dang phyag dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-25: zhabs brgyan pa nyid ces pa'o //
T04TD3903E:288a-26: thugs kar yang dpal be'u la sogs pa 'byung ba ste /
T04TD3903E:288a-27: thugs ka na gnas pa'i dpal be 'u la sogs pa rnams las 'od zer rnams 'byung ngo zhes pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:288a-28: mdo gzhan du phyag dang zhabs la sdod ris dang bum pa gang ba dang nya dang gnya' shing dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-29: dung dang khri bzang po dang gdugs dkar po dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-30: rnga yab la sogs pa rnams kyang gsungs so //
T04TD3903E:288a-31: mtshan dang dpe byad 'di rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams la yang 'byung ste /
T04TD3903E:288a-32: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul na gnas pa dang /
T04TD3903E:288a-33: gsal ba dang rdzogs pa nyid rnams kyis bla na med par phul du 'byung ba'o //
T04TD3903E:288a-34: phal cher ni 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T04TD3903E:288a-35: gzugs kyi sku gang la gnas nas de de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku mngon du mdzad pa'i sku de bsam gyis mi bya ba cing sna tshogs gzugs can te /
T04TD3903E:288a-36: gzugs can de dang des byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i rgyu nyid kyis yongs su 'gyur bar mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:288b-0: de @288b las sgra gang byung ba de las 'jig rten yang rnam pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa'i snod du 'gyur zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:288b-1: gang gi phyir 'dis sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas smon lam bskyed pa ste /
T04TD3903E:288b-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'di rnams dus 'dir 'di ltar rnam par mi rtog par yid bzhin nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra bar ji ltar rjes su mthun par sems can gyi don sgrub pa rdzogs par mdzad mod kyang skad cig kyang chos kyi dbyings las mi g-yo ba dang /
T04TD3903E:288b-3: sems can gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba de bzhin du bdag kyang 'gyur bar bya'o //
T04TD3903E:288b-4: nam mkha' ji srid pa dang sems can ji srid pa dang ji srid du nyon mongs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:288b-5: las rnams rab tu gdags pa de srid du bdag srog chags gcig gi yang bya ba la /
T04TD3903E:288b-6: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs kyang /
T04TD3903E:288b-7: gnas bar bya zhing pan ba rnams bya'o zhes pa 'di'i smon lam gyi 'phen pa'i dbang las dang /
T04TD3903E:288b-8: gdul bya rnams kyi yang rnam pa de lta bu'i chos nyan pa 'jug pa'i las yongs su smin pa las /
T04TD3903E:288b-9: de 'dra ba'i bya ba'i khyad par rnams rab tu gdags te /
T04TD3903E:288b-10: gang la rnam par rtog pa med par gyur kyang mtha' med pa'i dus su nam mkha' ji srid par ji ltar gdul bya dang rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba 'jug pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi don mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:288b-11: sku 'di yang sa bcu'i dbang phyug kho na'i byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pas dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyi me long can rnams la so sor snang gi sa 'og ma rnams la ma yin no //
T04TD3903E:288b-12: sems can 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun du ji skad brjod pa'i sku las /
T04TD3903E:288b-13: gzhan rgyu mtshan pa'i sku 'jug pa rnams ni chos kyi sku'i mthu las yang dag par byung ba'am /
T04TD3903E:288b-14: gzugs kyi sku'i ma thu las yang dag par byung ba yang rung ste /
T04TD3903E:288b-15: de rnams kyi yang mthu phul du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab po //
T04TD3903E:289a-0: de ltar ni gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas skabs las gang sngon thog ma med pa dang @289a * //
T04TD3903E:289a-1: ldan pa'i 'khor bar rang gi skye ba'i gnas skabs 'gag pa spyod pa'i mtha' sna tshogs pa du ma de rnams gsal ba ste /
T04TD3903E:289a-2: lus pa med pa'i spyod pa'i mtha' bstan pa las phan tshun 'dres pa med pa de rnams thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la gdong gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du cig car nyid du rgyu mthun pa'i sku gcig kho na la /
T04TD3903E:289a-3: 'bad pa med pa kho nar kun nas ston par byed do //
T04TD3903E:289a-4: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngon spyad pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:289a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams /
T04TD3903E:289a-6: gang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bee d'u rya dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-9: shel la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rin po che'i ljon shing la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa /
T04TD3903E:289a-10: zhe dang chu dang zlum skor la sogs pa rnams dang bcas pa de la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi khyad par gyis nye bar mdzes par /
T04TD3903E:289a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltams pa la sogs pa ston par bshad pa de ma lus pa sku gcig la ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289a-12: sangs rgyas de rnams kyi yang sku dang spyod pa dag gi mthu phul du byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-13: ji snyed du de rnams kyi dge 'dun 'dus par gyur pa'am /
T04TD3903E:289a-14: chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa'i rnam pa gang gis nyan thos dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun du gyur pa dang /
