T04TD3903E:289a-15: sangs rgyas de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par bkra ba'i sku can dbyibs dang ldan pa zhal zas dang chos gos dang gnas la sogs pa yongs su spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams byung ba dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-16: theg pa gcig dang theg pa gsum la brten pa'i pa'i chos nye bar bstan pa gang 'dra ba dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-17: bdag nyid bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs su rab tu skyes pa gang 'dra ba dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-18: gzugs dang blo dang ldan pa dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-19: khyim pa dang rab tu byung bar gyur pa dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-20: chos mnyan nas spyod pa gang la spyod pa dang /
T04TD3903E:289a-21: lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa'i bslab pa khas blangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-0: @289b sangs rgyas de rnams dang nyan thos dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la bza' ba la sogs pa dang chos gos dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-1: rin po che'i rgyan la sogs pa dus ji srid du tshad gang phul ba dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-2: ji ltar yang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i spyod tshul gyi mtha' ston pa de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-5: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la spyod pa yang gang sngon gyi gnas skabs ma tshang ba med pa de rnams ma lus par sku gcig la ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289b-6: de lta bu lta zhog / gzhan yang ba spu'i khung bu ra [?] yang bdag nyid kyi spyod pa thams cad gsal bar ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289b-7: gzhan yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-8: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar gyi spyod pa gang rnams dang ;
T04TD3903E:289b-9: dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T04TD3903E:289b-12: skye bo ma lus pa rnams kyi yang gnas skabs thams cad ba spu'i khung bu re rer ci car ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289b-13: nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bzhed na rdul phra rab gcig gi nang du ste /
T04TD3903E:289b-14: 'jig rten phra rab gyur pa yang ma yin la /
T04TD3903E:289b-15: rdul phra rab che bar yang ma yin no /
T04TD3903E:289b-16: rdul phra rab gcig gis kyang mtha' med pa'i yul la khyab pa dang 'jig rten ma lus pa brten pa ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams na ji snyed pa'i rdul phra rab de snyed las lhag pa'i spyod pa rnam par bkra ba rnams skad cig gcig la rnam par rtog pa med par 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du ston par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:289b-18: de ltar 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan phul du byung ba rnam pa de lta bu'i mig 'phrul gyi ngo bo las ma 'das pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum pa yang dag par ston par nus pa'o zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis mos par bya'o //
T04TD3903E:290a-0: de ltar bcom ldan 'das khams gsum @290a * //
T04TD3903E:290a-2: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis 'jig rten rjes su gzhug pas yum dang yab dang sras la sogs pa'i 'brel pa yang dag par ston zhing khams gsum par bzhugs nas ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa yang dag par 'jug pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la /
T04TD3903E:290a-3: grags pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa la sogs pa 'dod pas ma yin par thugs rjes 'gro ba rab tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i phrin las rnams kyis rab tu 'god par mdzad do //
T04TD3903E:290a-5: 'gro rnam zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T04TD3903E:290a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa ji srid du /
T04TD3903E:290a-7: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T04TD3903E:290a-8: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T04TD3903E:290a-9: ces pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan no //
T04TD3903E:290a-10: phrin las de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das sku de rnams su sprul pa ste /
T04TD3903E:290a-11: gang dmyal ba pa rnams kyi dmyal ba'i me shi bar byas pas dang /
T04TD3903E:290a-13: de bzhin du byol song rnams la yang rang gi sha dang khrag la sogs pa ster bas dang /
T04TD3903E:290a-14: de bzhin du yi dags rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa byin pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290a-15: chos ston pas kyang sems mngon par dang bar byas nas /
T04TD3903E:290a-16: mngon par dang bas de bas kyang rang gi 'gro ba rnams nas shi 'phos nas lha dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290a-17: lha theg pa dman pa la mo sa pa rnams kyang chos bstan pas mngon par dang bar byas nas dmigs su skye ba nas ji srid du nyan thos kyi byang chub la 'god do zhes pa la sogs pa rnams mdo ji lta bar ;
T04TD3903E:290a-18: bdag gis gong du gnas skabs ji ltar brjod zin to //
T04TD3903E:290a-19: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar rang nyid thugs dang po la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa de bzhin du sems de dang de bskyed pa'i ched du gdul bya rnams la chos ston par mdzad do zhes mdor bsdus nas 'di'i phrin las bstan pa'o //
T04TD3903E:290a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan ji skad brjod pa 'di rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du 'do la rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:290a-21: gang rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
T04TD3903E:290b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab @290b pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de las gzhan pa'i yon tan mtha' dag ldan pa'i bde bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku las tha dad pa med par 'jug pa nam mkha' gcig pu dpe dang dper bya ba'i yon tan re rer yon tan ma lus pa rgyas pa rnams ni /
T04TD3903E:290b-1: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i 'gro ba ma mgon med pa /
T04TD3903E:290b-2: rnam pa thams cad kyis snod ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun chad pa med par nam mkha' 'jug pa ji srid par mgon du 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:290b-3: ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad mnyam par 'gyur ram zhe na /
T04TD3903E:290b-4: rgyu gsum rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid de /
T04TD3903E:290b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-6: chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-8: sprul pa'i sku dag gis 'jig rten gyi don spyod pa'o //
T04TD3903E:290b-9: sku tshe dang rigs dang tshad kyis byas pa'i tha dad par ni 'gyur te /
T04TD3903E:290b-10: shin tu ring ba dang thung bar 'tsho ba'i phyir dang bram ze dang rgyal rigs su rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-11: 'od srungs dang goo ta ma la sogs pa rus tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-12: chung ba dang che ba'i bong tshod tha dad pa'i phyir te ;
T04TD3903E:290b-14: phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di nyid yid la byed pa'i mkhas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du shin tu dga' ba dang gus pa bskyed par bya nus te /
T04TD3903E:290b-15: 'di lta ste rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-16: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang phan pa byed pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:290b-17: de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:290b-18: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-19: dus ring por goms par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-20: rgyun du goms par byed pa dang /
T04TD3903E:290b-21: bkur stir byas te goms par byed pa'o //
T04TD3903E:290b-22: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:290b-26: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:290b-27: phan par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-1: bsngal las shin tu nges par 'grol pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-2: theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-3: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-4: nye bar ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-6: rnam pa thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-8: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-11: bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-12: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-13: mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-14: phyi rol gyi yul rnam sa sprul zhing yongs su bsgyur ba dang byin gyis rlob pa la dbang ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-15: sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa la dbang ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-16: bsgribs pa dang nam mkhar dang ring ba la myur bar gshegs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-17: phra ba mang por 'jug pa la dbang ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-18: sku'i 'od kyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gnyug ma'i ngo mtshar ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-19: gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-20: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-21: dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-22: stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-23: rdo rje'i snying po'i rus pa'i lus phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-24: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa dang zhing tha dad pa ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-25: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'ga' zhig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni shel gyi rang bzhin /
T04TD3903E:291a-26: 'ga' zhig gi ni bee d'urya'i rang bzhin te /
T04TD3903E:291a-27: de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-28: ming tha dad pa ni 'od dpag med dang /
T04TD3903E:291a-29: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291a-30: sku tha dad pa ni 'ga' zhig gis rnam pa 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba ste /
T04TD3903E:291a-31: shel gyi rang bzhin la sogs pa tha dad pa'am /
T04TD3903E:291a-32: sku chung ba dang sku che ba tha dad pas so //
T04TD3903E:291b-0: chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa tha dad pa ni sa bcu pa dang blo @291b gros mi zad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la sogs pa chos kyi rnam grangs tha dad pas so //
T04TD3903E:291b-1: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa ni der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ltos pa ste /
T04TD3903E:291b-2: bskor ba tha dad pa yang ngo //
T04TD3903E:291b-3: ji ltar sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir nges par bstan pa de ltar kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
T04TD3903E:291b-4: gnas gang de rnams bsams na byis pa nus pa zad pa las skyo zhing smyo la brgyal ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te /
T04TD3903E:291b-5: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T04TD3903E:291b-6: de rnams kyang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug gi gtso bos gzigs shing bstan pa de kho na ltar bdag gis 'dir gdams ngag ji lta bar nges par bshad pa'o //
T04TD3903E:291b-7: de ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po nyid mdor bsdus pa ste /
T04TD3903E:291b-8: phye bar bya na ni dbye ba mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
T04TD3903E:291b-9: sangs rgyas rnams kho nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i khung bu re rer dang dpe byad dang skyes bu'i mtshan dang /
T04TD3903E:291b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par de rnams kyang yongs su gcod par nus la /
T04TD3903E:291b-12: mngon par brjod par yang nus mod /
T04TD3903E:291b-13: ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bskal pa grangs med par sku tshe'i tshad byin gyis brlabs par gyur cing /
T04TD3903E:291b-14: myur zhing myur bar las gzhan med par gyur nas gal te brjod par gyur pa de lta na yang yon tan yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba nyid na /
T04TD3903E:291b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ci smos la rang sangs rgyas sam nyan thos rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mtha' shes pa'am brjod par mi nus par sngar kho na'o //
T04TD3903E:291b-16: gshog pa'i rgya shin tu yangs pa'i rlung gi shugs rlob cing pha rol gnon pa'i nam mkha' lding yang /
T04TD3903E:291b-17: nam mkha' yongs su zad do snyam nas nam mkha' las 'bab pa ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:291b-18: 'on kyang rang gi stobs dang pha rol gnon pa nyams pas so //
T04TD3903E:292a-0: de bzhin du gang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam @292a * //
T04TD3903E:292a-2: de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan de snyed mngon par brjod pa nus pa las /
T04TD3903E:292a-3: yon tan yongs su zad pas nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' med pa'i yon tan rnams las ldog pa ma yin gyi /
T04TD3903E:292a-4: rang gi blo'i stobs yongs su nyams pas ni log nas gnas na /
T04TD3903E:292a-5: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyis yon tan gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
T04TD3903E:292a-6: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su shes pa'am mngon par brjod pa la 'di lta bu'i gtam 'di lta ste /
T04TD3903E:292a-7: de'i phyir bdag lta bu'i ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis long ba ji lta ba bzhin gyi de kho na nyid shin tu lkog tu gyur pa can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i skabs ga la yod /
T04TD3903E:292a-8: gal te yang de lta ste /
T04TD3903E:292a-9: de lta na yang 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /
T04TD3903E:292a-10: 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sde la sogs pa la brten ba las /
T04TD3903E:292a-11: the tshom med par bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig gi cha tsam brjod do //
T04TD3903E:292a-12: de ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba'i yon tan rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no //
T04TD3903E:292a-13: 'on kyang slar yang byis pa rang yon tan gyis bkren pas mos pa dang bral ba rnams yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra ba thos kyang sangs rgyas de'i chos la gus par mi byed la /
T04TD3903E:292a-14: mkhas pa rnams ni rkang gi khong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la'ang mngon par rab tu dang bar byed do //
T04TD3903E:292a-15: de rnams de la dad pa tsam gyis kyar mngon par bsgrub pa rnams /
T04TD3903E:292a-16: rnam par smin pa ma nges pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi phung po rnams zil gyis mnan te /
T04TD3903E:292a-17: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong zhing /
T04TD3903E:292a-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla na med pa mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T04TD3903E:292a-19: thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan las yon tan gyi snang pa'i le 'u ste yongs su bcad ba bzhi pa'o /
T04TD3903E:292a-21: // / zhes pa thub dgongs dpag bsam ljon shing rtog pa'i rlung gis ni //
T04TD3903E:292a-22: g-yos shing lta ngan chu yis rgyun du rab zhir mthar zhugs pa //
T04TD3903E:292a-23: mi mthun phyogs rnams nye bar gyur las 'bras bu bzang rnams bsdus //
T04TD3903E:292b-0: kye snying slar yang skye ba dag pa 'byung ba ga la zhig / snang ba 'di las phan dang @292b mi phan pa yang rnam bltas nas //
T04TD3903E:292b-1: gang las mtho bas yon tan rang bzhin theg pa 'di zhon te //
T04TD3903E:292b-2: bdag nang stobs ldan dgra bo'i rigs kyi rtsa ba myur chod la //
T04TD3903E:292b-3: srid gsum rnam rgyal phun tshogs byang chub gnas kyis phun tshogs byon //
T04TD3903E:292b-4: tshul gsum rnams la bden pa zung gi srog / mdor bsdus bdag gis 'di ru nye bar bkod //
T04TD3903E:292b-5: gal te nyes par zin na de bzod mdzod //
T04TD3903E:292b-6: bden pa gnyis la sa brnyes tshad ma yin //
T04TD3903E:292b-7: gzhung lugs smad med bshad pa'i legs byas 'dod bya zla ba ni //
T04TD3903E:292b-8: rab rib 'joms byed gnyid bral de yis skye bo tshim byed shog bdag kyang so so'i sku 'dzin bsam mi khyab sku phun tshogs kyis //
T04TD3903E:292b-9: rtsod pa dang bral bskal par rol pa'i ched du 'du bar shog / yon tan dam pa bsgrigs pa'i rgyan //
T04TD3903E:292b-11: snang ba 'di ni skyo bo yi //
T04TD3903E:292b-12: mgrin pa rnams la gdags par mdzod//
T04TD3903E:292b-13: snang ba dang bcas rgyan 'di ltar //
T04TD3903E:292b-14: sems can sems la sdong bu bzhin //
T04TD3903E:292b-16: nam mkha' ji srid gnas par shog / thub pa dgongs pa'i rgyan slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3903E:292b-18: // / rnam gnon tshul mkhas 'ji gas med kyi //
T04TD3903E:292b-19: gnas la reg pa'i tshul 'di ni //
T04TD3903E:292b-20: dpal ldan dga' skyong rgyal srid kyi //
T04TD3903E:292b-21: sum cu'i lo la byas pa yin //
T04TD3903E:292b-22: phyed dang bcas pa'i stong phrag lnga //
T04TD3903E:292b-23: mkhas pa rnams kyis sdom pa'i tshad //
T04TD3903E:292b-25: / tshad bzhin snying la dngos po rnams //
T04TD3903E:292b-27: bde gshegs bstan pa bsam 'phel nor bu skye bo kun gyi rang gi mi shes mun pas bsgribs nas don med 'gyur //
T04TD3903E:292b-28: de rtogs don du shes rab sgron ma 'degs par byed pa'i dbang gyur shing rta chen po rnams kyang nub gyur te //
T04TD3903E:292b-29: 'gro ba kun la shin tu don med lta bur mi 'jigs seng ge'i thugs rje'i spyan gyis rab gzigs nas //
T04TD3903E:292b-30: yon tan rang bzhin thub chen dgongs pa'i sgron ma 'di ni mi shes mun pa bsal phyir mdzad //
T04TD3903E:292b-31: de lta na yang 'phags pa'i skad kyis dben pa'i skye bo dag la don med lta bur kho bos rab rtogs nas //
T04TD3903E:293a-1: kun gyis yid kyi mun pa shin tu stug po rnam par bsal phyir bdag gis legs par 'di bsgyur nas //
T04TD3903E:293a-2: byung ba'i bsod nams chu 'dzin 'od zer lta bur shin tu gsal zhing dga' ba skyed pa gang yin des //
T04TD3903E:293a-3: 'di ru skye bo kun gyi yid kyi mun pa shin tu stug po rnam par bsal nas zab mo'i lam rtogs shog //
T04TD3903E:293a-4: / mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byams la shes pa'i snang ba skyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid las mnyan nas /
T04TD3903E:293a-5: de nyid kyi zhal sngar sh'a kya'i dge slong dpang zho gsal ba grags zhes bya bas /
T04TD3903E:293a-6: yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal n'a lendrar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T04TD3903E:293a-8: // / dus phyis lung dang rigs pa'i dbang phyug stag sde pa chen po seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi bka' drin dang /
T04TD3903E:293a-9: de nyid kyi sras kyi thu bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyi stobs kyis mtha' yas pa'i shes bya'i chos la dbang bsgyur ba shong ston lo ts'a ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par bshad pa'i srol la sogs pa la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:293a-10: phyi dang nang gi gzhung lugs du ma rnams la blo'i snang ba cher rgyas pa /
T04TD3903E:293a-11: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dpang dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas /
T04TD3903E:293a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dog shing dbon po dang /
T04TD3903E:293a-13: bde ba chos kyi bzang po la sogs pas /
T04TD3903E:293a-14: mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa la brten nas /
T04TD3903E:293a-15: legs par bcos nas dag par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T04TD3903E:293a-18: // / slar yang dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa de nyid kyis gzhung 'di'i skabs dang gzhung lugs gzhan gyi skabs mthun pa ji snyed rnyed pa rnams sbyar zhing rgya dpe dang gtugs te legs par brtags shing dpyad nas zhus chen bgyis la /
T04TD3903E:293a-19: don la yang legs par dpyad pas shin tu dag par bgyis pa'o //
T04TD3903E:293a-20: sgra don snang ba nyin byed 'od //
T04TD3903E:293a-21: brtson pas yang yang brten pa yis //
T04TD3903E:293a-22: gzhung mchog zab yangs 'dab brgya'i tshal //
T04TD3903E:293a-23: dgongs don ge sar rab gsal gyur //
T04TD3903E:293a-24: 'gro ba mang po la phan gyur cig //
